customer_review_original_language: London to Izmir via Istanbul. First time I'd flown TK. I found them very good in the air, cabin crew, planes, food, all very nice. Not so great on the ground, ground staff, call centre, computer systems. My flight from LHR was delayed so I missed the connection in Istanbul. Most ground staff don't speak English, and I was given contradictory instructions from those that could speak a little English. I eventually got on a flight to Izmir three hours later, but it wasn't an easy process, made worse by the vast distances one has to walk between gates in the cavernous new airport. Also, I'd phoned a TK call centre (based in Ukraine) to pay an extra Â£40 or so each way for extra leg room seats. However, as the departure times kept changing, my seats kept changing, and for the return leg to London from Istanbul I was not given an extra leg room seat. Luckily there was a spare exit row seat and the cabin crew sorted me out. Overall, I think their cabin crew and planes are very good, ground staff and call centre staff need better training and they all need better computer systems and software to work with.

İstanbul'dan Bükreş'e. Havaalanında check-in yapıyoruz, valizlerimizi alıyorlar, kapıya gidiyoruz ve kapıda sürpriz bir şekilde iki çocukla uçağa binmemize izin vermiyorlar, çünkü uçuşta doluluk var diyorlar. İki çocuğumuzla sabah 5'e kadar bizi havaalanına 2 saat uzaklıktaki bir otele valizsiz, yemeksiz, hiçbir şey yemeden getirene kadar havaalanında beklemek zorunda kaldık. Bu havayolu ile ilk ve son uçuşumuz.

Da Roma a Prishtina via Istanbul. Ho volato con questa compagnia diverse volte negli ultimi anni e posso onestamente dire che sta peggiorando sempre di più. Ho volato da Roma a Prishtina via Istanbul, tutti e 4 i voli hanno avuto un ritardo (che a quanto pare è abbastanza normale con Turkish). Il personale di terra è per la maggior parte inutile. A Istambul ho provato a chiedere alcune informazioni su un ritardo del volo (avevo solo 30 minuti prima del volo in coincidenza) e l'intera risposta è stata: "Rilassati signore, nessun problema signore, va bene". Il nuovo aeroporto è un casino gigantesco, molto grande e disorganizzato. Quando atterri a Istanbul ci vogliono dai 20 ai 25 minuti di rullaggio e altri 10 minuti prima che inizino effettivamente a sbarcare, è un'esperienza estenuante soprattutto se sei di fretta. Dimenticate di chiedere qualche indicazione al nuovo aeroporto, tutti chiacchierano tra loro, alcuni con un caffè in mano. Ho volato con quattro aerei diversi in questo viaggio, due erano abbastanza nuovi, gli altri due erano vecchi, i sedili consumati. Il cibo a bordo era di pessima qualità..., lasciatemelo ripetere, pessima qualità. In generale posso dire che l'equipaggio è adeguatamente addestrato e offre una buona esperienza o almeno ci prova, ovviamente è lontana dall'esperienza che si ottiene volando in Qatar o Emirates ma comunque abbastanza buona, mentre il personale di terra, specialmente a Istanbul, è la personificazione della parola pigro. Un completo disastro. Cercherò di evitare Turkish Airlines in futuro, non è una compagnia economica e sicuramente non vale i soldi che paghi. Se sei di fretta o sai che eviterai questa compagnia ed eviterai il nuovo aeroporto di Istanbul a tutti i costi.

इस्तांबुल के रास्ते मुंबई से डबलिन तक। यदि आप मुंबई से डबलिन की यात्रा कर रहे हैं तो कभी भी तुर्की एयरलाइंस बुक न करें। अगर मुंबई से फ्लाइट लेट हो जाती है तो उनके पास आपके लिए कोई दूसरा विकल्प नहीं है। वे सीधे आपसे इस्तांबुल में होटल में रुकने के लिए कहेंगे। उन्हें आपके समय के नुकसान की कोई परवाह नहीं है. समय रहते एयरलाइंस क्रू की ओर से कोई निर्णय नहीं लिया गया। उन्होंने मुझे 3 घंटे से ज्यादा इंतजार कराया.

Türk Hava Yolları ile Dublin üzerinden İstanbul'dan Budapeşte'ye. Yolculuğun her iki ayağı için her uçuşta gecikmeler - yaklaşık 20 saat boyunca kaba, yavaş veya yardımcı olmayan ve çantalarımızı almak için bir saat süren yer personeli ile İstanbul'da mahsur kaldık. Söyleyebileceğim tek olumlu şey, uçaktaki yiyeceklerin iyi olması, diğer her şeyin felaket olması.

İstanbul'dan Cezayir'e, aynı gece 21:30'da kalkışı ve 23:20'de Cezayir'e varması planlanıyor. Teknik bir sorun nedeniyle uçuşun 2:55 saat rötar yaptığına dair bir duyuru aldık. Sonra gece yarısı uçağa bindikten ve taksi yapmaya başladıktan sonra pilot sorunun hala devam ettiğini ve kapıya geri dönmemiz gerektiğini duyurdu! Bir erteleme daha açıklandı! Üstelik yolcuların uçaktan inmesine de izin vermediler! tam bir kaos çünkü yolcular artık bu uçağa binmek istemiyor (ve tamamen anlıyorum) ve durumu daha da kötüleştiren şey, ne pilotun ne de herhangi bir yetkilinin bize neler olduğunu anlatması. Açıklama yok, özür yok, hiçbir şey yok! polisi aradılar ve kapıda silahlı sivil adamlar gördük. Sabah 6:30'a kadar havalanmadık (toplamda 9 saatten fazla gecikme!) Bu gecikme nedeniyle, ortaya çıkan rahatsızlık ve yorgunluk nedeniyle 15 Nisan'da Cezayir'deki tüm çalışma günüm (danışmanım) kaybettim. ve o gün için birkaç toplantı planlamıştım). Bir daha asla Türk Hava Yolları'na binmeyeceğim.

من أبو ظبي إلى لوكسمبورغ عبر اسطنبول. من AUH-IST ، حيث كانت الرحلة في الساعة 1:30 صباحًا ، كانت الرحلة مريحة نظرًا لصغر حجم الطائرة. كانت المقاعد ضيقة بالرغم من أن غرفة الأرجل كانت جيدة. بدأت الخدمة في منتصف الطريق وكان الطعام جيدًا ولكن لا يوجد شيء رائع. كان الموظفون في الغالب ودودين. كان موظفو IST-LUX أكثر ودية ، وكانت الطائرات أفضل قليلاً ، وكان الطعام من نفس المستوى على الرغم من ذلك. أعتقد أنها كانت تجربة لائقة بشكل عام ، لكنني أفضل طائرة جوية أكثر اتساعًا حتى لو كانت الرحلة على بعد 4.5 ساعة من AUH.

New York to Erbil via Istanbul. They have the worst customer service. My initial leg was delayed due to weather so I was going to miss my connection. Turkish Airlines did nothing to help - in fact finding someone with Turkish Airlines to assist is a feat in itself. TA kept passing the blame. Bottom line - if any segment of your Turkish Airlines flights causes a delay then you are SOL when it comes to TA. Plan on spending a lot more money and flying another airline because Turkish Airlines will not assist you and they will keep your money. The "customer service" is a joke - they read from scripts and keep repeating the same paragraph - almost like robots. They also tell you to send an email - it is just a stalling tactic.

من طهران إلى نيويورك عبر اسطنبول. تجربة رهيبة وخدمة عملاء رهيبة! لن تطير مرة أخرى. حاولت تغيير تاريخ رحلتي ، اتصلت بشركة الطيران وقاموا بإجراء التغييرات. أخبرني أنني سأتلقى رسالة تأكيد عبر البريد الإلكتروني بعد إنهاء المكالمة (لم أستلمها أبدًا). اتصلت مرة أخرى ، وقدمت طلبي مرة أخرى وقيل لي أن شخصًا ما سيعود إليّ في غضون 7 أيام على الأكثر (لم يحدث أبدًا مرة أخرى). اتصلت مرة أخرى (كان هذا 3 أيام من تاريخ الرحلة الفعلي) ، قيل لي أنني بحاجة للذهاب إلى مكتب شركة طيران لإجراء تغيير !. أقرب مكتب لي يبعد 250 ميلاً. أيضًا ، كان هناك تغيير في الجدول الزمني على التذكرة لم أقم بتأكيده. عندما اتصلت ، قيل لي إنني لن أتحمل الغرامة ، وانتهى بي الأمر بتحصيل رسوم + فرق الأجرة (حوالي 500 دولار). بالإضافة إلى تكلفة الرحلة (200 دولار) لرحلة ذهاب فقط. لذلك لم يحدث هذا من قبل مع أي شركة طيران أخرى. كان من الأسهل إلغاء وشراء رحلة جديدة كانت ستكلفني حوالي 800 دولار في اتجاهين.

Belgrade to Athens via Istanbul. My first flight departed with delay from Belgrade due to local weather conditions in Istanbul. I requested for a connection assistance in order to catch my second flight but the airline did not provide me such assistance. I managed to arrive at the gate of departure of my second flight while boarding was not completed and while the screen mentioned 'last call' but I was denied boarding because 'the system had unchecked me from the second flight due to late arrival of my previous plane'. People were boarding in front of my eyes on the plane. The Turkish Airlines officer deceivingly told me to go to another gate (215) because another plane was waiting for me. He just got rid of me. Gate 215 was near the rebooking office of Turkish Airlines for the issuance of new tickets. Although I was condemned to stay overnight at the airport, I was not proposed hotel accommodation or a meal. I was put on another flight departing next morning without even offered the possibility to select my checked seat (the officer rejected my request for an aisle position despite the fact that the plane was half-empty!). I filled a complaint form for denial of boarding and they replied that they are not responsible for a flight delay due to weather conditions. Turkish Airlines maybe is a large company but it manages these type of routine problems poorly as a low budget airline.

Dublin to Tel Aviv via Ä°stanbul. First of all our flight was delayed for over an hour, but that's fine we crossed that bridge, then when we arrived in Ä°stanbul airport we were told that we missed our connection flight. Ridiculous considering the fact the tickets were bought from Turkish Airlines and not from different companies, ok, 10 minutes of talking to customer service and we got new tickets from Ä°stanbul to Tel Aviv (not same comfortable plane as it supposed to be but still something) Arriving in Tel Aviv we found our 3 bags on the belt but so called oversized bag (which was actually a doll birthday box for my daughter) was missing almost 2 hours waiting for it to be found (no luck) then another half an hour of registering with lost&found made us exhausted (myself my husband and 2 kids aged 3 and 5 at 5am in the morning is no fun at all) We supposed to pick up our rental car in between 3-4am and when we came to get it apparently the car was gone to another customer because we were late. We had no choice but get another more expensive car that was available (I think Turkish airlines should be liable for that as well) We registered lost baggage gave the address and phone number in Petah and asked them to deliver it there as we were going to Eilat for a few days. I was pretty much confident that should be no problem with contact details. I was 5 days later arriving back to Tel Aviv and with no contact from lost&found I rang them to see what's the story and I was shocked when I heard that my baggage was delivered to me the following day! Where? When? To who? The answer was simple we have in our system that you baggage left to Eilat next day and was delivered to the hotel so we are really sorry but you have to get it yourself from there! How come they left my baggage in the hotel without notifying me? Answer was: Delivery company rang you but there was no answer. Left a message? I doubt it I think it's pure lies) Anyway I said I want my baggage back please get it to me! Oh you know it might take couple of days. Fine I said just get it please! Few days later I rang again because nothing came and find out that delivery man came to the hotel in Eilat asked for me but because me and my spouse have different surnames he was told that there's no such person registered (but then the question is how could he leave it there if he was told the person is not there) Again I was promised that few days later I will get it. As you can imagine I didn't. Rang again today asked for the manager (was told the manager is in holiday) got to speak to supervisor and what a surprise she said that the baggage is not in the hotel in Eilat but in airport Eilat and because it's holiday (Pesah) the airport is closed and they can't get it. And she said you know it's your fault that it went to Eilat. When I asked her name she refused to give and hanged up on me.

Tashkent to Istanbul. A poor experience with Turkish Airlines. The guy who seemed to be the cabin chief was acting in a very extremely rude way towards the passengers, almost yelling at them, mostly hurrying people to sit down quickly. Very unprofessional. The tightest space for seating I experienced, apart from a low cost carrier in Indonesia. A mess with luggage, clearly too many volumes allowed onboard.

İstanbul'dan Prag'a. Mürettebat çok kibardı. Geniş koltuklar, iyi eğlence ve güvenlik videosunu beğendim. Sabah uçuşum vardı, bu yüzden kahvaltı yaptılar. Yemekler yerinde ve lezzetliydi. Tek kötü not, ikinci turda soğuk içecek servisi yapmamaları.

Nakhchivan to Istanbul. The flight set off a little bit late and boarding was disorderly with too many passengers carrying oversized baggage on board. The aircraft appeared to be old with drop-down screens for entertainment which were virtually useless. Cabin service was not very good and staff appeared not to care.

İstanbul'dan Trabzon'a Biniş hızlıydı. Uçuşun zamanında geleceğini düşündüm ama hayır! Taksi sonsuza kadar sürdü. Kalkış için 40 dakika bekledik. Kabin ekibinden herhangi bir açıklama duyup duymadığımı hatırlamıyorum. Uçak koltuğunda 40 dakikaya havaalanında 60 dakikayı tercih ederim. Kabin ekibi iyiydi. Sandviç ve içecek çekilişi güzeldi. Ucuz fiyat.

Izmir to Istanbul. It was my first Boeing 777 experience. They gave a free hot sandwich with cheese and vegetables and a drink. Hot and cold options were rich. Cold ones weren't very cold but you can add some ice to them. Plane was really big and crowded yet there were no problem with fresh air and air conditioning. Well, maybe one. One of the cabins leaked some water to a passenger. They suddenly suggested he change his seat, he refused. Flight on time, good cabin crew. And this time, it was extremely cheap.

नई दिल्ली से इस्तांबुल होते हुए कप्पाडोसिया तक। मैंने 16 अप्रैल को शाम 6:15 बजे नई दिल्ली से उड़ान भरी, इसमें 1.5 घंटे की देरी हुई और शाम 7:50 बजे उड़ान भरी। 16 अप्रैल को दोपहर 12:20 बजे इस्तांबुल से कप्पाडोसिया के लिए मेरी कनेक्टिंग फ्लाइट थी, लेकिन इस एयरलाइन की देरी के कारण मैं देर से पहुंचा और मेरी फ्लाइट छूट गई। उन्होंने बिना किसी होटल में ठहरने की व्यवस्था उपलब्ध कराए मुझे रात 11:30 बजे की फ्लाइट दे दी। बाद में मुझे उन पर पहले वाली फ्लाइट देने के लिए दबाव डालना पड़ा क्योंकि मैं थका हुआ था इसलिए उन्होंने मुझे TK 2018 रात 8:35 बजे की फ्लाइट दी जिसमें भी देरी हुई और फ्लाइट रात 10:50 बजे रवाना हुई। मैं किसी तरह खुश था कि कम से कम मैं कप्पाडोसिया पहुंच गया लेकिन मेरा पूरा दिन और होटल बुकिंग बर्बाद हो गई। मैं अपना सामान लेने गया लेकिन मुझे आश्चर्य हुआ कि मेरा सामान नहीं आया और मुझे बताया गया कि यह अगली उड़ान में आ रहा है और वे इसे मेरे होटल में भेज देंगे। मैं अपने होटल आया और 17 अप्रैल को शाम के लगभग 4 बजे थे और कई बार कॉल करने के बाद भी मेरा सामान अभी तक नहीं आया है। इस एयरलाइन ने बिना कोई अच्छी सेवा या सुविधा दिए मुझसे बहुत अधिक शुल्क लिया है। मैं अत्यधिक अनुशंसा करूंगा कि किसी को भी टर्किश एयरलाइंस बुक न करें जब तक कि वे अपना समय और पैसा बर्बाद न करना चाहें। पता नहीं मेरा सामान कब आएगा और कब तक मुझे अपने होटल में बैठना पड़ेगा और समय बर्बाद करना पड़ेगा क्योंकि जब तक मैं अपने कपड़े नहीं ले लेता और इस शहर को देखने के लिए बाहर नहीं निकलता, तब तक मैं तरोताजा नहीं हो सकता।

新加坡經伊斯坦布爾飛往薩格勒布。伊斯坦布爾機場的客戶服務很糟糕。我錯過了從新加坡抵達伊斯坦布爾的轉機航班。我已向機上乘務員詢問我的轉機航班情況。她向我保證連接沒有問題。抵達後，沒有工作人員提供協助。顯示屏上沒有顯示我的航班。我最終去了他們的護理點櫃檯。那裡的工作人員是最差的。我會給負面評級 1。他們只是花時間來確定你的下一個航班。如果我沒有堅持要求我需要在同一天飛行，他們就會讓我乘坐第二天的航班。這是我10年旅行中遇到的最差的航站樓服務。

Baku to Amsterdam via Istanbul. They still operate like a third world airline. Check in counter staff at the new airport was ignorant (when she finished my check in, she just left the boarding pass and my passport on the counter instead of handing them to me). I changed my seat the previous night when doing the online check in. When boarding the agent said I had the wrong seat and put me back at my old seat. I asked why, and she said they changed plane. She just made that up.

New York JFK to Tel Aviv via Istanbul. Do not fly Turkish Airlines! We had round trip scheduled March-April 2019. Just before leaving on our trip they cancelled the second leg of our return flight and placed us on another flight which involved a 14 hour layover in Istanbul airport. Then, upon arrival in Istanbul on our way out to Tel Aviv they cancelled the second leg of this part of the trip as we stood at the gate waiting for departure and put us on another flight several hours later because the later flight was not full. Imagine 300 People at an airline gate waiting as staff filled out new boarding passes for everyone by hand!. We cancelled our return arrangements (without refund) and flew another airline home at the end of our vacation. Rather lose the money then deal with this airline any further!

Kathmandu to Berlin via Istanbul. Their service is worst because they usually overbook the flight and it was like first come first serve basis and airport staff don't even listen the customer request. They treat people like they are doing favor to them. Flight often delayed by 2- 4 hours and they don't care about your connecting flight. In my return flight after issuing boarding pass, my seat plan was changed without any notice and in flight entertainment system is damaged and it was 9 hours long flight. I have requested several times but they don't care and don't give attention to the passengers request.
Montréal à Bucarest via Istanbul. Nourriture délicieuse, grand choix de boissons. Personnel de cabine gentil et attentionné. Je choisirais à nouveau le turc et je peux les recommander.

Guangzhou to Barcelona via Istanbul. I wonder if customer service really exists for this airline. My luggage has been gone missing already two days and there has been no update for the last 24 hours already! I called the customer service almost ten times in the last 2 days and it is never answered. In their online luggage tracing system, they don't even update what they did or how long I need to wait. I doubt that I would ever book Turkish Airline again. As a frequent flier of the long-haul flights, I have never experienced lost luggage. I know that it is not uncommon that luggage can be delayed or missing. But what is lacking is their customer service.

İstanbul'dan Viyana'ya Türk Hava Yolları'ndan sıradan bir kavga daha. Yemekler mükemmel, ancak her zaman olduğu gibi uçağa biniş sırasında kuyrukta bir karmaşa var. Bu havayolu, tüm müşterilere kurallar konusunda gerçekten katı olmak zorunda, çünkü deneyimlerime göre bu, biniş süreci için en kötü havayolu.

Atlanta to Amman via Istanbul. Beside being one of the filthiest airport bathrooms and cheap of course for not making it easy to use the Wi-Fi, they make us wait 5 more hours in the transit just because they can fill up the plane by merging another plane for people who are going to Amman without giving us any notice! And after waiting hours now to check-in online, now they saying check-in at the counter. Bad food on the plane, bad select of movies and entertainments and of course bad customer service in the airport.

Manchester to Bangkok via Istanbul return in the last month. All flights were on time. Excellent food and drink service. Lovely staff and a smile on their faces. Great airline, cheap prices, excellent service.

Lagos to Istanbul via Kathmandu. I am never flying with Turkish Airlines again and I won't recommend to anyone I know, my friends or families. I had a very long layover both the ways around (20hrs) each. I had heard from many friends that Turkish would give a hotel or other relevant services if we have to wait there above specific hours. That's why I went directly to the airport help desk/transit passenger resting place to make an inquiry about the service I would get. To my surprise, the lady on the desk took my all information from passport and ticket and said you cannot get a hotel. Then I asked why

मुंबई से इस्तांबुल. हमारे जीवन के सबसे बुरे अनुभवों में से एक तुर्की एयरलाइंस की यह यात्रा रही है। 6 अप्रैल को कन्फ़र्म फ़्लाइट बुक करने के बाद हमें एक ऐसी फ़्लाइट की पेशकश की गई जिसमें कनेक्टिंग फ़्लाइट हमारे उतरने से 2 दिन पहले रवाना हो जाती है। शुक्र है हमने इसे गलती से नहीं चुना. फिर हमें एक नया यात्रा कार्यक्रम दिया गया जिसके लिए हमें इस्तांबुल में रात भर रुकना पड़ा। फिर हमें हवाई अड्डे के बाहर एक होटल का कमरा दिया गया, जिसके लिए हमें तुर्की में प्रवेश करने के लिए एक्सप्रेस वीज़ा पर 220 USD और यात्रा पर अतिरिक्त 100 USD खर्च करने पड़े। एयरलाइन आपको हवाई अड्डे पर कमरे नहीं देती है, जो यात्री के लिए अधिक महंगा हो जाता है क्योंकि हमारे होटल के कमरे तक कोई उचित सार्वजनिक परिवहन नहीं है और तुर्की इसके लिए भुगतान नहीं करेगा। मामले को बदतर बनाने के लिए आज चेक-इन काम नहीं कर रहा है और उन्होंने हमसे कहा है कि अगर हमें अच्छी सीटें चाहिए तो हमें हवाई अड्डे पर जल्दी पहुंचना होगा। इसकी भयानक ग्राहक सेवा के कारण इस एयरलाइन से बचें।

Prague to Istanbul. Just ordinary fight served by Turkish Airlines. Food excellent, but as always there's a mess with a queue when boarding process. This Airline really has to strict about the rules to all customer, as my experiences this is the worst airline for boarding process.

Amsterdam naar Bangkok via Istanboel. Ik zal niet meer boeken na de omstandigheden waarin ik ben gevlogen. Eten: lekker. Boven het gemiddelde voor een luchtvaartmaatschappij. Entertainment tijdens de vlucht: grote verscheidenheid aan films. Cabinepersoneel: nalatig en slordig, tot een frustrerend niveau. Zoveel afleveringen waarin ze zeer eenvoudige verzoeken van passagiers negeerden of (erger nog) problemen veroorzaakten vanwege hun desorganisatie. Gate crew: bij de check-in heb ik een plek gekozen waar ik gemakkelijk bij de badkamer kan, die ik om medische redenen nodig heb. Bij de poort is de stoel doorgestreept en ben ik opnieuw toegewezen, geen uitleg gegeven. Toen ik vroeg om de stoel te veranderen in een stoel aan het gangpad, kreeg ik van het cabinepersoneel te horen dat ik tijdelijk op de toegewezen stoel moest gaan zitten. Na het opstijgen werd mijn verzoek de hele vlucht genegeerd, ongeacht of er veel stoelen leeg waren. Zitplaatsen buitengewoon oncomfortabel en onmogelijk om in te slapen (heel oud vliegtuig voor een vlucht van 10 uur). De mijne was zelfs kapot, dus ik kon helemaal niet slapen. Foodservice: zo chaotisch dat sommige mensen zichzelf begonnen te bedienen omdat hun verzoeken werden genegeerd of vergeten. Al met al een zeer slechte ervaring die me in de war brengt over hoe dit bedrijf prijzen heeft gewonnen. In eerste instantie gaf ik het ook het voordeel van de twijfel, daarom wachtte ik met het schrijven van de recensie, maar de terugvlucht bevestigde al het nalatige gedrag dat ik op de vertrekvlucht zag. Andere luchtvaartmaatschappijen bieden zeer vergelijkbare prijzen en de nadelen wegen niet op tegen de vluchtomstandigheden die u zult ervaren.

Da Venezia ad Ankara via Istanbul. Invece di decollare in orario, il combattimento è stato originariamente ritardato (sulla tabella delle informazioni c'era scritto 10 minuti). Sono stato soddisfatto delle informazioni (è possibile essere ritardati). La successiva informazione che seguì ci invitò ad andare al cancello. Più del 75% dei passeggeri ha creato la fila davanti al banco e noi eravamo in attesa di aprire il varco. È stato il primo errore, dopo 45 minuti lo staff ha cambiato l'orario di partenza sul banco informazioni per le 10:50. Nessuno sapeva che la partita era iniziata. L'aereo ha subito un ritardo di oltre 60 minuti. Di solito è il personale a fornirti ulteriori informazioni sui voli in coincidenza. Purtroppo non è il caso di Turkish Airlines. Dopo l'arrivo, corro dall'aereo attraverso il tunnel nel terminal e speravo di prendere il volo per Ankara. Il ragazzo che indossava l'uniforme dell'AT e che stava aspettando in fondo al tunnel mi ha mostrato la direzione dove avrei dovuto trovare il gate per il mio volo. Ovviamente era la direzione sbagliata e sono dovuto tornare indietro. Dopodiché, ho dovuto passare attraverso la cornice dei raggi X e ho perso altri 10 minuti anche se non ho lasciato l'area protetta. Quando sono entrato nella sala principale ho visto che il cancello è chiuso. Fino a questo momento nessuno si è scusato per l'inconveniente e fino ad oggi anche. Questo viaggio dell'orrore non era ancora alla fine. Ho cercato di trovare l'ufficio TA e ho trovato solo il banco TA dove era possibile acquistare nuovi biglietti. Quando ho iniziato a spiegare la mia situazione e il ragazzo dietro la scrivania ha riconosciuto che non sono un nuovo potenziale cliente, la sua espressione del viso è cambiata rapidamente e la sua voce annoiata mi ha detto che non è responsabile delle informazioni. Il problema era chiuso per lui. Dopo pochi minuti ho trovato il desk con il logo TA nelle sezioni check-in. Corro lì per risolvere il problema e ho cercato di informare il primo staff della mia situazione. La sua risposta è stata: "Aspetta un minuto".. Non volevo aspettare e gli ho detto che la sua azienda è responsabile della situazione e mi aspetto più empatia e servizio completo per i clienti. Nessuna risposta, solo una reazione disgustata visibile nella sua mimica e mi ha mostrato con il dito un altro operatore di AT seduto accanto a lui. Questa persona si è lasciata spiegare nuovamente la mia situazione e ha stampato una nuova carta d'imbarco per il volo delle 18:00. Ho controllato la partenza sullo schermo e dal mio prossimo volo c'erano ulteriori informazioni che è in ritardo di 40 minuti prima della partenza. Ho chiesto di nuovo al ragazzo se è serio e la mia seconda domanda è stata perché non è possibile ottenere il biglietto per il volo alle 17:00? La risposta è stata data con la massima arroganza nella sua voce. "Il volo è pieno!". E non è ancora la fine dei guai, invece di ritardare di 40 minuti il ​​"grande" TA mi ha fatto aspettare un'ora in più rispetto all'orario di partenza originale. Il servizio era il caos e il comportamento dei dipendenti era tutt'altro che professionale.

Helsinki to Kiev via Istanbul. Flying Turkish Airlines for the very first time. I was simply shocked, in a good way. I have never seen a more spacious plane with such leg room in economy class. The served meal was just lovely, cabin crew as well. 10/10.

Amsterdam naar Bangkok via Istanboel. Vlucht ging vier uur te laat aan boord zonder communicatie tijdens deze vertraging. Het instappen was een complete puinhoop en iedereen klauterde om in te stappen. Eenmaal aan boord zag de bemanning van de business class er volkomen ongeïnteresseerd uit, wat de hele vlucht doorging. Het niveau van communicatieve vaardigheden in het Engels van het cabinepersoneel en de cockpit blijft ver onder de maat. De bemanning kwam over alsof ze je een plezier deden toen ik om een ​​drankje vroeg. Een zeer slechte algehele ervaring.

New York to Tel Aviv via Istanbul. Never again. While staff was excellent, plane was hot and extremely uncomfortable. Painfully uncomfortable. Several passengers requested for cabin air to be cooled. No avail. Plane was dirty. Get ready for your back and knees to hurt.

مانيلا الى اسطنبول. إذا سافرت في أي وقت مع طيران الإمارات أو الخطوط الجوية القطرية ، فستفقد خدمتهم إذا سافرت على متن الخطوط الجوية التركية. رأيت الطاقم فقط ، عندما كانوا يقدمون وجبة بعد المغادرة ، قبل الوصول والجري من الأمام إلى الخلف والعكس صحيح. لم تقدم مشروبات أو وجبات خفيفة. يعد الماء لمدة 13 ساعة تقريبًا أمرًا ضروريًا ، ولكن لم يتم تقديمه مطلقًا.

Dhaka to Copenhagen via Istanbul. This trip was full of disappointments. Already the airport lounge, Dhaka, demanded money for a glass of wine, unheard. I am a frequent flyer, I have never experienced business class lounge charging a business class passenger, for a glass of wine. Next, on board, no welcome drinks. I asked for a newspaper and a drink, the choice was a glass of water or a lemonade. After take-off, no beverage and snacks, just the meal, which was disgusting. My choice was beef, which was cold, dry, served with some bean and carrots, also cold. I asked for a glass of red wine, but waiting and waiting, I tried to draw the attention of a crew, who was talking with another passenger in the front row. Then I had to get up went where he was enjoying a conversation with the passenger. I made my request- I got served a glass of wine-. I expressed my gratitude- and the crew explained the delay- he had to take care of a CIP. The meal was eatabel, so asked for a cup of coffee and a glass of cognac. Surprise- the crew said there was no cognac. I showed the menu, which showed cognac was available. Well, had almost 6hours layover at Istanbul airport lounge, which was OK. About 90 minutes prior to board, we were asked to go the the gate. After completion of checking tickets and passports, we were waiting to board- almost 45 minutes had to wait and then bus to the plain. The flight was on way to Copenhagen. There were a grpoup of Danish passengers,. A elderly gentleman asked for lass of cognac, the crew was about to serve a generous glass of cognac. Another female crew rushed and snatched the glass, poured half of the content to another glass and then served the guest. We had a laugh- that was entertaining.- but not convincing for making Turkish Airline the choice any more.

Hanoi to Milano via Istanbul. As we 4 arrived this morning from Hanoi at 6 am (TK168) we learned that our connecting flight to Milan TK1873 had been cancelled. No assistance was given to passengers, everybody had to wander around the immense airport, address the numerous TK people behind desks each of whom seemed to take care of anything but customer service and only care to dispatch people somewhere else. Finally we got to the right desk and were given the TK flight leaving at 16.15, 10 hours waiting time. We were assured this was the first possibility open. To our surprise we discovered that there is a previous flight leaving at 12.45 with seats available. Hundreds of people crowded at the desk with only 2 employees working so we gave up trying to anticipate our flight, and no contact was possible on the phone.

من مانيلا إلى فيينا عبر اسطنبول. المقاعد مريحة. اختيار الوسائط على متن الطائرة رائع ومحدث. الطعام جيد. تعد شبكة Wifi المدفوعة أثناء الرحلة (MNL-IST) ممتازة للرحلات الطويلة. لا توجد شبكة Wifi لـ IST-VIE. طاقم الطائرة ليس ودودًا ولكن ليس سيئًا أيضًا. يمكن أن يتأخر الصعود إلى الطائرة. تتأخر إعلانات البوابة (تتغير أحيانًا في اللحظة الأخيرة) - كن حذرًا! قد تفوت رحلتك خاصة إذا كنت تواجه صعوبة في العثور على بوابات.

Boarding totally chaotic and far too long. Nice meal, creepy safety video which distracted the people more than giving them advice. Crew notifications (strong turkish accent, sound quality) hardly understandable, even for native speakers. Economy legroom and seat width did not at all suit the flight duration on the first flight from Phuket to Istanbul (11 hours), more equal to short-distance low costers. (disclaimer: I had a seat at an emergency exit, luckily). WiFi did not work for me and others at all, for some more expensive devices it did, but very slowly (asked my neighbours and staff for help, but no way to get it working). Very expensive seat pre-selection (160+30â‚¬ for a 400â‚¬ flight), so I did not take it and was lucky at the airport check-in.

İstanbul'dan Amsterdam'a. A330-300'den biraz yıpranmış ve eski olmasına rağmen A330-200'ün ekonomik kabini 333'e göre daha konforlu. Bu uçuş, kısa mesafeli bir uçuş için iyi bir koltuk aralığına sahipti. Yer hizmeti sorunsuzdu ve kabin ekibi Türkçe'de gördüğüm en iyilerden biriydi. İkinci yemek seçeneği bittiğinden, bize daha fazla ücretsiz içecek teklif edildi. Bu uçuştaki tek aksilik, sınırlı bir seçime sahip eski, modası geçmiş arayüzlü bir IFE idi. Birkaç yıllık küçük hayal kırıklıklarının ardından, Türk Hava Yolları'nı bir kez daha en çok tercih ettiğim hava yolları arasına eklemenin mutluluğunu yaşıyorum.

Ankara'dan İstanbul'a. 737-800'ün bu versiyonunda IFE olmamasına rağmen, bir saatten kısa süren bir uçuştur. Koltuk aralığı ve konforu muhtemelen bir 737-800'de gördüğüm en iyisiydi. Kısa mesafeli lezzetli bir panini ve içecekler puanları hak ediyor.
İstanbul'dan Ankara'ya. Harika kısa mesafeli uçuş. Sıcak, lezzetli bir paniniye çeşitli içecekler eşlik etti. Türkçe'nin IFE seçkisi eksiksiz hazırdı. Genel olarak çok keyifli bir uçuş.

Dublin to Manila via Istanbul. This flight was both a disaster and a nightmare. This incident happened during Istanbul-Manila leg of my flight. Im not sure what happened, but I your ground crew was disorderly and very unwelcoming. The boarding was horrible, flying business is not worth it especially I am queueing with the rest of the passengers. The on board experience was the tipping point. Since last year, I never had problem with my Vegan meal onboard as I make sure to preselect them online. But this flight was a disaster. Not only I made only preselection, I wrote to the menu that I am vegan, and the chef was aware i dont eat cheese as he asked me before flight. When I was served with appetizers, I was curious as they gave me a butter on a small dish. At first, I though it could be vegan as I was given butter previously, but that was on a pack, not this time. I called the head steward and explain my conundrum. The chef came and explained and apologized. They insisted i ordered vegetarian as shown on their records, but I showed my confirmation email that I did preselect Vegan meal. Somewhere something went wrong. I settled for orange juice, and went to sleep. Before landing, the chef gave me a minimal but unbusiness like food. I still appreciate his effort to come up with vegan food.

Nairobi to Amsterdam via Istanbul. Terrible service and bad customer care. I went through hell in a recent trip with Turkish. I was traveling for a conference and unfortunately missed a connection flight after last minute gate change. I was sent around their customer desks without any help. I was finally told I needed to pay extra to change my ticket, an amount that was far more than the original cost of the return ticket. They said the best they could do was to help me call my family. I was left stranded at Istanbul Airport. I had to request a friend to pay for a ticket from a different airline to get to my conference destination. After the conference I went back to the airport hoping to utilize my return ticket with Turkish Airlines, only to be told that it is no invalid and I have to book a flight afresh. I struggled to raise money and finally was able to buy a ticket with different flight and go home.

Helsinki to Beirut via Istanbul. Never again will I travel by Turkish Airlines! I had a flight connection from Helsinki to Beirut, and both trips were late by 1 hour. I don't understand the delay! Also when on board the stewardess were very slow in serving the food and the drinks.

Dalaman to Brussels. Turkish Airlines customer service is outrageous, they do not care about their customers. They called me in the evening to tell me that my morning flight was cancelled and to call a number and rearrange a flight. When I called them 2 different employees ensured me the flight was planned. After arguing for an hour, I gave up. An hour later I received a message saying my flight was cancelled. Spend a total of 3 hours on the phone as they could not get me to my meeting in time. I had to recall them at night to confirm my flight. Had no sleep whatsoever! As I had no guarantee my flight was confirmed. Had to travel 400 km to a different airport. And now I'm told that it's not their staff's fault. Well it is Turkish Airlines fault. You Cancel a flight and do not inform your own staff. Instead of an apology I receive a â€˜standard' mail saying they are not to blame. Shame on you!

من دبي إلى لشبونة عبر اسطنبول. في أبريل ، حجزت رحلة من دبي إلى لشبونة مقابل 530.90 دولارًا مع الخطوط الجوية التركية. عندما تلقيت بريدًا إلكترونيًا لتسجيل الوصول ، لم أتمكن من القيام بذلك. قررت الاتصال بهم للاستفسار عن السبب. أخبروني أنهم ألغوا الحجز الخاص بي وتم تمييز بطاقتي الائتمانية على أنها احتيال. قيل لي أن أقدم دليلاً على أن بطاقة الائتمان تخصني وكذلك فعلت. بادئ ذي بدء ، لماذا لم يتم إخطاري بإلغاء حجزي؟ حتى أنني تلقيت إشعارًا بالبريد الإلكتروني لتذكيرني بتسجيل الوصول - بعد يوم طويل من المراسلات ، أرسلوا لي بريدًا إلكترونيًا قائلين إنه يمكنني الحصول على الرحلة بنفس السعر الذي دفعته في الأصل. اتصلت لحجز رحلتي وقالوا إنها لن تمر مرة أخرى لذا اضطررت إلى استخدام بطاقة ائتمان مختلفة. أكد ممثل الخطوط الجوية التركية بعد ذلك أن دفعتي قد تم تسجيلها عبر الإنترنت. عظيم! أخيرًا لدي حجز لأنه كان أقل من 7 ساعات حتى المغادرة. عندما ذهبت لتسليم حقيبتي في مطار دبي ، قال ممثل الخطوط الجوية التركية إنه لا يوجد حجز لي. لقد أظهرت له تأكيدي وأظهرت له بيان بطاقة الائتمان الخاصة بي عبر الإنترنت الذي أظهر أنني أتحمل رسومًا من الخطوط الجوية التركية. أخبرني مرارًا وتكرارًا أنه لم يعد لدي حجز وأحتاج إلى شراء تذكرة جديدة من وكالة سفر في المطار. أخبرني أيضًا أنه سيتم استرداد أموالي بالكامل عند تقديم مطالبة مع الخطوط الجوية التركية. مرة أخرى ، لماذا لم يتم إخطاري بإلغاء الحجز الخاص بي؟ لماذا ألغوا حجزي بعد أن قاموا بالفعل بشحن بطاقتي الائتمانية؟ لقد مرت ساعة واحدة على المغادرة ، لذلك فعلت بالضبط ما قال لي ممثل الخطوط الجوية التركية أن أفعله. اشتريت رحلة في اتجاه واحد مقابل 1306.98 دولار !! منذ رحلتي في أبريل ، خضت معركة متواصلة في محاولة استرداد أموالي. في 19 ديسمبر 2018 ، اتصلت بي الخطوط الجوية التركية للاعتذار عن كل ما حدث. اعترفت بخطأ الخطوط الجوية التركية وأنهم لم يتبعوا بروتوكولهم مما أدى إلى إلغاء حجزي. طلبت مني إرسال نسخة من جواز سفري وكشوف بطاقتي الائتمانية وأنني سأسترد أموالي بالكامل في غضون أسبوع واحد. منذ تلك المكالمة الهاتفية ، تجاهلتني الخطوط الجوية التركية تمامًا. لقد حاولت الاتصال بهم في 4 يناير ، 6 يناير ، 9 يناير ، 15 يناير ، 16 يناير ، 20 يناير ، 22 يناير ، 25 يناير ، 29 يناير ، 1 فبراير ، 4 فبراير ، 14 فبراير ، و 20 فبراير. لقد حاولت الاتصال بهم ، فإما أنهم لا يستجيبون لي أو يخبرني مركز الاتصال أنهم سيحددون حالتي على أنها عاجلة وسيقوم شخص ما بالرد علي في غضون 48 ساعة. لم أتلق ردًا منهم مرة واحدة منذ أن قيل لي إنني سأسترد أموالي بالكامل في ديسمبر. لماذا يستجيب بروتوكولهم في غضون 7 أيام أو 48 ساعة ، ولكن مر شهرين الآن ولم أتلق أي أخبار منهم حتى الآن؟ لماذا لم يتبعوا البروتوكول المناسب في البداية عندما حجزت رحلتي؟ لماذا لم يخطروني أبدًا بأنهم قد ألغوا حجزي؟ لماذا أكد موظفهم أنه تم سداد مدفوعاتي وقام بتسجيل وصولي؟ لماذا ألغوا حجزي عندما فرضوا عليّ بالفعل رسومًا؟ لماذا أخبرني موظفوهم أنهم سيقومون برد أموالي بالكامل ، لكنهم ليسوا كذلك الآن؟ لماذا يتجاهلونني تمامًا؟ أشعر أنه يجب على الجميع أن يدرك مدى فظاعة الخطوط الجوية التركية. آمل ألا يضطر أي شخص آخر إلى المرور بما مررت به. لقد أثر بشكل خطير على صحتي في التعامل معهم. من الواضح أن لديهم خدمة رهيبة ولن يقوموا برد الأموال (قراءة المراجعات الأخرى). من فضلك - وفر أموالك ووقتك وصحتك وحجز شركة طيران مختلفة.

Montréal à Berlin via Istanbul. J'ai été surtout déçu des services. J'ai pris l'avion de Montréal à Istanbul et dès le début, j'ai senti que l'expérience était imparfaite. Il y avait environ 28 sièges en classe affaires et j'avais choisi un siège avec accès direct au couloir. Le siège est assez confortable et large, c'est ce que j'ai remarqué au début. L'équipage de cabine était horrible. Ils se sont rassemblés dans la cabine avant près du bar et nous ont regardés nous installer. Comme nous étions en plein hiver, les passagers avaient tous de lourds manteaux d'hiver. J'étais assis au deuxième rang et j'ai pu entendre des passagers demander à l'équipage s'ils pouvaient prendre leurs manteaux. J'ai été un peu interloqué par la réponse des équipages : « Non, plus tard, plus tard ». Inutile de dire que je n'allais pas faire tout mon possible pour leur demander de prendre mon manteau et que j'ai plutôt choisi de le laisser à ma place. Les membres de l'équipage ne m'ont proposé de prendre mon manteau ni celui de mon voisin à aucun moment de ce vol de 9h30. Nous nous sommes assis dans la cabine à nos sièges sans boissons offertes, sans bouteille d'eau pendant au moins 15 minutes. L'équipage est venu au bout de 15 minutes pour nous proposer une sélection de boissons non alcoolisées. J'ai refusé la boisson et on m'a demandé si je voulais autre chose et j'ai commandé du champagne. Toutes les boissons pendant tout notre vol ont été servies sans serviette et j'ai pensé que c'était un peu étrange puisque vous obtenez une serviette au Canada même sur les transporteurs à bas prix! Des menus ont été distribués et on nous a demandé notre sélection plus tard. Après le décollage, le service n'était pas bien planifié. Il a fallu un certain temps avant qu'un membre de l'équipage ne passe et quand ils l'ont fait, ils ont proposé de faire nos lits! Nous venions de quitter Montréal à 22 h 45 et je suppose que c'est pourquoi ils nous ont demandé avant même de prendre une commande de boisson! J'ai décliné l'offre de literie et les ai informés que je serais prêt après le dîner. "Bien sûr monsieur, tout ce que vous voulez". La réponse manquait d'authenticité et j'ai senti que l'équipage était quelque peu contrarié. Le service a commencé par la manipulation d'une bouteille d'eau, 40 minutes après le début du vol. Nous avons attendu encore 10 minutes environ et on nous a demandé des boissons. Le "chef à bord" est venu prendre notre commande de nourriture et cela s'est également fait de manière chaotique. Il prenait la commande de 3 à 5 sièges à la fois, puis disparaissait. L'ensemble de la prise de commande pour l'ensemble de la classe affaires a dû prendre 40 minutes. La nourriture était servie et c'était magnifiquement plaqué. Je ne peux pas dire que la nourriture avait meilleur goût que n'importe quel autre transporteur étranger avec lequel j'ai volé en classe affaires. Le chef à bord avait l'air d'être un spectacle et je ne pouvais pas vraiment voir comment il était un chef. Il a pris notre commande (les chefs ne le font généralement pas) et s'est assuré que les assiettes avaient l'air bien. Je pense que c'est tout et je ne vois pas vraiment de valeur exotique ou ajoutée à cela. Pendant tout le repas, mes boissons ont séché pendant 10 minutes ou plus à la fois. J'ai volé sur de nombreux transporteurs en classe affaires et je n'ai jamais eu à demander ou à me lever pour demander plus de vin avec mon repas. L'équipage de la cabine affaires n'était tout simplement pas amical ni attentif. J'ai également fait l'expérience du salon Turkish Airlines à Istanbul lors de ma correspondance. C'est un air fatigué et une atmosphère de cirque. Je me suis qualifié pour l'utilisation d'une suite de repos. La préposée m'a dit qu'elle viendrait me faire savoir quand je pourrais prendre une douche. J'étais là 3 heures, et elle n'est jamais venue.

New York to Dhaka via Istanbul. Services at Istanbul Airport was horrible and totally unprofessional. I had a flight from JFK to Istanbul on the way to Dhaka and had a 12-hour long stay over in Istanbul. While it was written on the Turkish website that they would give a hotel room if the stay over is 12 hours or more, there was no such opportunity. Turkish airlines staff at the airport had limited English proficiency, lack of decency (rude), and lower motivation to cooperate. However, instead of a hotel room, a lady at the counter offered me snacks. When I requested for lunch instead of snacks or breakfast, the lady just tore the check she wrote in front of me. I was devastated seeing this non-professional rudeness. Only positive things were inflight hospitality and foods.

Von Berlin nach Manila über Istanbul. Turkish Airlines hat mein Gepäck verloren. Die Lieferung erfolgte bereits 36 Stunden nach meiner Ankunft. Das Schlimmste war die Art der Lieferung. Ein sehr unhöflicher Typ brachte das Gepäck zu mir. Er drohte mir, das Gepäck auf die Straße zu werfen, wenn ich nicht die Treppe herunterkäme, um es abzuholen. Ich habe mich über das Online-Feedback-Formular beschwert und schreibe nun seit mehr als 6 Wochen Nachrichten mit Turkish Airlines. Sie weigern sich, mir irgendeine Entschädigung für den Stress zu geben. Für mich ist es der schlechteste Kundenservice, den ich je bei einer Fluggesellschaft erlebt habe. Ich werde nie wieder mit Turkish Airlines fliegen.

İstanbul'dan Londra'ya. Bu havayolu bir bagaj dolandırıcılığı yürütüyor. Çok farkında olun. Web sitelerinde ücretsiz 2 çantaya izin verdiklerini iddia ediyorlar (her biri 32 kiloya kadar check-in yapın). Tezgaha vardığınızda, İngilizce bilmiyorlar ve size herhangi bir çantaya izin verilmediğini ve parasını ödemeniz gerektiğini söylemeye devam ediyorlar. Sana başka seçenek bırakmıyorlar. Her biri 20 mg ağırlığındaki iki çantam için 400 dolar ödemek zorunda kaldım. Bu havayolundan veba gibi kaçının. İngilizce bilmiyorlar ve tüm bu bagaj dolandırıcılığıyla insanları dolandırıyorlar. Temelde bir çeşit yasallaştırılmış soygun.

Αθήνα προς Αβάνα μέσω Κωνσταντινούπολης. Καταπληκτική εξυπηρέτηση πληρώματος. Στην ώρα. Μεγάλη επιλογή μουσικής και ταινιών στο IFE. Το φαγητό ήταν νόστιμο με 2 επιλογές και κάρτα μενού και πραγματικά μαχαιροπίρουνα. Επίσης ανέσεις.

Vienna to Istanbul. Our morning flight was delayed then eventually cancelled due to the bad weather which is understandable. We had to rushed back to counter for them to issue another boarding pass and during this time it was already chaotic. Then they gave us options whather to take the next earliest flight but will arrive in Istanbul Sabiha airport and not Istanbul Ataturk airport. Another option is to take another flight but had to wait for another 9 hours. We took the first option because Turkish airlines promise that our luggage will be sent to Sabiha airport when we landed. Once landed, waited for around 45 mins - 1 hour for our luggage but none arrived including others that took the same option as ours. Few minutes later one of the staff came and informed us that all the luggage are left in Vienna. This became even more chaotic as passengers have other arrangements and obviously requires the luggage. The staff told us to file baggage lost at the counter and the queue itself took almost 2 hours. Turkish Airlines again made another promise that they would send it by the next morning to our hotel but again we still have not receive our luggage the next morning. Fortunately our hotel staff helped us to follow up on this matter and again Turkish Airlines made another promise that the luggage will be sent tomorrow evening. So day 3 In Istanbul with recycled sweaty clothes and no luggage. We are really hopeful that it will be sent by tomorrow evening as we are going back in few days. The trip from Sabiha airport to our hotel itself costed us twice the price. Pray for our luggage. Hope Turkish Airlines take this matter seriously.

İstanbul'dan Londra'ya. İstanbul dönüşü uçakta bebek arabamızı Türk Hava Yolları'na teslim ettik. Londra'ya vardığımızda bebek arabasının hasarlı olduğunu fark ettik. Orada, Heathrow havaalanında bir iddia davası başlattık. Bizim için bir çevrimiçi hesap açıldı ve bu hesap üzerinden daha fazla bilgi doldurduk ve THY'nin onarımı karşılayacağına dair bir değerlendirme aldık. İki adet yedek kapak siparişi verdik ve faturalarını THY'ye gönderdik. Bu 19 Ocak'taydı. O zamandan beri davayı çözmeye çalışıyoruz ama görmezden geliniyoruz. Bugün müşteri hizmetleri ile 5. kez görüştüm. Her seferinde birkaç gün içinde haber almamız gerektiği söylendi ama asla alamıyoruz. Bu çok utanç verici. İddia ettiklerimiz bu kadar bile değil. THY'ye borcumuz varken bu kadar duyarlı olsaydık defalarca ceza alırdık. Bundan kaçıyorlar. Dünya standartlarında olduğunu iddia eden bir şirket için çok yazık. Temsil ettikleri kalitenin hızla kaybolduğu aşikar.

Kathmandu to Munich via Istanbul. This is the worst service I have ever seen. Airline changed the flight time and instead of 2 hr transit we need to stay 14 hr at this Istanbul airport. And they didn't provide us visa and hotel to stay. This is the first and last I'm traveling with this airline.

İstanbul'dan Male'ye. Türk Hava Yolları'nın burada 10 üzerinden 5 puan aldığına inanamıyorum. Yıl boyunca tüm büyük ve birkaç küçük hava yolu şirketi ile uçuyorum ve daha önce hiç bu kadar iyi yemek, servis ve konfor almadım.

Baku to Istanbul. Frequent traveler of Turkish Airlines and somehow I see that quality decreases over time. Still smiling crew members, good food and wide drinks menu (incl spirits and wine). The only downside is entertainment service - screen not working properly and audio selection very limited. Also they could change food menu more often.

São Paulo a Istambul. Serviço terrível, o kit de amenidades foi dado a outros passageiros da Classe Executiva e não a mim. Em um voo de 12 horas, uma refeição, pois o café da manhã não foi servido mesmo no embarque, eu disse que descansaria na primeira parte do voo e comeria depois, eles disseram que tudo bem, mas depois disseram que a refeição não é servida sob demanda, comissários de bordo muito rudes. Perguntado sobre a água, eles disseram que trariam para o assento ainda esperando. O prato do jantar, foi péssimo, nunca teve uma carne tão seca e dura, pediram para trocar disseram que não havia refeição extra. Este é o tipo de tratamento que você tem na Classe Executiva da Turkish Airlines.
A330-300 ile İstanbul'dan Frankfurt'a. Kabin ekibi çok dikkatliydi. Frankfurt'a zamanında vardık. Türk hava yolları ile defalarca seyahat ettik ve yine yapacağız. Tavsiye ediyoruz.

İstanbul'dan Duşanbe'ye. Berbat!! Uçağın saat 9'da kalkması gerekiyordu. Check-in sırasında, uçuşun dokuz saat rötar yaptığı söylendi, yolcular havaalanında kalmak zorunda kaldı. Uyuyacak yer yok, yetersiz bilgilendirilmiş, kaba, İngilizce konuşma becerileri çok sınırlı olan Türk hava yolları çalışanlarından sıfır yardım veya empati. Dokuz saat boyunca havaalanının zemininde uyumaya bırakıldı. Onlarla bir daha asla uçmayacak.

İstanbul'dan Londra'ya. Gidiş salonuna geldiğimde, göçmenlik görevlilerini geçmek ve pasaportumu kontrol ettirmek için 30 dakika bekledim. Birleşik Krallık'a taşınan bazı aileler süreci yavaşlattı. Eldeki ailelerde Ön Yatılılık başarısız oldu, İngilizce veya Türkçe dilleri anlamadı. Yeni bir B737'ye biniş hızlıydı ve fazla kabin bagajı kesinlikle kapıda kontrol ediliyordu. Kabin, hafif ve parlak bir hisle çok yeniydi. Makul diz mesafeli ortalama ekonomi koltukları. Uçak, uçuş öncesi lego tabanlı sevimsiz bir video gösteren baş üstü TV ekranlarına sahipti. Kabin ekibi çok iyiydi ve verimli bir hizmet sundu. Kalkıştan sonra servis edilen içecekler ve bir saat sonra pilav, sebze ve kebaptan oluşan tam bir Türk yemeği servis edildi. Kuskus gibi görünen vejetaryen bir seçenek mevcuttu. İçecekler arasında meyve suyu, gazlı içecekler, bira ve beyaz şarap vardı. Uçak içi eğlence, 8 kanalda müzik ve radyo ile sınırlıydı. Genel olarak hoş bir uçuştu ve koltuklar iyi durumdaydı.

Boston to Amsterdam via Istanbul. Great flight, no delay. The staff were very kind and helpful during the flight. The entertainment system was great, lots of new movies/series. My preferred food is seefood based upon my miles and smiles profile. I got grilled salmon and shrimps. It was like eating at a good restaurant. No complaints at all

Tashkent to Istanbul. Check in Tashkent was chaos, People where checking in box's of eggs and fresh produce to sell in Istanbul. I quickly slipped into the business line and saved 20 minutes from the check in process. When we all assembled in the depart lounge the pre boarding sequence went out of the window. People standing closest to the door where on 1st. This ruffled a few business travellers big time. The airplane was a well used and tired aircraft, the interior was well used & featured cramped and un comfortable economy seats. Boarding was swift and the crew did a manual safety briefing, before a quick take off. The inflight services was a limited range of drinks and tea. The meal options where greasy riced based meals with donner meats. There was no flight entertainment. The flight was over soon enough and we disembarked on a jet way with easy connection to my next flight.

İstanbul'dan Taşkent'e. Kalkış kuyruğuna inince tam bir kaos, her biri 3-4 kabinli çanta, gelinlik, yorgan ve elektrikli eşya taşıyan 100'lerce yerlinin uçağa binmeye çalışması. Türk hava yolları personeli, Özbekleri alışverişten mutlu bir şekilde kontrol altına almak ve çantaları çıkarmak için ellerinden geleni yaptı. Biniş sırası da işe yaramadı. Bana en iyi haliyle bir ragbi hücumunu hatırlatıyor. Çok eski bir kabine sahip, iyi kullanılmış bir uçağa otobüsle götürüldük. Pencere koltuğuma geldiğimde her iki koltuğun da istiflenmiş çantalarla dolu olduğunu gördüm. Hangi sahiplerinin hayal kırıklığına uğraması için kaldırılması gerekiyordu. Türk Hava Yolları'nın uçuşta fazladan 6-7 personeli vardı ve 2 tonluk bagaj gibi görünen şeyi ambarın içine taşımaya ve insanları oraya tahsis edilen koltuklara oturtmaya çalışıyordu. Uçuşun gecikmeli bir kalkışı vardı, bu da size çok yorgun bir iç mekana bakmanız için zaman verdi, koltuklar eskiydi ve destekten yoksundu. Bacak mesafesi sıfırdı ve IFE veya video ekranı yoktu. Ekip, manuel bir güvenlik demosu yaptı ve koltuk değiştirmek isteyen kişileri kontrol etmek zorunda kaldı. Uçuşun kendisi iyiydi, temel bir içecek servisi ve basit bir kebap eti ve pilav yemeği vardı, görebildiğim hiçbir bitki örtüsü seçeneği yoktu. Mürettebat, kalkıştan itibaren sıkı bir likör politikası uyguladı ve bu da işe yaradı. İniş iyiydi ve uzak bir park yerinden bir otobüse bindik. Vize kontrolü ve bagaj toplama yoluyla geçiş, Özbek standartlarına göre hızlıydı.

London to Istanbul. The departing gate and boarding experience was good, people boarded quickly and the sequence worked well. The cabin of this new 737 was clean and bright, for a economy seat the legroom was ok with a standard seat pitch of 34 or so inches. A cheesy safety video was shown before takeoff featuring lego figures. A little too cheesy after been shown twice, once in Turkish and once in English. Drinks were served after take off in a punctual fashion and was soon followed by a superb in flight meal of lamb kebab and rice, a good looking vegetarian Dahl was available too. Drinks included average wines and rice beer, along with soft drinks and Turkish coffee. The cabin crew where good and well turned out, including a chef working in the galley for business class passengers. The rest of the flight was fine. This plane did not feature IFE, other than some magzines. We were disembarked at a remote stand and spent 20 minutes on a bus trundling across a dark airfield to a packed transfer hall. Cannot wait for the new airport.

इस्तांबुल के रास्ते मुंबई से लॉस एंजिल्स तक। TK9 (BOM-IST) का अनुमानित प्रस्थान सुबह 6:55 बजे था जो वास्तव में सुबह 7:55 बजे रवाना हुआ, कुछ कनेक्टिंग फ्लाइट और अन्य कारणों से इसमें देरी हुई। BOM-IST और IST-LAX दोनों उड़ानों में मेरा अनुभव बहुत अलग था। बीओएम-आईएसटी समीक्षा: संचार: पायलट द्वारा यात्रियों के साथ किया गया संचार भयानक था, उन्होंने तुर्की में कुछ बात की और कुछ अंग्रेजी में बड़बड़ाया। मुझे बस धन्यवाद शब्द ही समझ आया। घोषणा के लिए उपयोग किए गए स्पीकर की गुणवत्ता बहुत सस्ती थी। इस उड़ान में विमान चालक दल का रवैया बहुत अलग था, वे यात्रियों के साथ ठीक से संवाद नहीं कर रहे थे और बस रोबोट की तरह काम कर रहे थे। प्रश्नों को न सुनना और अगले यात्रियों के साथ आगे बढ़ना। उन्होंने अपने आने वाले यात्रियों का अभिवादन भी नहीं किया। भोजन की गुणवत्ता ठीक थी। कोई मेनू कार्ड उपलब्ध नहीं कराया गया. कुल मिलाकर फ्लाइट पुराने इंटरफेस के साथ साफ-सुथरी थी। मेरी आगे की सीट फट गई थी और कुछ अंदरूनी हिस्से साफ़ दिखाई दे रहे थे। IST-LAX समीक्षा: अंग्रेजी में संचार बहुत स्पष्ट था, बोलने वाले भी अच्छे थे। केबिन क्रू मिलनसार और मिलनसार था और यात्रियों को अच्छी तरह समझता था और मेरे सभी प्रश्न सुनता था। मेरे बैग उठाने में मेरी मदद की. अन्दर आते-जाते समय हमारा स्वागत किया। खाना: खाना बहुत ख़राब था. जब भोजन में एशियाई शाकाहारी भोजन को प्राथमिकता दी गई तो कृपया भगवान के लिए इटालियन पास्ता न परोसें। मेनू कार्ड उपलब्ध कराया गया. उड़ान: नए इंटरफेस और अच्छी सीटों के साथ यह उड़ान साफ-सुथरी थी। फ्लाइट 1 घंटा देरी से पहुंची. टर्किश एयरलाइंस की समग्र समीक्षा: इस्तांबुल हवाई अड्डे की सुरक्षा महिला बेहद असभ्य थी। वह बुनियादी अंग्रेजी भी नहीं समझ पाती। यात्री जल्दी में और थके हुए होते हैं और उस मानसिकता में ऐसी छोटी-छोटी बातें भी यात्रियों पर बड़ा प्रभाव डालती हैं। मेरी मुंबई से इस्तांबुल की उड़ान ख़राब थी और इस्तांबुल से लॉस एंजिल्स की उड़ान अच्छी थी। वे वास्तव में विभिन्न क्षेत्रों के यात्रियों के साथ भेदभाव करते हैं। अलग-अलग यात्रियों को अलग-अलग सेवाएँ प्रदान करना। मैंने काफी यात्राएँ की हैं लेकिन कभी भी ऐसा व्यवहार नहीं मिला।
İstanbul'dan Beyrut'a. Kaba, kibirli, stresli ve özür dilemeden dikkatsiz ekip. Wifi'ye bağlanmak imkansız veya basitçe arızalı. Gerçekten kötü bir deneyim.

Lahore to Frankfurt via Istanbul in business class. Extremely disappointed with this pathetic airline. Lahore to Istanbul the aircraft was A330-300. And everything about the flight was sub standard. The seat layout was at least 20 years old, when business class seats hardly just reclined. No storage space. The kit they provided had nothing in it. Cheap stuff. For an around 6 hour flight, no menu cards were provided. The crew serving never bothered to ask if passengers needed anything. One had to look around what others were eating and ask for it. The worst part was the next flight, from Istanbul to Frankfurt. It was again A330-200. And everything on this flight was perfect. They provided a menu card, the seats layout was modern. Like proper fully reclining seats. I feel awful the way they discriminate with flights from Pakistan.

Durban to Houston via Istanbul. We had booked our flights from Durban to Houston (return) which included a stopover of 2 days in Istanbul whereby our journey from Istanbul to Houston was on 16th December 2018 on flight number TK33 at 2.30pm. We had requested wheelchair service in advance. We checked-in on time at Istanbul Airport and waited more than 1 hour for the wheelchair assistant who never came and had to walk by ourselves to the gate. By the time we reached the gate we were denied boarding as they said that we are late. As a result, we had to buy another ticket on Turkish Airlines for 18th December 2018 at the airport which cost us TRY 21519 and this was through no fault of our own. The problem is that the wheelchair assistance never turned up which is the main reason for us being late. We have flown with other airlines and never faced this issue. It was our first time with Turkish Airlines and has been a terrible experience.

New York to Thessaloniki via Istanbul. I have so many bad words in my mind about this airline. It was the first and the last time I chose it. My return trip was yesterday, JFK to Ataturk, due to a 2.5 hours delay I lost my connection flight to Thessaloniki. When I came out of the plane there is no one to help me out with my flight, I was asking the ground staff and they talk to me in a rude and sarcastic manner because I dont speak Turkish. I was waiting in a very long line (100 people or more, all of them lost their connection flights) to change my ticket. My new ticket was at 20:15 evening and I had arrived at 9 am. I was waiting for 11 hours to go home! They take as at a hotel for almost 4 hours, the hotel and the ground staff had the worst attitude I have ever seen! They didn't show us any respect, long lines, no directions, no answers, no English, nothing except of rudeness. Now I'm home after 26 hours, instead of 14. For me Turkish is really the worst airline and has the worst ground stuff. Waste of money and time!

Cape Town to Sao Paulo via Istanbul. We applied and was granted "free accommodation" and stay over in Istanbul - never issued. This was a major reason we decided to use them they were not cheaper than SAA (direct flight) and the price we paid was to fly twice longer in and out. I contacted them many times over 9 months and just got promises, 4 days before our departure they still could not issue the vouchers and had to pay all ourselves. No feedback, no communication, nothing.

New York to Istanbul via Skopje. No care for being on time, worst airline ever to being on time. My first flight was 35 mins late for unknown reasons, I spent 9 hours waiting for the next available flight. As I was waiting I watched almost every Turkish Airlines that landed had passengers running off to malke it to their next flight. Then my next flight did not have us board till departure time, when it came to loading on the buses they had us wait 20 mins on a cramped bus without opening the doors. Some passengers had to use the emergency latch to open the doors so we can get some air. Then boarding the plane the captain notifies us that we are delayed and no reason with it. Late again to my final destination. Don't fly with Turkish Airlines!

من الرياض إلى مانيلا عبر اسطنبول. كانت كلتا الرحلتين ممتازتين خاصة من اسطنبول إلى مانيلا. كان الطعام لذيذًا وفيرًا. مساحة مقعد رحبة بتكوين 3x3x3 على B777 وهو أمر ضروري لهذه الرحلة التي تستغرق 12 ساعة. الترفيه المتوسط ​​على متن الطائرة والذي لا بأس به بالنسبة لي ، من لا يستخدمه كثيرًا. هذه الرحلة ممتلئة لكن الطاقم قام بعمل ممتاز.

Belgrade to Kiev via Istanbul. Worst customer support service ever. They respond with automatically generated replies that has nothing to do with my questions and complaints. Also Miles&Smiles program is made for fools. I have been flying with Turkish airlines for 10 years, collecting miles and now there is no way I can use them before they expire! Can't buy reward ticket, can't upgrade my flying class, nor my bonus card class, can't shop in the aircraft and online. My bonuses are blocked and soon will expire for nothing. And this is the way they say Thank you for being their faithful customer for a decade!
London to Bangkok via Istanbul. London to Istanbul on A330, excellent in every way. Superb selection of videos which all worked well with no delays and annoying adverts at onset. Aircraft clean

Atlanta to Addis Ababa via Istanbul. Turkish Airlines delays bags for all passengers up 2 days and when you arrive you have to come back a day or two later to claim your bag. Worst airline I have ever flown. Bad customer service. I will never fly again. Avoid if possible.

Washington to Addis Ababa via Istanbul . Although the flight and flight crew on my trip from DC to Addis were lovely the crew, plane, food, and customer service on my return trip were horrendous. The food served between Istanbul and DC (return flight) was obviously spoiled and several people were sick as a result. The flight crew did nothing to reduce the impact (mess, smell) from this. The plane itself was dirty and several of the seats damaged in the economy class area. The restrooms (within the first 2-3 hours of the flight) ran out of toilet paper and the floors became covered in urine and worse. Upon arrival in DC my checked luggage was returned badly damaged (hard sided suitcase with a giant crack in the hard case). Turkish Airlines has refused to compensate me for the damage despite filing all the appropriate documents.

Von Berlin nach Erbil über Istanbul. Über zwei Stunden nach Beginn des Fluges nach Erbil, als ich dachte, wir würden bereits absteigen, wurde bekannt gegeben, dass wir wegen Nebel nicht landen könnten und zurück nach Istanbul fliegen würden. Das bedeutete eine 24-stündige Wartezeit am Flughafen bis zum nächsten Flug, der dann weitere 90 Minuten Verspätung hatte. Dann, nachdem alle eingestiegen waren, fuhren zwei Busse vor, „Flug abgesagt“. Zu diesem Zeitpunkt konnte ich nicht länger warten und musste zurück nach Berlin fliegen. Meine ursprüngliche Rückkehr wäre am Tag zuvor gewesen. Ich verbrachte zwei Stunden am Transferschalter von Turkish Airlines und war voller Beharrlichkeit und Nervosität, um endlich in letzter Minute den Transfer zum nächsten Flugzeug am selben Tag zu bekommen. Der Gottesdienst dort war einfach schrecklich (ca. 13.00 Uhr am 19. Dezember). Zuerst wurde mir gesagt: „Alles ist in Ordnung, setzen Sie sich einfach hin und wir liefern Ihnen das Ticket.“ Aber als die Zeit verging und niemand kam, musste ich zum Schreibtisch zurückgehen und im Grunde ganz von vorne anfangen und mich mit insgesamt fünf oder sechs Beamten herumschlagen, die kaum Englisch sprachen und so unorganisiert waren, dass sie an kopflose Hühner erinnerten. Auch 2 Stunden kostenloses Flughafen-WLAN pro Woche (!) reichen für einen Reisenden unter diesen Umständen einfach nicht aus. Und es gab keine Möglichkeit, mit Kreditkarte mehr einzukaufen.

Amsterdam naar Abu Dhabi via Istanboel. Vertragingen, vertragingen en nog meer vertragingen. Dat vat de ervaring met Turkish Airlines samen. Lange rijen bij de incheckbalie. Langzame processen. Vertragingen in het vluchtschema van AMS naar IST. Late aankomst op de IST-luchthaven. Verdere vertragingen van IST naar AUH. En bij aankomst op Abu Dhabi Airport ontbraken onze koffers. Na een vertraging van twee dagen arriveerde de bagage eindelijk in ons hotel. We moesten voor 550 euro kleding, ondergoed, badkleding, schoeisel, toiletartikelen kopen om ons door de eerste twee dagen van onze vakantie te redden. Turks compenseerde slechts 170 euro. Een schande. Wij reizen nooit meer met deze luchtvaartmaatschappij.

İstanbul'dan Johannesburg'a. 30 Aralık (TK0038) tarihli uçuşumuz iptal edildi ve 31 Aralık (TK0042) uçuşunu sonlandırmak için bilet ofisleriyle bağlantı kurmak zorunda kaldık. 4 kişi için koltuk başına 79 $ ödedik (Koltuk 6 A/B ve 6 J/K) Bize sadece oğlum ve benim diz mesafesi nedeniyle kullandığımız A/B tahsis edildi. Eşim ve kızım 27E/F'ye taşındı. Heathrow'dan önceki gün 29 Aralık'ta 30 Aralık bağlantısı için uçtuk ama erteleme nedeniyle konaklama bulmak zorunda kaldık ve Türk Hava Yolları Heathrow'dan yolculuğumuzu bildiği halde yemek ve konaklama konusunda yardımcı olmadılar. Bu fazladan 300 Euro'ydu ve 2 x 79 $'lık koltuk maliyeti kaybım hakkında hiçbir şey duymadım. Bir daha asla!

Johannesburg to Istanbul. We were well taken care of by the cabin crew, service was near perfection. The food was delicious with lots of varieties available. Everything was on time. Great movie selections. Smooth lift off and landing

Taipei to Sao Paulo via Istanbul. Worst service I had in my life! As Elite Plus even I was flying economy I have access to Business Class Lounge in any domestic or international flight flying Turkish, what was denied in Taipei my entrance. When I arrive at my seat someone was already seated, they changed me seat, and later I couldn't access internet, need to use from my miles. During flight other passengers in Business Class Received amenity kit and I didn't. I used miles for upgrade both ways and they gave boarding pass just for first sector, I asked Purser about the amenity and as well my ticket second sector because in a previous flight I had same bad experience. They said you should do a feedback form. Waiting answer until now. They used more miles than the top limit on their system that is 75000 miles from Far East to South America, they deducted 100.000 miles. They damage my luggage on arrival. The asked invoice from the luggage I had, and denied payment saying the luggage is fixable, just come and fix for me. The miles accrued was to be 100% on the fare I bought they gave me around 50%. Amazing company!

Chicago to Athens via Istanbul. This was the worst airline I have flown with. I booked my tickets last minute, it was for me and my 4 month old son. I had 3 suitcases a stroller and 2 carryons. I had paid for the suitcases, but because I was traveling alone I went there with my husband and he politely asked if they could please take the carryons on the plane because she can't carry everything by herself. The manager came out and said that we have to pay. I said I already paid extra for my suitcases please help us because my wife is carrying our son, the diaper bag and 2 carryons. He was rude stating that we have to pay each carryon. We didn't have the extra money and my wife took everything with her. If that's how Turkish Airline treats their customers, they shouldn't be operating. It was the last time I use this airline. No dignity or humanity, it's all only about the money. And when I took the stroller with my son. They made me package the stroller by myself looking that I had my son on me crying and when I asked for help they said that they can't help me... unbelievable... they see me with 2 carryons a stroller and a baby and they can't help me.

London to Bangkok via Istanbul. I traveled with Turkish Airlines on business class back to Bangkok. The check-in was fast as there weren't any queue and the staff work very professionally. i received a priority pass at the security. The airport is huge so I need sometime to walk to the gate. I visited the United Airlines lounge near the gate which was large, modern, clean, had friendly staff and had wide selection of food and drinks. After staying in the lounge I headed to the gate early like it said on the time board but I had to wait at the gate very long and the queue as disorganized and passenger both business and economy were held for another half an hour before boarding. After boarding, I got welcomed by the crew handed out a welcome drink and a menu for lunch. The seat was fully flat, modern and comfortable but the remote control was old and the distance to the magazines was unacceptable and the storage areas was poor. The flight was delayed as the traffic at Heathrow was bad. The in-flight entertainment system which had wide selection of movies, TV programs and many more. The meal was served an hour after takeoff, the food made up of Turkish food which was nice but it tasteless and the option in the menu was poor. The toilet was clean and modern. The flight arrived on time in Istanbul. The airport was crowded, old and had lack of renovation. Fortunately, I had an access to the lounge which was large,clean but crowded, lack of food options and seats. I spent and hour before head to the gate for my flight to Bangkok. The airport was huge and I nearly missed the priority boarding as the time board show the gate late. The service and facilities was the same as the previous flight but the seat included the amenity kit which is really useful on this 10 hour flight. The crew weren't friendly on this flight and not motivated. The flight arrived in Bangkok in the afternoon on the next day on time. I received another priority pass to went through the passport control. My bag arrived on time also. Overall, the airline itself had a good service and business class facilities but the crew should be more friendly and the airport issues should be fixed.

Vienna to Riyadh via Istanbul. Biggest problem with this airline is its home airport. Istanbul Ataturk has huge capacity problems. Because of that most flights are delayed and there are no places to sit while waiting for a delayed flight. Then really amateur services kick in when the employees start calling for all passengers to group in the back of the room for passport check only to move again to the front after that for the boarding. The fact that I booked extra legroom seat and a plane was changed without any notification (resulting in regular seat) only adds to an unpleasant experience. This was not a low-cost flight, but services appeared so. Food and on-board services won't fix these problems.

İstanbul'dan Abuja'ya. Türk Hava Yolları online check-in ile seçtiğim koltukları değiştirerek ailemi ayırdı. Bunun bana açıklanmasına gerek yoktu, bu da bagajımı teslim ettiğimde bunun dikkatsizlik ve beceriksizlik olduğu sonucuna varmama neden oldu. Bagaj teslimi sırasında koltuklarımı değiştirdiler. Sonra işleri batırdılar ve bir bebeği acil durum koltuğuna oturttular. Bunun üzerine babasıyla birlikte yanıma bir bebek koydurdum, halbuki ondan önce benim yanımda boş bir koltuk vardı. Personelden özür yok. Korkunç organizasyon ve hizmet. Onları tekrar uçurmayacak.

Bruxelles à Istanbul via Beyrouth. Nous avons été déçus par cette horrible compagnie aérienne à bien des égards. Pour commencer, nous avons réservé nos billets de Noël le 1er juillet pour garantir une place à un prix équitable. La nuit avant le vol. Nous allons en ligne pour nous enregistrer et découvrir que notre vol de correspondance d'Istanbul à Beyrouth a été annulé et nous avons été automatiquement mis sur le vol de correspondance précédent qui part avant notre arrivée de Bruxelles. Le système a permis l'enregistrement et n'a rien vu de mal dans la combinaison de vols. Nous avons appelé le service client pour faire un changement de vol trois fois et à tout moment l'agent n'était pas serviable, pas prêt pour une conversation, et a insisté sur le fait que si nous voulions nous rendre à Beyrouth, la seule option serait de partir le 23 décembre. arriver le 24, sachant que notre réservation initiale était départ et arrivée le 21 décembre. La seule autre option offerte était de voler le 25 ou de se faire rembourser le prix du billet payé en juillet pour pouvoir acheter un nouveau billet sur une autre compagnie aérienne le jour du vol, ce qui bien sûr vous comprenez à quel point c'est ridicule. Donc, ayant peur de rater l'occasion de voir ma famille ce Noël, nous avons pris l'option du 23 décembre. Après cela, j'ai fait des recherches plus approfondies sur les options et j'ai découvert qu'il s'agissait d'autres options qui nous ont permis d'arriver à temps pour notre vol de correspondance le 21, avec des sièges disponibles, que l'agent n'avait non seulement pas proposé, mais également assuré qu'il n'y en avait pas. J'ai confirmé auprès d'un autre agent de Turkish Airlines la disponibilité de prendre ce vol, j'ai trouvé, moi, le client, qui a fait ce qu'il était censé faire s'il était compétent. Cependant, maintenant que j'étais d'accord sur le changement de billet pour le 23, pour pouvoir faire mon nouveau changement, les politiques se sont appliquées d'un coup, alors qu'elles étaient complètement fautives depuis le début. Pour faire le changement nous avons dû payer 100€ par personne plus les taxes d'aéroport plus la différence de prix pour les billets qui sont passés de 360€ par personne à 680€ par personne, ce qui est complètement scandaleux puisque jusqu'à présent, tous les problèmes proviennent d'un système défaillant qui ne nous a jamais signalé un changement de vol, d'un agent qui n'a pas fait son travail et d'un service client totalement indifférent. Pour essayer de rectifier la situation, je suis resté éveillé de la 20e nuit jusqu'à 8 heures du matin le lendemain, rédigeant soi-disant une réclamation auprès du centre de réclamation sans aucune preuve de cela, demandant à l'agent de me donner des réponses robotiques répétitives et me disant d'attendre. Après être restés éveillés, nous n'avons jamais eu de nouvelles de notre demande urgente. Nous avons manqué notre option de solution avec le départ de l'avion. Je suis resté au téléphone en essayant de prendre la prochaine solution disponible. Notre dossier est "toujours en cours" sans solution, manquant toute notre option pour y arriver avant le 24. Cette compagnie se comporte moins bien qu'une compagnie low-cost. Insulte le client et son intelligence. Embauche des personnes qui n'ont ni le bon anglais ni l'empathie pour traiter avec un client. Est frustrant et honteux. Il me manque des moments familiaux importants que j'ai planifiés depuis des mois à cause de cette compagnie aérienne, de son système, de ses employés. Quant aux recommandations si vous souhaitez vous rendre à Beyrouth. Pegasus, un low cost, est beaucoup plus efficace et respectueux. Les compagnies aériennes du Moyen-Orient ont définitivement été une bonne expérience, j'ai eu un problème une fois avec les compagnies aériennes Aegean, mais elles l'ont résolu sur place, ne me laissant pas la place de me plaindre.

Paris à Dar es Salam via Istanbul. Turkish Airlines n'est au mieux pas fiable. Le cauchemar a commencé en août mais permettez-moi de dire que jusqu'à ce que je voyage en décembre, j'ai changé le billet 3 fois. Chaque fois que "l'horaire change". Puis quand j'ai voyagé, ils ont perdu mon sac. Quand ils l'ont trouvé, il manquait un objet ! Je n'étais pas le seul à manquer un bagage à l'aéroport. Les compagnies aériennes turques sont tout simplement très peu professionnelles. J'ai acheté leur billet à cause de prix compétitifs, mais si je calcule le prix du billet et le temps et l'argent pour les appeler (à cause de leurs problèmes), j'aurais dû acheter un billet auprès d'une compagnie supérieure comme Emirates ou Qatar. Épargnez-vous de gâcher vos vacances et évitez ces personnes non professionnelles !

Vienna to San Francisco via Istanbul. Flight experience was ok and satisfying. Customer complaints handling a disaster. TK did not credit status miles as on the ticket. But no way to get an answer why. All online contacts tried. Autogenerated answers, refusal to accept messages in language of home page. Refusal of message because form not filled completely (no miles and smiles number, we cannot deal with your message). And last "You may contact with related Airlines customer service for the transactions". All from email accounts that would not accept answers. My take is clear: TK does knowingly produce wrong and misleading information on tickets, and laugh at customers asking for remedy for non provided services. Hence, neither me nor any company member I have to authorize will fly TK from now on.

İstanbul'dan Los Angeles'a. Yer ekibi çok mutsuz. Kaba ve küçümseyici. İşlerinden memnun değiller ve bu gösteriyor. Hiçbiri aslında liderliğe yansıyan şirketlerini umursamıyor. Bu nedenle, müşteri deneyimi her yerde kötüdür. Ödediğinizin karşılığını alıyorsunuz ve bu sizin için Türk hava yolları. Bu incelemeye yol açan olay, gözlüklerimi düşürmüş olmamdır. Tüm yolcuların gitmesini bekledim ve sonra onları aramaya başladım. Onları ararken, mürettebatı yardım etmek yerine, onu arayacaklarını ve bagaj teslimine getireceklerini garanti ederek uçağı terk etmemi istediler. Bagaj teslim noktasına ulaştığımda birkaç dakika bekleyin, size haber vereceğiz dediler. 15 dakika daha geçti ve onları buldular, çıkışlarda check-in kontuarından almamı söylediler. Ben de oraya yürüdüm ve masadaki bayan mutsuz. Bana 45 dakika süreceğini ve onları bana postalayamayacaklarını söyledi, ben de bekliyorum. Bir buçuk sonra biri benim olmayan gözlüklerle geldi. Daha fazlasını bulana kadar bekle dediler, iki çift daha geldi ve hala benim değil. 45 dakika daha geçer ve hiçbir şey olmaz. Yani temelde boşa giden 500 dolarlık bardak. Sonuç olarak, bir şey düşürürseniz uçağı terk etmeyin, sizi dışarı atmaya çalışacaklar ve sonra umursamayacaklar. Gidip biraz daha ödeyip daha iyi hizmet alın derim. Bir şey kaybettiğimden değil, mürettebatın, aramama izin verseler alabileceğim bir eşyayı düşürdükten sonra bana nasıl davrandığı.

İstanbul'dan Bangkok'a. Eski uçak, binerken 10-15 dakika içinde hava akışı yok, klima başlayana kadar Kötü Hava. Sıcak yemek ve tatlı tadı iyiydi ama garnitürler, salatalar vs yiyemedim. Normalde hepsini uçakta yerim. Yemekten sonra kabin oldukça sıcaktı. Sıcaklık seviyesini hava görevlisine bildiriyorum ama fazla bir değişiklik yok. Soğutucuda uyumak daha iyi, çünkü battaniyen ve üzerine ekleyebileceğin kıyafetlerin var! Ucuz bilet maliyeti bile, iyi hava taşımacılığı için 100e daha ödemeyi seviyorum.

Türk Hava Yolları ile Ankara-Frankfurt seferi. Öncelik sayacını kullanarak hızlı kontrol edin. Pasaport kontrolünün ardından, çok sıcak olan ve çok temel yiyecek ve içecek seçeneklerine sahip olan salona yöneldi. Bu salon, TK'nin İstanbul'daki salonundan dünyalar kadar uzakta ve şimdiye kadar ziyaret ettiğim en kötü salonlardan biri. WiFi, tekrarlanan denemelere rağmen çalışmadı. Biniş saatinden çok önce kapıya yöneldik ve hayal kırıklığımın büyük bir kısmı, birkaç boş hava köprüsü varken uçağa bindik. Uçakta sert ürün yeterliydi ve bir acil çıkış sırası seçtiğim için bol miktarda bacak boşluğum vardı. Servis son derece yavaştı ve öğle yemeğimi aldığımda zaten soğuktu. Yemekler, TK'dan beklediğim standardın oldukça altındaydı ve bunu, hizmetin bozulmasının açık bir işareti olarak görüyorum. FA'lar sanki otopilottaymış gibi görevlerini yerine getirmeye başladılar. IFE'nin iyi bir seçimi vardı ve benim gelen yolculuğum gibi, ses jakı iyi çalışmadı ve sık sık ses kaybına neden oldu. Uçak kalktı ve zamanında geldi. “Öncelikli” olarak etiketlenmiş olmasına rağmen çantamın çıkması oldukça uzun sürdü ve bu şekilde etiketlenmemiş olanlardan çok sonra teslim edildi.
