Birkaç ay önce bir A330'daydım ve şans eseri geniş bacak mesafeli koltuğumu aldım ama arkadaki 5 yolcu da geniş ayak mesafeli koltuklar için para ödedi. THY, yolcu haklarını henüz keşfetmedi.

Prague to Tbilisi via Istanbul, returning from Baku. I was a bit worried because I had to transfer in Istanbul from IST to SAW but it worked perfectly. 90 min after landing I was at the other airport. However, it was Sunday afternoon, so there was less traffic than during the week. Only two minuses were baggage delivery at IST - the monitors are not updated regularly or are too small for such a big number of arrivals so our baggage was already out and we still did not see information about the belt and the staff at the SAW airport. I had the feeling that there we were punished for flying with Turkish as the airport is hub for the competition airline. Boarding was not even announced properly, just somebody shouted. On the return flight stop over in IST was very pleasant with smooth security control. In flight service great, friendly staff, good food. The only minus is big difference in equipment. I changed 4 planes. 2 were without IFE, one with old one and one with new one. So you never really know what is waiting for you.

Hamburg nach Istanbul. Neue A321 mit neuen Kabinen, getrennte C- und Y-Klasse, hell und luftig, neue Sitze mit erstklassigem IFE mit WIFI an Bord. Der Flug ist zu 100 % ausgebucht, aber die Sitze sind bequem. Das Kabinenpersonal war höflich und professionell. Nach der pünktlichen Abfahrt verteilten die Mitarbeiter das Menü. TK servierte auf dem 3,10-stündigen Flug ein komplettes, leckeres Abendessen mit 2 Auswahlmöglichkeiten und kompletten Getränken, einschließlich Wein und Bier. Sie bieten auf diesen 3,10 Stunden ein hervorragendes IFE. Flug mit voller Auswahl an Spielen und neuesten Filmen. Alles in allem ein sehr angenehmer Flug, pünktlicher Flug und erstklassiger Service an Bord.

New York to Istanbul. Worst experience yet flying ever. The flight was delayed 3 hours and when asked about connecting flight the staff could give no information, said just to wait and maybe we would still make the connecting flight. When we missed the flight then someone would help us. When I called the online service the staff was extremely unhelpful and refused to find a manager for me, when I called back she said she was referring me to customer service but really just left me on hold for 10 minutes until I hung up. Horrendous, tickets may be cheap but reflects the service and reliability

Da Roma a Tel Aviv via Istanbul. Velivolo molto pulito, equipaggio di cabina professionale e cordiale. Il pasto fornito era eccezionale e ho mangiato in prima classe su altre compagnie aeree che non si avvicinano a questa qualità. Molto impressionato! Voli puntuali e arrivati ​​puntuali. Piacevole esperienza tutto intorno!.

Pisa to Istanbul. Turkish Airlines cancelled flight without even informing me. They offered full refund. That would have only costed me double the money, given the fact I did not want to be more late. I went to Pisa airport to get my tickets only to find out that I am not in the system even after changed information of my schedule. The staff took 4 hours to figure out this issue. They don't know how to do their job. Crew members would forget the last people on the seats and not serve coffee to us. I recommend not to use Turkish Airlines.

Chicago to Cape Town via Istanbul. Turkish Airlines counters at O'Hare opened well in advance of the flight, which is great for someone like me--who likes to get checked in and through security early and then enjoy a meal or a couple of drinks. The seats were relatively comfortable, and the in-flight entertainment system kept me occupied. The food was good and came regularly, together with a full drinks cart. The service was professional and friendly. We received a complimentary amenities kit on each leg.

Chicago to Zagreb via Istanbul. Turkish Airlines' service out of O'Hare has become better now that it uses Boeing 777. There was more room than before. The check-in process, amenities kit, in-flight service, food, drinks, and entertainment system were all solid. There were more lavatories, and nicer headphones were provided. My connections to and from Zagreb were on an Airbus, which was more than adequate for the shorter flights. The in-flight service was excellent. Given the low fares that Turkish has been offering recently, the value has been very high.

Amsterdam naar Seoel via Istanboel. Ik ben de afgelopen 5 jaar lid van Turkish Airlines Elite Plus (Platinum). Turkish Airlines was vroeger geweldig in vergelijking met de meeste luchtvaartmaatschappijen met geweldige service en geweldig eten. Helaas zijn de dingen ten kwade veranderd en in de afgelopen twee jaar is hun niveau behoorlijk dramatisch gedaald en ik begin nu te kijken om te veranderen en te stoppen met vliegen met Turkish Airlines. Vroeger was business class eten geweldig, het wedijverde met Qatar Airways en eersteklas eten bij andere luchtvaartmaatschappijen. Het voedselpeil is tot op de grond gedaald en is gemiddeld min in vergelijking met veel andere luchtvaartmaatschappijen. Ik heb met nogal wat cabinechefs gesproken en ze bevestigen allemaal dat veel passagiers klagen over de verslechtering van hun businessclass-eten en dat het management op de hoogte is van dit probleem. Vrij triest. Business class stoelen zijn relatief oud in vergelijking met de betere luchtvaartmaatschappijen. Terwijl andere luchtvaartmaatschappijen vooruit zijn gegaan, is Turks achtergebleven. Er is geen privacy en de configuratie is een verouderde 2-3-2 (B777) - ik neem aan dat dit niet zal veranderen, aangezien het erg duur is om de stoelconfiguratie te wijzigen. Het lijkt erop dat de prijzen voortdurend stijgen en terwijl Turks vroeger concurreerde met onder meer Swiss of Lufthansa, zijn de prijzen tegenwoordig doorgaans hoger bij Turkish Airlines. Service aan boord is meestal goed met het personeel aan boord meestal erg vriendelijk en zorgzaam. Vliegtuigleeftijd kan een hit of een misser zijn met sommige heel oud en sommige redelijk nieuw. Entertainment tijdens de vlucht is meestal vrij goed.

Boston to Toronto and then Toronto to Istanbul to Kathmandu, all booked as a single ticket via Turkish airlines. As soon as I arrived to my connecting flight with AQir Canada for check in, they told me I could not board the flight because I did not have a visa. I told them I did not intend to stay in Canada but just transit and usually the transit visa is given at the airport or online. However, the staff told me that as a Nepal citizen I could only get the visa if I go to the consulate in New York and do the necessary paperwork. Worried I decided to contact the Turkish airlines customer service. I called about 20 times with no avail. The call kept going to an automatic response. Really worried I decided to go to terminal E to meet the Turkish airlines staff in person. To my surprise, no one was there. I contacted the help desk and they told me that the Turkish airlines staff will be there only after 7 pm but my flight was to leave at 5 pm. Desperately looking for options, I went around the airport talking to every staff I came across, explaining my situation and they all told me only the (non-existent) Turkish staff could help me. Fast forward to 7 pm, (already forced to meet miss my actual flight) I finally meet the ticketing staff of Turkish airlines. I explained her my situation and tell her how I am a student planning to go home and I have already brought a connecting domestic flight back in Nepal to go from Kathmandu to home and that if I did not make this flight I would lose that ticket too. Then all she does is to tell me that I should have known that Canada requires a visa and that it is my fault. Stunned at her response, I tried to reason with her about how it is unreasonable to expect the customer to know this beforehand and that it is the airlines responsibility to let the customer know of such peculiar cases. After discussing for several minutes, she tells me that there is another flight leaving directly from Boston to Istanbul and that there is only one seat left and it will cost me USD 691 to transfer to this flight. Also she told me that if I had called the customer service immediately after this happened and changed the flight, I would not have had to pay the fine. (which is odd because my customer service call was never answered). I felt betrayed and sad at how the people who are supposed to help you make your life miserable. Although the hospitality of the staff in the plane was good, I felt deeply unsatisfied because of what I had to go through. This is easily the worst travel experience of my life yet.

İstanbul'dan Atina'ya. Genel uçuş harikaydı. Personelin çoğu arkadaş canlısıydı. 6 ay önceden bilet aldım o kadar mutlu değilim ki koltuklar başka bir aile için değiştirildi, bu yüzden ailemle oturamadım. Hiç mutlu değil. Bu nedenle puanım çok düşük olurdu.

İstanbul'dan Podgorica'ya. Her iki uçuş da zamanında gerçekleşti. Sorunsuz check-in. Yeni uçak ve çok temiz. Personel yeterince cana yakın ve kısa mesafe için bile içki ve yemek yedik. Şikayet edecek bir şey yok.

Los Angeles to Tehran via Istanbul. Unfortunately this airline is getting worse and worse by the day. They used to be good in service and food. They served us cold and tasteless food although they have 1-2 chefs walking around. Their seats are narrow, cramped and very uncomfortable. If the passenger in front of you recline his/her seat, you can't use the tray in front of you. The space is too cramped. The bathrooms are filthy after a few hours and it is not really the flight attendants job to clean the bathrooms while serving the food with the same gloves. The flights from Istanbul to Tehran in both directions were terrible. The flight attendants were condescending to the fellow passengers. It wasn't just this trip. It is also the only airline flying to US has the longest immigration checkpoints before boarding the plane. 3 people checks your passport and 1 checks your carry-on. Everyone gets checked.

İstanbul'dan Lizbon'a. Ailem ve ben, bagajlarımızı kontrol etmek ve teslim etmek için uçuştan 3 saat önce geldik. Masadaki asistan bize koltuk alamadığımızı ve tek açıklamasının 'bu uçuş korkunç' olduğunu söyledi ve daha fazla açıklama yapmayı reddetti. Bize 'bekleme' biniş kartları verdi. Uçağa biniş kapısında kenara çekildik ve diğer herkesin uçağa binmesini bekledik. Bizim durumumuzda 7 kişi vardı ve aralarında kesinlikle saygısız davranılan hamile bir bayan vardı! Uçuştan vazgeçen olmadığı için ertesi gün kalmak ve uçmak zorunda kaldık çünkü olmayan biletler satıldı. Bu rezervasyonu uçuşa bir aydan daha uzun bir süre önce almıştık ve aniden bize yer yok mu diyorlar? Bir Şirket, herkesin ayırttığı tarih ve saatte oturduğundan ve uçtuğundan emin olmalıdır. Çifte rezervasyon birçok ciddi sonuç doğurur.

İstanbul'dan Los Angeles'a. Çıkış sırasında bir pencere koltuğu ayırttık ve rezervasyon için prim ödedik. Kontrol ettiğimde rezervasyonun bulunamadığını söylediler. Onlara, tahsis edilen koltukla birlikte seyahat planımın bir kopyasını gösterdim, ancak tek duyabildiğim, bana yardım edemeyecekleriydi. Sonunda bana iki atletik beyefendinin arasında 14 saat hareket ettiremeyeceğim çok dar bir orta koltuk verdiler. Uzun yıllardır Türk Hava Yolları'nı alıyorum ve hizmet, yemek ve müşteri hizmetlerinin seviyelerinin yıllar geçtikçe daha da kötüye gittiğini öğrendim. Kendime bir daha Türk hava yolları ile uçmayacağıma söz verdim.

新加坡經伊斯坦布爾飛往杜塞爾多夫。我每年飛往亞洲 5-6 次出差，土耳其航空一直是我的首選航空公司。直到兩年前的軍事政變期間，我在 IST 機場被困了兩天。但這完全是另一回事了。現在，我在去新加坡出差時再次嘗試了土耳其航空，簡直不敢相信這家航空公司已經變得如此糟糕。回程的4條航程的飛機都很舊而且破舊（不知道型號），毯子又舊又臭，食物遠不如以前，座位不舒服，過境通道完全沒有組織，這幾乎導致了我錯過了繼續飛行的航班。工作人員很好而且很友好。不幸的是，我已經預訂了七月份另一次去上海的商務旅行，但這將是土耳其航空的最後一次。再次回到阿聯酋航空，它在每個標准上都更好，而且價格也貴不了多少。

Pristina to Islamabad via Istanbul. Worst experience ever with the ground staff. They are rude. And have no desire to help out. I arrived and asked for a meal voucher. To which the lady said. No working. Come later. I asked why and how much later. And she started to show irritation and anger. So I asked her why she was raising her voice. And she said. I get angry at you because you don't understand. This electricity issue and not personal. I even asked why they don't have a manual process for this. And she told me to go away!

دبي إلى هانوفر عبر اسطنبول. كان لدي اتصال قصير جدًا لتبدأ بـ (70 دقيقة). عندما وصلنا إلى اسطنبول ، ابتعدت الطائرة وأخذتنا حافلة إلى المحطة. كان مدخل مبنى الركاب مزدحما بالركاب من الرحلات الأخرى. استغرقنا 20 دقيقة للوصول إلى المبنى. بعد ذلك ، كان الفحص الأمني ​​للنقل الدولي مكتظًا بالركاب. حاولت التحدث إلى الموظفين للسماح لي بالذهاب أولاً لكنهم قالوا ابق في المكان الذي أنت فيه في المسار - يقول جميع الركاب نفس الأشياء أولاً. نتيجة لذلك فاتني الاتصال. ذهبت إلى مكتب النقل لشركة الخطوط الجوية التركية. قالت السيدة إنه سيصلني في الرحلة التالية التي ستغادر في غضون ثلاث ساعات. قالت يجب أن أنتظر ريثما تحصل على بطاقة صعود جديدة. انتظرت وانتظرت. تمت المتابعة 5 مرات. في كل مرة قيل لي ألا أقلق ويتم ذلك. بعد 3 ساعات - أخبرني رجل نبيل من الخطوط الجوية التركية أن خطئي هو أن فاتني الاتصال. كانت ساعة واحدة أكثر من كافية للحصول على الاتصال. شرحت له الأسباب لكنه قال ما زال خطئي! سألته إذا كان هذا هو الحال لماذا تم إجباري على الانتظار لمدة 3 ساعات؟ لم يكن لديه إجابة على ذلك وتوقف عن التحدث معي. قال إنه يمكنه إعطائي رحلة في اليوم التالي ورفض الرد على المزيد. لقد رفض دفع ثمن تأشيرتي والفندق أيضًا.

New York JFK to Istanbul. This is the first and last time I will ever book with this airline! Ever! Flight has been delayed twice now. The weather is beautiful out, the plane is at the gate, so it's safe to assume it's due to a scheduling (administrative) issues. No excuse! If I miss my connecting flight, then this review is only the beginning of my complaints!

İstanbul'dan Saraybosna'ya. Ailem ve ben İstanbul Havalimanı'nda olabilecek en kötü kabusu yaşıyoruz. Profesyonel olmayan iki Türk Hava Yolları personeli tarafından uçağa binişimiz ertelendi ve bize haber vermeden çantalarımızın uçaktan atılmasını istedi. Bunu gördüğümüzde sorular sormaya başladık ve daha sonra uçacağımız söylendi - hiçbir sebep açıklanmadı veya özür dilenmedi. Onlara olan güvenimizin bir ödülü olarak, İstanbul Havalimanı'nda 24 saat kalış süremizi tamamlamak üzereyiz ve kendimize neden uçağa binmemizi engellediğimizi soruyoruz.

Kayseri to Istanbul. Flown with this airline twice this month and both experiences were very good. The boarding was very organized and the plane left on time. The seats were spacious and comfy. The best part is definitely the food service, even for a short flight we were provided with a sandwich and drink for free. One of my favourite airlines.

من القاهرة إلى سان فرانسيسكو مع اتصال في اسطنبول. تأخرت الرحلة من القاهرة ، مما جعلنا متأخرين للغاية لإجراء الاتصال في اسطنبول. أسوأ ما في الأمر أنه في إسطنبول ، وضعوا الركاب القادمين على متن حافلة بطيئة بدلاً من مدرج المطار للوصول إلى البوابة ويجعلون من السهل تفويت الرحلات الجوية المتصلة. بعد انقطاع الاتصال ، اضطررنا إلى قضاء 90 دقيقة أخرى في مكتب خدمة العملاء للوصول إلى الرحلة في اليوم التالي. لقد دفعت الخطوط الجوية التركية تكاليف الإقامة في الفندق بالإضافة إلى العشاء والفطور ، لكنها كانت لا تزال مصدر إزعاج. ثم ، في الرحلة في اليوم التالي ، كان هناك تأخير آخر بسبب أخطاء ميكانيكية. لا يصدق كم كانت هذه الرحلة مزعجة.

北京飛往伊斯坦布爾。 TK 在北京使用第三方來辦理地面手續，需要注意辦理登機手續和登機口工作人員的極其粗魯和不合格的服務。我的入住手續是由一位態度粗魯、脾氣暴躁的代理人辦理的，他在整個辦理入住的過程中與一位同事交談。在門口，我們被告知延誤了 30 分鐘，但監視器上沒有顯示這一點。與中國的大多數出發航班一樣，登機非常混亂，所有乘客都使用優先通道。儘管登機口工作人員堅稱延誤時間僅為 30 分鐘，但航班仍晚點 2.5 小時起飛。船上的船員友好而專業。座椅直立時還可以，但由於坐墊磨損，平躺時不舒服。食物很美味，但酒單需要更新，因為他們已經提供相同的選擇兩年了。 IFE 有很多選擇，但考慮到出發時間很晚，我選擇了睡覺。盥洗室狀況不錯，但水槽需要多注意一下。由於出發時間晚，航班晚點，導致多次錯過轉機。儘管延誤並不是航空公司的錯，因為北京正值冬末降雪，但相關的溝通完全具有誤導性。例如，船長提到除冰在 5 分鐘內完成，當時看不到除冰設備。總的來說，這是一次從平庸到還可以的航班。
曼谷經伊斯坦布爾飛往柏林。即使我有一個出口排座位，座位本身的舒適度也很差。頭枕不可調節，而且我的娛樂系統壞了，所以我不得不握住屏幕。沒有提供免費 WiFi 等補償，所以我無法使用平板電腦進行娛樂。他們有一份菜單可供選擇，有羊肉和牛肉，但當他們到達我所在的那排時，只有牛肉可用。與其他航空公司相比，工作人員也不友好，所以我不會推薦這家航空公司。

الرياض الى اسطنبول. أعادوا جدولة رحلتي مع مهلة قصيرة واضطررت إلى البقاء في المطار لمدة أربع ساعات في انتظار رحلتي واضطررت إلى دفع أموال إضافية. علاوة على ذلك ، وصلت بعد أربع ساعات ثم وصولي المتوقع حيث اضطررت إلى ركوب سيارة أجرة بدلاً من أن يصطحبني أخي. أردت في الطائرة شحن هاتفي ولكن لم يكن هناك منفذ أو منفذ USB.

Boston to Tehran via Istanbul. I had one of my worst experience (if not the worst) with Turkish Airlines. I would be a couple pages if I write exactly how many mistakes their agents made and how I got ripped off because of their mistakes! When I first checked in my bag the agent couldn't find my second flight so didn't issue me the boarding pass for that flight and told me I should get boarding pass when I arrive in Istanbul. She first said I should claim my bag in Istanbul and then changed it and said I should claim it in my final destination. In Istanbul, I was told by an agent to wait in a line for boarding pass and when I reached front desk the person there said she couldn't find my ticket! Again, after I showed my online booking she said that because my flight is from the other airport I should go there and get my boarding pass! I then rushed to the other airport which is around 1-2 hours drive far (because I waited around 3 hours in that line to get my boarding pass!!) only to find out that my bag was left at the previous airport that I arrived! So I missed my flight, had to pay to reschedule fee, and had to go back to the previous airport to claim my bag. I told them that I don't want to reschedule with them and she said if I don't I basically forfeit my return flight! So, I had to pay a fee that was about 10 times higher than a single other flight that I could book at the same time with another airline! Back in the first airline, also I had so hard time to find my bag! Noone at this airlines knows what they are doing apparently. It's totally crazy. When I claimed my bag it was obvious that they made a mistake. They ripped off a part of it and wrote the destination by hand (took pictures of that as well to file a complaint). Not to mention that I got ripped off also by the airport taxi for 20 times of what I should have paid them (as I was in a hurry and didn't know the exchange rate and wanted not to miss my other flight although I had already missed it as my bag was not there). This is one of the worst and incompetent airlines that I traveled with. The only scenario that I can think of that you will have a pleasant flight is if nothing and absolutely nothing wrong or just a bit uncommon happens. Nobody knows what they are doing and it's surprising. Even when I wanted to find my bag at the previous airport when I went there, I talked to at least 5 Turkish Airlines agent about it and everyone was sending me to a different direction and was saying a different thing. My experience couldn't be worse.

Booked to fly Turkish Airlines from Madrid to Alexandria via Istanbul. Worst flight service of my past 5 years. I chose this flight specifically due to its catchy price and most importantly short transit time as I have a family with 1 year old son. Flight from Madrid was delayed by 5 hours (flew 11.30 pm instead of 6.15 pm) since it was not possible to catch my connection flight they booked me the next trip 12.55 pm (an extra night and almost 9 hours transit time). Arrived into Istanbul and my baby was extremely tired, asked Turkish information desk for a place to spend the night but a rude employee told me go to the public restrooms. They were extremely uncomfortable so I went back and asked again, this time they gave me 5 hours lounge stay where again it was impossible to sleep. Overall a horrible nightmare experience. Rude employees who don't have any ideas on how to satisfy a customer.

曼谷經伊斯坦布爾飛往休斯敦。在避開它們幾年後，我決定再次嘗試它們，但如果我讀過這裡的評論，我就不會這樣做。同樣的經歷，令人印象深刻的網站不太工作。我在預訂機票時輸入了我的美聯航 FF 號碼，發現它不斷添加 TK 航空公司代碼。然後我看到他們提供司機駕駛的接送服務。我只能在登錄我的 TK Miles & smiles 帳戶後才能找到它。經過長時間的電子郵件交流後，我被告知我的單程商務艙機票超過 2,000 美元，對於這個來說太便宜了，但仍然可以，但非常低。我注意到我的記錄顯示了我的 TK ff 號碼，但我在 UA 上累積獎勵里程時並未使用該號碼。因此，在曼谷辦理登機手續時，我確認他們有我的美國號碼，甚至還讀給我聽。在 ISt 中，我注意到我的 TK 帳戶已存入里程，因此我發送了電子郵件，但沒有回复。 ：到達後，我再次注意到 TK 已經存入了里程，顯然我失去了所有的黃金獎勵。：所以我打電話給 TK - 甚至找到電話號碼和一個人真是一場噩夢。他們一開始很唐突，不願意提供幫助。幾天后，我直言不諱地寫了拒絕信，他們對我的回應無能為力。

New York to Tel Aviv via Istanbul was on time, as were 4 segments of my itinerary. Cabin staff solicitous ,helpful and polite. Catering out of JFK was particularly good, the onboard "chefs" a nice touch even if they really aren't preparing much fresh food. We were seated on the side, 2 abreast, which was good as the center section of 3 across does not look appealing. The seats are relatively open, not affording much privacy, but the amount of storage is more than very sufficient, and the seat comfort when in the flat position, including the "bedpad", comforter and pillow more than adequate. The lounge in Istanbul was quite good, being on two levels with many interesting and well prepared food stations. We were also given two private sleeping rooms in the lounge for our 5 hour transit, a very nice touch. All in all, Turkish seems to offer a solid business class product, superior to US airlines in staff attitude, on time performance, speed of baggage delivery and overall efficiency.

Von Berlin nach Kuala Lumpur über Istanbul. Das Einchecken im TXL verlief reibungslos. Für die erste Etappe nach IST wurden wir mit einem Bus vom Typ A330 befördert. Bei der Hälfte der Sitze in der Hauptkabine funktionierten die IFE-Bildschirme nicht. Auch nicht während der Sicherheitsanweisungen, und ich war schockiert, als ich sah, dass das Kabinenpersonal nicht dafür gesorgt hat, dass den Passagieren stattdessen eine Demonstration gegeben wurde, oder überprüfte, ob die Sicherheitsgurte angelegt waren und bestimmte Reihen vom Handgepäck befreit waren. Auch die Crew könnte etwas mehr Englisch lernen und insgesamt etwas freundlicher sein. IST-KUL war auf einer Boeing 777 und sicherlich komfortabler. Die Crew war präsenter, ist TK ein Hit oder Miss? Das IFE ist großartig (wenn es funktioniert) und es serviert auf jeden Fall ausgezeichnetes Essen! IST ist ein Albtraum, aber das ist eine andere Bewertung.

इस्तांबुल के रास्ते मुंबई से ह्यूस्टन तक। मेरा बैग टर्किश एयरलाइंस में गुम हो गया था और मेरा बैग मिलने में एक महीने से अधिक का समय लग गया। एयरलाइन को मुझसे संपर्क करने या मुझे अपडेट करने में भी कोई दिलचस्पी नहीं थी। मैंने उन्हें बार-बार समझाया कि किसी भी अन्य चीज़ से अधिक, मेरी महत्वपूर्ण दवाएँ जो मुझे दैनिक आधार पर लेनी होती थीं, बैग में थीं। सौभाग्य से, कुछ दवाएँ, जो मेरे पति के पास थीं, न्यूयॉर्क से मुझे कूरियर से भेजी गईं। लंबी कहानी को संक्षेप में कहें तो, आखिरकार जब मेरा बैग अपने गंतव्य तक पहुंच गया, तो एयरलाइन द्वारा बैग पहुंचाने के बजाय, मुझे इसे ला गार्डिया हवाई अड्डे से लेना पड़ा। टर्किश एयरलाइंस यूरोप की सबसे अच्छी एयरलाइन होने का दावा करती है लेकिन मैं इससे सहमत नहीं हूं। मुझे यकीन है कि ऐसे और भी यात्री होंगे जिन्हें ऐसी ही समस्याओं का सामना करना पड़ा होगा जिनसे मैं गुज़रा।

Moscow to Manila via Istanbul. Good flight from Moscow to Istanbul. Comfortable seats with reasonable recline. Flight left and landed on time. Cabin staff functioned well with announcements in Turkish, Russian and English. A good lunch was served with appropriate sized portions. IFE had a fair selection of films available. Istanbul to Manila a fair flight. Dinner was served at the beginning of the flight and chef did not present any alternatives when the main course that I wanted was not available so I slept and woke up relatively early. I had an early breakfast (this was quite adequate, although I would have liked a little more given no dinner the previous night). No further food was offered. I think that the airline would be better off allowing passengers going straight to sleep and then having breakfast and lunch as the two meals on this long flight. Overall the quality of the service from Istanbul to Manila was a little lower than previous long haul flights in business class.

İstanbul'dan Tel Aviv'e dönüş. Yer personeli uçağa binerken çok yardımcı oldu. Her iki uçuş da zamanında kalktı ve geldi. Uçaklar temiz ve moderndi ve uçuşlar olaysızdı. Koltuklar rahattı ve yeterli diz mesafesi ve yaslanma yeri vardı. Gıda makul ve bölümleri tatmin ediciydi. Kabin personeli verimliydi ve yemek her iki uçuşta da erken servis edildi. Dönüş uçuşunda check-in iyi çalıştı. İkinci etap için Business Class'a geçiş yaptığım için bana öncelik verildi. Genel olarak hizmet standardından ve uçuşlardan memnun kaldım.

London to Istanbul. I am a frequent flyer who always travels with excess baggage up to 10 times a year internationally. As a result of the ultra punitive charges for excess baggage on the low cost carriers like Ryanair and EasyJet I prefer to travel with the normal carriers and was very keen to try Turkish Airlines as they have a good reputation and being a gold Emirates flyer I wanted to check the experience. How sad that they have such a horrific extra baggage policy. After battling to find anything on there site after booking my ticket I presumed that I would pay per piece and saw that there looked to be an $80 price on some flights. As I had already paid and unable to navigate there confusing baggage policy on line and unable to pay on line either I made my way to the airport. My ticket cost me approx Â£120 I went with 1 extra bag weighing exactly 23kg. I know how strict airlines are about this. I was horrified to be charged approx Â£230 for my extra bag. Â£110 more than my ticket and resulted in an increase in my costs by over 200%. I could have bought 2 extra tickets. How can this be justified? I immediately realized why there extra luggage policy on there website is difficult to navigate. Extra profits. Ryanair and Easyjet get such a bad rap for these sort of charges and they are open and upfront about them. To get stung with these at the airport and have them being double the cost of a ticket is truly blackmailing your customers. I learnt my lesson and will never travel this airline. Companies that force unjustified charges on unsuspecting customers should be held to account. Why is it so much? How can one bag cost double a ticket price? Shame on them.

Jakarta to Istanbul. First impression is not so good when I saw rapid seat configuration, but when Chef on Board provide me food that I choose suddenly everything's changed. The foods are really good. I will choose this airline again for flight of more than 3 hours and less than 8 hours.

İstanbul'dan Guangzhou'ya Türk Hava Yolları'nın en güzel yanlarından biri, bir uçuşu rezervasyon yapmadan önce birkaç günlüğüne ücretsiz rezerve etme imkanı. Yaptık, çünkü 3 aylık kızımız yanımızdaydı ve onun bir bebek beşiğinde uyuyabilmesini çok istiyorduk ve bunu sunabilecek herhangi bir havayolu şirketi için rezervasyon yapmaya hazırdık. Uçuş rezervasyonu yaptıktan sonra Twitter üzerinden (@TK_HelpDesk) Türk Hava Yolları yardım masası ile iletişime geçerek bizim için bir beşik rezerve edip edemeyeceklerini sorduk ve bileti onayladık ve bunun bir sorun olmayacağından emin olduktan sonra ödemeyi yaptık. 40 gün sonra uçağa gerçekten bindiğimizde ve boş koltuk olmadığında ve uçak tamamen dolu gibi göründüğünde her şey dağıldı. Mürettebat birkaç kişiye üstünü değiştirmek isteyip istemediklerini sordu ama hepsi reddetti. Sonradan öğrendik ki beşikli koltuklara fazladan para vermişler. 10 saatlik bir gece uçuşu, bebeği kucağımızda saatlerce dengede tutmaya çalışan uykusuz bir korku hikayesine dönüştü. Alan o kadar sınırlıydı ki bir şey yeme imkanımız yoktu ve hava akışına imkan olmadığından işler gerçekten terliyordu. Evde iyileştikten sonra şikayet departmanıyla temasa geçtik ve kısa sürede orada sadece boş özürler için bulunduğunu öğrendik. Görünüşe göre Türk Hava Yolları beşikli koltukları satmaya karar vermiş ve daha önceki taahhütlerinin hiçbiriyle uğraşmamaya karar vermiş, mesaj veya uyarı vermeden hepsini silmiş. Biraz şaşırdım, birkaç kez tekrar sordum ama bir şekilde bu multi-milyar şirket, müşterileriyle sözleşmeyi ihlal etmenin onlar için her zamanki iş olduğu konusunda ısrar etmeye devam etti. Mümkün olduğu kadar çok insanı bu havayolu şirketine güvenmemeleri konusunda uyarmaktan başka bir şey yapamam.

Manchester to Kuala Lumpur via Istanbul. The first time I flew with Turkish Airlines and it was a disappointment. My flight from Manchester to Istanbul was delayed for an hour as some of the passengers could not follow simple instructions ie. seating at their assigned seats. This caused ruckus as some of them insisted on sitting on other people's seats which I found utterly ridiculous. The staff handled this poorly and kept shouting at everyone. The seat has narrow legroom and was uncomfortable. Even though it was a 4 hour flight to Istanbul, the plane was small and does not offer much space. There is only 2 toilets for economy class passengers and with people lining up to use the bathroom and staff trying to serve meals with the trolley, it was not a nice experiencel. The staff's English proficiency has room for improvement as I could not understand much from the announcements made and at one point I was given tomato juice after asking for mango juice. The in-flight meals and entertainment are satisfactory. I was lucky as even though the first flight was delayed for an hour, I managed to continue with the second flight to Kuala Lumpur. I however was not happy about the transit as the gate for my connecting flight was really far and then I had to ride the bus which took almost half an hour to reach the plane and was left to wait in the bus with the doors open (which was not a good idea as it was cold and windy early that morning) for another 15-20 mins before we were allowed to enter the plane. In conclusion, this was really a bad experience.

İstanbul'dan Londra'ya. Harika uçuş. Düz koltuklar ve isteğe bağlı IFE. Do&Co tarafından sunulan yiyecek ve içecekler harikaydı. Mürettebat, hepsi mükemmel İngilizce ile çok cana yakın ve yardımsever. Bu uçakta ayrıca business class için ücretsiz olan wifi vardı. Hakkında iyi şeyler duyduğum salonu ziyaret etmeyi dört gözle bekliyordum. Salonun kendisi harikaydı. Çok sayıda farklı alanla çok geniş. Ama son derece kalabalıktı, öyle ki orada olduğum bir saat boyunca pek çok yiyecek sunumu boş kaldı. Sadece dört saatlik bir uçuş için mutlak bir zevkti.

Chicago to Lagos via Istanbul. If you want to make changes to your flight Turkish Airlines requires you to go into their offices and show your credit card. Imagine how few people would fly Turkish airlines if you had to buy your ticket in person. The nearest office is hours away from me. I bought my ticket with my credit card online - why would I not be able to change it. I find this absurd.

Odessa to Taipei via Istanbul. We were supposed to fly but it never happened. We are still waiting for our outbound flight from Odessa 3 days after our scheduled trip. The reason was stated as bad weather conditions when our flight TK468 was canceled on the 2nd Feb, 2018. That's understandable since Odessa airport gets fog from week to week. What is not, is the fact our trip was shifted 3 days. And that is totally unacceptable. Nobody offered us a flight with other Star Alliance carrier on the same day (2nd Feb). Nobody tried to facilitate our plans to reach our destination on time or with a slight delay not a 3 day delay. Nobody issued an apology letter and a Flight Cancelation Notice. We had to head back to the Turkish Airlines office to issue one on our personal demand. Totally unacceptable service.

Cape Town to London via Istanbul. It's a shame that Turkish Airlines use the Bidvest lounge at CPT because it's one of those pay-to-enter places that's stuffed with passengers gorging themselves with food. Boarding for the CPT â€“ IST flight started an hour before take-off, which seemed excessive. The business class cabin has a utilitarian dÃ©cor of shades of grey â€“ no middle-eastern bling or graduated, coloured lighting here. The staggered 2:2:2 seating pattern affords reasonable privacy, although passengers in window seats still have to climb over their neighbour's legs. Cabin crew use a counter at the front of the cabin to prepare the food and drink service

Montréal à Maurice via Istanbul. Le site Web est horrible, on ne peut pas voir quelles places sont disponibles. J'ai dû téléphoner plusieurs fois (parfois avec de longues attentes et une communication difficile en anglais)) pour réserver des places en classe affaires. Les sièges entièrement plats étaient confortables mais le service de restauration était désorganisé. Le personnel très agréable faisait des allers-retours avec des plats et des verres individuels de manière très inefficace. Le problème majeur pour nous s'est produit dans le salon de classe affaires d'Istanbul. Notre temps d'attente entre les vols était de 10 heures et nous nous attendions à pouvoir utiliser leurs chambres à coucher pendant au moins plusieurs heures. À notre grande surprise, nous avons été informés que nous ne sommes pas éligibles car la règle est que seuls les clients avec un temps d'attente de 3 à 7 heures sont éligibles ! Nous avons supplié de nous laisser rester pour une période raccourcie en vain. Après s'être plaint au directeur, on nous a proposé un hébergement dans un hôtel extérieur (nous aurions besoin d'obtenir un visa et d'organiser le transport). Avant notre départ du Canada, j'ai demandé par téléphone si nous pouvions réserver l'espace de couchage en raison de notre longue attente et on m'a dit que c'était le premier arrivé, premier servi et aucune mention de la règle. Saurions-nous qu'il y avait la règle stupide, nous aurions réservé une chambre d'hôtel dans l'aéroport. A notre arrivée à Istanbul, c'était bien sûr complet. Nous avons donc passé les 10 heures suivantes dans un salon d'affaires bruyant et bondé, avec des tables et des sols débordant de vaisselle sale, de couverts, de serviettes et de bouteilles et canettes vides.

Amsterdam naar New York via Istanboel. Ben altijd tevreden geweest met Turkish Airlines: goede service, goed eten, goede prijzen. Er was echter een snafu op deze reis. Ik had een overnachting in Istanbul geboekt omdat het tarief $ 100 lager was dan bij de andere vervoerders. Mijn hotel was $ 50, dus het was nog steeds een besparing. Ik controleerde echter TIMATIC op visumvereisten op een Star Alliance-site en er stond geen visum vereist, maar ik moest $ 30 betalen op de luchthaven om naar mijn hotel te gaan. Dus het bleek een valse economie te zijn. De incheckservice bij zowel AMS als IST was top: ik had een verbinding op JFK naar Jet Blue naar Albuquerque en was erg blij dat TK mijn tas tussen hen had geplaatst. Amerikaanse luchtvaartmaatschappijen zijn ermee gestopt dat American Airlines niet eens meer bagage naar hun eigen vluchten overdraagt ​​(indien geboekt op een apart record, en zo geef je twee tickets uit sinds het een zelfbedieningswereld is geworden). Ik gaf er slechts 3 voor zitcomfort, maar het moet gezegd worden dat het altijd pijnlijk voor me is om op vliegtuigstoelen te reizen.

Bruxelles à Dar es Salaam via Istanbul. Très déçu par Turkish Airlines. Personnel de cabine très antipathique, sièges exigus, pas de choix de nourriture. 7 heures de vol d'Istanbul à Dar es Salaam était sur un avion 737-900. L'avion était trop petit avec des sièges exigus. Je ne recommande pas cette compagnie aérienne.

İstanbul'dan Montreal'e. Herkes aynı anda uçağa biniyordu (Gruplama yok, öncelik yok) ve uçak tam biniş olduğu için oldukça uzun sürdü. Uçak yeniydi (3 yaşında) ve 2-4-2 düzenine sahipti. Koltuk kendisi iyiydi, yaptığım diğer uzun mesafeli uçuşlarla karşılaştırılabilir. Ayak mesafesi iyiydi, 1.80 boyundayım ve hiçbir sorun yaşamadım. Yiyecek ve içecek servisi harikaydı, önce fıstık paketleri, ardından içecek servisi, ardından akşam yemeği verildi. Gıda gerçekten iyiydi ve bir kişi için doluydu. İçecekler uçuş boyunca sağlandı. IFE iyiydi ve bir sürü film ve dizi vardı. Bir şikayet, bazı TV Dizilerinde bazı rastgele bölümlerin olduğu yönündedir (bir dizinin 4. Sezon Bölüm 5-6-7'si gibi). Mürettebat yardımcı oldu ve diğer Türk Hava Yolları uçuşlarının aksine, İngilizce olarak gerçek bir konuşma yapabildiler. Uçuş sırasında WiFi satın aldım (14,99 ABD Doları karşılığında) ve uçuş boyunca iyi çalıştı.

London to Thessaloniki via Istanbul. I would recommend to anyone who can avoid this airline to do so by all means. I cannot find words to describe their "customer service" and should anything go wrong during the trip you are left alone. Between booking and flying, TK changed the aircraft type and a flight time without informing me at all. I flew from LHR to IST and then my flight from IST to SKG was cancelled. It took me 2.5 hours at the transfer desk and stories I cannot even describe to get a ticket to return back to London as there was no other flight to my destination until the day after. I had a business class ticket, however when I went to the gate I was told they had overbooked the business class cabin and I would have to be downgraded to economy. Overall, I spent 34 hours without sleep only to return where I left from, without ever reaching my destination. And now several days later, I still haven't received a refund for my tickets. Avoid this airline and fly with one that knows how to treat customers.

Ljubljana to Ho Chi Minh City via Istanbul. Great flights. All on time, cabins new, bright and airy, seating quite comfortable. Asian vegetarian catering really very good. The best part of all flights was a cabin crew, especially on a long distant flights from Istanbul to Ho Chi Minh and back. Professional and very pleasant. When a cabin assistant sing a song to himself when working at a galley, than you know that everything is more than fine. Completely switched back to Turkish, which slowly upgraded economy product over last few years.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan New York'a uçtum. Çok lezzetli Türk yemekleri, zamanında kalkış, kibar ekip üyeleri ve son olarak en yeni filmlerle harika bir eğlence sistemi. Bu havayolunun bu web sitesinde nasıl 8'den az puan aldığını anlamıyorum. Koltuklar rahat ve genişti. Diğer büyük havayolu şirketlerine kıyasla Türkçe ile çok keyifli bir uçuş geçirdim ve herkese tavsiye ederim.

İstanbul'dan Marsilya'ya. Genellikle yılda en az 4 kez Türk Hava Yolları ile uçuyorum. Dürüst olmak gerekirse hiçbir zaman şikayet edecek bir şeyim olmadı. Havaalanları iyi, personeli aktif ve uçakları rahat ve güvenli. Güvendiğim ve isteyebileceğim tüm kaliteyi sağlayan bir havayolu.

München nach Teheran über Istanbul SAW. Ich hatte einen Koffer und ein Handgepäck dabei. Da das Handgepäck das zulässige Handgepäckgewicht von 8 Kilo überschritt, zahlte ich die zusätzliche Gebühr und gab auch das Handgepäck auf. Als ich jedoch in Teheran landete, stellte ich fest, dass die Tagging-Nummer des Handgepäcks nicht einmal am Boarding-Schalter ausgegeben wurde und mein Handgepäck verloren ging. Ich habe das Antragsformular im Fundbüro in Teheran ausgefüllt und bisher mehrmals bei den türkischen Fluggesellschaften am Flughafen München angerufen, aber nach 10 Tagen immer noch keine Antwort erhalten. Da ich nicht einmal eine Gepäckanhängernummer für mein Handgepäck habe, kann ich nicht einmal eine Entschädigung verlangen. Ich frage mich: Selbst wenn der Check-in-Mitarbeiter vergisst, den Gepäckanhänger abzugeben, warum kann er dann nicht versuchen, die Nummer des aufgegebenen Handgepäcks zu überprüfen, da alle Informationen aufgezeichnet und im Gepäck aufbewahrt werden? System. Ich bin äußerst enttäuscht, da dies meinen Urlaub irgendwie ruiniert hat.

Boston to Istanbul. Worst service I have experienced. Not only did I have to keep asking for utensils and missing food items on my tray but when I asked for a drink he gave e me a tiny cup and poured it half way with a coca-cola beverage. When I asked for more he muttered under his breath. The rest of the flight he was rude and snappy. I completely understand having long days, but this was no way to treat paying customers. I was not given a seat for free, I paid for it.

الكويت إلى دوسلدورف عبر اسطنبول. تجربة رهيبة. من الكويت إلى اسطنبول كانت طائرة A330 قديمة جدًا حيث لم يعمل اثنان من المقاعد الثلاثة المحجوزة لدينا ويمكن تعديلها يدويًا فقط. التلفزيون لا يعمل. لم يتم توفير أغطية سرير لتغطية المقاعد. لا يتم تقديم المشروبات الكحولية أيضًا. كان امتداد اسطنبول إلى دوسلدورف أسوأ حيث كانت الطائرة قديمة بنفس القدر من طراز A321. لهذه الرحلة 3.5 ساعة مقاعد عادية ، لا مسطحة. لا توجد شاشات تلفزيون في المقاعد. تم توفير الكمبيوتر اللوحي المحمول. لا أتطلع إلى رحلات العودة.

İstanbul'dan Lefkoşa'ya. Telefondaki müşteri hizmetleri sorunları çözmez, sorun yaratır. Bir şeyi düzeltmek için en az 15 farklı acenteyle telefonda görüştüm - kalkış havalimanını değiştirmek ve bu nedenle yarattıkları sorunları çözmek. Her zaman telefonda başka bir temsilciye yönlendirin ve kimse sorumluluk almıyor ve çözüm üretmiyor. Sabina Gökçen havalimanındaki Türk hava yolları kioskunda görevli personeller daha iyi değil, ne yapacaklarını bilemiyorlar ve telefonla müşteri hizmetlerine yönlendiriyorlar.

Mombasa to London Gatwick via Istanbul. Our flight from Mombasa was meant to depart at 4.30am. I checked in at 2.30, the flight did not leave till 6 am. Hence arrived Istanbul late and only to find out my bags did not arrive in Gatwick. On putting in the claim I was told I would get my bags the following day, again only to call and find out only 1 bag arrived and the other bag is still in Mombasa. This is the first time I have travelled with Turkish Airlines and have had the worst experience. I suggest that you rather pay an extra 100 dollars and go for a better airline. Lousy service and pathetic airline.

Male to Vilnius via Istanbul. Service is horrible, staff rude onboard and at Istanbul airport. We had 10 hours connection flight at Istanbul airport, and Turkish airlines didn't provide any hotel like they say. We wanted to book airport hotel by ourselves but it was fully booked. Turkish airlines said, we cannot do anything about it, because you arrived 6:03 am from Male, and to Vilnius our flight is 4:00 p.m. They said it is not enough hours because they provide hotel only when it is 10 hours waiting. If i knew it will be like this,i would book alternative flight. Disappointed!

Von Frankfurt nach Elazig über Istanbul. Die Sitze sind superkurz. Es passt nicht zu meinen Beinen und meine Beine tun wegen des Sitzes weh. Der Flughafen Istanbul ist total schrecklich. Aufgrund der Flugverspätung spricht die Besatzung kein Englisch und weiß nicht, was Sie wollen. Wie kommt es, dass an einem internationalen Flughafen niemand richtig Englisch sprechen kann? Ihre Anweisungen sind völlig unterschiedlich, einer sagt dies, ein anderer sagt das. Sehr enttäuscht von ihnen.

London to Lahore via Istanbul. Cancelled my ticket with no explanation on 6/12/2017, 12 days before flying out in peak season. I have flown with them before and the experience has been OK- apart from the rude staff at the airport in Istanbul who think you've forged your passport. However after this experience its easy to know why Qatar, Emirates etc are ranked above these guys. Extremely poor. From a disappointed, out of pocket customer.

Kayseri to Istanbul. I cannot recommend this airline. After being unable to fly to Turkey due to recent US Visa restrictions, I called the company. Was told to call back two weeks later which I did and then I was told to call back again. I did. Then I was told that I must get a refund at a Turkish Airlines sales office, there are only 2 in the entire US. I complained and was told to call back. Now I am told that I can get a "refund" after cancellation and "no-show" fees are applied. This amounted to $32 euros on a $600 ticket. Apparently, they are only granting full refunds if you depart from the US. This is an absolute sham and seems set up to make the system frustrating to navigate so they can mitigate their losses. They don't seem to care.

دبي إلى تورنتو عبر اسطنبول. واجهت زوجتي مشكلة في اسطنبول تتعلق بتأشيرة عبور المطار عبر كندا. استغرق الأمر حوالي 8 ساعات من وقتنا في 5 مواقع مختلفة بالمطارات لشراء تذاكر جديدة في النهاية للعودة في اليوم التالي. تذكر تذاكرنا الأصلية: "إعادة الإصدار بغرامة قدرها 200 دولار أمريكي". ما لم أراه هو الطباعة الدقيقة في الأسفل: "تحتفظ الخطوط الجوية التركية بالحق في تغيير القواعد المتعلقة بتغييرات التذاكر واستردادها". يقصدون ذلك. بقدر ما كانت تجربتنا الشخصية سيئة ، فإن السبب الحقيقي الذي جعلنا نشعر بالفزع هو أننا بقينا هناك لفترة كافية لنرى أن هذا هو المعيار بالنسبة لهم. في يومنا الوحيد هناك ، رأينا ما لا يقل عن 100 مسافر آخر يمرون بأشياء مماثلة. الحل الوحيد الذي تم تقديمه على الإطلاق هو شراء تذكرة أخرى. شاهدنا العديد من الناس يبكون. يفقد الكثيرون السيطرة ويصرخون. كان موظفوهم يصرخون على العملاء (في منطقة مكتب منفصلة ، كان كل شيء يضحك ويضحك). كنا محظوظين لأن لدينا الوسائل لشراء تذاكر جديدة. من الواضح أن الآخرين لم يفعلوا ذلك. لا أعرف ماذا حدث لبعضهم. كانت لحظة واحدة رمزية للغاية للتجربة بأكملها. كان مسافر مهزوم آخر يدفع 843 دولارًا مقابل تذكرة جديدة نقدًا. أعطى موظفة 845 دولارًا لكنها بالطبع لم يكن لديها أي تغيير. بدلاً من 5 دولارات ، أعطاها فاتورتان من فئة 1 دولار. كان لدي واحدة في جيبي لذا أعطيتها لها أيضًا. رفعت فاتورتي التي تبلغ قيمتها دولارًا واحدًا ، وأشارت إلى الزاوية التي بها قطعة صغيرة جدًا ممزقة ، ولم يكن هناك حبر مفقود ، وسخرت "لا يمكنني قبول هذا". فعلت هذا لمجرد أنها تستطيع. كنا عاجزين. لقد عرفت ذلك واستمتعت به. عادةً ما أقوم بإضافة التعليقات فقط إذا كانت إيجابية. أنا أفهم أن الناس والشركات يمكن أن يمروا بيوم سيء. الخطوط الجوية التركية مختلفة. إنها حقًا شركة مروعة مع موظفين متحمسين لئيمين.

Montréal à Istanbul. Nous avons fait les réservations en ligne comme la plupart des gens le font de nos jours et à notre grande surprise, Turkish Airline a refusé les miles qui étaient censés être gagnés pour le vol pris et qui figuraient clairement sur leur propre billet émis par la réservation. Après quelques échanges d'e-mails (numéros de billets de référence ci-dessus), ils ont choisi de supprimer l'e-mail de contact du site Web. Ils ont simplement refusé d'honorer les miles de notre vol et nous n'avons jamais reçu d'explication sur leur action. Certes, cela parle très mal de Turkish Airlines, compagnie que nous ne soutiendrons pas à l'avenir

Budapest to Atlanta via Istanbul. In August I flew from Budapest to Atlanta via Istanbul. The attention onboard was good as was the food. Arriving in Atlanta I found that my suitcase was left in Istanbul. After waiting for more than an hour and a half they told me that they would send it to me the next day but they only brought it to me two days later, so I had to spend 3 nights in a hotel in Atlanta and I could not go to work on Monday. The representative of the company told me to send him the receipts of the expenses he had had that within a period of 3 weeks they sent me a check for that amount. It's been over 3 months now and they have not sent me anything. They do not even answer the emails that I sent them. I think a lack of professionalism and respect towards customers.

Kathmandu to Houston via Istanbul. I with my two little kids and old mother had a flight on November 2017. I had a layover of 19 hours so we were suppose to get hotel, but because of being American passport we didn't get hotel. I didn't mind getting hotel but they gave me lot of trouble just to give little information about the visa. I was wondering from one counter to another counter just to get right information. Staffs at the airport were the rudest people I ever met. Even the visa officers at the counter didn't give me correct information instead they yelled and behaved in a very rude way. I couldn't get hotel because I and my kids had American passport and they don't issue visa from the airport to the American. My question to the Turkish Airlines is that why they didn't mention that while I brought the ticket why they issued ticket to the American passport? I went to Turkish Airlines counter may be four time finally I got the correct answer. Staffs at the Turkish Airlines counter were also very very rude just as other staff at the airport. I ended up paying 300$ at airport hotel. I will never travel with Turkish Airlines again.

İstanbul'dan Madrid'e. Gemide iyi hizmet. 2+2 konfigürasyonunda koltuklar rahattır ve gerçek iş koltuğu, 3+3 konfigürasyonunda ortadaki koltuğun kullanılmadığı diğerlerinden farklıdır. Yemek kalitesi iyi, 4 saat 30 uçuş olduğu için daha iyi olabilirdi.

Buenos Aires a Estambul vía Sao Paolo. Me ha sorprendido mucho la calidad general de la aerolínea en los negocios. Después de la escala en Sao Paolo, te cambian los auriculares por unos Denon (sonido increíble). Los inodoros son aproximadamente la mitad más grandes que los de la clase económica. Muy buen personal a bordo y dedicado a su placer.

Washington to Istanbul. The website didn't work for check in, so I called and it was quick on the phone somebody checked me in, but the wonderful thing happened at the airport as we checked in for the flight we are now waiting for. The man at the ticket counter was wonderful, efficient and very considerate for my old parents, also helping fellow agents.

İstanbul'dan Paris'e Star Alliance Havayolu kalitesini hissedebilirsiniz. Genelde Türk Hava Yolları kullanıyorum ve ilk defa check-in ve uçuş sırasında birden fazla yönetim sorunu görüyorum. Check-in görevlileri diğer seyahatlerime göre çok daha yavaştı ve insanlara yanlış bilgi veriyorlar. Uçakların koltuk düzeni hakkında hiçbir fikirleri yok ve hiç kimse herhangi bir sorunu kabul edip çözmeye çalışmıyor. Uçuş sırasında kabin ekibi arasındaki farkı hissedebiliyorsunuz, Türk Hava Yolları yeni kabin görevlisine eskisi gibi eğitim vermiyor. Umarım bu sorunlar kısa süreli olur ve Türk Hava Yolları eski günlerine döner.

Amsterdam naar Teheran via Istanbul. De eerste vlucht was met vertraging, we hadden een aansluitende vlucht maar door vertraging hebben we de tweede vlucht gemist en daar werd niet op gereageerd. De service van het personeel was verschrikkelijk, het was echt een slechte reis. We betaalden twee keer voor onze geboekte vlucht.

Atlanta to Doha via Istanbul. From the moment you step on they greet you nicely but once you take off it's all downhill with customer service. I would never wish that experience on my enemy. The flight attendants were grumpy and English is a little unrecognizable. Luckily I had my handy app on my iPhone X downloaded two weeks prior to my trip. As I knew I was going to have a 9 hr layover both ways. So I was able to learn a little Turkish. The meals were ok. The entertainment was good. The leg room was horrible!

İstanbul'dan Ho Chi Minh City'ye. Bu 10 saatlik uçuşta olağanüstü mürettebat ve harika yemek ve içecek servisi sağlanmaktadır. Uçuştan önceki dinlenme salonu bir hayal kırıklığıydı çünkü geç ayrılma (02:40), taze yiyecek veya atıştırmalık bulunmadığı anlamına geliyordu, ancak başka türlü tamamdı. TK, bu fiyata sunulan mükemmel bir ürünle çok değerli business class ücretleri sunuyor. Gemideki personel bu sektördeki tüm beklentileri aştı.

Jakarta to Istanbul. TK 57 left Jakarta airport earlier than schedule. The service level was similar when we returned back home on TK56. On both flights, cabin and toilets were clean and staff were nice. Food was in big portion and we are pleased to have it. Inflight amenities were sufficient. During this flight we did not get ice cream like Asian airlines. My other inputs are that menu for flights from Istanbul. Please serve any other menu from elsewhere. We had enough Turkish meal during our long visit in Turkey and please train your staff to speak better English. Yes they are nice and polite and speak English but just a little effort to speak better and I am sure Turkish airlines can do it.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan New York'a. Check-in, sabahın çok erken bir saatinde olduğu düşünüldüğünde nispeten ağrısızdı. Uçağa binmeden önce, normalden daha düşük hızda çalışan lounge'ı kullandık ve yemek seçenekleri normal saatlerde olduğu kadar bol değildi. Uçağa biniş bölgelere göre yapıldı, ancak bölgelerin kullanımını tamamen gereksiz kılan uçağa otobüsle götürüldüğümüzü öğrendiğimde tam bir hayal kırıklığı oldu. Gemide, uçak, business class'ta 2x2x2 konfigürasyonuyla yeni görünüyordu. FA'lar, uçak taksi yaparken arkamdaki yolcunun ayağa kalkmasına müdahale etmese de görevlerini yerine getirirken güler yüzlü, samimi ve profesyoneldi. İnişten önce kahvaltı ve öğle yemeği servis edildi, ancak servis biraz yavaştı. Son 12 ayda Atlantik üzerinden 8 dönüş yolculuğunu Türkçe ile tamamladım ve menü ve şarap seçimleri her seferinde aynıydı ve bir değişikliğin çok geciktiğine inanıyorum. Wifi iyi çalıştı ve IFE daha yeni çıkan filmleri kullanmış olsa da iyi bir seçime sahipti. Uçuş kalktı ve zamanında geldi ve genel olarak iyi bir deneyim oldu.

Von Frankfurt nach Singapur über Istanbul. FRA-IST, dann 2,5 Stunden Zwischenstopp und IST-SIN. Der Check-in-Vorgang verlief einwandfrei. Das Personal der Turkish Airlines auf der ersten Etappe der Reise war ziemlich mürrisch, aber professionell. Ihre Flugzeuge sind sauber, die angebotenen Dienstleistungen (Unterhaltung, Catering) überdurchschnittlich gut und auch die Crew auf der längeren zweiten Etappe meiner Reise war in Ordnung. Leider ist meine neue Tasche nicht in Singapur angekommen. Es fehlt bis heute. Die Gepäckabfertiger am Flughafen in Singapur haben für mich ein Formular zur Meldung verlorenen Gepäcks erstellt. Sie riefen mich vier Tage lang jeden Tag an, um mir mitzuteilen, dass meine Tasche noch nicht gefunden wurde. Dann hörten sie auf. Auf der Website der türkischen Fluggesellschaft heißt es: „Innerhalb der ersten fünf Tage liegt die Suche nach verlorenem Gepäck in der Verantwortung des Fundbüros des Flughafens. Wenn Ihr Gepäck nicht innerhalb der ersten fünf Tage gefunden wird, besuchen Sie bitte die Seite zur Meldung von Gepäckunregelmäßigkeiten und zur Nachverfolgung.“ und machen Sie mit den erforderlichen Unterlagen einen Anspruch geltend. Also habe ich das gemacht. Ich ging auf ihre Website und machte den Anspruch geltend. Die Website fühlt sich wieder an wie im Jahr 1990, beschränkt Textfelder auf etwa 255 (ich weiß nicht mehr) Zeichen und deaktiviert das Kopieren und Einfügen. Es ist die schlechteste Website, die ich je gesehen habe, und ich werde Ihnen eine Bestätigungsmail auf Englisch senden, die Sie auf die türkische Website verlinkt. Ich habe Ansprüche geltend gemacht, meinen Fall dargelegt, Rechnungen und Marken/Preise für die Dinge vorgelegt, die mir fehlen. Innerhalb weniger Minuten erhielt ich eine Antwort. Leider stand darin nichts, es handelte sich möglicherweise um eine vorgefertigte Nachricht und hatte einen vagen Inhalt wie „Andererseits, wenn unsere Recherche zu einem negativen Ergebnis führt, dann.“

Atlanta to Nairobi via Istanbul. My experience begun with trying to book a reservation on the company portal on 4th November currently having a choice of 2 systems. Between dodging the prompt on whether you want to use â€œold versionâ€ or â€œnew versionâ€ I struggled to reserve a round trip from Atlanta to Nairobi 19th November 7, 2017 return 27th December 2017 only to discover minutes later when going to print off ticket that it was wrong! The information was captured inaccurately, I just had one way ticket that was outbound with my return date on it. Confident that this is an easy fix after years of travelling with other gulf region airlines, I immediately reach out to the Sales Office in Atlanta which rings endlessly without any answers. Very surprised but again in good faith reached out to the call center number provided. This was a nightmare, the first agent could barely speak English and any attempt to get the name was met with callous response of â€“ why are you calling. Speaking very slowly and clearly as it was obvious there was minimal comprehension, agent also confirming he could not understand leaving me very confused I patiently informed of the situation explaining that I was looking for a round trip ticket but believed there was a technical issue as screens kept switching between 2 versions on the portal. Eventually I was transferred to another department which I was informed would resolve the issue and unprofessionally transferred. I had to go through the same process. On the 6th when calling in for a status, as I tried to review the issue to the first agent, she told me she doesn't have to talk to me if I was calling for a status and I had to persist that she could not treat customers that way. This was the first time ever to attempt to use Turkish Airline and it is quite a rude shock. Eventually I was transferred to another department to an incoherent agent who sarcastically informed me that I could call back to speak to a more articulate agent. Not believing a corporation like this does not have people who could comprehend the issue, I made another attempt to call back and request to speak with a manager and explain that I needed a resolution with my primary goal is to get the correct ticket that I reserved as I still intended to take the trip. I persevered the same call process all over again and this time found an agent, more coherent and a little patient only for him to tell me they had emailed me a response and that my request was denied. When I sought for clarification or a manager he informed me that there are no managers there and he read a script out. This is very disturbing, there's no professional etiquette to this cycle of events even more so, my issue has not been addressed. It seems to be more about the money than customer satisfaction. My trip is about 50 hours away but I have the wrong ticket and no resolve. I have never experienced such a service in my many years of travel. I am hoping management will actually resolve the issue and not just respond without addressing the concern. I shudder at the thought of what lays ahead in the flight if this is the type of service they have before you even travel.

İstanbul'dan Londra'ya. Benim yorumum, uçuşun kendisinden çok yer deneyimiyle ilgili. Daha az engelli insanlar için salondan kapıya ulaşım yoktur. Tek sundukları tekerlekli sandalye rezervasyonu yapmak. İki el çantası, bir el arabası ve bir gitar taşırken birini tekerlekli sandalyede nasıl iteceksin? Diğer havalimanları/havayollarının emrinde buggy'ler vardır. Bazı kapıların 15 dakikalık yürüme mesafesinde olduğu düşünüldüğünde, bu oldukça zayıf. Bir apron kapısından uçarken (7xx, örneğin 700), business class yolcuları için business class otobüsleri yoktur ve insanlar birbirinin ayak parmaklarına basana ve herkes yer personeline check-in sırasında bize söylendiği gibi neden business class otobüs bulunmadığını sorduğumuzda, 'ekonomi' dediler ve business class otobüslerin sadece gelen ve iç hat uçuşları için mevcut olduğunu söylediler - çok kötü bir gösteri. Genel puanım 6: - uçakta servis ve yemek: 8 - uçakta tuvalet temizliği: 5 (zemin genellikle ıslaktır) - dinlenme salonu hizmetleri ve yiyecek: 8 - erkek dinlenme salonu personeli: 5 (sıklıkla yüksek sesle veya bağırarak) oda) - bayan dinlenme salonu personeli: 9 - yer hizmetleri (otobüs/ulaşım): 0

İstanbul'dan Washington'a. Türk Hava Yolları yine iyi. Gemideki ikram servisi, fasulye sayacı tavsiyelerinden muzdarip. Türk Hava Yolları'nda Business Class yemeklerinin istisnai olduğu günler geride kaldı. Şimdi sıradan. Havayolunun itibarı üzerinde uzun süreli bir etkisi olabilecek bu tür dar görüşlü önlemlerin uygulandığını görmek üzücü. Uçuş vaktindeydi ama uçak eskiydi. Temizdi ama yaş gösterdi. Uçuşun en göze çarpan yönü mürettebattı. Yardımsever, hoş, özenli ve arkadaş canlısıydılar. Ben yaklaşık altı saat çalışırken bir mürettebat üyesi (ben sormadan) bana çay getirmeye devam etti. Yolculuk boyunca her zaman hoş bir gülümsemesi vardı. Ekibin çabasının gözden kaçmaması için bu incelemeyi yazdım.

London to Manila return via Istanbul. Check in was very quick we checked in 3 large suitcases with our 80kgs combined allowance we also had two carry on trolley cases a rucksack and suit holder asked if we could check in the rucksack to save dragging it around with us even though we were on the check in limit, yes sir no problem. Spent time in the business class lounge to wait for boarding. Arrived at the boarding gate checked through boarded the plane first. Flight London to Istanbul was 4 hours approx, seat was very comfortable flight attendants very good and spoke perfect English. There was a chef who came round and took our order for our meal. The food was excellent. IFE was good but not great could do with upgrading but acceptable. We arrived in Istanbul on time and were bussed to the terminal business class passengers were off the plane first and had there own bus. we had about two hours. so spent time in the Turkish Airlines Lounge then headed to our gate to board our plane for Manila. this is the only fault I found with this trip. There was no business class priority boarding just everybody trying to to get through the check in and only one member of staff checking tickets and passports absolutely ridiculous it was mayhem finally got through the check in and were last to board a waiting bus (I would not have liked to be first on the bus) to take us to the aircraft. We were welcomed on board by the flight attendants and given a pre flight drink and our suit holder was hung up for us. The seats were comfortable and spacious and turned into a flatbed with the ottoman at the foot and for once I actually slept during the flight which is a rarity for me. The IFE was the same as mentioned before Our section of the business cabin had 28 seats which less than half were occupied. Flight attendants were very attentive spoke perfect English. The chef came round asked to fill out a menu card for our breakfast at the end of our flight and also took our order for our meal again it was a fantastic meal the best we have had in the air. We were a little late taking off from Istanbul for our 12 hour flight but still arrived at Manila 1 hour early. We were first off the plane through immigration got to the carousel to pick our luggage our 4 bags because of the priority tags were in the first 10 bags we were out of Manila airport 25 minutes after getting off the plane. Our return trip was just as good if not better as the boarding situation for the London flight at Istanbul was much better organised. Would I use this airline again, most definitely.

Manchester to Johannesburg, SA via Istanbul. Very disappointed with this airline. My husband and I flew out separately and returned together. I opted for vegetarian meal as I cannot tolerate spicy food, only to receive Ratatouille made with chili sauce and a stuffed chilli for breakfast. I could not get the TV monitor out from the side of the seat, and my request for help was ignored. Same thing happened with my husband with his TV monitor. Return trip - very hot plane and our request for extra water with ice was ignored. Staff were sullen and unresponsive - both inflight and at Artatuk Airport. Needless to say, will not be using this airline again. Have written to complain, to date - no reply.

Αθήνα προς Σιγκαπούρη μέσω Κωνσταντινούπολης. Είδα ένα ζωύφιο πάνω από την οθόνη μου στο κάθισμα μπροστά μου, άρπαξα τη σερβιέτα για να το στριμώξω και μου φάνηκε σαν τσιμπούρι. Τα γεύματα ήταν απογοητευτικά καθώς ζήτησα ανατολίτικο χορτοφάγο αλλά μου δόθηκε χορτοφαγικό γεύμα και μου είπαν ότι είναι το ίδιο. Πώς γίνεται όταν το όνομα που αναγράφεται στο αυτοκόλλητο του γεύματος δεν είναι το όνομά μου;

İstanbul'dan Atina'ya. Erkek arkadaşım ve ben, Turkish Arline ile birden çok varış noktasına uçuş rezervasyonu yaptık. Los Angeles'tan İstanbul'a hareket ettik, 1 gece kaldık ve ardından İstanbul'dan Atina'ya uçuş yaptık. Web sitelerinde veya uygulamalarında check-in yapamadık, web sitesindeki sorunlar nedeniyle havaalanına 2,5 saat erken geldik, yardım istedik ancak havaalanı personeli tarafından yanlış hatta yönlendirildik. Check-in sırasının önüne geldiğimizde, uçağımızın 50 dakika sonra kalkacağı için artık check-in yapamayacağımız söylendi. Kasiyer bölümüne yönlendirildik ve 1,5 saatlik uçuş için kişi başı 950 dolar ödememiz istendi ve internette kişi başı 120 dolardan listelendi. Biletleri kendilerinden almazsak kalan uçuşlarımızı kullanamayacağımızı söylediler. Erkek arkadaşım panikledi ödedi Türk Arline sitesine şikayet yazdık

Montréal à Istanbul sur Turkish Airlines. Enregistrement et embarquement rapides. Le produit dur est confortable mais manque d'intimité en raison de la configuration 2x2x2 de la cabine de la classe affaires, ce qui signifie qu'il n'y a pas d'accès direct au couloir pour tous les sièges. Les FA étaient agréables et professionnels même si leur anglais n'était pas très bon. La qualité de la nourriture était moyenne et inférieure à leurs normes historiques. Les toilettes ont été maintenues raisonnablement propres et bien rangées tout au long du voyage. IFE avait beaucoup de choix mais la liste des films avait besoin d'une mise à jour avec très peu de sorties récentes. Le vol est parti à l'heure et est arrivé une heure avant la date prévue. Le débarquement via les bus reste une nuisance totale et un mystère car il y avait beaucoup de ponts aériens vacants. Dans l'ensemble, une expérience décente, mais le produit de classe affaires est inférieur aux transporteurs du Golfe et d'Asie du Sud-Est.

Πέταξε την Αθήνα στην Κωνσταντινούπολη. Η πτήση ήταν αργά το βράδυ και έφτασε στο IST 30 λεπτά μετά τα μεσάνυχτα. Η εξυπηρέτηση εδάφους στο ATH ήταν καλή. Αναχώρησε στην ώρα του. Η υπηρεσία εν πτήσει ήταν γρήγορη και αποτελεσματική - το μόνο μειονέκτημα ήταν ότι οι αεροσυνοδοί δεν μιλούσαν αγγλικά. Το φαγητό ήταν ένα σάντουιτς και ένα κρουασάν με τυρί και ζαμπόν μη χοιρινό, λίγη σαλάτα και ένα επιδόρπιο. Όλα εξαιρετικής ποιότητας και πολύ νόστιμα! Η άνεση του καθίσματος ήταν καλή, δεδομένου ότι ήταν μια σύντομη πτήση. Η καμπίνα ήταν καθαρή, όπως και οι τουαλέτες. Μια πτήση χωρίς γεγονότα και ευχάριστη. Μοιράζονται για να κρατάτε ακουστικά, χρήσιμα για να ακούτε μουσική, επειδή η πτήση κράτησε λιγότερο από δύο ώρες, για τις οποίες διαρκούν οι περισσότερες ταινίες.

İstanbul'dan Barselona'ya. İstanbul'daki uçağımızı kaçırdık. Yardım istedik, hatta yardım için yalvardık ve tezgahın arkasındaki herkes tarafından görmezden gelindik. Müşteri hizmetlerini aradık ve İngilizcemiz olmadığı için yardım alamadık. Sonunda uçağımız kalktıktan yaklaşık 2 saat sonra kontuardaki biriyle konuşabildik ve yolcu başına 700 $'a tam fiyatlı bir bilet almamız gerektiğini söyledik. Oğlumuzu eyaletlere geri çağırdık ve bizi bir çevrimiçi seyahat sitesinden sadece 270 $ 'a 700 $' a satmaya çalıştıkları aynı uçağa bindirebildi.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul-Montreal seferi. Check-in nispeten hızlı ve etkiliydi. Uçağa binmeden önce salonun ve geniş olanakların keyfini çıkarın. Gemide, sert ürün, hem dik hem de yatay konumlarda rahat oturmasıyla düzgün bir şekilde görünüyordu. Başka bir koltuğa taşınma talebim yerine getirildi ve boş bir yan koltukla seyahat etmeme izin verildi. İkram, bir kez daha bu taşıyıcıda daha önce deneyimlediğim standardın altındaydı ve Asya ve Orta Doğu taşıyıcılarında kesinlikle birinci sınıf ikramın altındaydı. Eskiden ana farklılaştırıcıları olduğu için talihsiz olan catering ile köşeleri kestiklerine dair açık kanıtlar var. FA'lar dikkatliydi ve isteklere derhal yanıt verdi. Uçuştaki en büyük sorun, rahatsız edici derecede sıcak olan ve birçok yolcunun şikayet etmesinden sonra düzenlenmesi uzun zaman alan kabin sıcaklığıydı. Ayrıca tuvaletler, iki kez belirtmem gereken daha fazla dikkat kullanabilirdi. IFE iyiydi ve iyi bir film seçkisine ve harika bir müzik kitaplığına sahipti. Ücretsiz wifi, yolculuk boyunca iyi çalıştı. Geç ayrıldık ama programa vardık. İnişte, en son bu rotada seyahat ettiğimde olduğu gibi merdivenlerden indik. Bu, boş hava köprülerine rağmen oldu. Genel olarak iyi bir deneyimdi ancak TK'nın ikram kalitesindeki düşüş eğilimini tersine çevirmesi ve eskiden sahip olduğu yüksek standartlara geri dönmesi gerekiyor.

Amsterdam naar Mauritius, met een tussenstop in Istanbul. Dat deel van de reis is goed verlopen, zonder problemen, goede service. De terugreis was slecht georganiseerd. Op 30 september stond vlucht TK161 (Mauritius-Istanbul) gepland om 20.05. Eerst kregen we de mededeling dat de vlucht vertraging had tot 21:30 uur. Om 20:30 moesten we naar een andere gate en toen hoorden we dat de vlucht geannuleerd was. We moesten naar een andere gate, werden op de lijst gezet, moesten de bagage ophalen, gingen door de paspoortcontrole en na 1 uur werden we met de bus naar hotels vervoerd. Ons hotel: Palms Hotel, Quatre Bornes, Mauritius, op 45 minuten rijden. Kamer was redelijk maar leek de laatste tijd niet gebruikt te worden, want alle lampen waren nog losgekoppeld en we hadden geen warm water. Het diner bestond uit rijst, rode peperaardappelen, sla en een vleessaus. We hebben 3 uur kunnen rusten omdat slapen niet mogelijk was door het lawaai van een disco/nachtclub. We kregen te horen dat het ontbijt om 16.00 uur 's avonds bij de receptie werd geserveerd. Maar er was niemand, we moesten zelf het licht aandoen. Om 04:50 werden een paar crackers, boter, plakjes worst, ananas en yoghurt op tafel gezet. Geen koffie, thee, water etc. Een andere groep had geluk want ze werden overgeplaatst naar een luxe hotel, waar ze konden slapen en echt konden ontbijten. Om 17.00 uur vertrokken de bussen naar het vliegveld. Om 18.00 uur inchecken, inclusief bagage, maar het personeel was erg chaotisch, er was geen toezicht. Er was ons beloofd dat ze de overgangsstop in Istanbul al aan het regelen waren. Om 8:30 vertrok het vliegtuig naar Istanbul waar we ruim 9 uur later aankwamen. Sommige mensen die ook een transfervlucht hadden, kregen bij de uitgang van de gate een boardingpass, maar de meesten moesten heel snel naar de Transferbalie. Daar waren we totaal hopeloos toen we een rij zagen van 80, misschien wel 100 mensen. Een hardwerkende medewerker selecteerde 20 personen. Gelukkig behoorden wij tot die groep (geheel willekeurig) die na een 2e snelle wandeling van 10 minuten naar een Business Transfer Desk werd gebracht. Eerst wilden of konden ze niets voor ons regelen. Uiteindelijk gaven ze de Amsterdammers van die groep vanaf 19.30 uur nieuwe boardingpassen, TK1955 Istanbul-Amsterdam. We hadden geluk want we kwamen om 22:05 aan in Amsterdam. Toen we daar aankwamen, misten we 1 van onze 2 koffers. En we waren niet de enige slachtoffers, want de hele afhandeling en registratie kostte ons 2 uur extra tijd. Zondagnacht om 14.00 uur waren we eindelijk thuis. Maandagmiddag kregen we te horen dat de koffer was gevonden en achterbleef in Istanbul. Eind goed, oké, zouden we willen zeggen, maar in dit geval niet, zeker niet. We weten nog steeds niet wat de reden voor de annulering van de vlucht was. We vroegen ons keer op keer af waarom alles zo extreem mis ging. Er kan een technisch mankement gebeuren en dat ze geen enkel risico willen nemen, dat begrijpen we allemaal. Tijdens ons hotelverblijf en onze vlucht naar Istanbul had Turkish Airlines echter 22 uur de tijd om een ​​aansluitende vlucht + instapkaarten voor iedereen te regelen, maar er leek niets geregeld te zijn. Waarom werden we van de ene plek naar de andere gesleurd, wanhopig en uitgeput toekijken hoe hun medewerkers verhitte discussies voerden en alles zo slecht geregeld was?

New York to Kharkov via Istanbul. Our plane from New York was 3 hours late causing us to miss a connection flight in Istanbul. So because there were no more flights that day going to Ukraine, we had to stay overnight in Istanbul. It was a nightmare waiting to be placed in a hotel. I had no extra diapers or baby food. On top we had to pay for 3 visas to stay in Istanbul (total $90). We were told that we will get reimbursed for visas, so upon our return I started requesting reimbursement. We were granted our reimbursement, however to get your money you have to go to their "closest sales office" - well guess what, for me it is a 2 hour drive! They refused to mail a check for deposit, so now i am out $90 and had a terrible flight all because of no fault of mine. This is unacceptable in this day and age to make someone drive for 2 hours to get $ they are entitled to. Will never use this airline again.

Antalya to Moscow. We bought business class tickets and wanted to spend 1-2 hours in a lounge - to feed the baby mostly - but there was no lounge available. We double checked with a man who was checking us in where is the lounge for Turkish business class - he send us wrong direction and did not even put priority tags on our luggage. We spend extra hour in Moscow waiting for luggage with economy class as no tags where provided.

Cape Town to Athens via Istanbul. My wife and I were traveling with twins in business class, and her family was also on the plane but traveling in economy class. As we got to the boarding gate, we wanted to get the rest of our family onto business class. There were seats available, but the first person we asked said it was impossible to change seats at such a late time. I then met a staff member and he called someone in Istanbul to see if it was possible. After a few phone calls, he asked for my credit card details and was able to upgrade the rest of my family to business class. The reason this is so impressive is that he had to go against the inbuilt systems to delight a customer. I think the airline industry needs more staff like him and less people who just follow the process. I will be flying Turkish airlines again because of this.

London to Mombasa via Istanbul, after being told and having my ticket verified by a lady agent at the international transit desk just before passport control that i qualify for a free transit hotel for a layover as my transit time was 18hours. I also met the other requirements such as being in transit from a Turkish Airlines flight to another Turkish Airline flight that was international as well as the connection flight being the only option hence being forced by the Turkish Airlines schedule structure thus requiring a layover as there was no shorter connection from Istanbul with Turkish Airlines on the same day. After having arrived at the hotel desk with people who just got of the flight I was told that the hotels were full and there was nothing he could do about it apart from offering me a voucher to compensate for the hotel for a bus trip around Istanbul at 7am - bearing in mind that its was 2am and I had no sleep. Long story short he claimed to be the supervisor and a colleague beside him the manager, he gave me a counter number for the Turkish Airlines customer service number to which I called and was told I met the requirements but they wouldn't provide, forcing me to give up. I not only wasted $30 for the visa required to get through passport control but my time. They also use a trick to bypass the free transit hotel: If they are aware of long delays (more than 10 hours) they just break down 1 big delay into multiple short delays. If they adds flights to their schedule between the time of booking and date of travel they will not offer the hotel.

Washington to Istanbul. Food service was poor. They run out of dinner with fish after serving almost 50 passengers and I had no other option but pasta with cheese sauce. My return on Sept 19 2017 was terrible. A woman was changing her baby's diaper by the food service area. Flight attendant was incapable of doing something about it. During dinner time they once again run out and I was served this time eggplant with rice. By the time they service our section my food was cold. I gave my dinner back. When I told the flight attendant she said 'she will let her supervisor know' but nobody came to talk to me nor offered anything else to eat. I believe I had to get upset like other passengers to receive better dinner and service. I have been flying with Turkish Airlines for 15 years and have lost confidence for the quality service and competency of keeping passengers satisfaction.

Cologne to Shiraz via Istanbul. My first plane was delayed in Cologne so I couldn't catch my next flight so Turkish Airlines offered a ticket for my final destination which was due in 18 hours. In such situations you can either go to a hotel and rest or take a city tour. The hotel was supposedly 5 star, I would not say that my residence was bad, but I prefer to be home on time.

London to Kuala Lumpur via Istanbul. Really impressed with the hard products and 9 abreast seats in B777 economy. Even more impressed with the live television services, though limited channels. I would not have imagined watching a UEFA Champions League / World Cup qualifier game whilst travelling intercontinental. Food is good relative to other airlines. Was relieved that my check-in luggage made it through to Kuala Lumpur, after there was a 50 minutes delay from my departure at Heathrow. At Istanbul, I was off the plane and straightaway dashed to my connection gate. Made it into the connection to Kuala Lumpur, but was resigned that my luggage wouldn't make it and may come in on the following flight. Thankfully, it reached KUL together with me. One reservation about the hardproduct is seat pitch, especially on the A330. I'm 6 foot 1, and really feel the tightness. Not much improvement on the B777, but perhaps bearable for a 9 hours flight.

London to Riyadh via Istanbul. I booked a seat by the window on the right-hand side. The flight left at 01:20 so I expected to be able to sleep. On going through the gate security the staff scribbled out the seat number and wrote the same row (31, I believe, the second to last row) but wrote seat E. I asked why and they said the plane had been changed but it was the same size as the first leg and I was supposed to be in the exact same seat - 31F. I tried to engage them further but they just waved me off. The flight attendants on board said the flight was overbooked which was a lie. The person next to me, who had taken my seat, was a woman with a crying baby. I said nothing to her as that would be rude, and I'm not as rude as Turkish Airlines' staff. This is by no means the first time it has happened, but only seems to be leaving or entering Saudi Arabia. Sometimes I appreciate a woman doesn't want to be seated next to a male stranger, but this woman was still next to me, and had the side of the plane to lean on - exactly why I chose to book the seat in advance, instead of just turning up knowing the staff will steal someone else's. One good point was she had a huge, blow up cushion between her and the aircraft window which I will look for and use when I fly in future, with a different airline of course.

Αθήνα προς Βουδαπέστη μέσω Κωνσταντινούπολης. Υπήρξε καθυστέρηση 1 ώρας από το αεροδρόμιο της Αθήνας για την αναχώρηση της πτήσης για Κωνσταντινούπολη. Ως αποτέλεσμα, φτάσαμε στο αεροδρόμιο 20 λεπτά πριν απογειωθεί η πτήση σύνδεσης για τη Βουδαπέστη. Δεν υπήρξε καμία ανακοίνωση για την πτήση σύνδεσης, ούτε διευθέτηση μεταφοράς μας στην πύλη/αεροπλάνο. Φτάσαμε στην πύλη 10 λεπτά πριν από την πτήση, αλλά η πύλη ήταν κλειστή. Ενημερωθήκαμε από τον υπάλληλο εκεί, να φτάσουμε σε μια άλλη πύλη, η οποία ήταν λάθος περπατώντας ξανά για μεγάλη απόσταση και τελικά φτάσαμε στο γραφείο μεταφοράς, όπου μετά από πολύωρη αναμονή ενημερωθήκαμε για τη διανυκτέρευση μας σε ξενοδοχείο στην Κωνσταντινούπολη. για να πάρετε την πτήση της 7.00 π.μ. για Βουδαπέστη. Ενημερωθήκαμε ότι οι αποσκευές μας είχαν βγει από το αεροπλάνο. Έπειτα έπρεπε να φύγουμε από το ξενοδοχείο 3 ώρες πριν, που σημαίνει στις 4.00 π.μ.

Bruxelles à Istanbul. La classe affaires a les fauteuils inclinables typiques qui sont meilleurs que la plupart des compagnies aériennes dans les avions à fuselage étroit.
