Mon expérience d'enregistrement à Bruxelles a été horrible. L'agent d'enregistrement en classe affaires était inexpérimenté et arrogant. Il a littéralement fallu 20 minutes pour mettre mes bagages dans l'avion, puis elle a commencé à harceler mon bagage à main en appliquant strictement une règle de classe affaires de 8 kg. Je suis allé voir le directeur de la station, j'ai dû remballer des trucs après quoi elle a dit une fois que c'était trop. Un autre voyage au directeur de la station et avec quelques mots à ne pas recommencer, il m'a laissé partir. J'ai dû courir pour monter dans mon avion. Une chose est sûre, je ne recommencerai pas et choisirai une autre compagnie aérienne. Je recommande à la compagnie aérienne de ne pas utiliser de telles personnalités pour le service client.

Buenos Aires a Barcelona vía Estambul. Los asientos están bien, pero no son los mejores. Lo bueno es que son totalmente planos, lo malo es que no todos ofrecen acceso directo al pasillo (y que hay 3 asientos juntos en la fila del medio en clase ejecutiva). Dicho esto, también tengo que decir que el vuelo Buenos Aires - Estambul es muy largo por la escala en Sao Paulo, pero volar en clase ejecutiva en TK lo hace parecer más corto, el IFE es bastante bueno y la comida es genial. Tomo este vuelo dos veces al año y aunque el servicio de comida se deterioró un poco últimamente, sigue siendo muy bueno en comparación con otras aerolíneas (lamentablemente en mis últimos vuelos no hubo más amuse bouche, no más opciones de entrantes para elegir). carro y no más carro final con café y petit fours; este último ahora se consolidó con el carro de postres, también el champán a bordo se rebajó de Taittinger a Mumm). Como dije, el servicio de comidas sigue siendo bueno, pero podría ser mucho mejor si los asistentes de vuelo fueran más proactivos al ofrecer bebidas y recargas. Simplemente no lo hacen, debes llamarlos cada vez que necesites una recarga (no sucede en muchas otras aerolíneas) y cuando lo haces se demoran una eternidad y es obvio que no están dispuestos a hacerlo. En general, recomendaría la clase ejecutiva TK porque la comida es muy buena y los asientos son cómodos, pero necesitan mejorar el servicio a bordo. Si lo hicieran, serían bastante perfectos.

Dammam to London via Istanbul. Paid for seat reservations on both flights and they were not honoured. When I asked the flight team I was told there was nothing that could be done. When I then complained to the airline I was basically told that changes to aircrafts are made and they don't feel the need to inform you of those changes or refund the price that you have paid for the seat reservations. Deeply unhappy. I will not be using them again.

Johannesburg to Brussels via Istanbul. Our first holiday that we flew with Turkish Airlines and probably our last. However we are satisfied about the staff on board, it's the lack of customer care that makes the final result of this review. As we arrived home we found out that one of the locks of our suitcases was damaged in a way that this lock could not be used any more. No message of Customs was left. An inquiry at Samsonite showed that this part can not be repaired. So we are forced to buy a new suitcase because of this damage. Turkish Airlines is responsible to take care of our bagage and if some problem occurs, they should offer a solution. Challenge 1 is to find out how to claim damaged baggage. Found on the internet and made a claim the next day. Challenge 2 is to convince Turkish Airlines (Customer Care) about the real cause of the damage, since they decline a claim immediately. Challenge 3 is to convince them about the fact that the suitcase is not repairable. If it would be, we should send it to a national Samsonite repair center (costs!). But they confirmed that the lock is no longer available (only during the warranty time of 5 years). A copy of these emails were sent to TA, but the refuse to accept it and think about another solution. Challenge 4 is to convince TA that for me the only solution is that I have to buy a new suitcase, which I did, and to get a refund as compensation. I bought a new Samsonite, sent my invoice to them and asked them to solve this matter, but again they answered that only repairs will be paid. When you pay over 2500 Euros for your tickets, you have the right to expect customer service as it should be. Let's end positive about the airplane and staff. The airplane is new well cleaned and you there is a lot of entertainment to choose on your personal screen. Staf is really friendly and drinks and meals are alright. We just did not understand why on a night flight it took so long to get your meal after the take off. It would be nice to get it earlier and then get some more time to sleep.

Manchester to Ercan via Istanbul. We are flying again in September and for various reasons wanted to change dates. The customer service operator was exceedingly sympathetic and helpful and while I was on the phone he exceeded my expectations and did more than I could have asked. I now have exactly what I wanted at no extra cost. We love Turkish Airlines and always use them if we can.

Jakarta to Sao Paulo return via Istanbul with Boeing 777-300ER in Business Class. I felt that the entertainment screen is quite small, it is adequate but would be great if we could enjoy larger screen size. Food options were satisfying and presentation was nice thanks to Do&Co catering. It would be great if they offer flexibility to their pax to be able to opt to dine whenever they wish (not only in a designated meal service time). This is particularly for the red-eye flight like Sao Paulo-Istanbul which depart at 3am and a meal was served just after take off. Cabin crew polite and courteous especially Indonesian-bound flight. Lounge at Istanbul was great with many food selections but much fewer when you departing late at night. One most point that need to be improved is the boarding arrangement at the Departure Gate especially for Business Class Passengers ! There was indeed a special Line for business class pax but mostly were blocked by the long economy pax queue that we had to struggle to find the dedicated line for business class pax.

İstanbul'dan Hatay'a Türk Hava Yolları'na teşekkür etmek istiyorum. Uçağımı kaçırdım ve uçağıma yetişemedim ama personel nazik davranarak biletimi değiştirdi ve seyahatimi aynı gün tamamlamama yardım etti. Uçağım sabah 9'daydı ve 12 saat sonra bile saat 21.00 oldu ama daha sonra geri dönmem için bana yardımcı oldular.

Los Angeles to Bucharest via Istanbul three weeks ago. My two bags were not delivered until now. I followed all the procedures requested, I sent all the information required for identification of my bags (including their photos and the lists of properties), I sent them a lot of emails, but no one gives me any news. I am shocked by the lack of involvement of the Claim Department staff in this case. I do not recommend this company.

Nairobi to Heathrow via Istanbul. The flight from Nairobi delayed by close to one hour and I almost missed my connecting flight to London. I was travelling with 2 suitcases both of which were missing when we got to London. One suitcase was delivered 4 days later and the other is still missing more than one week down the line. The airline does not give any updates on the progress of tracing the lost baggage and refers you to a robot site that has the same update "tracing continues check later for updates" for seven days. It is unfortunate I had booked a return flight, otherwise, I am not flying Turkish Airlines again!

Amsterdam naar Bangkok via Istanboel. In Amsterdam kregen we een upgrade vanwege een overboekt vliegtuig. We ontvingen onze nieuwe instapkaart voor stoelen 6J/6K, slechts 15 minuten voordat het instappen begon. Toen we wilden instappen, vertelde het scansysteem dat onze stoelen weer in economy waren gezet. Volgens de helpdesk van Turkish Airlines is dit een normale procedure. Upgraden en downgraden wanneer ze maar willen. Het was geen fout van Turkish Airlines, maar van de afhandelingsmaatschappij. Ook in Istanbul was het personeel helemaal niet vriendelijk! Ze renden weg toen we een vraag wilden stellen over deze situatie.

İstanbul'dan Bangkok'a. Türk Hava Yolları ile birkaç olumlu uçuş deneyiminden sonra, İstanbul'dan Bangkok'a son uçuşum çok hayal kırıklığı yarattı. Uçağa, biraz düzensiz de olsa, zamanında binildi. Tüm yolcular uçağa bindikten sonra yaklaşık 1 saat bekledikten sonra teknik bir arıza nedeniyle uçağın değiştirilmesi gerektiği anonsu yapıldı. Bu kendi başına büyük bir sorun değildi, biraz rahatsızlık verse de, yine de güvenliğe gösterilen ilgi takdire şayandı. Kapı biniş alanına döndüğümüzde, durumla nasıl başa çıkacağı hakkında hiçbir fikri yokmuş gibi görünen tek bir yer ajanı vardı. Duyuru yapılmadı. 2 saat sonrasına yeni kalkış saati belirlenince yeni bir uçağa bindik. Uçağımız neredeyse 3 saat rötar yaptığı için kabin görevlileri tüm bunlardan etkilenmişe benziyor. Yemek verildikten sonra uzun süre ortalıkta görünmeyenler, yolcular doymadan 1 saat boyunca boş yemek tepsileri ile ayrılanlar ve mutfağa getirip kendi tepsilerini toplamaya başladılar. Bu rahatsızlık hakkında, yemek servisinden sonra temizlik için uzun bekleme süresi hakkında şikayette bulunduğum için "beni yazmak" zorunda kalacağını söyleyen uçuş görevlisine bir yorum yaptım. Bu tutum ve tedavi beni hayal kırıklığına uğrattı.

Flew Dalaman to Istanbul Ataturk. Found the Business Class check-in tucked away in the corner of a seething departure hall. Showing my Gold card, I was politely and promptly checked in. I was told where to find the CIP lounge. In there it felt more like a school playground with children running noisily around in circles. Obviously not the fault of Turkish Airlines. Slight delay in boarding as the aircraft came in late. No boarding announcements made (until I boarded at least) but people just moved forward. One lady called out something in barely audible Turkish language, but nothing in English. Before take-off they showed the safety briefing on drop-down screens. Those screens then remained down, just showing the Turkish Airlines logo, throughout the flight. In fact they were still down as we got off the plane in Istanbul. After take-off the Captain explained and apologised for the delay. We were served a warm cheese and tomato roll with soft and hot drinks. In fact identical to the snack when I flew from Istanbul a few days earlier. But it was welcome and tasty and perfectly adequate for 11.30 pm. Two very smiling and friendly flight attendants served us. As we flew in circles the Captain announced a change in runway meant a further 15 minutes delay. We finally landed - with the only occupant in the row in front of me in his seat fully reclined. After landing we were told we could use our electronic devices so I looked at the flight path we had flown. It was certainly convoluted! We were taken by bus to the domestic terminal and all in all 30 minutes delay. I have not had a delayed Turkish Airlines flight for months so not a big deal for me.

Billund to Delhi via Istanbul. On 29th July our travel from Billund via Istanbul was delayed by 24 hours due to heavy delay in first flight which resulted in missing next fligh.t We stuck at Istanbul airport with family and could not go out as we did not had working international credit card to get E-Visa. We had US Dollars in cash but there was no system at Istanbul airport to pay for E-Visa in cash. This resulted us spending 24 hours at airport with family and 1 year old baby. It was one of the worst experience we had. Ground staffs at Istanbul airport were very uncooperative.

Bruxelles à Entebbe via Istanbul. Notre train a été retardé, mais nous sommes arrivés à l'aéroport 80 minutes avant notre vol prévu. La zone d'enregistrement était très occupée et déroutante avec plusieurs files d'attente. Nous avons attendu 25 minutes dans la file d'attente pour découvrir que nous étions dans la mauvaise file d'attente, car il y avait deux vols pour Istanbul ce jour-là à des heures similaires. Nous sommes arrivés au comptoir d'enregistrement lorsque la dame nous a informés que nous étions au mauvais comptoir et que nous étions trop tard et que l'enregistrement était déjà terminé. Elle nous a ensuite dirigé vers le comptoir Turkish Airline mais il nous a dit qu'il ne pouvait pas nous aider. Nous avons souligné que nous n'avions que deux petits bagages à main et que tout ce dont nous avions besoin était une carte d'embarquement (et nous avions encore 50 minutes avant le départ). Il a refusé avec un sourire narquois ajoutant que ce n'était pas son problème. Nous avons fini par dépenser des milliers d'euros pour nos nouveaux billets, payer un hôtel et changer l'horaire de notre voyage et tout cela était inutile. Nous comprenons qu'il existe des politiques strictes des compagnies aériennes et que les passagers doivent arriver à l'heure à l'enregistrement. Tout ce dont nous avions besoin était que quelqu'un nous délivre des billets.

Algiers to Dubai via Istanbul. Stsrted at the check in where I had to wait 1,5 hour in line to just drop off my bag although I had checked in online, due to slow staff, who not only took at least 10 minutes to check in a passenger but also had no idea about the seats on the plane and I was given a wrong seat in result. The flight was also delayed 60 mins. My wife traveled the same route in August and both her flights were delayed 1 hour and she wasn't given a protective bag for the stroller although she was promised to recieve it at the plane entrance and she did not get the seat that has a child bassinet.
曼谷經伊斯坦布爾飛往突尼斯。對他們的在線預訂系統非常失望。當我在線預訂機票時，我選擇支付最昂貴的價格以獲得一張靈活的機票，我可以免費更改日期並重新簽發機票。 （至少是這麼寫的）。不得不說，我從來沒有機會在商務艙中選擇艙位。幾天后，當我要求更改回程航班日期（提前一天攜帶）時，我被要求支付 500 歐元（機票總價值的 15%），因為票價不同。預訂時從未提及這一點......

Von Zürich über Istanbul nach Dubai. Pünktliches Boarding in Zürich auf einer sauberen und neu aussehenden 321-200 mit Winglets. Die Sitze waren schwarz und rot, sahen sehr modern aus und waren mit Touchscreen und AVOD-Sound auf dem neuesten Stand. Die Besatzung arbeitete ununterbrochen auf dem 2 Stunden und 30 Minuten langen Flug, es wurden ausgezeichnete Speisen und Getränke, Weine und Spirituosen angeboten. Turkish Airlines hat in qualitativ hochwertige Produkte investiert, verfügt aber auch über eine junge Flugbesatzung, die hart arbeitet und ein hohes Serviceniveau bietet. Die Verbindung in Istanbul war eng, funktionierte aber. Bei strömendem Regen wurden wir mit dem Bus zum abgelegenen Stand 777-00 gebracht, und ein überfüllter Flug startete pünktlich. Die Besatzung bot wieder gutes Essen an, dieses Mal Rindfleischköfte und Reis, bot Spirituosen und Wein an und arbeitete unermüdlich an diesem Nachtflug.

Moscow to Bangkok via Istanbul. Quick and efficient check in at Vnukovo Airport. However no priority lane at the airport and very slow processing of my exit from Russia meant that I nearly missed the flight. First sector had reclining seats. Cabin service was good and the meal was good. The second sector was a week later from Istanbul to Bangkok. The check in was efficient and fast, there was a special clearance lane for Turkish Airlines passengers (different to the normal fast track for other airlines and this lane fed straight into the lounge). The plane was a little late taking off and there seemed to be no hurry with the meal service, a pity as I would rather have slept straight away and just had breakfast. The food and wine on the plane was good. The bed was comfortable and I slept well. There was a priority lane service but not used as there was no queue in Immigration.My luggage was the first off - there has been a problem where two or more sectors are flown but not on this occasion. I was happy with the service and will continue to fly Turkish airlines.

İstanbul'dan Tel Aviv'e dönüş. Hem İstanbul (ekonomi sınıfı) hem de Tel Aviv (işletme sınıfı, çünkü İstanbul'dan Business Class'a geçiyordum) için hızlı ve verimli check-in. Çanta, Bangkok'a öncelikli olarak kontrol edildi ve ilk olarak Bangkok'ta uçuştan indi. Her iki uçuş da zamanında kalktı ve indi ve her iki uçuşta da sadece iki saat sürmesine rağmen hafif bir yemek ikram edildi. Koltuklar iyiydi ve yeterli bacak boşluğum vardı. Tuvaletler temizdi.
曼谷飛往伊斯坦布爾。商務艙很棒。食物很棒，服務也很好（不如卡塔爾航空或新加坡航空，但仍然很好）。商務艙的座椅很舒適，可以變成床上。土耳其航空確實是一家很棒的航空公司。

Dublin to Tel Aviv via Istanbul. Turkish Airlines fall short in all areas from customer service to cabin and inflight experience. The lounge they use at Dublin is the worst experience. No recognition of business class passengers - we pay for this experience, but it is non existent. Narrowbody business class seating not overly comfortable, especially when in the recline position, especially the leg rest or lack of leg rest. Poor in flight service, feeling of being a burden to the cabin staff, despite only 50% occupation on business class cabin. IFE screen malfunction, poor response from crew and no offer of seat change. Not worth the extra fare for business class as there was a total lack of experience. I submitted feedback and received a response from them that did not address the basis of the feedback.

曼谷經伊斯坦布爾飛往倫敦。從曼谷出發的第一站是 A330。由於曼谷的天氣原因，航班延誤了，不幸的是，他們只是在所有人都走到登機口後才宣布延誤。航班晚點了大約 45 分鐘，當乘客登機時，機組人員還沒有完全準備好，因為他們遲到了，而且似乎對航班延誤感到有點壓力，這在航班的大部分時間裡都困擾著他們。儘管有壓力，他們還是很友好並提供了良好的服務。有迎賓飲料但是TK的招牌檸檬水喝完了，有點差。也就是說，這次航班在其他方面都很棒，起飛後很快就提供了晚餐，而且食物比出境航班有了巨大的改善。牛排是我多年來在飛機上吃過的最好的牛排之一。晚餐後，床鋪鋪好了，燈也關了。早餐在著陸前大約 2 小時供應，這次機組人員確實記得領取早餐訂單，因此一切都正確供應。儘管起飛延誤，我們仍準時降落在 IST。當我們凌晨 4 點到達 IST 時，轉乘保安還沒有完全醒過來，但我們很快就通過了，並進入了 IST 一流的休息室。雖然休息室很棒，但早上 6 點就非常繁忙，座位都很難找到。由於前往英國旅行時必須接受登機口檢查個人電子設備，登機口流程大約需要 15 分鐘才能通過，但 TK 在簡化流程方面做得相當不錯，尤其是對於商務艙乘客。登機組織合理，LHR航班很快完成登機。這次的航班是一架波音777，從IST準時起飛。早餐很快又供應了。雖然熱菜的選擇有限，但仍然很美味。機組人員在這次飛行中更加放鬆，絕對是一種樂趣。航班準時降落在 LHR。獲取 PED 的過程幾乎和托運一樣麻煩，但 TK 工作人員盡力盡快歸還設備。

北京經伊斯坦布爾飛往亞特蘭大。飛行本身非常好。我的問題是航班外的服務很差。我購買了一張經濟艙機票，並嘗試使用我的里程（來自星空聯盟內的另一家航空公司）來升級航班的一個航段。簡單的？一點也不。我確保使用正確的代碼 (B) 購買了機票，因為您只能使用 Y 和 B 代碼升艙。然後我使用我的里程升級了機票，但隨後被告知升級會將代碼更改為 I。代碼 I 意味著即使我支付了機票全價，我也無法獲得該航班的里程。我嘗試通過土耳其航空公司的網站聯繫他們，但沒有收到回复。我試圖通過他們的社交媒體網站聯繫他們，並被告知要耐心等待，我會收到回复。兩週後，我查看狀態，發現土耳其航空取消了我的機票。我聯繫了我的旅行社，他們發現我的升級在他們的系統中創建了重複的機票，所以他們取消了一切，而沒有通知我。然後他們試圖向我收取重新簽發費用，因為他們的錯誤。然後我再次嘗試升級，但無法在線，所以我聯繫了他們（這次是通過電話），並被告知他們的系統已關閉，他們無法執行任何操作。

İstanbul'dan Abuja'ya. Güzel uçuş, müşteri hizmetleri güzel, güzel yemekler, zamanında ve çok dakik. Boeing 737-900, 6 saatten fazla bir yolculuk için çok küçük bir uçaktır, çok rahatsızdır ve neredeyse esneyecek veya hareket edecek alanı yoktur. Ancak uçağın çok küçük olması dışında genel olarak harika bir uçuş.

Cape Town to Athens via Istanbul. They charge for sporting equipment stating it's a 'handling fee'. They are happy to take golf bags and skis free of charge, and diving equipment to three destinations free of charge, but the rest of the world they charge for. It really can't be that hard to handle some fins, a mask and a very small speargun for no charge can it, especially when these make up the only form of checked in baggage? And they do not weigh more than golf equipment or don't take up more space than a golf bag. I've never dealt with an airline that has such inconsistent rules regarding baggage, and made taking other goods overseas so difficult. Speaking to customer service they can't do anything either. Oh and they don't charge sports baggage fees as a single trip return, they charge for each destination where you stop / layover, both there and back, so you could pay up to 90 euros one way,and the same return.

London to Guangzhou via Istanbul. I chose Turkish Airline on this occasion instead of my regular Qatar Airways. Was a bit apprehensive choosing this airline but what a fantastic airline it turn out to be, flights were punctual, priority boarding at all sectors, attentive and smiling FAs plus a chef on board preparing food which was very tasty and flatbed seats on both aircraft. The only issue, nothing to do with the airline, is the last leg, Istanbul to London and it can be daunting especially after a 10 hour flight where you go through security checks twice and no laptops on hand baggage. Although flying Business Class, the queues is very much the same as travelling economy and it took forever. Apart from the security checks at IST, everything else was as good if not better than some other 5* airlines I have flown. Give this airline a try and you will be pleasantly surprised.

Dublin to Istanbul. I was impressed by the flight. Check in and boarding went well. The staff were very friendly and helpful, particularly with the younger passengers. The meal was very tasty, although I was surprised they served a breakfast for a late morning departure. IFE was very good.

İstanbul'dan Atina'ya. Maalesef uçak rötar yaptı, bunun dışında keyifli bir uçuştu. Tam hizmet veren bir havayolu için beni şaşırtan alkollü bir içecek sunmadıklarına biraz şaşırdım. Sunulan yemek, çok kısa bir uçuş olduğu düşünüldüğünde çok da kötü olmayan bir ruloydu.

Dublin to Istanbul. I enjoyed my flight. It left on time and check in and boarding went very smoothly. The meal was very tasty. I was a bit surprised that they served breakfast given the flight left at 10.50. Towards the end of the flight there were drinks being served which was very much appreciated.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul-Montreal seferi. Kuzey Amerika'ya giden uçuşlar için ekstra kontrol katmanı nedeniyle, öncelikli şerit için normalden daha yavaş check-in. Bölge numaralarına göre biniş ve oldukça düzenli. Gemide, sert ürün biraz yıpranmıştı, sürtünme izleri ve yırtık süslemeler vardı. Uçuş kapıdan 35 dakika geç ayrıldı ve "operasyonel sorunlar" dışında herhangi bir sebep gösterilmedi. Havalandıktan sonra, çok çeşitli içecek seçenekleriyle birlikte 5 çeşitli öğle yemeği servis edildi. Yemek oldukça lezzetli ve iyi sunulmuş. FA'lar sıcak, samimi ve çok dikkatliydi. Tüm uçuş boyunca sürekli bir gülümseme ve neşeli bir tavırla koridorun benim tarafımla ilgilenen personele özel bir söz var. IFE iyi bir seçime sahipti, ancak bazen gezinmek zordu. Tuvaletler dikkat gerektiriyordu ve her zaman temiz / düzenli değildi. Uçak 30 dakika geç indi ve bilinmeyen bir nedenle, Montreal için son derece nadir olan hava tarafı otobüsleriyle indik. Genel olarak deneyim olumluydu ve kabin ekibi olağanüstüydü.

İstanbul'dan Sao Paulo'ya. Gündüz uçuşu. Çok fazla diz mesafesi olan bir çıkış koltuğu almayı başardı. Kadırganın yanına oturdu, bir sürü insan etrafta dolanıyordu. Mürettebat yüksek düzeyde hizmet sağladı. İlk yemek güzeldi, ikincisi pek değil. Eğlence sistemi iyiydi. Uçuşta her zaman yardımcı olan Wifi vardı. Dekor eski, yorgun görünmesine rağmen uçak temizdi. İstanbul Havalimanı, şimdiye kadar bulunduğum en iyi dinlenme salonlarından biri ile mükemmel. Uçuştan keyif aldım, fiyat çok iyiydi, kesinlikle tekrar Türkçe uçacağım!

Madrid a Estambul fue lo más fluido y placentero que puede ser un vuelo. El check-in fue inmediato y amigable, la Sala Cibeles en Barajas es un excelente salón, la salida y la llegada fueron puntuales y el servicio a bordo fue excelente. El cielo estuvo despejado durante toda la ruta, por lo que las vistas fueron agradables. Los asientos de clase ejecutiva en el A330-300 son 2x2x2

Montréal à Istanbul sur TK36. Arrivé à l'aéroport 2 heures avant le départ pour découvrir que l'enregistrement avait été suspendu. Les passagers ont attendu dans les files d'attente pendant un certain temps avant que le responsable de la station TK n'apparaisse et annonce à tout le monde que le vol avait été annulé. Ce qui s'en est suivi ne peut être décrit que comme un chaos avec des agents qui courent partout pour collecter les coordonnées des passagers afin qu'ils puissent être informés de leur itinéraire réacheminé. TK exploite trois vols par semaine sur cette route, le prochain vol ne devant partir que vendredi. Cela a entraîné une file d'attente longue et extrêmement lente devant la billetterie alors que deux agents tentaient de retraiter un avion chargé de personnes. Le reste du personnel au sol a couru partout, semblant savoir ce qu'il faisait, mais n'accomplissant presque rien. Le directeur de la gare était introuvable avec de nombreux passagers exigeant des réponses. Comme le vol est souvent le tout dernier de la journée, il n'y avait plus d'autres options pour faire sortir les passagers le même jour, beaucoup devant faire face à au moins un jour de retard. Les perturbations de vol sont un élément inévitable du transport aérien, mais TK n'est pas équipé pour y faire face, comme en témoignent le manque de coordination et l'inefficacité. Leur centre d'appels était tout aussi inefficace car ils n'arrêtaient pas de dire qu'ils ne pouvaient rien faire. Si TK aspire bel et bien à devenir l'un des principaux transporteurs, il lui faut considérablement accélérer son jeu dans la relation client et la réponse aux imprévus.

Kuala Lumpur to Venice via Istanbul. The flight from Kuala Lumpur was real packed. I was seated on 50G. It was rather hot during the flight. Meal was plenty and tasty. I also like your special menu and unique drink such as sour cheery drink and home made lemonade. They are fantastic! Most cabin crews on Kuala Lumpur - Istanbul sector were nice and polite except one male crew looked grumpy but he still did the job well. Nothing to complain from Istanbul to Venice. Toilet was clean and with proper amenities. We got nice blanket, pillow and nice pouch (Kuala Lumpur - Istanbul sector) full of flying amenities such as lip balm, socks, eye shade, toothbrush and ear plug which are nice. AVOD needs improvement on film and song selection. Need to provide some asian movies and songs including in Chinese/Mandarin. You have ones in Malay but not Bahasa Indonesia although you also serve Jakarta airport. Wifi is on and off. A bit frustrating indeed. Other than that, I have nothing to complain.

Da Roma a Giacarta via Istanbul. Gli aerei erano puliti e gli equipaggi gentili. Come al solito, la porzione del pasto era abbondante. Non avrò fame volando con loro. Tutti sono deliziosi. Le bevande erano carine. Come il loro succo acido e allegro e la limonata fatta in casa. Coperta e auricolare erano puliti e buoni. Mi piacciono, la custodia da viaggio data è stata carina. È pieno di spazzolino da denti, calzini, ombretto, tappi per le orecchie, balsamo per le labbra e sandali. Grande offerta. Gli equipaggi hanno cercato di fare del loro meglio per renderci felici, ma poiché l'aereo era molto pieno, ritengo che la risposta sia stata piuttosto tardiva. Ho premuto il pulsante della cabina ma sono arrivati ​​così a lungo ma capisco che erano molto occupati. Immagino che l'aereo fosse quasi pieno al 100%. L'aereo sembrava nuovo. Il bagno era pulito con i suoi servizi. Tuttavia, AVOD necessita di miglioramenti. Altri film e canzoni asiatiche, tra cui cinese mandarino e Bahasa Indonesia (non solo malese). Anche il Wi-Fi ha bisogno di miglioramenti. Complimenti turco!.

Amsterdam naar Amman via Istanboel. Deze reis was een 4-daagse reis met ingecheckte bagage. Zowel in Amsterdam als in Amman en op doorreis in Istanbul konden we gebruik maken van prioritaire faciliteiten waardoor we de rijen konden overslaan voor de security. Turkish Airlines maakt gebruik van de Aspire Lounge in het niet-Schengengebied van Schiphol Airport, dat druk was en slecht bevoorraad met eet- en drinkgelegenheden. In Amman gebruiken ze de Royal Jordanian lounge die ruim is en goed gevuld met eten en drinken. Tijdens de 2e tussenstop in Istanbul hebben we gebruik gemaakt van de Turkish Airline-lounge, die enorm is met veel voorzieningen en eetgelegenheden en wederom een ​​goed wifi-netwerk. We hebben zelfs wat tijd gevonden om te spelen met de golfsimulator op de benedenverdieping van de lounge. De vluchten waren de typische middellangeafstandsvluchten, alle 4 de vluchten vertrokken redelijk op tijd en kwamen stipt op tijd aan op de bestemming. Op de dagvluchten tussen Amsterdam en Istanbul werd een lunch respectievelijk ontbijt aangeboden. Al het eten was lekker en mooi gepresenteerd. Tijdens de nachtvluchten tussen Istanbul en Amman kregen we voorafgaand aan het opstijgen een diner respectievelijk ontbijt aangeboden, maar in beide gevallen kozen we ervoor om te slapen wat perfect mogelijk was op de slaapstoelen in de A340 en A330. Op alle 4 de vluchten was het cabinepersoneel goed verzorgd, aardig en attent maar bleef altijd op afstand.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul-Montreal seferi. TK, Kanada, ABD, Birleşik Krallık ve İsrail'e giden uçuşlar için ekstra pasaport formaliteleri ile özel bir business class check-in hizmeti kullanır. Bu işlem yavaştı ve check-in işlemine zaman ekledi. Uçağa biraz geç ama düzenli bir şekilde binildi. Gemide, sert ürün, küçük eşyalar için geniş depolama alanı ile düzgün bir şekilde görünüyordu. Bununla birlikte, baş üstü çöp kutusu alanı, ellerinde tuttukları yatak takımları nedeniyle sınırlıydı. Kalkıştan sonra içecekler ve öğle yemeği ikram edildi ve 6 hafta önce aynı rotayı gezdikten sonra aynı menüyü görünce şaşırdım. Buna rağmen yemek ve şaraplar lezzetliydi ve servis bir gülümsemeyle yapıldı. IFE iyi bir seçime sahipti, ancak navigasyon bazen garipti. Denon gürültü önleyici kulaklıklar harikaydı. Henüz anlayamadığım sebeplerden dolayı, inişten 3 saat önce, öğleden sonra atıştırması yapmak için kabin ışıklarını Türkçe olarak yakıyor. Diğer birçok havayolu aynı şeyi yapıyor, ancak inişten çok önce değil. Bu, almayı bekleyebileceğiniz uyku miktarını sınırlar. Wifi, uçuşun yalnızca bir bölümünde çalıştı. Harika bir kabin ekibi ile çok güzel bir uçuştu. Kokpitten Fransızca anonslar hoş bir dokunuştu. Uçuş geç kalktı ancak programın 40 dakika ilerisinde geldi.

من القاهرة إلى فيينا عبر اسطنبول. أنا أعتبر الخطوط الجوية التركية من أفضل شركات الطيران في كل شيء ، مقصورة الطائرة نظيفة وطاقم العمل مهذب ومتعاون. حتى منطقة الترانزيت في مطار أتاتورك كانت تجربة رائعة وكان لدينا ما يقرب من 5 إلى 6 ساعات من وقت العبور في المطار ولكننا استمتعنا بها حقًا.

الكويت الى ادنبره عبر اسطنبول. رحلاتي بشكل عام كانت جيدة. ومع ذلك ، كان نظام الترفيه على متن الطائرة في إحدى مراحل الرحلة متقطعًا للغاية - ليس فقط بالنسبة لي ولكن لجميع الأنظمة. أجد أن طعام الغداء أفضل من طعام الإفطار. كان الصعود إلى الطائرة غير مؤلم وكان النقل عبر مطار إسطنبول بسيطًا إلى حد ما.

Montréal à Budapest via Istanbul. J'avais des attentes assez élevées vis-à-vis de Turkish Airlines mais après quatre vols avec eux, je les juge médiocres. J'ai peut-être fait une mauvaise sélection de repas, mais le repas végétarien oriental était très peu attrayant. Les autres repas étaient tout aussi insatisfaisants. J'ai apprécié les couverts en acier au lieu du plastique. J'ai également été déçu de voir que Turkish fournit de petits sacs de toilette pour tenter de rendre le vol plus confortable. Je recommanderais toujours le turc, car j'ai réservé avec eux et le prix d'un vol direct pour Montréal était bon.

İstanbul'dan Frankfurt'a İstanbul'dan tam zamanında yola çıktık. Uçuş görevlilerinin profesyonel hizmetini takdir ettik. Güler yüzlü ve samimiydiler. Ekstra yemek sipariş ettik ve çok lezzetliydi. Koltuklar rahat ve Eğlence Programı iyiydi. Her şey için çok teşekkür ederim ve yakında tekrar sizinle uçmayı dört gözle bekliyorum!

Sarajevo to Panama City via Istanbul. The first leg SJJ-IST was in a Boeing 737 in Row 1 with what must have been the worst leg-room I've witnessed in Business on a 737. The bulkhead is in front of your face and the only position to sit is upright. Fortunately the business class section was not full so I moved to a seat in Row 2, which had the seat in front of you to put your feet under. The service was good, and the meal was very good for so short a flight. The Istanbul to Panama City segment was on a semi-antiquated A330-200 which is 4 rows in a 2-2-2 configuration. The seat is comfortable for sitting upright and to a certain extent it is comfortable for relaxing. It is dreadful for sleeping, because the seat is so configured that in the "angled flat" position you slide down. I resolved this by putting my briefcase in the space under the seat in front of mine, and the briefcase then elevated my feet sufficiently to provide support to be able to lay comfortably without struggling to avoid sliding down the incline. The food on this carrier is much better than most European carriers, and light-years ahead of US carriers. The flight crew are sufficiently attentive to function without being over-the-top. When they finish serving, they disappear, and if you want something you'll need to call them and ask for it, or get up and get it yourself- they won't come by and volunteer. But the price is much cheaper than competitors on this route, and that forgives a lot. Overall, for the price, I'm more than satisfied. But if I had to pay full going price of European carriers, I'd fly Lufthansa or Air France, with flat bed seats and a more professional operation. A note of warning - unlike most Turkish long-haul aircraft which offer excellent wifi, this aircraft has no wifi, so you'd better enjoy reading.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan İzmir'e. Bu kadar kısa (50 dakika) bir rotada bir Boeing 777-300ER bulmak benim için inanılmazdı. Uçak henüz 1 yaşında ve çok rahattı. Yeni IFE inanılmaz derecede iyi çalışıyor ve çok zengin bir menüye sahip. Sandviç verip içiyorlar. 50 dakikalık bir uçuş için zevkli ve güzeldi. Kabin ekibi de her zamanki gibi çok yardımcı ve güler yüzlüydü.

Da Venezia a Singapore via Istanbul. Servizio normale, carino e standard su questi due voli. Entrambi i velivoli nuovi. Ho notato che hanno migliorato il loro IFE con nuove funzionalità. Le porzioni di cibo sono diventate un po' più piccole sulle rotte europee ma più grandi su quelle intercontinentali. La qualità del cibo era buona. Ampia scelta di bevande ma i turni potrebbero essere più frequenti. Entrambi i voli pieni. L'equipaggio di cabina è simpatico all'andata, molto più caldo nel segmento più lungo. Sulla strada per Singapore, a causa della congestione del traffico all'aeroporto di Istanbul, l'aereo è decollato con un ritardo di un'ora ma è atterrato a Singapore in orario. I bagni sono stati mantenuti puliti e ora vengono riforniti di nuovi servizi (fiori, lozioni per le mani e creme per le mani di alta qualità) che su altre compagnie aeree potresti trovare solo in business class. La distanza tra i sedili dell'A330 è piuttosto scarsa rispetto al Boeing 777. Come membro Elite, ho potuto utilizzare gratuitamente il Wi-Fi a bordo e la connessione era stabile e molto buona considerando l'altitudine. I bagagli con etichetta prioritaria sono stati consegnati in meno di 15 minuti a Singapore. La sala d'oro all'aeroporto di Istanbul è superba.

Kiev to Istanbul. The service is surely not bad, but is not as high and as expected. A321 with very narrow, uncomfortable seats, and not pleasant to fly. InFlight Entairtainment didn't want to work. At Istambul Airport all our boarding and de boarding were serviced by bus, and it takes a lot of time. The crew was not very attentive, but was professional however.

Birmingham to Istanbul. What a revelation this turned out to be. A great seat pitch (34" on Boeing 737-900ER) which as far as I know is unrivaled on most European economy class. A tasty dinner including soft drinks and wine was included and the cabin crew were excellent. Outbound and return both left and arrived on time. This offering was so far ahead of British Airways that choosing which one to use on this route is a no brainer.

Johannesburg to Gatwick via Istanbul. Seats were the smallest we have come across which was no fun on a 10 hour first leg. Staff unpleasant and food worse. Worst of all was the conflicting advice. We were told at check in no laptops or tablets in hand luggage, but they failed to mention battery pack phone chargers are not permitted. Ours were confiscated although people with laptops and tablets were permitted to hand these over and collect on arrival. Lack of customer advice mean this won't be an airline we will use again or recommend.

İstanbul'dan Lagos'a. Uçağa biniş sırasında uçuş görevlisi cam koltuklarımızı arka arkaya iki sıradaki çıkıştan dört sıranın ortasındaki çıkışsız koltuğa değiştirmiştir. Koltuğu kontrol etmedik, ancak değişikliğin eşdeğer koltuklarda olup olmadığını sorduk ve evet aldık - ancak daha sonra bizi yanlış bilgilendirdiğini görmek için. Yemek seçimi mevcut değildi. İyi enterntsinmrnt sistemi ancak bazen sorunlar ve çok fazla duyuru var. 4 uçuştan bir valiz çok hasar gördü, biri iki gün gecikti. Uçaktaki personel cana yakın ve yardımsever

İstanbul'dan Hurgada'ya uçtu. Salon aracılığıyla uygun hava tarafı erişimi takdir edildi. Gece geç saatlere kadar çok çeşitli yiyecek ve içecek seçenekleri sunan salon. Yine de bazı varyasyonlarla yapabilirdi. Uçuş öncesi duyurular ve öncelikli uygulama ile düzenli biniş süreci. Hoş bir sürpriz olan çifte rezervasyon nedeniyle yükseltildi. Dolu kabin. Ekip mükemmeldi. Kalkış öncesi içecekler, iki sıcak seçenek ile güzel bir kahvaltı ve yemek sonrası içecek servisi. Bu A321'de boş orta koltuk yapılandırılmış J Kabin ile bu 2,5 saatlik atlama için önceden yüklenmiş eğlence ve kaliteli kulaklıklarla tabletler dağıtıldı. Sert hava koşullarına ve zamanında varışa rağmen çok düzgün iniş. Uçuş güvertesine teşekkürler. Bu yolculukta Türk Hava Yolları ile mükemmel genel uçuş deneyimi.

Tbilisi to Amsterdam via Istanbul. Flew TK for the first time (return flight) and I found it a bit overrated. Service and reliability is no better than most EU majors, and overall the comfort and service looks from another time. The seats and interiors are really old, and very narrow on the A320 models (a kid won't even fit). Service is not really outstanding like you read in reviews, just basic and a bit cheap. Cabin staff can be quite stiff and really not friendly, which does not give the best sense of welcome claimed in their marketing. However the ground staff in Istanbul is quite outstanding and efficient! Our flight was 40min late with only 1 hour connection, but someone waits at the exit gate and takes groups of pax with short connections directly to the next gate

İstanbul'dan Washington'a. Genel olarak Türk Hava Yolları'nın koltuk konforundan, yemek kalitesinden, kabin hizmetlerinden vs. memnunum. Washington Dulles Havalimanı'ndaki dinlenme salonu mükemmel ve muhtemelen o havalimanındaki en iyisidir. ABD ve İngiltere'nin getirdiği laptop yasağını nasıl karşıladıklarına değinmek istiyorum. Bagajda check-in işlemi yapılmayan cihazlar, tüm pasaport ve güvenlik kontrollerinden sonra uçuş kapısında havayolu yetkilileri tarafından kabul edilmektedir. Cihazlar balonlu paketlere sarılır ve yolcuya özel fiş verilir. Sarılmış cihazlar, gözlerinizin önünde sağlam kaplara yerleştirilir. Diğer uçta ise Türk Hava Yolları pasaport kontrolünden geçtikten hemen sonra, gümrükten geçmeden önce bir stant açıyor. Makbuzunuzu kontrol ederler ve dizüstü bilgisayarınızı size geri verirler. Telaş yok, telaş yok. Bu koşullar altında operasyon oldukça pürüzsüz. Gezginlerin bilmesi gerektiğini düşündüm.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul-Montreal seferi. Sorunsuz olan iş sınıfı kontrolünü kullandı. İstanbul'daki salon, çok çeşitli içecek ve yemek seçenekleri sunuyordu, ancak duş olanakları dökülüyordu ve yenilenmeye ihtiyacı olduğu ortaya çıktı. Biniş zamanında ve düzenliydi ve zamanında ayrıldık. Gemide oturma rahattı ve FA'lar özenliydi. Türk Hava Yolları ikram hizmetleri eskisi gibi olmayan porsiyon küçülmesi ve kalitesiyle ciddi bir düşüş yaşıyor. Ana yemeğim iki parça fazla pişmiş ince dilim dana etiydi. İnişten önceki yemek de hayal kırıklığı yarattı. Şarap seçimi iyiydi ve Tattinger takdir edildi. Tuvaletler temiz tutulmadı ve FA'lara iki kez bir rötuş yapılması gerektiğini belirtmek zorunda kaldım. Wifi güvenilirdi. IFE iyiydi ama daha yeni çıkan filmleri kullanabilirdi. Kokpitten yapılan duyurular, yalnızca başlangıçta sağlanan uçuş ayrıntılarıyla azdı. Uçuş planlanandan önce geldi.

Amsterdam naar Manilla, via Istanbul met ongeveer 1 uur tussenstop in Istanbul en 5 uur op de terugvlucht. De prijs was erg goed voor deze route. Dit was mijn eerste keer dat ik met Turkish Airlines vloog en het was redelijk goed. IFE had ook een goede selectie films om me bezig te houden, en ze geven je een voorzieningenpakket wat leuk is. De vliegtuigen waren ook redelijk mooi, minpuntje op de terugweg, Istanbul naar Amsterdam, het vliegtuig was oud en had geen IFE, viel een beetje tegen. De maaltijden zijn over het algemeen erg goed, ik hield van de Cafe De Paris Chicken. Het personeel was zo, toen ik in het vliegtuig stapte, begonnen de twee mannelijke FA's die mensen zouden moeten verwelkomen plotseling te kletsen en me niet te verwelkomen, niet zeker waar dit over ging. Op een andere vlucht vergaten ze me brood te geven bij mijn maaltijd, ze serveren het brood na de maaltijd. Ik zag ze andere mensen geven, maar ze gaven me nooit. Ik zou weer met ze vliegen als ze het goedkoopste ticket naar mijn bestemming hebben, anders niet.

Von Frankfurt nach Konya über Istanbul. Ich bin zum ersten Mal mit Turkish Airlines geflogen und es hat mir sehr gut gefallen. Es ist großartig, dass es keine Verzögerungen oder andere Probleme gab, die auftreten könnten. Das Kabinenpersonal war freundlich und das Essen war ausgezeichnet. Der Sitz war bequem und ich hatte genügend Platz, um meine Beine hineinzulegen. Insgesamt hatte ich eine gute Erfahrung zu einem guten Preis.

Kuala Lumpur to London via Istanbul. This is the third time I flew with Turkish Airlines and possibly the last. The first two times I flew Turkish Airlines were direct flights as I was visiting Turkey. Everything was okay, average service experience. The last time I flew with Turkish Airlines, I departed from Kuala Lumpur, transferred at Istanbul and final destination is London. Much of the time you travel between the gate and aircraft by shuttle bus at Istanbul Airport. Tiny leg room (31-33" seat pitch). No compensation for delayed or damaged luggage.

Kathmandu to Geneva via Istanbul. In general I like Turkish Airlines. On both legs of this trip the cabin crew was especially friendly and helpful. However, I left my Kindle e-reader on one of the flights and I cannot find a way to call or email lost and found. There is lost and found for baggage. I suppose I'll accept the loss but it an airline of the standing of Turkish Airline would have a better email/phone system that would allow clients to at least post a message. Disappointed in the usefulness of the communication ability through email/phone.

Kuala Lumpur to Vienna via Istanbul. Turkish Airlines surpassed my expectations. Both the ground and cabin staff is friendly and competent, I also comtacted the call centre twice before my trip and I were helpful as well. They have a generous luggage policy, on top of my 31 kg checked in suitcase I was also able to take my skis (around 4 kg with the bag) free of charge. In fact, they have a wide range of sport equipment which one can take for free, however I'm not sure whether you can take it on top of your 32 kg free luggage (or whatever you have if you fly business/first) or whether I just got lucky. I also took on both trips, KUL-VIE and return 3 big pieces of carry on luggage and nobody said anything (although I'm sure this is not their official policy). Finally, when I managed to miss my connecting flight from IST to VIE, after I had felt asleep at the airport, they rebooked my flight free of charge, after little convincing. The cherry on the cake is the food - maybe the best plane food I've ever eaten!

Moscow to PanamÃ¡ City via Istambul. I paid for an extra baggage in Moscow to my final destination in Panama City (3 bagagges in total). Since both flights from were operated by Turkish Airlines I was supposed to pick up my lugagge in Panama City. Long story short, they lost one of my bags, it arrived 2 days later. The flight was very comfortable since the seat beside me was empty, the attention was pretty nice as always. Unfortunately the screen in which I was suppossed to have some kind of entertainment had a glitch and even though the crew re strated it, it refused to work.
Panama City to London via Istanbul. Seat 2D in business on a A330-200 and IST-LHR in seat 2B on Boeing 777-300. The A330-200 Business Class seat was not lie-flat

Belgrade to Atlanta via Istanbul. Turkish Airlines are highly tentative to needs of its passengers. I had an amazing meal on short flight from Belgrade to Istanbul, then again excellent choice on a long haul from Istanbul to Atlanta. They have wi-fi which is free for business class and very fast. In other airlines this is charged and you have limitations on how much you use, plus not so consistent quality of connection. Seat is very comfortable and spacious, with nice lighting atmosphere. They give out small artificial candle that flickers. Very nice touch to feel like relaxed. I fly a lot for business and they have amazed me yet again.

Atlanta to Thessaloniki via Istanbul. Everything was amazing. The cabin crew of Turkish Airlines was perfect in every aspect of their duties during the whole flights. Always with a smile, gentle and kind people. Never showed their tiredness during those long flights. The pilots did the best job from every take-off to every landing. The price of the tickets was perfect. The meals were so nice. Just the seats in economy class weren't so comfortable for such a long-haul trip, so next time business class for more comfort. Concerning the airport service it was very good at all airports.

Dushanbe to Istanbul. I will never fly Turkish Airlines again. I was scheduled to depart early on Saturday morning. However, due to snow Turkish Airlines decided not to send the plane from Istanbul to Dushanbe. Despite the fact that FlyDubai and Somon Air both managed to get their flights in and out. If that were not bad enough the next time they said they would be flying was 2 days later on Monday. But it is now Monday and they have had the better part of two days to deal with the snow and the weather is crystal clear in Dushanbe. But is the flight coming on time? No. It is delayed 5.5 hours, assuming it arrives at all. That has destroyed the rest of my itinerary. I am going to have to spend the night in Istanbul as a result in the best case scenario. This is not the first time Turkish has screwed up my travel. Because where I live Turkish is one of a handful of airlines that come in and out, I have used them from time to time, but it will certainly be the last. Way to go Turkish, you have not only lost a customer you have actually gained a foe.

Barcelona a Estambul, y Turkish Airlines reprogramó mi vuelo a Estambul dos veces de 15:00 a 17:00 y luego a las 19:00. Días después también reprogramaron mi vuelo de regreso a Barcelona, ​​del martes por la noche no del miércoles por la mañana. Tuve que cancelar los vuelos por estos cambios y solo me devolvieron el valor de los boletos. Tuve que pagar la tarifa de cancelación del hotel. No dieron ninguna explicación de estos cambios. Inaceptable.

Manchester to Kiev via Istanbul. Flight crew were very good and pleasant and very helpful. Arrived in Kiev 25 mins late, so missed my connection to my destination. Turkish Airlines said it was due to a passenger not arriving for their flight, so the flight from Istanbul to Kiev was delayed. Got to Kiev and my suitcase wheel has been smashed, new suitcase and good quality. Turkish Airlines refuse to take responsibility, complaint made. On return journey I arrived a the airport in Kiev 5 mins late due to severe weather condition in the area of Ukrainian where I staying. Turkish Airlines refused to all allow me on board and then tried to charge me $500 dollars for a return flight plus a penalty charge of 100 Euros because I was late. I later found out that I was actually bumped of the flight because it was over subscribed so the real reason I was not allowed on the plane, was because they had already sold my seat. I have travelled by plane for over 40 years and never have I had my luggage damaged and never have I missed a flight.

Bogotá a Roma vía Estambul. Reservamos los boletos a principios de octubre de 2016 para nosotros 5, como parte de nuestro viaje anual a Alemania. Las ofertas con LH para el vuelo directo BOG-FRA no eran nada interesantes. Siendo titular de la tarjeta Star Gold, prefería viajar con un socio de Star Alliance, y sabiendo que TK comenzó a servir a BOG en mayo de 2016, busqué esta opción, pero los precios a cualquier destino alemán todavía eran bastante altos, así que por pura curiosidad. Estuve buscando los precios para otros destinos europeos. Roma con un precio muy atractivo fue el éxito, por lo que decidimos volar TK vía IST a Italia, quedándonos una noche en IST y una noche en Roma, antes de dirigirnos a FRA con un boleto de Alitalia muy barato. Bogotá a Estambul tiene una escala en la ciudad de Panamá, y el mismo número de vuelo de regreso a BOG desde IST. Así que al abordar el avión en BOG nos encontramos con muchos pasajeros originarios de Estambul con destino a Panamá. Así que el avión estaba repleto en el vuelo corto a Panamá, con muchos pasajeros saliendo del avión en PTY, pero no demasiados pasajeros abordando para volar a Estambul. Esto significó que mi esposa y yo teníamos una fila de 2 asientos para nosotros en el camino durante este largo vuelo de 13 horas. El servicio ofrecido por la tripulación fue impecable, la comida fue muy buena y bien presentada, diría que la mejor que he tenido en Economy hasta ahora. La tripulación estuvo atenta y dispuesta a ayudar en cualquier caso. Durante el largo vuelo, mi esposa voló a su cumpleaños y les pregunté si podían hacer algo por ella. Sonrieron y prometieron organizar una sorpresa. 20 minutos después llegaron junto con el chef a bordo, presentando un pastel muy bien preparado con velas y crema diciendo feliz cumpleaños, champán de clase ejecutiva para los dos y cantándole feliz cumpleaños a ella. El avión llegó a tiempo a IST y realizamos el recorrido por la ciudad que Turkish Airlines ofrece a sus pasajeros de transferencia internacional. Este tour es gratuito y te lleva a los sitios turísticos más importantes de Estambul, e incluye un buen almuerzo. Después de que terminó el recorrido, el guía se quedó en la ciudad con los que no tenían prisa, como nosotros, y nos llevó por algunos lugares más. Vuelo a la mañana siguiente a Roma, con un desayuno abundante y bien presentado, mejor que la mayoría de las comidas de clase ejecutiva intraeuropeas en otras aerolíneas. Viaje de regreso a Colombia en enero con la misma calidad en todos los vuelos, estaba un poco preocupado por nuestro equipaje debido a algunos comentarios aquí sobre equipaje perdido, pero todo llegó a salvo a BOG. Durante la escala de 6 h en el aeropuerto de Atatürk, utilizamos el salón de Turkish Airlines. Un lugar enorme, bien decorado, con excelentes opciones de comida y bebida, buenas duchas y algunos otros trucos como un campo de prácticas electrónico, una mesa de billar, etc. . Ese vuelo estaba totalmente repleto, sin embargo la tripulación nuevamente brindó un gran servicio. No puedo quejarme de la falta de amabilidad y profesionalidad. Dicho esto, sin embargo, tuvimos la suerte de viajar de regreso a BOG una semana después del caos de nieve en el aeropuerto de Atatürk. Probablemente las cosas hubieran sido diferentes para nosotros si hubiéramos viajado unos días antes. En general, recomendamos Turkish Airlines.

Seoul to Istanbul. First time flying with Turkish Airlines and last one. The ticket was very expensive and the flying experience quite bad. Economy class, on the exit row and despite the big leg room, the seats were so uncomfortable (possibly the narrowest I have ever experienced in an 11-hour flight). It was not possible to sleep at all. The seat recline was broken, and my friend's screen (right next to me) was broken too. Reported it to the crew but they did not pay any attention and they did not even try to help.

Manchester to Bangkok via Istanbul. A really good all round experience except for the boarding process at the Istanbul airport which needs to improve however food and drinks were very good as was the onboard service from hard working cabin crew. Turkish Airlines are really good, however their ground staff do let them down from time to time with poor communication skills.

Vilnius to Istanbul. Turkish Airlines excelled in cabin service, catering, aircraft and seat comfort. The departure was on time, aircraft was new (with sky interior lightning) and very clean. There weren't too many passengers. Therefore, there was a free middle seat between me and the other passenger. The seat pitch was fine. In the beginning, I got a chocolate praline. Then we got earbuds (bad quality and shallow sound but it is economy so I am not going to complain) and I managed to watch a full movie during the flight (the screen was pretty large and had good resolution). The food on this short-haul flight was tasty and it included a hot meal (which is rare on European flights) and a complimentary beverage (I recommend Ayran yoghurt and homemade lemonade but you can also take alcoholic drinks). The flight attendants offered tea and coffee. The flight attendants provided top notch service. Overall it was an exceptional experience.

Da Roma a Khartum via Istanbul. Il servizio clienti di Turkish Airlines è estremamente caotico e disorganizzato, la peggiore esperienza di volo che abbia mai avuto. Mi rendo conto che le cattive condizioni meteorologiche (neve) erano fuori dal controllo delle compagnie aeree la notte del 6 gennaio a Istanbul, il servizio e le poche informazioni fornite da TK erano estremamente scadenti e confuse. Subito dopo essere atterrati all'IST, siamo stati informati che tutti i voli erano stati cancellati a causa delle cattive condizioni meteorologiche. Non sono state fornite informazioni o indicazioni chiare e i pochi (maleducati) membri del personale TK presenti all'aeroporto di Ataturk non sembravano interessati / disposti ad assistere i passeggeri su cosa fare. Tutto ciò che ottenevamo erano informazioni sbagliate e il loro personale di terra continuava a mandarci da una scrivania all'altra. Quella prima notte, dopo 4 ore passate in aeroporto per avere qualche informazione, decisi di andare in un albergo pagato da me. La mattina seguente (07 gennaio) siamo stati informati che tutti i voli sono stati nuovamente cancellati a causa della neve e ho dovuto fare la fila per quasi 7 ore alla biglietteria per riprenotare il mio volo per il giorno successivo. Alla fine, ho dovuto prenotare di nuovo l'alloggio da solo, perché c'era un'altra coda estremamente lunga al banco informazioni dell'hotel. L'8 gennaio, il mio volo per KRT ha cancellato ancora e ancora 7 ore di coda per riprenotare il volo. Il terzo giorno sono andato in aeroporto la mattina, questa volta il volo è stato confermato quindi ho fatto il check-in ed sono entrato nell'area partenze dopo il controllo passaporti ma il volo per KRT è stato nuovamente cancellato verso le 16:00 e di nuovo una coda caotica all'aeroporto immigrazione e dopo un'altra coda alla biglietteria per cambiare nuovamente il mio volo, senza aiuto o guida da parte del personale TK. Dopodiché e dopo altre 3 ore di coda per trovare un hotel, sono riuscito ad avere una stanza solo alle 04:00, dato che abbiamo passato del tempo guidando per Istanbul alla ricerca di un hotel gratuito, dato che erano tutti al completo con passeggeri TK bloccati nel città. Il 10 gennaio sono riuscito a partire con un ritardo di due ore. Questa è stata la mia ultima volta che ho volato con Turkish Airlines.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan Dubai'ye. En kötü müşteri hizmetleri. İstanbul'da 6 Ocak gecesi hava / karı anlamak havayollarının kontrolü dışındaydı, ancak hizmet ve bilgi öyle. Uçuşumuz iptal olana kadar yaklaşık 6 saat uçakta kaldık. Uçaktan indiğimizde (Business class yolcular için bile) net bir bilgilendirme ve yönlendirme yapılmadı. Elimizdeki tek şey yanlış bilgiydi ve yer personeli sırf bizden kurtulmak için bizi bir masadan diğerine göndermeye devam etti. Çözümü kendi başıma bulmak için havaalanında 3 saat koştuktan sonra, uçuşumu değiştirmek için bilet gişesinde 6 saat daha beklemek zorunda kaldım (evet, business class ile uçuyorum). Türk Hava Yolları'ndan yiyecek ve su temin edilmedi. Sonunda, otel bilgi masasında 4 saatlik bir kuyruk daha olduğu için konaklama yerini kendim ayırtmak zorunda kaldım. Daha da kötüsü, 8 Ocak'ta yeni uçuşum için check-in yaptığımda neredeyse bagajımı kaybediyorlardı. Bu benim Türk Hava Yolları ile son uçuşum olacak.

Cape Town to Geneva via Istanbul. I had the worst trip with them yesterday. The time spent in flight was alright, food is ok, flight attendants are competent and nice enough and the entertainment is ok. The legroom is a bit tight though. But the transfer at Ataturk airport was an absolute disaster. They had snow 4 days before and still had not recover from it. All flights were delayed, the airport was packed, people were sleeping on the floor - complete chaos. Our flight was delayed every hour without any reason, and nobody at the airport could help us, they were rude and useless, couldn't give a damn about any passengers. After 5 long hours of waiting without any help, finally a boarding gate appeared. We rushed there and suddenly this mass of people rushed to the check in counter and the boarding was delayed. Nobody told us what was happening, we couldn't understand because they were speaking in Turkish, but we finally understood that they were trying to get on board because they had been stuck in Istanbul for four days. I thought we would stay stuck as well for days. We boarded the flight in complete chaos, they tried to change our seats that we booked months ago, the entertainment system crashed, and when we arrived the luggage took forever and was wet.

Da Venezia a Singapore via Istanbul. Entrambi i velivoli erano immacolati (6 mesi) e presentavano l'ultimo prodotto rigido turco a bordo. Nonostante il viaggio nella notte di New York, i voli erano pieni. In qualità di membro Elite, sono stato aggiornato alla classe Business sulla rotta da Istanbul a Singapore. Il cibo rimane uno dei principali punti di forza di ma ho la sensazione che le porzioni siano diventate più piccole (forse sono solo io). Personale di cabina gentile, specialmente il capo cabina sull'A330. Lo chef di bordo sembrava però un po' confuso e inesperto. Le nuove cuffie Denon con cancellazione del rumore fornite sono al di sopra di ciò che offrono i concorrenti nel settore Business. Champagne di buona qualità con ricariche generose. Decollato in orario e atterrato prima del previsto. Wifi gratuito, che ha funzionato benissimo fino a 20 minuti prima dell'atterraggio a Singapore.

Edinburgh to Cape Town via Istanbul. No segregation of business class and economy customers at gate - economy pushed in ahead of the business class customers. No Amenity bag or flat bed on Edinburgh to Istanbul 4hr 25 mins flight. A 3.5 hour delay on the second leg. The business class lounge staff at the front desk are rude and useless and won't give you information. Nice food and wine in the business class lounge but no comfortable day beds or seats that would allow you to recline in comfort. Istanbul to Cape Town rescheduled but at no point shown as boarding on info screens. At boarding we ended up lumped in with economy passengers again. A330 Istanbul to Cape Town a nice new modern plane, flat bed good, Denon headphones supplied, excellent food and wine (although no top-ups offered), staff seemed in a huff (who would not be at 6.30am when flight was due to leave nearly 4 hours prior) and not quite on it. Reluctant service. Only 1 loo for business class and this behind the closely guarded and curtained staff section â€“ you were told to get back behind the curtain if you entered the cabin crew space.

Kuala Lumpur to Istanbul return. The food on the flight was some of the worst. I find the cabin staff can be quite surly. However, had a truly awful experience with their customer service during the return flight, Istanbul was hit by blizzards the afternoon of the evening return flight which caused chaos with cancellations of all flights from all Istanbul airports, unfortunate, not much one can do about the weather. What is deplorable is the experience I have had with their customer service. Given the situation as one can imagine the ticket sales/changes queue at the airport was astronomical with everyone trying to rearrange travel arrangements. Spoke with a THY staff member who said I could rearrange over the phone. Waiting for half an over on the phone reached a customer service representative who informed me that as the KL to Perth flight was with a partner airline and THY they could not complete the booking and I had to go in person to the THY ticket office. So I went to the other airport in Istanbul at 3am in a taxi in a blizzard. Upon arriving at the ticket sales office they said they emailed the partner airline but that we would have to wait for a confirmation response. No indication of time frames. We waited for an hour then a different staff member told us that there was no need for us to wait at the airport and that in fact there was no need for us to have come in person to the airport to do this and the call staff had misinformed us. After getting a few hours sleep I then spent half the day repeatedly calling Turkish Airlines chasing any updates. Eventually I was told that in fact we were on standby with the other airline which was strange as the other airlines website was showing tickets for sale. After tearing my hair out eventually I spoke directly with the original booking travel agent who changed the booking no problem wish I had done that sooner rather than wasting my time with THY. Unfortunately the same issue has happened again with the rebooked flight tonight being cancelled due to weather and I am now going through the entire process again. No one can or will give me a telephone number for the ticket sales office instead I am told that I have to get a taxi, drive an hour each way if I'm lucky in the snow and repeat the crazy process of telling the ticket sales office in person exactly what I've told the call centre for them to lodge the booking request with the other airline and then wait until who knows when for them to get back. I have repeatedly asked to speak to a more senior management staff at the call centre to resolve the issue to be told there is no one more senior. Considering the trip was bought as one continuous flight how on earth THY cannot resolve this from their end with the partner airline beggars belief and why on earth one has to physically go to the ticket office to do this seems illogical and hugely inconvenient.

Αθήνα προς Κέιπ Τάουν μέσω Κωνσταντινούπολης. Τα αεροσκάφη ήταν καθαρά, αλλά η θέση του καθίσματος ήταν τρομερή και ήταν πολύ άβολο να κοιμηθείς. Η πτήση από το IST στη Νότια Αφρική ήταν 10 ώρες 15 λεπτά και κοιμήθηκα πολύ λίγες ώρες. Στην πτήση που πήγαινα είχα ένα κάθισμα στο παράθυρο και ήταν άβολο, στην πτήση της επιστροφής επέλεξα μια σειρά για να κοιμηθώ, αλλά οι αεροσυνοδοί μου χτύπησαν τα πόδια με το τρόλεϊ τους. Το φαγητό και τα ποτά ήταν καλά και το IFE ήταν ευχάριστο. Μια πτήση CPT-IST είχαμε 1 ώρα καθυστέρηση. Παρόλο που η εξυπηρέτηση ήταν καλή, δεν θα το συνιστούσα. Οι ταξιδιώτες τα επιλέγουν λόγω των φθηνών ναύλων τους.

İstanbul'dan Doha'ya.. İstanbul'daki olumsuz hava koşullarına rağmen uçağımız programda kalktı ve bu bir rahatlama oldu. Hızlı yol güvenliği ve dinlenme salonuna geçiş, IST'deki formaliteleri kolaylaştırır. Şaşırtıcı bir şekilde, kapıda TGS tarafından çok iyi organize edilmiş bir biniş prosedürü, yardıma ihtiyacı olan yolcular ve premium yolcular için öncelik sunan kayıtlı anonslar. Yatırılabilir iş koltukları ve dokunmatik ekranlı IFE (el kumandası dahil) ile A321, 4 saatten kısa süren bir uçuş için iyi bir konfor sunar. Ayrılış öncesi içecekler Uçan Aşçı tarafından güler yüzle sunulur. Verilen hediye kesesi de uçuş süresi göz önünde bulundurularak yeterliydi. Uçakta yüksek kalitede ikram. Servis de özenli. Zamanında varış. Doha havaalanı son derece meşgul. TK varış göçmenliği için hızlı geçiş kartı sunabilirdi, biniş kartımla iş şeridini kullanabilsem de oldukça kaotik bir süreçti. Mükemmel genel deneyim.
香港經伊斯坦布爾飛往柏林泰格爾。這是我第一次乘坐土耳其航空的航班，我聽到了正面和負面的評論，因此我對他們在這兩個航班上提供的優質服務感到非常驚訝。工作人員很友好並且願意提供幫助。食物也很棒，食物/甜點的選擇非常特別，而且他們提供不銹鋼餐具。一件事是我在網上提前選擇座位時遇到了問題，但我沒有通過電子郵件收到有用的回复。除此之外，地勤和飛行人員的態度都很好。

Los Angeles to Johannesburg return via Istanbul. We had a nightmarish time making our reservation with Turkish Airlines. After reservation was made and tickets were issued, airlines unexpectedly change our flight time, flight date and flight number, and this happened several times. It caused us having to change hotel and other reservations several times, and having to stay at some cities longer (or shorter). Turkish Airlines also did not notify us or the travel agent about the changes. We were lucky enough to find out only because we were making online seat selections They even moved flight #4 in our travel plan earlier than #3, meaning we would arrive in one city, only to find the next flight we were supposed to catch had already left a few days ago. As for the flights themselves, they were ok. Service was ok, a bit inconsistent on some flights. Some planes were older, others are newer. Cabins and bathrooms were clean, seats were comfortable. Food were enjoyable, although quality was a little inconsistent too. In Turkey airports, you do get special privileges for flying with Turkish Airlines Business Class, so that is something to consider if flying to Turkey.

Amsterdam naar Istanbul met Turkish Airlines. De 3,5 uur durende vlucht werd alleen bedorven door kleine tv's aan het plafond en een defecte koptelefoonaansluiting. Televisies met rugleuning en USB-voeding zouden standaard moeten zijn bij een "premium" luchtvaartmaatschappij. De opgedroogde pasta was ook niet zo geweldig. Een van de twee achterste toiletten was defect.

Bodrum to Istanbul. While the ground staff at the Domestic IST CIP terminal are great in reserving front rows or exit seats for their premium Miles&Smiles members, unfortunately, the TGS ground staff in BJV are the opposite. When I asked politely if I could have a window seat towards the front of the cabin I was handed a boarding card with a seat in the last row with a grin. I then asked if I could do a last minute mileage upgrade. Was first told that it was no problem, then the counter agent contacted her supervisor/colleague which first said that there was availability and that she could process my request but then strangely asked for my name, I could hear the whole conversation over the radio. I guess unless you are a local VIP your commercial value is of little importance. Then suddenly a barrage of invalid excuses followed. First she suggested that my fare class did not allow a last minute upgrade, when I pointed out that was untrue, it was unavailabllity bucket class C, which is also untrue according to M&S rules, finally she said there was a problem with their system, a TGS classic, I was handed out a seat in 6A and did not pursue the matter any further as a line began to form behind me. Not that of a big problem for a 50 minute flight but having had worse problems before, I was reminded once more how TK's ground services and customer service attitude on the ground, bar TK Do&Co, is a total mess. The flights to BJV and to IST were excellent in the air. On time, friendly and attentive cabin crew and detailed flight deck announcements. I wish it was good on the ground as it is in the air.
新加坡飛往伊斯坦布爾並返回。座位有些破舊，但還好。主要問題是機艙極度過熱。我問過幾次他們是否可以降低溫度，但他們從來沒有這樣做。經過 13 個小時的長途跋涉，感覺被煮熟了是非常不愉快的。我無法再乘坐土耳其航班飛行。

İstanbul-Amsterdam dönüşü. Türk Hava Yolları'nın en güzel yanı yemekleriydi. Lezzetli köfte ve biraz pilav ile füme patlıcan harikaydı ve Türk şarabı (kırmızı olan) da iyiydi. Çok yardımcı olan kabin ekibinden çok memnun kaldım. A321 aynı zamanda yeni bir uçaktı. Olumsuz bir şey yoktu.

İstanbul'dan Amsterdam'a. Türk Hava Yolları'ndaki en iyi uçuşlarımdan biriydi. Uçak en yenisi olmasa da (10 yaşında bir A330-200), bu kadar kısa bir rota için yeterince rahattı. Uçuş eğlence sistemi 2 kez dondu ama keyifli bir içeriğe sahip. Bilet ucuzdu, yemekler harikaydı ve 30 kg bagaj hakkı harikaydı.

Vilnius to Buenos Aires via Istanbul. A next-to-perfect experience. VNO-IST a new 737, light load in business, crew attentive. No printed menu, yet good food and a large choice of beverages. In Istanbul, a separate shuttle for business pax getting them to the terminal before the main crowd. Got a complimentary 5* hotel for my layover, yet had to wait for almost an hour before it was arranged (without any crowd at the desk). Another negative point for ground service - staff at Turkish Airlines lounge in Istanbul was unable to handle any reservation change, been told to go to transfer desk (which is in the arrivals area and would thus need to re-clear security to get back to departures). Istanbul to Buenos Aires a slightly worn Boeing 777, yet full recline seat. Great attentive staff, printed menu, food was great and plentiful - two full services, one light (sandwiches) plus an ample choice of self-service items. Despite a dedicated wine list being presented, had to explicitely request wine, crew never offered it. Free wifi for business passengers is a great plus as well, although the connection was faltering at some moments. Onboard experience was thus almost spotless, ground experience much less so - at Buenos Aires, first priority/business luggage was delivered more than 20 minutes after the delivery started. Fellow business pax already started to worry. On the overall, a very nice experience, outstanding value for money given the price paid.

Ankara'dan İstanbul'a Türk Hava Yolları ile. Verimli check-in ve düzenli biniş. Uçakta ürün, tam düz koltuklar ve çok fazla alan ile iyiydi. IFE'nin yenilenmesi gerekiyor, ancak bunun dışında çok çeşitli film ve müzik seçenekleriyle gayet iyi. Yumuşak ürünün cilalanması gerekir. Kalkıştan sonra içecek seçimim istendi ve teslim edildiğinde kahvem en iyi ihtimalle ılıktı. FA herkese öğle yemeği verdi ama beni tamamen görmezden geldi. Sorulduğunda, cevap şaşırtıcı bir "Sanırım unuttum" oldu. Uçak içi ikram hizmetleriyle gurur duyan ve Avrupa'nın en iyisi olmakla övünen bir havayolu şirketi için bu şok edici ve kesinlikle kabul edilemez bir yanıttı. Uçuş zamanında kalktı ve zamanında geldi ve IST kullanan çoğu uçuşta olduğu gibi terminale otobüsle götürüldük. Son 2 ayda 12 kez Türk Hava Yolları ile uçtum ve bu açık ara en hayal kırıklığı yaratan deneyimdi.

Boston to Mumbai via Istanbul. I travel a lot of airlines between Boston and Bombay, and the tickets with Turkish Airlines were significantly cheaper. For the most part Turkish Airlines is average. The Istanbul airport layout leaves a lot to be desired but is made up by the food (Pistachio Icecream and Lamb). My complaint is with their Customer service which is abysmal. I needed to delay my departure because my Father-in-law was very ill. They had no Customer Service in India. I called their HQ and even though I selected the English option, they continued to talk in Turkish. I then called the US office (might as well). They gave a price 3 times my original fare just to change the dates ($2000 per ticket - my original fare was $850). To top it all, they will not accept credit cards. I would have to mail them a "check" and when they got it they would change it if there was availability!

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul Münih dönüş yolculuğu. Başlangıçta 11 Cuma günü MUC'ye geri uçmayı planladığımız için daha önce uçuşlarımızı TK ana sayfası aracılığıyla yeniden rezerve etmeye çalıştık. Ne yazık ki, TKÂ'nın Türkiye'deki ana sayfası ("eski sürüm") Almanya'dakinden ("yeni sürüm") farklıdır. Bir uçuşu yeniden rezerve etmeye çalışırsanız veya çevrimiçi check-in'inizi eski sürümde yaparsanız, program sizi nirvana'ya gönderecektir. Bu nedenle, ağır bir yeniden rezervasyon ücreti alan, düşmanca ve pişmanlık duymayan bir büro memurunun yardımıyla, uçuşu yeniden rezerve etmek için Taksim Meydanı'ndaki belediye ofislerine giderek yarım günümüzü boşa harcadık. Online check-in için Taksim Meydanı ofisini tekrar denedik ve kapalı olduğu ortaya çıktı, ancak Harbiye'de yakınlarda başka bir ofis olduğunu öğrenecek kadar şanslıydık. biniş kartlarımızı yazdırın - TK, gizem dolu bir havayolu. Pazar günü, Atatürk Havalimanı'ndaki güvenlik/pasaport kontrolleri, genel aşırı kalabalığa ve check-in alanındaki TK yer personelinin cana yakın ve yardımsever olmasına rağmen şaşırtıcı derecede verimli. 206 numaralı kapıya gittik ve varış noktasını veya programlanmış biniş zamanını belirten hiçbir bilgi ekranı olmadığını gördük. Biniş planlanan saatten 30 dakika sonra başladı
München nach Istanbul. Das Flugzeug startete mit fast 40 Minuten Verspätung

عمان إلى بوغوتا عبر اسطنبول. بينما كانت رحلة عمان إلى اسطنبول قصيرة وبدأت المشاكل الهادئة بمجرد وصولك إلى مطار أتاتورك. ربما لا يكون هذا خطأ شركة الطيران ولكن المطار غير قادر بأي حال من الأحوال على التعامل مع الكثير من حركة المرور. صالة TK كبيرة وتوفر الكثير ، فهي مزدحمة للغاية الآن لدرجة أنها لا تشعر بالتميز حيالها - تشعر أنك عالق في محطة حافلات مزدحمة صاخبة. تعد خدمة wifi مزحة وتستمر في قطع الاتصال على الأرجح عن العدد الكبير جدًا من الأشخاص الذين يحاولون استخدام الخدمة. كانت الطائرات المستخدمة في بوجوتا هي طائرات A330 قديمة مع مقاعد درجة الأعمال على الطراز القديم مما يعني عدم الاستلقاء على أسرة مسطحة في رحلة مدتها 15 ساعة. الطاقم (الذي تصادف أن يكون نفس الطاقم على متن الرحلة ذهابًا وإيابًا) تحدث القليل جدًا من اللغة الإنجليزية وكان شبه آلي في سلوكهم. كان الطعام مقبولًا ولم يكن رائعًا كما توحي بعض المراجعات. أعطاني ما يسمى بـ "الطاهي الطائر" نظرة مندهشة عندما استفسرت عما إذا كان بإمكاني تناول إفطاري قبل ساعتين من الهبوط في بوغوتا!

İstanbul'dan Katmandu'ya. Türk Hava Yolları'ndan beklentim çok yüksekti çünkü business class'taki koltuklar çok büyüktü ve Catering (by Do&Co) Koltukları çok geniş, rahat, kaliteli bir uyku çekmek mümkün. Ancak battaniyeler ve yastıklar çok küçük (iyileştirme için yer) / Yemek çok saçma - Her şey bir tepsideydi (ana yemek hariç) Ana yemek bir arabadan servis edildi. Bir saatlik uçuştan sonra şampanya yok.

Chicago to Istanbul. Quick and smooth check-in at Chicago airport. Given a lounge invitation. Priority boarding. Onboard the seats very comfortable. Welcome drink offered, opted for Champagne which was of great quality. Hot towel was given. Choice of magazines/ newspapers. Jaguar amenity kit given with excellent products. Soon after take of plenty of appetizers offered, followed by delicious pumpkin soup, main course, desserts and tea/coffee. Bed was made and had good night sleep. Breakfast orders were taken soon after take off. Before landing excellent breakfast was offered with fresh orange juice. Landed before time. Could not find any fault at all during entire flight.
London to Hanoi via Istanbul. Hard product on both legs was faulty, no IFE on 14 hour second sector between IST and HAN

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul-Bodrum seferi. Mobil check-in ve koltuk seçimi kusursuz çalıştı. IST'deki yurtiçi CIP alt terminali büyük kolaylık sağlamakta ve zamandan tasarruf sağlamaktadır. Yurtiçi dinlenme salonu, yurt içi seyahatler için yeterlidir ve genellikle oldukça yoğun olmasına rağmen iyi bir konfor sunar. Uzak stantta uçağa götürüldü ve planlandığı gibi kapıları kapattı. Kalkıştan önce sunulan içecekler ve 55 dakikalık bir uçuş için üç çeşitli yemek (lezzetli bir sıcak ana yemek dahil) servis edildi. Mürettebat güler yüzlü ve özenliydi ve dolu bir kabin olmasına rağmen çok iyi bir hizmet seviyesi sunuyordu. Bodrum'da J Pax'a sunulan terminale çok yumuşak bir iniş ve CIP otobüs transferi. Türk Hava Yolları tarafından karada ve havada genel olarak mükemmel yurt içi hizmet. Çok mutlu bir müşteri.

İstanbul'dan Almatı'ya dönüş her iki uçuşu da normal 737-900 yerine eski bir 737-800 ile daha önce bu rotada deneyimledim. Gidiş uçuşu bir gecelik uçuştur ve yemek uçuşun erken saatlerinde servis edilerek yolcuların yolculuğun geri kalanında uyumasına olanak tanır. Koltuğun rahatlığı dışında deneyim iyiydi. Çıkış koltuğunda olduğum için diz mesafesi harikaydı ama koltuk çok sert, bu da 5 saatlik bir yolculuk için çok rahatsız. Birkaç gün sonra dönüş uçuşu aynı (belki de aynı) bir uçaktaydı. 6 saatlik dönüş uçuşunun başlangıcında sıcak bir kahvaltı (aslında çok soğuktu) ve ardından birkaç saat sonra bazı içecekler servis edildi. Bu kadar uzun bir yolculuk için, uçuşun sonlarına doğru hafif bir içecek ve daha sıcak bir yemek sunulmasını beklerdim. Her iki uçuşta da mürettebatın çoğu, gülümseyen ve yardımsever görünen Kazakistanlı gibi görünen bazıları dışında, yolculara karşı çok kayıtsız ve umursamazdı. Atatürk Havalimanı'na inerken uçağın tavanından (belki de eriyen buzdan) su benim ve önümdeki yolcunun üzerine akmaya başladı. İkimiz de pencerenin yanındaki çıkış sırasındaki koltuklara oturduk. Bu sırada inişe çok yakın olduğumuz için yerimden kalkmam mümkün olmadı, bu yüzden kendimi sudan korumak için yastık ve battaniye kullanmak zorunda kaldım. Önümüzde bulunan uçakta meydana gelen bir kuş çarpması nedeniyle, başka bir iniş yaklaşımı yapmak için keskin bir şekilde yükselmek zorunda kaldık. Güvenli bir şekilde iniş yapmadan önce on dakika daha uçtuk. Bu olay sırasında pilot iletişimi çok kabul edilebilirdi ve bu memnuniyet vericiydi. Uçuş görevlisine su sızıntısı hakkında çıkarken tavsiyede bulundum ve kıyafetlerim bana bunun bazen olduğunu söyledi - müşteriye karşı çok kötü bir tutum. Gelecekte muhtemelen bu rota için başka bir taşıyıcı düşüneceğim. TK'nin bu kadar uzun bir yolculukta bu kadar eski bir uçağı kullanmasına ve kabin ekibinin tavrına şaşırdım. çok hayal kırıklığı

Da Milano a Bangkok via Istanbul. Check-in agevole all'aeroporto di Milano con personale di terra cordiale. Volo per Istanbul in un nuovo A321 con intrattenimento personale in volo (anche in classe economica). Il cibo era abbastanza e gustoso. Bevande servite frequentemente e molte opzioni (bevande alcoliche incluse). Il volo sull'A330-300 per Bangkok andava bene, ma lo spazio per le gambe era un po' limitato. La mia ragazza ha optato per un pasto vegetariano preordinato, che ha funzionato perfettamente su entrambi i voli.

Amsterdam naar Kuala Lumpur via Istanboel. Het goede aan vliegen met Turkish Airlines was het eten - eetbaar en heerlijk. Verbeterpunt: de klantenservice van het cabinepersoneel is over het algemeen slecht. Ze deden alsof ze lachten als je aan boord stapte en ze lachten helemaal niet als ze eten serveerden, en ze reageerden halfslachtig als passagiers om hulp vroegen.

Von Zürich nach Bogota über Istanbul. Turkish Airlines ist aufgrund ihres guten Angebots zwischen Istanbul und europäischen Städten vielleicht die beste in Europa, aber ihr hartes Angebot auf Langstreckenstrecken ist sehr veraltet und schrecklich. Besonders beim A330-200. Die Flugzeuge sind alt, schmutzig und die Sitze oft kaputt. Um das Ganze abzurunden, funktionierte die Bordunterhaltung bei einem 13-stündigen Flug nicht. Eine Fluggesellschaft sollte konsistent sein und in der gesamten Flotte das gleiche harte Produkt in der C-Klasse anbieten. Ihre Flugbegleiter sind frech und verfügen nicht über die Professionalität anderer Fluggesellschaften der Star Alliance. Ich finde das Essen sehr überbewertet, tatsächlich ist fast alles fast kitschig, angefangen von der Präsentation der Speisekarte bis zum Abendessen mit der falschen Kerze. Dieser Fluggesellschaft fehlt die „Finesse“ ihrer größten europäischen Konkurrenten.
