Als ich meinen Sitznachbarn, der aus Osteuropa stammt und jetzt in Panama lebt, fragte, warum er nicht mit anderen Fluggesellschaften fliege, antwortete er schlicht: „Der Preis gefällt mir.“ Seine Antwort erklärte mir tatsächlich alles. Sie bekommen, wofür Sie bezahlen! In Zukunft werde ich mehr bezahlen und lieber in sauberen und gepflegten Flugzeugen anderer Fluggesellschaften sitzen, deren Service und Image etwas geschliffener ist.

Montréal à Téhéran via Istanbul. Je dois dire que les produits et services sont corrects. Par exemple, l'IFE est OK (mais les écrans tactiles ne répondent pas rapidement). Les sièges sont confortables. L'espace pour les jambes est correct. La nourriture est très bonne (cependant, une fois que nous avons eu de la nourriture 3 heures après un vol de nuit long-courrier). Les prix sont abordables. Cependant, le service client est terrible, je me souviens de 4-5 interactions terribles avec le personnel de la compagnie aérienne à diverses occasions (hôtesses de l'air, personnel de l'aéroport, billetterie). L'aéroport d'Atatürk n'est pas bien équipé. Vous n'aurez même pas accès au wifi. Je ne recommande pas cette compagnie aérienne si vous allez avoir un long temps de connexion à cet aéroport. Dans l'ensemble, la compagnie aérienne fournit des services OK. Si vous trouvez un prix très abordable et temporaire, cela en vaut la peine.

İstanbul'dan Gatwick'e. Salondaki bazı yeni sağlıklı yemek seçenekleri çok makbule geçti. Hem Gözen Güvenlik hem de kapıdaki TGS, aileler ve Status/J Pax için öncelik uyguladı. Organize biniş ve zamanında kalkış. Bu rotada sürekli olarak 2x2 koltuklu 737'ler veya A321'ler alıyorum ki bu Avrupa'nın en iyi ticari zor ürünü. IFE, en son gişe rekorları kıran filmlere ve etkileşimli 3B uçuş haritasına sahipti. Yemekler iyi sunuldu ve lezzetliydi, kılıç balığı broşunun tadını çıkardım, ancak porsiyonlar biraz daha küçülmüş gibi görünüyor. Mürettebat ve gemideki Şef proaktif ve gülümsüyordu. Programın ilerisinde geldi ve 30 dakikadan daha kısa sürede Gatwick Ekspresindeydi. İşler iyi gittiğinde, TK gerçekten Avrupa'nın en iyisidir.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan Washington'a IAD. Başka bir Star Alliance ortağıyla statü eşleştirmesi yapmaya çalıştım. Star Alliance Havayolumun üretemediği plastik kartın bir kopyasında ısrar ettiler. My Star Alliance havayolu şirketi bunun mümkün olmadığını belirtti. TA'nın mil ve gülümseme programı web sitesinin kullanımı imkansız ve yavaş.

Hannover to Dubai via Istanbul. Once again a quite good experience. All 4 flights in time, in two cases landing ahead of schedule. Check in took a bit long in Hannover, and I wonder why online check in is provided but no baggage drop counter. Aircraft all clean, crew was friendly and food for economy class was good. Enterntainment system ok, just the provided headphones are not very comfortable. Transfer in Istanbul on both ways efficient. Can recommend Turkish Airlines, not sure if they are Europes number one but for sure they are among the best.
曼谷經伊斯坦布爾飛往威尼斯。雙腿上都有新飛機，配備最新的硬質產品，一如既往的美味食物。伊斯坦布爾至威尼斯航線上的空乘人員是我在航班上遇到過的最好的空乘人員之一：年輕、禮貌、非常專業、面帶微笑。土耳其航空仍然是我在歐洲和亞洲之間旅行的唯一選擇。

Birmingham to Cape Town via Istanbul and Durban. BHX to IST a comfortable B737-800 with fairly good leg space. Food was okay. Cabin crew weren't very enthusiastic. IFE was a bit difficult to work as touch screen wasn't very responsive. Choice of movies was okay. Was shocked to see many passengers get up to collect their cabin luggage while plane was still taxiing on arrival in Istanbul and cabin crew did nothing except tell them to sit down over the speaker. Istanbul to Cape Town via Durban a new A330-300, much better IFE although seat would not recline and very uncomfortable for a 12 hour flight to CPT, including a 1 hour layover in Durban. Fortunately we did not have to disembark in Durban. Food quality was the same as previous flight. Appreciated the amenities (toothbrush, socks.etc) given on this long haul flight as this is not always provided for on other airlines. Cabin crew friendlier on this sector. Flight was punctual on arrival in CPT. Return flight CPT-IST via Durban on an A330-300. More experienced crew and friendlier than previous flights. Same food quality and almost exactly same menu. IST to BHX on a B737-800. Boarding was disorganized and painfully slow which caused a slight delay in the flight. Lack of adequate airport facilities at Istanbul a contributing factor. Same breakfast served as on previous flight. Overall, not a great experience but considering it was cheapest ticket available I accept the outcome. Service and product quality nowhere near as advertised. Food menu was repetitive on all flight and cabin crew not always professional with not very fluent English.

Johannesburg to Montreal via Istanbul. Check in at JNB was uneventful. Turkish Airlines uses the SAA lounge which is pretty ordinary but food choices are extensive. Boarding was delayed due to late arrival of the inbound aircraft but was conducted in an orderly manner. Onboard, the aircraft looked well kept and the FA's were friendly and spoke very good English. Food and wine quality were good but I would have liked to have a few South African wines. Dinner and drink service was very slow and it took us over three hours to get to desert once we were airborne. The aircraft on the JNB-IST leg did not have wifi and although the IFE had a large selection of movies, it was on the skinny side when it came to new releases. Flight landed on time and with almost every flight we were bussed to the terminal. Spent a few hours in the Istanbul lounge which is well and truly an amazing experience with a very large array of food and beverage offerings. Boarding on the second leg was absolutely chaotic and TK should be ashamed of putting their premium passengers through that ordeal. Once again we were bussed to the aircraft. The second A330 was brand new and the crew and their service were outstanding. I felt pampered throughout the 10 hour flight and was able to catch 3 hours of very comfortable rest in the lie flat seats. The WiFi on the second leg did not work despite the pursers countless efforts to get it up and running. The food on the second leg was superior to the first which likely was related to catering being done out of TK's hub in Istanbul. The flight landed on time but the luggage delivery was slow with priority bags coming out towards the end. Turkish offers a very good business class product on long-haul routes and I would not hesitate to use them again. They must however improve boarding and gate arrangements in IST which are deplorable.

Da Venezia a Kuala Lumpur via Istanbul, primo volo un volo A321 in overbooking. In qualità di membro Elite, sono stato aggiornato alla classe Business al gate. Apprezzo la configurazione 2-2 Business class che Turkish Airlines ha sulla maggior parte dei suoi A321. Fa la differenza rispetto ad altri vettori europei. I pasti erano fantastici come al solito, champagne generosamente disponibile. Lo chef a bordo era gentile e attento, altrimenti il ​​servizio era un po' frettoloso. Da Istanbul a Kuala Lumpur su un nuovo A330-300. Fattore di carico piuttosto basso su questo segmento, ho avuto la possibilità di prendere due posti di emergenza tutti per me. Il servizio in generale è molto buono, ha fatto una lunga chiacchierata con l'equipaggio di cabina sul retro dell'aereo, sembravano gentili e amichevoli. La mia valigia è arrivata in Malesia danneggiata ma è stata ritirata a casa mia, riparata e riconsegnata dalla stessa Turkish Airlines in meno di 24 ore.

Edinburgh to Kansai via Istanbul. Both flights were comfortable and left and arrived on time. Edinburgh to Istanbul on a modern Boeing 737, Istanbul to Kansai on an older A330. Leg room was just about adequate on both flights - I'm 1.92m tall. Food was good and plentiful, entertainment on the A330 was of poor quality - both the screen and the sound were a bit snowy.

دبي إلى أمستردام عبر Istanbul SAW. غادرت في وقت متأخر في DXB. عند الصعود إلى الطائرة ، كانت المقصورة ساخنة تمامًا وكانت الرحلة بأكملها غير مريحة. تمكنا من اللحاق برحلتنا إلى AMS على الرغم من أننا كنا نركض إلى البوابة. 20 دقيقة ++ كنا ما زلنا على الأرض وأثناء النظر إلى نافذتنا رأيت أمتعتي بالإضافة إلى أمتعة أصدقائي ملقاة خارج طائرتنا ، حتى عادت طائرتنا إلى الوراء ، تمكنت من التقاط صورة لها. عند وصولنا إلى أمستردام ، لم تخرج أمتعتنا من الناقل وأعلنت أنها أمتعة أسيء التعامل معها. لم يتحدث إلينا موظفو المعارف التقليدية المباشرون ، ولم يتم توفير وسائل الراحة لاستخدامها أثناء وجودنا في أمستردام لأننا لسنا غير مقيمين.

São Paulo para Bangkok via Istambul com a Turkish Airlines. Nas últimas 3 semanas, eles mudaram nossos voos 5 vezes com apenas uma notificação por e-mail. Nenhuma alteração nos voos de conexão, portanto, se eu não ligasse, não haveria voo de conexão. O atendimento ao cliente deles age como se estivesse fazendo um favor ao mudar de voo. Nenhuma resposta a uma reclamação feita pela internet há 2 semanas. Eu usei mais de 20 companhias aéreas e esta empresa parece ser a Fawlty Towers das companhias aéreas. Primeira e última vez que reservo com eles. Leva mais de um mês para receber um reembolso se você não quiser alterar os horários dos voos a cada poucos dias. Eu acredito que você tem que ligar para a Turquia para que isso aconteça.

عمان إلى تورنتو عبر اسطنبول. يعني الذهاب إلى عمّان التوقف لمدة 10 ساعات ثم العودة إلى تورنتو لمدة 9.45 ساعة ، وكلا الطريقتين نسافر فيهما للعمل وهو ما يعني فندقًا أو غرفة لمدة ساعتين في صالة الأعمال حيث يمكنك أخذ قيلولة والاستحمام. في كلا الاتجاهين تم رفض الفندق أو غرفة لمدة ساعتين. لم نكن وحدنا - كان الشيء نفسه يحدث للأشخاص الذين يسافرون من وإلى جوهانسبرج. يبدو أن الخطوط الجوية التركية تقدم رحلات توقف طويلة ولا تمنح المستهلكين خيار التوقف لفترة أقصر ثم محاصرتهم في مطار إسطنبول. يحتوي هذا المطار على بعض من أكثر متاجر السوق الحرة تضخمًا التي رأيتها على الإطلاق. ابحث عن الرحلات الجوية بعناية على الرغم من أن الخطوط الجوية التركية لا تقدم توقفات أقصر عند الانتقال من وإلى الوجهات ، هناك أشخاص يضطرون لقضاء أكثر من نصف يوم في مطار إسطنبول. هذا ليس صحيحا. لقد سافرت 8 ساعات وما زلت 8 ساعات أخرى قبل اللحاق برحلة مدتها 14 ساعة إلى كندا.

İstanbul'dan Singapur'a Bu sefer düzensiz biniş. Uzak durmak için oldukça uzun otobüs yolculuğu. Yalan daireler ve kapsamlı IFE ile A330, ancak yerleşik Wifi yok. Uçakta ikram, kapsamlı ve önemli bir lÃ  TK tarzıydı. Kabin ekibi çalışkandı ve genel olarak iyi düzeyde hizmet verdiler. Neredeyse planlandığı gibi geldi, Changi'deki yoğun trafiğe biraz gecikti. Genel olarak, TK ile başka bir sağlam uzun mesafeli uçuş.

Kilimanjaro to London Heathrow via Istanbul. My route on the way to Tanzania wasn't too bad, although my friends bag did get lost. On the way home it was a terrible 24 hours. We got to Kilimanjaro airport early and then when it came to check in three people from my group including myself weren't on the list to fly! We had to wait till after check in had closed for someone to drive to the airport with a different list, during this time we were told nothing we had no idea if we would definitely be on that flight. We finally got through and then very quickly had to go through security again and wait to board. We had a two hour wait even though our plane had arrived - we got given no information. I hadn't had a drink in over 4 hours due to the fact you can't take liquids into the airport and then the only place I could buy a drink I was only there for a minute until I had to move again into somewhere we couldn't take liquids. They had moved some people up to business class and then after about an hour took in everyones tickets and got them reprinted, back to economy. Finally once we were on and then arrived at Istanbul, due to the fact we were 2 hours late one of my friends travelling with us had missed her next flight. Throughout the whole journey she was asking for help, she was literally on the back seat of the plane and wouldn't allow her to be one of the first to get off so she was the last person off. We then had to wait for a bus to take us to the airport. Once there we tried to find someone to help her, she asked someone who sent her to somewhere you go if you didn't have a boarding pass - this wasn't the issue (causing her to be even later). We asked 5 people at the airport for help and the staff were all rude saying 'I'm busy' and walking off. Eventually we found someone who told her where to go but it was too late she had missed her flight. I then got on my next plane to Heathrow, once landed at 4.30 I went to collect my luggage, I waited an hour and a half for them to then say 'That's all the bags.' Which meant 6 out of 7 people I was with didn't have their rucksacks. We all went over to lost luggage and there we got told all our bags weren't on the flight and that they were on the next flight coming from Istanbul. If we had been told this earlier it wouldn't have been as big an issue yet we waited an hour and half and parking at an airport isn't cheap! There was no communication at all. We got told we could wait till the next flight came in which was gone 9 in the evening or get our bags delivered to us in a few days. I opted for getting my bag delivered as my parents would have had to pay a fortune on parking else. Not happy at all, such a long tiring day with no communication. The one positive note I have is that the landing in London was very smooth!

Montréal à Istanbul sur Turkish Airlines. L'enregistrement a été effectué par un agent au sol et non par un membre du personnel de Turkish Airlines. C'était un peu lent car je voulais que mon sac soit enregistré uniquement à Istanbul et non à ma destination finale. Turkish utilise un salon affilié à Montréal qui était rempli de places debout seulement, alors je suis parti et je me suis dirigé vers le salon Air Canada qui était très calme. L'embarquement a été lent avec des passagers d'affaires et d'autocar traités en même temps mais dans des files d'attente différentes. De plus, les passagers attendaient dans la passerelle car l'équipage n'était pas prêt. À bord, l'avion avait l'air neuf. Les FA étaient courtois et parlaient un anglais correct. Le siège allongé était confortable mais étroit et l'équipage s'est transformé en lit en utilisant un matelas et une couette. Le service était rapide et la nourriture et les boissons, y compris le champagne, étaient de grande qualité. IFE avait une riche sélection de films et l'écran était d'une taille décente. La connectivité Wi-Fi était excellente. Le vol est parti à l'heure et est arrivé en avance sur l'horaire. Dans l'ensemble, c'était un produit de classe affaires solide.

Amsterdam naar Johannesburg via Istanboel. Zeer goede service en ik zou geen klachten hebben als het niet voor de ongemakkelijke en krappe zitplaatsen was. Niet geschikt voor iemand langer dan 1.85m. Verder graag met Turkish Airlines vliegen, vluchten waren op tijd, het eten en drinken zijn erg goed, misschien hebben hun A330's een opknapbeurt nodig.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan Toronto'ya. Yemekler mükemmel. Kabin ekibi, uçtuğum birçok havayolundan daha cana yakın. Hiç sorun yaşamadım ve uçuşlar neredeyse her zaman zamanında oluyor. Kanada'ya direkt uçuşları seviyorum. Ekonomi sınıfı koltuklar biraz daha rahat olabilirdi ama genel olarak mutlu bir müşteri.

Von Zürich nach Istanbul mit Turkish Airlines. Tolle Vertragslounge im ZRH (Aspire), betrieben von Swissport, mit einer Terrasse, von der aus man tolle Flugzeugbeobachtungen machen kann. Das Angebot war auch viel besser als in der Senator-Lounge, die Erbsenzähler müssen wie üblich in der LH-Gruppe hart arbeiten. Pünktliche Abreise und ordnungsgemäßes Einsteigen. 2x2 Business-Bestuhlung, IFE und sehr geschätztes Qualitäts-Catering. Während man in einer Metallröhre mit wenig Ablenkung fliegt, ist es schön, ein gutes Essen serviert zu bekommen. Der Bordkoch war aufmerksam und die Hühnchen-Papillotte war sehr gut. Anschließend kann man sogar eine Tasse türkischen Kaffee genießen. Geplante Ankunft in IST. Ein großes Lob an TGS, da der CIP-Bus für einen schnellen Transfer zum Terminal verfügbar war (und dieses Mal nur für J-Personen). Die neuen Kopfhörer scheinen von minderer Qualität zu sein, ein kleines Problem auf einer ansonsten sehr zufriedenstellenden TK-Reise.

Niamey to London Heathrow via Istanbul. What a hectic night. We sat on the plane on the tarmac for two and a bit hours because they lost an oxygen tank and couldn't find a new one. They then cancelled our flight and stuck us back in the terminal. Then the heavens opened. Obviously the best option was to stick 200 grumpy passengers outside in the thunder, lightning and rain. Next, they took us 4 at a time in taxis to an hotel. My wife and I were put into what appeared to be the remnant of a much hated Toyota Corrolla. We hung out there for a bit with a guy who spoke no English whatsoever. Once he left us alone in his car and we realised we were going nowhere we accosted a man with a Turkish airlines jacket in a dark car park (still raining). He put us on a bus which proceeded to tour Niamey at 3:00am with the AC on full blast which helped our wet cloths become much more effective in helping us contract some illness. Finally after messing about for a total 6 hours, at 4:00am we got a hotel which makes faulty towers look like New York's Waldorf hotel. There we were left in the hands of the Receptionist. What he lacked linguist ability and clarity of speech he made for in volume and repetition. Needless to say information about our fate was lacking. At around around 7:30am a rumour spread that our suffering may end by 8:00pm that evening. Finally at 8:00pm we were herded into a bus and taken to the airport. There, the Turkish Airlines staff directed us to line up and walk around Niamey airport. At the departure gate our boarding passes and baggage tags were handed out. Once we finally boarded the aircraft most of us passed out with exhaustion for the rest of our journey. Needless to say this is a journey we will not forget in a hurry.

İstanbul'dan Zürih'e. IST'de rahat ve yüksek standartta dinlenme salonu ve hızlı yol erişimi. Yer hizmetleri sağlayıcısı TGS de iyi halden. Aileler ve statü/iş Yolcuları için uygulanan öncelik ile zamanında uçağa biniş. Mürettebat tarafından sıcak bir karşılama ve uçuş güvertesinden iyi bir İngilizce ile bilgilendirici anons. İsteğe bağlı IFE ve geniş bir içerik yelpazesi ile uygun 2x2 business class koltuklar. 3 servisli uçak içi ikram her zamanki gibi çok iyi. Kabin ekibi, yeniden doldurma konusunda biraz daha proaktif olabilir. ZRH'de programın ilerisinde indi. Türk Hava Yolları, diğer Avrupa Taşıyıcılarına kıyasla çok rekabetçi bir ürün ve premium bir ürün sunuyor.

İstanbul'dan Odessa'ya. Yemen veya Kırgızistan'a gitmeniz gerekiyorsa Türk Hava Yolları bir nimettir. Nispeten yeni bir uçak filosuna ve İstanbul'da harika bir iş salonuna sahipler. Ancak, herhangi bir seyahat sorununuz varsa, bu modernite kaplamasının hızla kaybolabileceği konusunda uyarmalıyım. Yüzeyin altında bürokratik bir organizasyon yatıyor ve İstanbul üzerinden bağlantınız Münih bağlantınız gibi olmayacak. Somurtkan personel, kirli banyolar ve genel rahatsızlık. Bir uçuşu kaçırırsanız ve bir gece kalmak zorunda kalırsanız, eksiksiz bir Türkiye deneyimine sahip olabilirsiniz. Bu nedenle, Tahran'a aceleyle gitmeniz gerekiyorsa, Türkçe en iyi seçiminizdir.

Bruxelles à New York JFK via Istanbul avec Turkish Airlines. TK est connu comme le meilleur transporteur européen, mais à notre avis, ce n'est pas le cas. Il n'y avait pas assez d'espace pour nos jambes, 2/3 de la nourriture servie n'était pas de bon goût pour les passagers ouest-européens. Lors du premier vol de BRU à IST, l'écran ne fonctionnait pas et il n'a pas été possible de le faire fonctionner. Points positifs, la sélection de films que j'ai pu apprécier sur le deuxième vol depuis IST-JFK.

İstanbul'dan San Francisco'ya. Çalışanlar iyi İngilizce konuşamıyor veya anlamıyor. Yanımızda bir bebeğimiz vardı ve ayrıldığımızda beşikli bir koltuk ayırdık. Bize ailecek aynı sırada yer vermediler ama en azından beşiği alalım dedim. Kapıda bizim için yanlış biniş kartı bastıkları görüldü, bu da bizim için güvenliği karmaşık hale getirdi ve tüm bunlardan sonra beşik koltuğunu kaybetmemize neden oldu. Şimdi bebeği koyacak beşik olmadan, birbirinden ayrı 13 saatlik bir uçuşun acısını çekmek zorunda kaldık.

من بيروت إلى مالطا عبر اسطنبول. كان الفريق ودودًا للغاية في كل من الرحلات الجوية ، والرحلات في الوقت المحدد تقريبًا. قم أولاً بتوصيل طائرة كبيرة بخيارات ترفيهية متعددة. المشروبات كانت مقبولة. المقاعد وفقًا للمعيار العادي للدرجة الاقتصادية ولكن طائرة التوصيل الثانية إلى مالطا كانت صغيرة والمقاعد ضيقة جدًا. لا يوجد ترفيه متاح على هذه الرحلة.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul-Bodrum seferi. Öncelik sayacını kullanarak check-in yaptım ve hızla salona gittim. Sabahın o saatinde salon kalabalık ve gürültülüydü. Sunulan yiyecekler oldukça iyiydi ve düzenli olarak yenileniyordu. İstanbul'da sık görülen bir olay gibi görünen otobüsle uçağa bindi. Uçak, her koltukta ayrı IFE ekranlarıyla yeniydi. Ayak mesafesi 1,77 boyundaki biri için bile yetersizdi. Uçak içi servis hızlıydı ve içinde sandviç, sos ve puding bulunan bir atıştırmalık kutusundan oluşuyordu. Kokpitten ve servis direktöründen düzenli anonslar geliyordu. İngilizce anlayacak kadar iyiydi. Uçuş zamanında geldi ve bagaj teslimi hızlıydı. Genel olarak iyi bir deneyim.

Da Roma a Città del Capo via Istanbul con Turkish Airlines. Volo eccellente e puntuale da Roma a Istanbul con Turkish Airlines, con buon cibo, servizio eccellente e veri posti in business class. L'aeroporto Attaturk di Istanbul è in costruzione e quindi molto disordinato. Difficile trovare BC-lounge. L'aereo A340 per Città del Capo era in riparazione e quindi si era imbarcato con un'ora di ritardo all'hangar con un'altra ora di attesa all'interno dell'aereo. Arrivo con un'ora di ritardo. Il servizio e il cibo sono buoni, ma i posti in business class sono logori e molto scomodi. Il non reclinare completamente e il poggiapiedi non reggeva su entrambi i voli. Sul volo di ritorno, l'audio non funzionava e non poteva essere riparato dal personale. Fatto: questo non è uno standard di classe business, anche se il prezzo è di circa 1000,00 Euro in meno rispetto alla concorrenza.

Da Roma a San Francisco via Istanbul. Era la prima volta che usavo Turkish Airlines e sono rimasto molto sorpreso dall'eccellente servizio sull'aereo e nell'aeroporto di sosta (Istanbul). In aereo, anche se in classe economica, siamo stati trattati bene. Nella toilette c'erano fiori freschi, creme e profumi da scegliere. Ho anche visto il personale pulire la toilette, cosa molto utile soprattutto in un volo molto lungo. Non ho mai visto un servizio così eccezionale.

عمان إلى سانت بطرسبرغ عبر اسطنبول مع الخطوط الجوية التركية. كنت قلقًا في البداية بشأن وقت النقل القصير نسبيًا في إسطنبول خاصة وأن هذه كانت رحلة عمل قصيرة ، لكنني فوجئت بسرور كبير ، فجميع الرحلات كانت في الوقت المحدد بالضبط وهي الأولى بالنسبة لي مع الخطوط الجوية التركية. كانت الخدمة جيدة على متن الطائرة مع طعام لائق خاصة وأن الرحلات كانت قصيرة نسبيًا. درجة رجال الأعمال مع A320 هي حظك في السحب ، في واحدة من الرحلات الثلاث في درجة رجال الأعمال من نوع هذه الطائرة كانت مجرد مقعد اقتصادي مع ترك المقعد الأوسط فارغًا كما هو الحال مع شركات الطيران الأوروبية. هذا غير عادل للمسافرين الذين يدفعون الكثير من المال فقط لينتهي بهم الأمر في مقعد اقتصادي ، في A330 إنها تجربة مختلفة تمامًا مع مقعد ضخم ، وأطنان من الخصوصية والمساحة تجربة مختلفة تمامًا. الصالة في اسطنبول ضخمة والطعام هناك لذيذ ، لذا خصص وقتًا دائمًا للاستمتاع به إذا كنت تطير في رحلة عمل مع TK. سوف أطير بهم بكل سرور مرة أخرى وأنصحهم ، خاصة بالنسبة لسفر العمل لمسافات طويلة.

Bordeaux à Athènes via Istanbul avec Turkish Airlines. Ils m'ont vraiment surpris. Le processus d'enregistrement et la franchise de bagages sont bons. Les avions sont propres et des divertissements en vol sont fournis. Le personnel de cabine est vraiment gentil et fait attention aux détails. La restauration est bonne et généreuse. Je volerai certainement avec eux à nouveau.

Da Roma a Istanbul con Turkish Airlines, e non mi sorprende che si ripetano la compagnia aerea europea dell'anno. Sebbene solo un volo relativamente breve, avevano a bordo un cuoco per darci da mangiare correttamente. Niente di troppo disturbo. Sia gli aeroporti di Roma che quelli di Istanbul sono caotici ma non è colpa di Turkish Airlines. Hanno fatto tutto il possibile per rendere le cose il più agevoli possibile, inclusa un'attenzione speciale per mia madre di 86 anni. Volerò sicuramente di nuovo con loro.

Dublin to Istanbul with Turkish Airlines. Flight was on time, boarding quick and cabin staff extremely helpful. The seat was more than comfortable and spacious for the duration of the flight. Drinks were plentiful and I especially enjoyed the lemon drink served. A light snack served was enjoyable and tasty. All through the flight the staff were very attentive. This was a great way to begin what was a long day, I had a connecting flight to the Philippines from Istanbul.

İstanbul'dan İzmir'e. Korkunç müşteri hizmetleri. Çağrı merkezi ile rezervasyonumu değiştirdim. Yapılan değişikliği kredi kartından tahsil ettiler. Ancak tarihlerde bir hata yaptılar ve ödememi bloke ettiler. Ne yapacaklarına karar vermelerini beklerken uçağımı kaybettim. Görünen o ki müşteri ilişkilerinde telefonlara cevap verebilecek bir amir ya da yönetici yok. Yöneticiler, sözde müşteriyle konuşmaya gerek kalmadan vakaları çözüyor. Yeterli limitim olmadığı için mümkün olmayan başka bir bilet almam söylendi. Engellenen tutarı iade edemezler. Business class için böyle kötü bir hizmet.

新加坡經伊斯坦布爾飛往布魯塞爾，從柏林返回。到了布魯塞爾，一切都運行得有條不紊，一次令人滿意的體驗。餐飲和娛樂與其他航空公司相當。但當出現問題時，TK 就會崩潰。技術故障延誤了我從柏林返回的航班。最初，延誤時間被宣佈為 90 分鐘，這意味著許多乘客將錯過 IST 的轉機，包括我自己。過境旅客的命運被留給了 IST 的轉機櫃檯，因為 TXL 地勤人員拒絕採取任何行動。這非常令人傷腦筋，因為我飛往 SIN 的轉機航班每天都有，所以如果我錯過了，我就不得不在 IST 過夜。當我解釋情況並要求從TXL重新預訂時，地勤人員拒絕了我的請求，並表示他們無能為力，也無法提供我的轉機航班的任何信息。一些過境乘客因得不到答复而感到沮喪，導致與地勤人員發生爭執。登機期間出現進一步延誤，並且沒有提供任何解釋或修改的出發時間。最終，航班晚點2.5小時起飛。在 IST，轉機櫃檯說 SIN 航班晚點了 4 個多小時。為什麼 TXL 的地勤人員不能告訴我這一點？我們還被告知，在帶有諷刺意味的“護理點”上有食品券，工作人員的工作人員英語很差，粗魯無禮。沒有食物券

مانيلا إلى اسطنبول مع الخطوط الجوية التركية. أنا على متن الرحلة بينما أكتب هذا التعليق ، هناك ساعة واحدة للذهاب في رحلة مدتها 12 ساعة. اليوم 8 مايو 2016 ، غادر يوم 7. سأضطر إلى تصنيف الخطوط الجوية التركية في المراكز الثلاثة الأولى إن لم يكن في القمة. كان المقعد هو الأفضل من حيث التصميم المريح للتخزين وشاشة التلفزيون كبيرة الحجم والكثير للاختيار من بينها سهل الاستخدام. الإنترنت أثناء الرحلة. كان الشيف على متن الطائرة ودودًا وتكيفًا مع بعض الطلبات بابتسامة. كان نومًا مريحًا جيدًا لمدة 6-7 ساعات كان سعر العمل من أرخص الأسعار. استمتعت بشكل عام بالتجربة ، على الخطوط الجوية التركية وسوف تختارها مرة أخرى.

Antalya to Frankfurt via Istanbul. Out of 4 airplanes flown, 3 were rather dirty and had limited or no entertainment systems. No WiFi was available onboard. After arrival in Istanbul, it took 10 minutes for the stairs to arrive and another 10 minutes for the shuttle buses to come. Istanbul domestic is similar to La Guardia. Miles&Smiles I contacted TK more than 10 times and spend USD 60 on phone costs without getting any professional reply - at both Istanbul Miles&Smiles desks the staff was busy doing their personal things and any customer was an unwelcomed intrusion. The girl at the outside Miles&Smiles desk made it clear that she will not answer any questions and is only hired to print cards. The guy at the int'l inside Miles&Smiles desk refused to answer my question and I had to pay USD 30 entry fee to a nearby lounge to get my answer. Don't call them. Just write a message and maybe you will receive a reply within 2-8 biz days. If you have anything urgent, too bad. If you have a question at check-in, go directly to the supervisor. There, you might have a chance to get an answer - I asked the supervisor at the Istanbul lounge about the lousy Miles&Smiles service. She refused to answer, refused to investigate, and refused to forward anything. She told me to write an email to customer care - Turkish Airlines staff guided me to the wrong security check-in, because of that, I was stuck with customs / police for over an hour. There is no Turkish Airlines customer care service at Istanbul domestic airport or outside of security at the international terminal. I contacted customer care and didn't receive any answer to any of above raised points. Turkish Airlines have a few points that they advertise and that are great (like the Istanbul lounge), with most other things, I felt like Turkish Airlines is only a large cheap budget airline. I am still waiting for a reply from Turkish Airlines.

Von Zürich nach Los Angeles über Istanbul mit Turkish Airlines. Toller Preis, tolles Essen und Kabinenservice, reibungsloser Flug und pünktlich. Sehr einfacher Flugwechsel in Istanbul. Ich würde wieder mit Turkish Airlines fliegen.

Mit Turkish Airlines von München nach Istanbul. Ich habe meinen Online-Check-in vorbereitet, um einen guten Start in meinen Urlaub zu haben. Als ich am Flughafen ankam, teilten sie mir mit, dass sie die Online-Check-in-Reservierung nicht nutzen könnten. Keine Angabe von Gründen. Nur haben sie es nicht genutzt. Jetzt sitze ich auf einem Mittelplatz in Reihe 10, statt auf einem Fensterplatz hinten. Bitte ersetzen Sie bei dieser Fluggesellschaft Menschen durch Roboter. Wenn Sie keinen Online-Check-in durchführen können, bieten Sie ihn nicht an.

Barcelona a Nueva York JFK vía Estambul con Turkish Airlines. Me encantó y me sentí muy mimada. Todo fue muy eficiente. Se sirvió comida deliciosa (y de cortesía), un vuelo tranquilo y con un personal agradable. Un avión moderno y de gran valor. Lo recomiendo encarecidamente.

San Francisco to Istanbul and return in the past 3 weeks with Turkish Airlines. These were the two single best flights in my many years of long distance travel. The newest business class seats (the plane was 3 weeks old) now have plenty of storage space under the foot rest. The service was friendly and very helpful (repeatedly checking in on our needs, smiling, energetic). The food was top quality (as good as a decent restaurant). Lie flat seats that are quite comfortable. This product far exceeds what you get on United, Lufthansa, and Air France to Europe out of SFO and tends to sell at about 40% less money than these other carriers. My only complaints is that drink service tends to be a bit neglected (e.g., if you want a second glass of wine you are going to have to ask for it, no one will offer). That's not much of a problem.

Malta to Istanbul return. First time with Turkish Airlines and very impressed. The Boeing 737 to IST was new and spotless. Crew were friendly and the inflight service good. Food was impressive for a 2 hour flight and alcohol poured from a large bottle, so good measures. On the way back slightly older A319 but still spotless. Again excellent service and landed early on both flights. I will choose Turkish again.

Copenhagen to Dar es Salaam via Istanbul with Turkish Airlines. For a couple of years I have flown quite a lot with this airline and I have been very satisfied with the service and performance, however recently it seems like the previous high standard is declining. The flight from Copenhagen to Istanbul was okay, but the journey from Istanbul to Dar Es Salaam was nothing to write home about - not something good at least. Mediocre meal, uninterested crew, fixed seat without any possibility for adjustments etc. I hope that Turkish Airlines will show it previous strength and performance on the way back. I will still recommend THY on this background.

Podgorica to Tbilisi via Istanbul. Turkish Airlines is the best airline I have flown, and I have to say they have best service for the value of the ticket. Cabin crew are very polite and friendly. Also seats are excelent, the entertainment in the plane is great, various movies, music game. The best part is food and drinks, especially chocolate mouse.

Boston to Tel Aviv via Istanbul. Had to deal with customer service by telephone before the flight - this was difficult and set my expectations for the flight low. But the flight itself was wonderful. Pleasant check-in, friendly people, and inflight quite comfortable seating and a very attentive cabin crew. So all-in-all a most wonderful experience and I would readily fly Turkish Airlines again.

曼谷經伊斯坦布爾飛往紐約。我對土耳其航空懷有懷舊之情，並多次乘坐土耳其航空從伊斯坦布爾飛往紐約——該航線上的豪華經濟艙是航空旅行中最划算的選擇之一。他們的商業產品是另一回事，儘管它有其優點。我乘坐這架飛機從曼谷長途飛往紐約，結果好壞參半。 A330 又小又狹窄，尤其是如果您習慣乘坐阿聯酋航空的 A380 的話。不過，國泰航空也運營這架飛機，他們將座位設計成人字形，以保護您的隱私。土耳其語就沒有這樣的運氣了。 2-2-2 配置意味著您要么旁邊有人打鼾，沒有隔板，沒有任何隱私，要么您不斷地跳過某人的腿去衛生間。由於這個原因，機艙裡感覺幽閉恐怖且炎熱。食物很棒，是的，我喜歡小蠟燭！服務也很專業，面帶微笑，葡萄酒質量也很高。機上娛樂設施相當平庸：屏幕小，選擇不多，電影選擇也低俗。正如土耳其人很常見的那樣，我錯過了與紐約的聯繫，當我到達伊斯坦布爾時，地勤人員的幫助為零。我只剩下自己照顧自己了。第二天在紐約的約會被正式取消，我費了四個小時才帶著我的（暫時放錯地方的）行李走出機場，拿到了一張酒店優惠券（排著長隊，是一家三星級酒店的優惠券）。至少可以說，這不是商務艙體驗。當然，伊斯坦布爾機場的局限性並不是土耳其航空的錯，但該航空公司需要在發生過境事故時認真重新考慮其地面運營，特別是因為此類事故如此常見，以至於我現在對是否在伊斯坦布爾轉機猶豫不決。第二天我到達紐約時心情很糟糕。回來後，在肯尼迪機場登機就像一場橄欖球賽，沒有優先登機，也沒有組織。一路壓力。總而言之，土耳其航空努力讓機上體驗變得友好和美食溺愛，這是人們必須欣賞的，但對於幾千美元，我想我下次會乘坐遠東或海灣航空公司的航班 - 產品只是好多了，邏輯上也更加複雜。正如許多其他人在這裡指出的那樣，這裡沒有客戶服務，因此您的小抱怨將被完全忽略，就像我的一樣。以後我會用土耳其航空搭乘經濟艙的短途航班，因為它們飛的地方很多，而且物有所值。我會把商務旅行留給大佬們。

Bologna to Tokyo via Istanbul. We could do the online check in only 24 hrs before and when we coul do it it was only for the first flight from Bologna and not the other from Istanbul, because it was 24 hrs before. We had no chance to choose meals. During the flights we had no choice for the meal because it was already finished once crew arrived at our seat. My monitor was not working, I asked few times unduccessfully. After 4 hours I had it working, after asking again. Crew could have been more smiling and reactive to our requests.

Antalya to Zurich via Istanbul with Turkish Airlines. The flights back were very nice. Both flights were operated on new aircraft and from Istanbul to Zurich, AVOD was offered. The service from the FA's was very nice. The only problem is Istanbul Airport which is a chaotic place. However when I fly to Turkey or beyond, I will choose TK again, since I was very satisfied with their service.

New York to Istanbul with Turkish Airlines was one of the best transatlantic flights ever. Great food, warm and professional service and a seat so comfortable that I managed to sleep over 7 of the 10-hour flight. The only part that I wish was a bit better was the Entertaiment selection. The movies option seemed to be fine and up to date, but the TV programming was quite limited. But everything else was impeccable (minus the extremely annoying kids sitting behind me, but the airline cannot be blamed for that).

Von Zürich über Istanbul nach Antalya und ich war beeindruckt. Alles verlief reibungslos. Die FA's waren sehr nett und aufmerksam. Das Essen war für die Economy Class sehr gut. Alle Flüge starteten und kamen pünktlich an, auf der Strecke nach Antalya sogar noch früher. Der einzige Minuspunkt ist vielleicht, dass es auf dem Flug von Zürich nach Istanbul kein Unterhaltungsprogramm gab. Kein großes Problem. Ich hatte genug Lesestoff.

Baku to Istanbul with Turkish Airlines. Ground experience was very disappointing: I had do wait more than a half hour for my check in at the business class counter at GYD because they only open one counter for a A330 flight. Thats a joke and not acceptable. It was not possible for me to reach the lounge because of the mentioned delay at check in. Onboard was long haul Business Class Seats (A330) on the route GYD-IST, a friendly crew and a lot of meal options. Food had a good quality and was served very fast after takeoff. Flight was lightly delayed and had to park on the apron at IST - TK don't offer separate busses for business class passengers- that is a point to improve!

Oslo to Dhaka via Istanbul return. I have travelled with Turkish Airlines some times the past year, and it seems there is always is some sort of mishap - delays, technical problems with the entertainment system, booking of seats that doesn't exist etc. However, my past trip with made me wonder if they have heard of the term "customer service". I had booked their website. The trip passed through Istanbul with one hour waiting time. At 2am the day before my trip (ie. 34 hours before departure) I received an email (and email only) that my flight to Istanbul was 5 hours delayed, but there were no information about my flight from Istanbul, so I called customer service. It turned out that my flight had been cancelled, and that I had been shifted on a later flight, but Turkish hadn't thought about what effects that had on my flight from Istanbul. The initial thought of the customer service was that I had to stay overnight at Istanbul, and then take the flight the next day. There is only 1 flight from Istanbul to my destination every day, so that meant that I were facing a 24 hours delay and that I would have to wait until 6pm before my flight departed. When I told the customer service that this was not doable, he said that there were seats available on the flight to Istanbul on an earlier flight ( departure 7.30a, instead of noon), but that there were only business class seats left and that I had to upgrade my ticket. That is of course not acceptable. After 32 minutes on the phone with customer service, I got booked on to that earlier flight (giving me an 5 hours additional wait in Istanbul, but at least not a 24 hour delay to my arrival time). When I boarded that flight, I was seated in one of the economy seats that were supposed to be unavailable, and it also turned out that there were plenty of free seats on economy class. What kind of customer service is this? Unfortunately I had another horrible experience with Turkish on my flight back, where I were denied to check-in because I met up at the airport 52 minutes before departure instead of the required 60 minutes. There were no problems in assisting the business class passenger who arrived at the same time as me, but I was rejected because of these 8 minutes. I have never been late on check-in before, but I have seen many exemples of airline companies bending over backwards to help their passengers (especially if it was the last flight for the day, or in this case the only). Turkish would rather exploit it's customers. The irony is that this very trip was the one that earned me the last points for a membership upgrade. I will go to great lengths to avoid this airline in the future.

Malta to Kilimanjaro via Dar es Salaam. We are frequent flyers with Turkish Airlines and our experience in this case was bad enough that we will probably never fly with them again. 7 hour flights at 2am and 4am in aircraft so small and old that the seat inclined (when it worked) just 30 degrees. Crew mostly indifferent. Food also indifferent - normally the food and service plus sky chefs on Turkish warrant a 5 star review on their own. We asked at Istanbul lounge if we could speak to a member of customer service about our experience and they said 'No. Post via the website'. So we did. Nobody even acknowledged. We love the Istanbul lounge and the food there and (normally) the food on board. But in general indifferent has got into the habit of seeing customers as pesky unwanted extras that get in the way of their job. So maybe they're just telling us to go to another airline. Message received.

Von München über Istanbul nach Bangkok. Turkish Airlines ist eine günstige Fluggesellschaft mit guten Linienflugzeiten. Die Flugzeuge sind in gutem Zustand, das Essen ist durchschnittlich. Das Personal ist teilweise sehr freundlich, ich habe es aber auch als unfreundlich erlebt. Das Problem ist, dass ich auf meinen 4 Flügen dreimal zu spät eingecheckt und zweimal zu spät angekommen bin. Einmal kam ich drei Stunden zu spät an, ohne dass sich der Pilot überhaupt dafür entschuldigte.

Birmingham to Bangkok via Istanbul. Onboard the best food I've had in the air and the service onboard is fantastic. Turkish Airlines ground staff however are terrible on all counts. In Istanbul they offer priority boarding for business class, priority boarding for a bus that is. A bus that you then stand on for half an hour before getting crammed with all other passengers before taking you on the long journey to the plane and a scrum on the stairs. The lounge in Istanbul is great but seems to be operating at absolute maximum capacity. It really is a tale of an airline that gets some things so right, and others so very wrong.

Prague to Istanbul with Turkish Airlines. Checked-in online for my flight with the app - boarded the aircraft - first impressions, very outdated decor - like from 1980's but clean and comfortable. Sat down, noticed they had an onboard chef - was wearing a chef's uniform and hat - thought that was nice. Crew were very friendly, made nice conversation and in-flight service was nice, meal was surprisingly good. Would recommend this airline for short-haul flights.

İstanbul'dan Kahire'ye. Atatürk Havalimanı'nda check-in ve dinlenme salonu çok iyi. Uçağa binmek, bu havaalanında hiçbir zaman kolay görünmüyor. Uçağa çıkmak için kalabalık bir otobüste yaklaşık 15 dakika bekledi. Yer ekibi düşmanca ve yararsızdır. Türkiye'den Mısır'a yapılan uçuşlarda ikram, Türk Hava Yolları iç hat yemeklerine benzeyen soğuk yemeklere indirilmiş görünüyor. Neyse ki uçuştan önce salonda yedim. Bilet fiyatı için ikramın daha önce sunulana dönmesi gerekiyor. Uçuş görevlileri, yolculuğun çoğu için mevcut değil.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan Almatı'ya uçtum. Check-in işlemi kolaydı, salon çok kalabalıktı ve yemek için uzun süre beklemek. Uçağa biniş süreci, uçağa gitmek için kalabalık bir otobüste uzun süre beklemekle geçiyor. Yerleşik deneyim iyiydi. İkram iyiydi ve uçak içi eğlence iyiydi, ancak yanıt vermek çok yavaştı - bazen sistemi sıfırlamayı istemek gerekiyor. Mürettebat bu vardiyada çalışmaktan mutlu görünmüyordu.

Edinburgh to Dalaman via Istanbul Business Class - a paid upgrade to Business Class. Nice lounge Edinburgh Airport. Proper Business Class seats on a 737-800, very comfortable. Handed a menu which they swiftly took away, they didn't have enough Business Class meals loaded so I got an Economy meal. One bathroom at front of Business but occupied so I used the rear one in Economy, only noticed there was no toilet roll. 4 Crew sat in rear talking. An 8 Hour layover in Istanbul, no lounge or accommodation provided. Dalaman to Edinburgh via Istanbul in Economy. Do not sit in Row 10 of Airbus they use A320? Elderly gentleman could not get his legs in, sat sideways, rude crew when he asked for help. Boeing 737-800 to Edinburgh comfortable in row 11. Handed a menu. At meal time no choice, they ran out from row 5 to 11. Meal, tea and coffee.. service over. Great seat back tvs. Case at Airport had been damaged and torn. Still better than BA for short haul seat back TV and music, crew indifferent.

乘坐土耳其航空航班從曼谷經伊斯坦布爾飛往蓋特威克。使用了曼谷的長榮航空休息室，那裡的標準非常高，食物和飲料的選擇也很好。航班很好，床鋪平躺，空間充足，食物美味，機上有廚師，工作人員送麵包和飲料的速度有點慢。在伊斯坦布爾使用了非常繁忙的休息室，早餐的食物選擇很少，但在我使用過的其他時候卻相當不錯。我很生氣土耳其航空的客戶關係如此糟糕 - 我中轉了 16 個小時，應該被安置在酒店裡。他們無法讓我乘坐較早的航班，因為航班已滿，但他們也不會為我預訂酒店，所以我自費預訂了自己的航班，並且不得不為我和我的兒子購買電子簽證。從伊斯坦布爾飛往倫敦的航班還不錯，只是白天的座位，而且我的座位沒有傾斜。總體而言，就所支付的價格而言，航班物有所值。儘管酒店有問題，我還是會再次和他們一起旅行。

Kuala Lumpur to Istanbul with Turkish Airlines. Good plane, kind and helpful staff. Internet on-board. In the middle of the day we were asked to pull down the window blinds so that people could sleep. I had selected this flight as it departed in the morning local time, and arrives in the evening - a perfect oportunity to catch the day-rythm at the destination, unless you sleep and are unable to sleep when arriving in the evening. The temperature in the plane was too high - good if you want your customers to go to sleep, but not if you want to make them feel comfortable.

Dammam to Marseille via Istanbul. Onboard service (food, entertainment, plane, crew) are very good. Price is most of the time competitive. But customer service is very poor. I want to cancel a reservation that is cancelable/refundable. I stopped by Turkish Airline ticket office at the airport. They could not do it but recommended to contact their call center. I did that - they cannot calculate the refund amount, they told me to go to a ticket office to do so. Result: imposibble to get a refund because nobody can calculate how much it would be! The flight I want to cancel is leaving tomorrow. If I cannot fix this refund issue, they will consider a no show and do not refund me at all. In other word I'm loosing 540â‚¬ for a ticket that is sold as cancellable / refundable.

London to Varna via Istanbul. First time flying Turkish Airlines and pleasantly surprised. The flight crew were very friendly and helpful, the food was fairly good compared to other airlines I have flown with and seat pitch was generally ok considering i am 6'2. Flight was smooth and the transfer at IST was a nice experience. No shortages on drinks on board both flights. The aircraft's were both modern and clean. For the price we paid, I would use Turkish again. It would be nice on the LGW to IST route TV's were provided.

Bruxelles à Istanbul avec Turkish Airlines. Pas un enregistrement rapide et utilisé la voie rapide pour la sécurité à Bruxelles. Vieux salon SN fatigué, qui a besoin d'être rénové. Bon personnel cependant. A231 avec 3x3 sièges et celui du milieu libre. Excellent personnel à bord et nourriture médiocre. Le retour a utilisé l'enregistrement rapide, le meilleur que j'aie jamais utilisé, une entrée privée pour la classe C dans le salon avec une sécurité exclusive et un contrôle des passeports. Le salon est fabuleux mais toujours occupé. Cette fois, pas de portes éloignées, donc un peu de bonheur. Les sièges étaient 2x2 que certains A321 ont, et pour moi, ils sont la meilleure classe C en Europe.

Pisa to Manila via Istambul. I bought this flight because the good price, but i had a lot of problems. When the trip started they changed the route, Pisa-Istambul became Pisa-Bologna-Istambul, in fact I had to run fast to get the connection to Manila, but they didn't put on that flight my baggage. I arrived in Filippine but my baggage arrived very late - about 8 days!! And it caused a lot of problems to me. When I had to come back to Italy they cancelled my flight Istambul-Pisa and gave me one day after flight. I think it was the worst service.

Miami to Thessaloniki via Istanbul with Turkish Airlines. The aircraft was excellent and almost new, the seats lack space but the inflight cabin service was great as was the inflight entertainment. Food was plenty but not that tasty. The crew was very polite, some lacks foreign languages.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan Sao Paulo'ya. 4 Şubat sabah 6:00'da Atatürk Havalimanı'na vardım. (yani hareket saatinden 3 saatten fazla önce). Önce check-in kontuarında benimle ilgilenen hanımefendi bana biniş biletlerini verdi ve beni ve ailemi aynı sıraya (51) sıralı koltuklara yerleştirdi. Ama bana biniş biletlerini vermeden önce başka bir görevliyle konuşmaya karar verdi ve ardından biletleri yeniden basmaya karar vererek bizi tamamen farklı koltuklara oturttu. Not: Yolculardan biri kızımdı ve henüz 1,5 yaşında! Check-in yapan bayana birkaç kez kızımla uçtuğumu ve en azından anne ya da babanın onunla birlikte seyahat etmesi gerektiğini açıklamaya çalıştım - daha iyi bir konaklama sağlamak ve zahmet etmemek için ona bir koltuk aldım. diğer yolcular. Ama kızdı ve küstahlaştı, bana bu "sorunu" kapı görevlileriyle ve hatta uçuş görevlileriyle tek başıma çözmem gerektiğini, hatta uçaktaki insanlardan benimle koltuk değiştirmelerini istemem gerektiğini söyledi. Yani özetle sorunu Türk Hava Yolları yarattı ve benim çözmem gerekecekti. O zamanlar, Türk Hava Yolları için uluslararası check-in masasında akıcı İngilizce bilmeyen kişilerin çalışmasının kabul edilemez olduğu noktadan başlayarak, check-in personelinin küstahlığına ve beceriksizliğine kızmaya başladım. €“ 1,5 yaşındaki bir bebeğin check-in masasında bu bayanın bana sağladığı çılgın düzenlemeyle tek başına uçacağı gerçeğini görmezden geldiklerinden bahsetmeden. Hala check-in yapan bayanın bana verdiği talimatları takip ederek, kapıda çalışan diğer iki bayan gereksinimlerimi görmezden geldi. Ancak o kadınlardan birine bağırmak zorunda kaldıktan sonra, bana (çok kızgın bir yüzle bana yardım edemeyeceğini ve bu sorunu uçağın içinde kendi başıma çözmem gerektiğini söyledi. Uçağa binmek için kapı açıldığında, başka biri görevli isteyip biletlerimi teslim aldı ve benden ve ailemden parmak dışında beklememizi istedi yaklaşık 20 dakika bekledik ve neredeyse tüm yolcular uçağa bindiğinde başka bir çalışan biletleri geri verdi ve sorunu çözmem gerekeceğini söyledi. O zamanlar beni boş yere 20 dakika bekleten çalışanların kibrinden bıkmıştım ve uçağa biner binmez uçuş şefinin gelmesi için bağırmaya başladım. Eşime kızımı aynı koltukta tutmasını teklif etme cesaretini gösteren görevliler, aldığımız fazladan koltuğu başka bir yolcuya vererek, ancak havaalanı polisini aramayı önerdikten ve uçak kaptanının (ve o sırada karım ve kızım zaten ağlıyordu) ekip taşındı ve mucizevi bir şekilde 47. sırada üç koltuk belirdi!

Tokio naar Barcelona via Istanbul met Turkish Airlines. Beste economy class in alle opzichten. Het toilet werd tijdens de vlucht schoon gehouden, het eten is uitstekend en de houding van de bemanning is geweldig. Toiletten handcrème, dikke darm en aromatische zeep maakten een groot verschil om op te frissen tijdens een lange vlucht tussen Tokyo-Istanbul.

搭乘土耳其航空從新加坡經伊斯坦布爾飛往愛丁堡。舒適的旅程，兩個航段的服務都非常好。在新加坡辦理登機手續非常順利，登機也很順利。現代飛機，配備非常好的設施和食物。客艙工作人員很友好，樂於助人。在伊斯坦布爾過境便捷，準時出發前往愛丁堡。第二航段的波音 737 既現代又舒適。飛行中的娛樂設施也很好——食物和服務也一樣。我認為土耳其航空物超所值，根據我的經驗，我會毫不猶豫地再次乘坐他們的航班。非常滿意的客戶！

Casablanca to Hong Kong via Istanbul with Turkish Airlines. Great check-in at Casablanca, nice lounge, food selection was various and high quality. Casablanca to Istanbul the service on board is quite impressive. The cabin crew pay attention to details and the food selection is extremely good. I would criticize the inflight entertainment since they don't have a big selection of movies. Turkish Airlines lounge in Istanbul is the best I've been to in Europe. The food was amazing. Free massage offered and iMacs available. Istanbul to Hong Kong no complaints. Turkish Airlines offer free wifi access to its Business Class cabin and it works perfectly.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan Kuala Lumpur'a. Kabin ekibi tarafından sıcak bir karşılama ve uçuş sırasında daima gülümseme. Hizmet çok iyi - ekonomi sınıfının gerçekten güzel olan hediyelik eşyalarla servis edilmesine şaşırdı. IFE güncellendi ve koltuk uzun mesafe için rahattı. Genel olarak güzel bir servis ile güzel bir yemek de.

Denver to Kathmandu via Istanbul with Turkish Airlines. Great food, but once you land in Istanbul, they don't give any damn about service. You will see staff on their personal phone surrounded by frustrated customers trying to find answer. I literally had to yell to catch attention. No empathy but lot of attitude. Also, I found few staff with no English at all.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul üzerinden Ankara'dan Boston'a. Uçuş, uçuşta iyi hizmet verdi, ancak mürettebatın rahatlığında. Ankara'dan İstanbul'a ilk uçuş gecikti ve bu da benim dış hatlar uçuşumun İstanbul havaalanının diğer tarafına koşmasıyla sonuçlandı. O uçuş da geç kalktı ve bu da benim Boston'a geç gelmeme neden oldu. Boston'a vardığımızda pistte bir saat park yeri bekledik. Tamamen kabul edilemez. Ödediğinizin karşılığını alıyorsunuz, bu yüzden zamanında gelmeyen ucuz bir uçuş istiyorsanız uçmanız gereken yer burası. Tekrar uçmayacak.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan Amsterdam'a, karada ve havada korkunç hizmet. Görünüşe göre uçak değişti, bu yüzden insanlar kapıda elleriyle yeni koltuklar tahsis ettiler. Arkadaşım, yerel bir adam arkada oturmaktan hoşlanmadığı için uçakta son sırada 5'ten 27'ye yeniden yerleştirildi. Şikayet ettiğinde, çok kaba bir şekilde konuşuldu. Sıramızı idare eden bayan birdenbire başka bir şey yapmaya karar verdi ve bizi bekletti. Biniş sırasına göre yapıldı, ancak zorunlu olmadı, bu yüzden girdiğimizde, neredeyse tüm havai alan da dahil olmak üzere uçağın %90'ı zaten doluydu. Sıfıra yakın açıklama ile büyük bir gecikme yaşadık. İnsanlar bağlantıları sorduğunda, "benim sorunum değil" söylendi, uçaktaki sıcaklık 28 dereceydi, önce değiştiremeyecekleri söylendi, sonra uçağın yarısı şikayet edince birden değiştirebileceklerini söylediler. Gecikmeleri ve hatta başka koltuklar almayı kabul edebilirim. Ancak nezaket eksikliği ve personelin kaba kaba davranışı mazur görülemez. En son Türk Hava Yolları ile uçuyorum.

Montréal à Ho Chi Minh Ville via Istanbul avec Turkish Airlines. Rapport qualité/prix, excellente qualité de service. Les agents de bord étaient serviables, la nourriture était excellente, les sièges étaient super et je n'ai pas eu de retard. Pas de wifi à bord. Le programme de divertissement en vol est varié. La seule raison pour laquelle j'ai arrêté de voler avec Turkish Airlines est que sur le programme LH Miles&More, auquel elles sont affiliées, vous n'obtenez que 25 % des miles réellement parcourus, quelle que soit votre classe de siège (j'ai voyagé en classe affaires et n'a obtenu que 2 % des milles). L'autre revers est le fait que l'aéroport d'Istanbul Ataturk est l'un de leurs principaux hubs et cet aéroport est tout simplement horrible - trop petit, totalement inadapté à ce que devrait être une expérience de voyage aujourd'hui. Donc, si vous voyagez avec Turkish Airlines, vous devrez très probablement transiter par cet aéroport.

Da Venezia a Istanbul su un nuovo A321 con gli schermi personali. Il volo è atterrato ad Ataturk 15 minuti prima del previsto. Equipaggio di cabina gentile ed efficiente. Da Istanbul a Jakarta su un A330-200 con il vecchio tipo di sedili che personalmente non mi piace. Il volo è partito con 35 minuti di ritardo a causa della congestione dell'aeroporto ma è atterrato in Indonesia con mezz'ora di anticipo. Entrambi i voli non sono pieni. Ho notato che le porzioni di cibo in classe Economy sono aumentate sui voli a lungo raggio. La qualità del cibo è di prim'ordine. Sono un membro Elite Star Alliance Gold e volo spesso con Turkish Airlines e non ho mai avuto grossi ritardi o smarrimento o danneggiamento del bagaglio. La Business lounge dell'aeroporto Ataturk è impressionante.

Malaga to Istanbul on TK1306 on 22 January 2016. Having recently acquired Elite status on Turkish Airlines, I was well aware that they are great in the air but pretty ordinary on the ground. Based on this flight with my wife today, I am ready to change that opinion. TK has become pretty ordinary both in the air and on the ground. I was confident that we would get exit row seats at check in at Malaga but were told all seats were taken. Luckily, I prevailed on the agent to give us a window and aisle with the middle seat vacant, which she did. There is no in-flight recognition by Turkish Airlines of a person's Elite status. My wife's seat did not recline. The crew were downright poorly trained. They did not do a seat belt inspection before take off and landing, window blinds remained closed as well. Food service was surly. The rice was cold, got standard kebabs that were awful. When I asked for a second helping of water, I was met with a glare. The crew spoke very poor English - something very common with Turkish Airlines cabin crews. When we landed in Istanbul after being in a holding pattern for 45 minutes, we were at the far remote end of the airport. The first bus left and we were left standing in freezing weather waiting for the next bus. Then the chaos of IST airport. All in all, a pretty dismal experience. Dreading our connecting flight to DXB in the early hours but more on that later.

Los Angeles to Tel Aviv via Istanbul and I've never flown Turkish Airlines, and after reading reviews I was nervous. At check in, I knew that one of my bags weighed more than the 50lb allowance, but the woman at the ticket counter was sweet enough to let it slide, and didn't charge me the extra fee. I flew with a friend who bought his ticket before mine, so we didn't have seats next to each other. The women at the gate were sweet enough to tell us there was a row in the back of the plane with nobody occupying it, so him and I were able to spread out amongst 3 seats and actually be comfortable. As soon as we took off they handed out coffee and drinks, little candies and a warm towel. My one issue is that by the time they got to our row, they had run out of the veggie option for dinner. I don't eat non-kosher meat so I ended up not eating, but that was my own fault for not requesting a special meal. The flight went by quickly, and the staff was very sweet and helpful. Even on the second flight, which was only an hour and a half long, we got served a dinner and drinks. The on-board chef even brought this little girl a cake out to the cabin because it was her birthday. I've never seen an airline do that, and it put a smile on my face seeing them go well out of their way to do something that sweet. Will absolutely fly them again!

Bruxelles à Istanbul avec Turkish Airlines, et espace pour les jambes plutôt inacceptable. Le personnel n'a rien d'enthousiasmant. Très bonne nourriture cependant. Le vol d'Istanbul à Séoul était le meilleur vol que j'aie jamais pris. Personnel super sympa et arrangeant, nourriture délicieuse, bon système de divertissement, sièges confortables. Une très agréable surprise !

Vienna to New York JFK via Istanbul, and the flight from Vienna to Istanbul was pleasant and generally unremarkable until landing in Istanbul. It was pouring rain, the aircraft was parked and buses arrived to take us to the main airport. A bus for business class was provided, however when we tried to board, a ground person aggressive waved his arms and yelled, "No more". I said, "we are business class," and tried to show my boarding pass only to have him become more aggressive, and shout, "go". There are no signs in the gate areas to direct traveler with connections to the the business class lounges. The flight from Istanbul to New York JFK was dismal. I will say the only saving grace is the food service is very good. The overhead bins are literally 1/3 filled with bedding and other equipment. The crew seemed trained to ignore service than provide service. Baggage service at JFK was very slow, and of course when our bags finally arrived, they were completely soaked, obviously having been left out uncovered in Istanbul!

Edinburgh to Singapore via Istanbul on Turkish Airlines, and punctual flights. Clean modern aircraft, friendly and attentive crews with an easy transfer at Istanbul. Very impressed and happy with value for money. Based on reading earlier critical reviews had concerns about flying Turkish Airlines, so was very pleasantly surprised with our experience.

من طهران إلى لوس أنجلوس عبر اسطنبول. لقد كنت تحلق معهم لسنوات عديدة وهي حالة ضرب أو تفوت عليهم. لا يعرف موظفو مركز الاتصال مزايا كل فئة من فئات المسافر الدائم التي يقدمها برنامجهم الخاص. فريق العمل الأرضي بشكل عام غير مفيد. ومع ذلك ، عندما يتعلق الأمر بالرحلة الفعلية ، يمكن أن تتغير الأشياء ، وتكون خدمتهم في الهواء جيدة حقًا. تلقيت كل من رحلتي في هذه الرحلة خدمة جيدة حقًا. لذا ، إذا كنت تعرف التواريخ الدقيقة التي تسافر إليها ، ولا تخطط لإجراء أي تغييرات ، فإن اللغة التركية تعد خيارًا جيدًا ، ومع ذلك فهي بالطبع إذا لم تواجه أي تأخيرات وفقدان الاتصالات وفقدان الأمتعة.

Pristina to Gatwick via Istanbul. I travelled on a connecting flight through Istanbul and on my arrival I was greeted with chaos, I could not get to the front of the queue at the Transfer desk due to about 75 other people and because I only had 1 hr 20 mins to get to my connecting flight, I had to push in, only to be told my flight had been sold, then they changed their words to my seat had been sold. From then onwards everything was a nightmare, I was told I had to buy a visa (Â£20) and then go through security to passport control and then go outside the airport to the Turrkish Airlines ticket sales desk. I decided to try to get my luggage and given false information - it was on my connecting flight, then it's here somewhere but we cant possibly get it for you. I was then directed outside of the airport by a police officer and had to go back through security to get back in. I joined the 6 hour queue at Turkish Airlines desk and managed to get another flight 2 days later. I then had to join the Supervisor queue then the hotel queue and finally put up at a hotel. When I returned to my allocated flight I was told twice that my luggage was on the flight, guess what I arrived Gatwick and No luggage! And no compensation for things I had to pay for.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul üzerinden Ankara'dan Washington'a. En iyi yemek, servis ve mutlu ekip, Sorunsuz kalkış ve iniş, mükemmel yer hizmeti ve bağlantı gecikmedi. İyi uçak içi eğlence, kabul edilebilir hızda ücretsiz internet bağlantısı. Diğer ekonomi sınıfı havayolları ile aynı fiyata ucuz business class bileti.

İstanbul'dan Londra'ya ve 7 gündür 6 bagaj kayıp, web sitesinde bunların 4. gün elimizde olması gerektiğini söylüyorlar. Türk Hava Yolları'na telefon veya e-posta ile ulaşamazsınız. tüm bagaj etiketleme numaralarını sağladık ve kurye ile iletişim kuramıyoruz. Kimse yardım etmek istemiyor - onlarla bir daha asla uçmayacak. Sadece umursamıyorlar ve gösteriyor.

London to Singapore via Istanbul with Turkish Airlines, and a 22 hour delay on the ground. Outbound to London, everything went excellent - service by attendants and minimal delays taking off and landing. When I fell asleep on the first leg from Singapore to Istanbul and couldn't find my glasses, the attendant was very helpful in searching for it, even ripping out the seat in case it was stuck there. Food was really good also, considering when I slept through meal service and by the time I woke up, the flight attendant told me that my meal wasn't fresh anymore so she gave me a business class vegetarian meal instead. However, on my inbound flight on New Year's Eve/day, everything was a mess! I showed up at Heathrow to hear of a flight delay. Supposedly 1 hour became four, then five hours due to snow. They could have updated the website or sent a courtesy email so I didn't have to spend 8 hours at the airport before take off. Landed in Istanbul after circling for 2 hours due to lack of landing spots and another 2 hours waiting on the runway. Missed my connecting flight of course, and had to queue for 2 hours to get rebooked and re-sorted out on my next flight back to Singapore. Total chaos there with 30 crying babies at any one time and very rude, sneaky men cutting in line and making offensive remarks when I didn't let them cut in behind/infront of me. Ground staff and customer service desperately need training on conflict resolution and soft skills. Finally got on my plane, yet after another 1:30 delay. In flight entertainment wasn't working and the attendant had to spend an hour trying to fix my console as the flight was completely full. At least the meal service was wonderfully tasty.

Birmingham to Johannesburg via Istanbul return. My wife and I fly from Birmingham to South Africa with our 3 year old daughter quite frequently using Swiss, Lufthansa, KLM, Air France and Emirates. On this occasion we decided to try Turkish Airlines and while the service was okay in flight, we were shocked and disappointed with the complete chaos and lack of organisation we experienced from Turkish Airlines employees at Ataturk airport in the face of adverse weather conditions. After a 3 hour delay at Johannesburg airport, we arrived too late at Istanbul airport to catch our connecting flight to Birmingham and Ataturk airport was utter chaos and disorganisation. We were sent from one very long queue to another â€“ standing for hours with a 3 year old child after a long international flight â€“ no water was supplied or even available, no hospitality of any kind â€“ just chaos and more chaos. After 6 hours in queues in Ataturk airport, we were finally sent on a long bus ride to a hotel on the very opposite side of the city to the airport â€“ the Ramada Encore. Both my wife and I have missed a day's work as a result of the chaos at Ataturk and are very exhausted and distressed from the whole experience of flying Turkish. It ruined our holiday to see family in South Africa.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan Kansai'ye. Biz Star Alliance Gold yolcularıyız ama uçağa en son bindik - otobüse biniş kaostu ve ne dağınıklık. Mürettebat gerçekten uykulu görünüyordu ve uçak yaşını gösteriyordu. Aynı Türk dana kıyma köftesi menüde iki kez vardı ve ikinci seçimim ikinci turda olmadığı için aynı şeyi iki kez yemek zorunda kaldım. Tuvaletler kirliydi ve ekip gerekenin en iyisini yaptı. Korkunç bir deneyimdi ve onları tekrar uçurmayacak.

Bucharest to Abuja via Istanbul, and the nightmare started when I arrived to Abuja Airport from Istanbul on 11th December on a Turkish Airlines flight. Both of my luggage never came with the flight. Apparently, after some days they sent one of the bags to Kano (another airport in Nigeria) and from there to Abuja. So I got that one. I've never seen the second one. I made complaints and called them and it's been almost one month since I came to the country and I still didn't get it. All my clothes and belongings are inside that bag since it's the big one. I was supposed to travel the same day of the arrival to Calabar, however because I didn't have my bags I had to spend more than one week in the hotel. After that time I got tired so I decided to travel to my destination. They said when the bag is found they'll send it to my address - that's what they say. This is the worst experience I've had. The worst thing is that I have a return ticket.

دبي إلى تورنتو عبر اسطنبول مع الخطوط الجوية التركية. من أسوأ تجارب حياتي. تأخرت الرحلة من دبي لمدة 7 ساعات ، ثم تأخرت الرحلة لمدة يومين في اسطنبول ، وفي النهاية لم تحصل على أي أمتعة مسجلة. لن تطير أبدًا شركة الطيران غير الكفؤة هذه.

من طهران إلى لندن عبر اسطنبول وخدمة فظيعة! تم إلغاء رحلة ربط الخطوط الجوية التركية ، لا معلومات ، لا دعم ، لا شيء. كان علينا أن نفرز أنفسنا ، كان الموظفون فظين وعدوانيين ولم يفعلوا شيئًا للأمهات اللائي لديهن أطفال مما يمكنني رؤيته. كانوا غير أكفاء تماما.

Sofia to Manila via Istanbul and a horrible experience. First flight was cancelled without an announcement. Then they put me on the wrong flight to Istanbul even though they had seats on the earlier flight. Flight was 4 hours late so I missed that connection too. Then they moved me on a flight with Emirates with an extra stop in Dubai but forgot to put my baggage in the flight. Stranded at airports twice, took me 5 days to get to my destination (normally should be a day) and my baggage is lost. Staff was rude and unhelpful. Most barely spoke English and were unhelpful and rude. Cabin crew were mere waitresses only - 'I don't know' was their usual answer to every question that wasn't food related. On that note, food was nothing special. On top of that, their call center is bad - they are incompetent, don't know how to handle customer complaints. One of them even hang up on me when I asked why I wasn't offered a hotel room when they left me stranded for two days in Sofia. With all the issues and problems they caused me, nobody took responsibility or offered an apology, let alone compensation.

London to Doha via Istanbul. My flight was delayed for 4.5 hours from Heathrow T2 on Saturday 2nd January. When we arrived to Turkey there was no information on the board regarding our flight, asked a few members of staff no one knew anything. Whenever I tried asking they'd drive away in their Segway. There was no information on where to go or what to do and we had missed our connecting flight to Doha, Qatar. Queued up for hours to be told our flight is cancelled and we'll leave next day at 8pm. Told us to go to passport control and get hotel voucher. Had to pay for a visa then back to passport control - the officer there was so rude. Eventually got out to see the queue for the hotel desk, it took us 2.5 hours to get the front. Next day when we to the airport for our flight we were told to go to one gate, then told no it's changed an hour before departure time. When I asked another member of staff firstly she ignored me so I had to get her attention by waving at her then she replied "I don't know you go check" - she spoke so rudely. It was not snowing very heavily to cancel or delay flights for that long. The customer service was horrendous never have I met such rude people in my life. We also had to pay for our visa to leave the airport and get a hotel. Never will I travel on Turkish Airlines again.

Manchester to Tokyo return via Istanbul. The inflight entertainment systems were great, seats comfy, food great on all the flights as well. My return flight from Tokyo to Istanbul when I booked was 11:40pm, with no communication from the airline this was moved to 10:40pm. I made the flight (barely) after turning up almost 2 hours early and there being next to nowhere to help someone new to such a large airport. The ground service and cabin service were very inconsistent, cabin service was average on all 4 flights. On the last flight I and the passenger next to me had to ask 3 times for a drink with our meal. The ground staff outside the UK seemed clueless at times as well.

乘坐土耳其航空從北京飛往巴塞羅那，經伊斯坦布爾。當我們乘坐中午 12:50 的航班抵達機場時，我們去辦理登機手續，卻發現我們的航班因機組人員加班而延誤至凌晨 430 點。當時我問為什麼沒有通知我們，這樣我們就可以在酒店住更長時間，而不必在機場睡覺。他們的回應是他們仍然必須在正常時間檢查每個人，我覺得這很荒謬。等了兩個小時後他們給我們提供了三明治。 4.30 飛行員到達並登機，記得我們被告知我們將於 4.30 起飛。 20分鐘後，機組人員抵達。直到5.20我們才開始登機。飛機直到六點才起飛，比我們預定的時間晚了一個半小時。更讓我困擾的是，我們從未因給您帶來的不便而道歉。乘坐土耳其航空公司的航班時，我感到完全無能為力和受到虐待。我再也不會和他們一起坐飛機了。

Αθήνα στη Λυών μέσω Κωνσταντινούπολης και η Turkish Airlines είναι μια πολύ κακή και αντιεπαγγελματική εταιρεία όταν υπάρχει πρόβλημα. Έμεινα κολλημένος στην Κωνσταντινούπολη λόγω του χιονιού για 30 ώρες και δεν είχα πληροφορίες, ούτε φαγητό ούτε αρκετό νερό. Ήταν ένα απόλυτο χάος και έπρεπε να περιμένω στην ουρά για σχεδόν 6 ώρες για να πάρω άλλο αεροπλάνο καθώς το αεροπλάνο μου ακυρώθηκε. Μετά έχασαν τις αποσκευές μου και δεν έχω νέα γι' αυτό, συνεχίζουν να λένε ότι δεν μπορούν να ξέρουν αν είναι αν και έχω τον αριθμό αποσκευών και έκανα τη σωστή ανάκτηση. Απίστευτος!

Dublin to Jakarta via Istanbul. A total shamble, missed the connection at Istanbul due to a slot time for the first flight. Turkish Airlines did not provide direct plane to plane bus transfers. Had they done so many would have been able to make connections. Once inside the terminal the staff rebooked on the next flight 24 hours later. The following night that flight was delayed and delayed. The lounge monitors were inaccurate and the CIP lounge staff incompetent. No information, no announcements, no service. They refused to rebook onto other airlines and failed to deal with customers properly. When we finally got on our way we arrived 34 hours late. As to the long haul flight: avoid the A330-200. The seats are old and uncomfortable (angled and not lie flat) and the IFE is unresponsive. This is not a premium airline. Every time there is a slightest problem Turkish Airlines miserably fail at customer service.

من القاهرة إلى واشنطن العاصمة عبر اسطنبول. كنا نلحق برحلة متصلة في اسطنبول وبسبب الظروف الجوية ، تأخرت رحلتنا حوالي 4 ساعات. بمجرد وصولنا ، ركضنا إلى بوابتنا في عداد المفقودين للتو الرحلة. يمكن أن يحدث سوء الأحوال الجوية والتأخير والإلغاء لأي شركة طيران. الأمر المخيب للآمال هو الطريقة التي تعامل بها موظفو الخطوط الجوية التركية مع هذا الموقف. كانت الفوضى تامة مع الافتقار إلى التواصل وسوء الإدارة وعدم رغبة الموظفين في تقديم المساعدة. كان من الصعب العثور على شخص يتحدث الإنجليزية ، وعندما فعلت ذلك ، كان يتسم بالوقاحة والتنازل. انتظرنا أكثر من 7 ساعات في مكتب النقل للحصول على رحلة أخرى. قيل لنا أن شركة الطيران ستزودنا بإقامة فندقية ، لكننا شعرنا بالصدمة من طول الخط الذي يتطلب انتظارًا من 5 إلى 6 ساعات أخرى. في النهاية دفعنا ثمن الإقامة الخاصة بنا. لقد أصابني الفزع من طريقة تصاعد غضب العملاء وفي بعض الحالات ، تم التعامل مع حالات الطوارئ الطبية أو في هذه الحالة تم التعامل معها بشكل سيء. أثناء الانتظار في الطابور ، شاهدنا ما لا يقل عن 3 معارك جسدية ، وشخصان أغمي عليهما ، وممثلو خدمة العملاء الذين كانوا في حاجة ماسة إلى التدريب المناسب. لقد سافرت مع شركة الطيران هذه في مناسبتين أخريين دون مشاكل ، لكن الخطوط الجوية التركية بالتأكيد تصدعت تحت الضغط.

Oslo to Bahrain via Istanbul. Have flown with Turkish Airlines many times and from many different countries but now is enough. Poor customer service. Bad language skills of staff makes it impossible to communicate or understand messages. Our latest travel took us through Istanbul in the snow storm that crippled the airport and the "help" we got was non existent. They dismissed us after giving us a new flight 20 hours later. We were given no food, water or a place to sleep. We were told "it is not our problem".

London to Istanbul. My bag was lost by Turkish Airlines on the 28th of December. Airport staff said my bag would be returned to me the next day. It did not arrive. I was told that it had been given to a company called ABS Kargo. Two days later, the courier called me and I had to get a Turkish friend to talk to him as he spoke no English (not his fault but you'd think Turkish Airlines would use a company that was able to comunicate effectively) and was told he could not find my address. My friend gave the courier my work address and I was assured the bag would arrive the following day. It did not. Days passed and the courier turned his phone off and was not contactable. During this time I was calling Turkish Airlines every day and was told they could not speak to the courier firm on my behalf. I was told every day that my bag would arrive the next day. It did not. Eventually, following complaints on Twitter and by email I was called by Turkish Airlines to say my bag would arrive the following day - the 3rd of January - it did was damaged.

Von München nach Singapur über Istanbul. Aufgrund des Schnees in IST hatten alle Flüge Verspätung und ich verpasste meinen Anschlussflug. Es kommt zu Schneefällen und ich verstehe, dass dies nicht in der Macht der Fluggesellschaft liegt. Die Art und Weise, mit schwierigen Situationen umzugehen, zeigt jedoch die wahre Qualität der Fluggesellschaft. Turkish Airlines scheitert auf allen Ebenen. Flug hat 4 Stunden Verspätung, in Wirklichkeit muss man um einen Gutschein betteln, Passagiere sitzen fest und TK-Mitarbeiter verstecken sich vor den Gates. Um Informationen oder Gutscheine zu erhalten, muss man erneut den Zoll passieren. Verspätete Ankunft am IST-Flughafen, verpasster Anschlussflug – es werden keine Informationen gegeben, Transferschalter haben 3-stündige Warteschlangen. In Wirklichkeit vergingen zwischen der verspäteten Ankunft und dem Einchecken im Hotel (um 6 Uhr morgens) 4 Stunden – dieser Prozess kann sicherlich verbessert werden. Stellen Sie sicher, dass der Passagier eine Entschuldigung erhält, die sehr einfach, günstig und effektiv ist, aber dies scheint nicht den Standards von TK zu entsprechen. Insgesamt wurde diese Situation sehr schlecht gemeistert. An Bord finde ich, dass Turkish Airlines eine gute Fluggesellschaft ist, aber das gesamte Kundenerlebnis zählt. Ich habe andere Fluggesellschaften gesehen, die viel professioneller und auf Krisensituationen vorbereitet sind.

Birmingham to Kuala Lumpur via Istanbul. The second leg from Istanbul to Kuala Lumpur was delayed for 5.5 hours. Queued at the Turkish Airlines care desk for 30 minutes, just to be brought directly to Burger King for a free meal. A free meal is probably OK, but the staff could have been more polite and friendly. He could barely speak English. There is no apology for the flight delay at all, no explanation as to why it was delayed. Really incompetent staff. On the flight, the food and drinks were good. The orange juice was fresh. Choices of movies were plenty. The air stewardess were not the friendliest, but at least they were quite fast in serving, unlike certain other airlines. I would not recommend this airline purely because of the 5.5 hours delay without any apology.
London to Baku via Istanbul. Turkish Airlines has increased its profile for destinations offered

İstanbul'dan Londra'ya. Kar nedeniyle uçuşum iptal oldu ama Türk Hava Yolları müşteri hizmetleri kabul etmedi. Türkiye AB üyesi olmadığı için AB düzenlemelerine uymuyor. Havaalanında 22 saat beklemek için yiyecek ve içecek satın alma hakkınız olmadığını size memnuniyetle bildirirler. Personelin tutumu, bazı durumlarda kayıtsız, umursamaz ve düpedüz kabadır.

26 Aralık'ta, Koltuk 25A'da İstanbul'dan Lizbon'a uçtu. ve mükemmel bir uçuş Çok lezzetli bir öğle yemeği ve Türk kırmızı şarabı ikram edildi. Kabin görevlileri, keyifli, yararlı ve verimli idi. Bu taşıyıcı hakkında çok iyi bir izlenimim var ve mümkün olduğunda Türkçe kullanacağım.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan Abu Dabi'ye - gecikmelere neden olan kar yağışı nedeniyle IST'de yine tam bir kaos. Bunun için TK'yi suçlayamam. Ancak, her zamanki gibi, TK yer hizmetleri sağlayıcısı TGS tarafından krizin ele alınması acımasızdı. Salonda yetersiz uçuş bilgi ekranları. 3 saat bekledikten ve lounge resepsiyonuna her saat uçuşumun durumuyla ilgili güncellemeleri sormak zorunda kaldıktan sonra neredeyse uçağımı kaçırıyordum. Uçakta, çok az bilgi içeren olağan, anlaşılmaz kokpit anonsu. Yükleme kartı yok. Uçak, Business Class'ta karma kabin konfigürasyonuna sahip kiralık kuşlardan biriydi. TK'yi sadece mil yakmak için veya çok ucuz ücretlerde tavsiye ederim.

Malaga to Cape Town via Istanbul. Good but I also had a suitcase lost. Overall service was fine but they need to be more attentive to passengers. Food was very nice, but the business class seats were not totally flat. I am dismayed about how poorly they are handling my lost luggage situation. It has just disappeared and only the staff from Cape Town airport have taken any interest. The business class lounge in Istanbul was great. The luggage thing makes me lose trust in Turkish Airlines.

İstanbul'dan Bombay'a. Yerdeki personel son derece verimliydi, tekerlekli sandalyem sağlandı. Uçakta kabin ekibinin hizmeti beni çok etkiledi, durumumu anladılar ve rahat ettiğimden emin oldular. BOM'daki tekerlekli sandalye de hemen sağlandı ve kabin ekibi bana dokunaklı bir veda etti. Koltuklar iyiydi, yemekler iyi. Lezzetli türk lokumunu seviyorum. IFE mükemmeldi. Kalkış/zamanında varış.

Paris à Kuala Lumpur via Istanbul avec Turkish Airlines. Le vol de Paris à Istanbul a été retardé de 2 heures. J'avais très peur de ne pas récupérer mes bagages même si je pouvais prendre le prochain vol. Si je rate le vol de correspondance, je devrai attendre 16h à Istanbul, et j'ai été assez contrarié quand ils ne m'ont pas permis de changer mon billet. L'avion est arrivé avec 3 heures de retard après avoir fait le tour d'Istanbul pendant 30 minutes. Ne sous-estimez jamais le trafic aérien à Istanbul ! Heureusement, mon vol de correspondance a également été retardé. J'ai couru jusqu'à la porte d'embarquement pendant 15 minutes et j'ai réussi à prendre le vol. C'est un miracle qu'ils aient livré mes bagages à temps. Les deux avions étaient assez neufs et joliment décorés. Je donne 5 étoiles à l'expérience à bord, cela ne me dérange pas de voler à nouveau avec eux car ils offrent toujours le billet aller simple le moins cher.

Miami to Bangkok via Istanbul. The food was great, the service and seats good. Turkish Airlines is much better than any US airline I have flown. The class separation is weird though. We were served start to finish before economy was served drinks. (I went to the lav and the curtain was open.) I don't understand that.
