I paid for more room so I could sleep but not to be treated differently. The entertainment options were very good. I love being able to see out the front of the plane when in the airports. I also liked the hot towel, Turkish Delight, flight bags and blanket but I wish the blanket were washed rather than perfumed. The over-ear headphones were great. Of four flights only one was on time. I didn't miss any connections because the next flight was 2 hours late and I had a very long layover. I spoke with a young man who had an overnight layover in Istanbul. I don't know where he stayed but he sent me a text saying Turkish Air paid for his room! I don't know how comfortable it was but anything is better than the airport overnight! I've done that twice when US airlines kept us on the tarmac so long we missed our connections and the last rooms in town.

من دبي إلى البندقية عبر اسطنبول. تنمو الخطوط الجوية التركية بسرعة كبيرة ، ومثل أي شيء آخر إذا كانت الكمية هي التركيز ، فإن الجودة تتضرر. أن تكون عضوًا في فئة النخبة لأكثر من 20 عامًا. اتفق مع المراجعات الأخرى على أن الموظفين لا يتحدثون الإنجليزية كثيرًا ويعطون الأولوية للمسافرين الأتراك ، في جميع درجات السفر. نادراً ما تتواصل أطقم قمرة القيادة مع الركاب ، ولا توجد معلومات ذات صلة ، مثل سبب التأخير -0 فقط عدد قليل من الطيارين الأجانب يسمحون لك بالحصول على الصورة الحقيقية! بالإضافة إلى ذلك ، لم تعد الخطوط الجوية التركية تهتم بالتعليقات ، فدعهم يطلعون على آرائنا على هذا الموقع لتصنيف العام المقبل.
曼谷經伊斯坦布爾飛往第比利斯。航班幾乎準點起飛，服務非常好——竭盡全力滿足我的每一個需求。我真的很喜歡土耳其航空的食物。新鮮、完美平衡且健康。和一個很好的葡萄酒選擇。我發現 A330 的平躺床有點窄，我喜歡聽聽我要降落的城市的天氣情況 - 他們不提供這些，而且我厭倦了到達伊斯坦布爾並不得不乘坐巴士前往航站樓，尤其是當您滑行經過眾多空置的登機橋海灣時。

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul-Zagreb seferi. Uçuş sorunsuzdu, bugün çok kuvvetli yan rüzgarlar nedeniyle kalkışta biraz geç kaldık. Uçuş görevlileri kibardı ama bazılarının İngilizcesinin çok kötü olduğunu fark ettim. Türk Hava Yolları, yolcuların kalkış ve iniş sırasında kulaklık kullanmasına izin vermiyor. Uçuş görevlisi bana kızmıştı, çünkü 3 kez gelip iniş ve kalkış sırasında iPhone'umu (uçak modunda) kullanmayı bırakmam gerektiğini söyledi - ancak diğer bazı havayollarında buna izin veriliyor. Yiyecek ve içecekler diğer havayollarının ekonomi sınıfının üzerindedir, bu nedenle en iyi Ekonomi sınıfının Türk Hava Yolları olduğunu söyleyebilirim. Uçak içi eğlence güzeldi, 4 veya 6 müzik kanalı ve LCD'de bazı belgeseller oynuyordu.

Bruxelles-Istanbul aller-retour sur Turkish Airlines. Enregistrement rapide, pas de voie rapide pour le contrôle des passeports mais pour la sécurité. Lounge est le salon redouté de SN Brussels Airlines. L'embarquement et le service à bord étaient étonnamment bons, bien que les choix de nourriture soient les mêmes que d'habitude. J'opte pour commander un plateau de fruits qui est un peu petit pour la durée du vol. Voie rapide à Istanbul et sortie en 5 minutes. Le retour s'est déroulé sans heurts, l'enregistrement a été rapide, la voie prioritaire pour la sécurité et le contrôle des passeports. Salon fabuleux mais l'aéroport d'Istanbul est un gâchis. Trop de vols et à court de portes.

Vienna to Istanbul Sabiha Gokcen. Flight on time, remote stand. Old-looking and dirty Boeing 737. Overhead monitors displaying map, commercials etc. Good legroom, but dirty seat. Interesting inflight magazine. Very nice and smiling cabin crew. Menus distributed with some Turkish delight before takeoff - very nice touch. Food was excellent - large tray with salad, dessert, cheese and crackers, and hot main course (two options to choose from), full beverage cart. Arrived on time. Excellent food, best among many European airlines, but cleaness of an airplane is below expectations.

San Francisco to Milan via Istanbul with Turkish Airlines. Check in was a nightmare. The gate employee didn't communicate seat information, and didn't respond to my concern that my bag would get lost (as it did twice in the past with Turkish Airlines). I spoke with two different managers on basic questions of Turkish Airlines policy, and they were just rude. Each of them asked me to repeat all the information I had already provided (an annoyingly obvious tactic to tire the customer), and then proceeded to quote policy unrelated to my question. Besides saying sir as if it were a four-letter word, and twice rolling their eyes (two different managers) with accompanying tone of condescension, one manager asked me "are you on medication?" Terrible service. Terrible quality. A mean, cynical, and dismissive handling of the customer. So much for Turkish Airlines Gold Premier service! I will never fly Turkish Airlines again, if I can help it.

Bruxelles à Manille via Istanbul. Nous avons volé ce mois-ci avec Turkish Airlines pour la première fois et avons été impressionnés par leur service. La nourriture servie était délicieuse et je me suis sentie choyée par leurs commodités, etc. Le personnel était attentionné. Nous devions prendre un vol très long-courrier mais je me sentais à l'aise. Je m'inquiétais des vols retardés selon les critiques, mais heureusement, tous les vols étaient à l'heure ! Dans l'ensemble, nous avons eu une très belle expérience et je les félicite pour leur travail acharné pour fournir un bon service.

من الرياض إلى ميلانو عبر اسطنبول. كان طاقم الطائرة من الرياض إلى اسطنبول فظًا ومتوازنًا. كانت الطائرة صغيرة في رحلة مدتها 5 ساعات مقارنة بنوع الطائرة من اسطنبول إلى ميلانو ، وهي رحلة أقصر وطائرة أكبر. كانت كلتا الطائرتين ممتلئتين. كان الموظفون الأرضيون غير متعاونين عندما استفسرت في رحلتي المتصلة عن وصول حقائبي وأعطتهم بطاقاتي. كذب الطاقم على وجهي وأجابني أنه في الطائرة. عند وصولي إلى ميلان لم تكن هناك علامات على حقيبتي. وصلت الحقيبة بعد يومين. لن أطأ قدماي على الخطوط الجوية التركية مرة أخرى وسأفضل دفع المزيد على شركة طيران أخرى.

London to Bangkok via Istanbul return, and flights delayed going and coming back. Old planes, uncomfortable seats with not enough leg room. Flight attendants, business like, not friendly. Food was okay and lots to drink. Due to the flight landing late in Istanbul coming back last night, I missed my connecting flight. No comunications from the airline on what to do, in the air or in the Airport. Running around like a headless chicken trying to get another flight. Eventually got another one, just made it to the gate on time. The ground staff in Istanbul are terrible and rude. Then once back in the UK, no luggage, they failed to put my bag on the new flight. Hopefully will be delivered today. If you can help it, never fly Turkish Airlines long haul.

Chicago to Dusseldorf via Istanbul. This was a classic case of high expectations colliding with miserably poor performance. I looked forward to the flight because I love Turkish food and have experienced the wonderful hospitality of the Turkish people. I flew to Istanbul and noticed I was invisible to Turkish Airlines staff. They focused their attention on their Turkish customers. I had a coat and draped over my knees and no one asked to hang it. After about an hour on my knees I finally asked someone to hang it. They also have an elaborate bed-making ritual that begins with a blue packet containing a pillow, blanket etc. They made the beds of their Turkish clientele, but my seat did not even have this packet, nor was I asked if I wanted my bed to be made. The food, however, was excellent. From Istanbul to Dusseldorf I experienced something I've only experienced in third-world travel: Flies. A host of flies bothered us the entire way. As they delivered trays of food, flies alighted on the food as it was being handed to us or placed on our trays. The return trip was worse. Flies again plagued us from Dusseldorf to Istanbul. But the worst service came with the person who issued boarding passes. She asked me if I wanted an aisle seat, and I said yes. I then added, "I flew bulkhead from Istanbul to Dusseldorf and do not want to fly bulkhead again." Her response "Of course." Imagine my shock when I discovered my 12 hour flight from Istanbul to Chicago was a bulkhead middle seat. What sort of perversity leads a person to ask a traveler, "Would you like an aisle seat," and then give them a middle seat? Or acknowledge the bulkhead's lack of desirability, and then placing the passenger there for 12 hours? Turkish Airlines should come with this warning. No matter how cheap they make the cost of your flight, it is not worth it. The customer processing system went out of order in Istanbul prior to the flight to Chicago. Every ticket was manually logged using pen and paper. So, they held up the boarding of the flight, and sent down segments. Normally, you would expect the business class to go first, followed by the business class. Not in Turkey. The most important quality a passenger can have is being Turkish. So, the people who boarded first were people whose trip originated in Istanbul. Meaning, about 90% of the first boarders were locals. Then, once we encountered those who were checking boarding passes, complete chaos reigned. If I can avoid flying Turkish Airlines I will. It is just not worth the pain and perverse customer service.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan Kazablanka'ya. Check-in kolaydı ve özel pasaport kuyruğu mükemmeldi. Yer hizmetleri personeli mümkün olduğu kadar çok yolcuyu otobüse sıkıştırmaya çalıştığı için uçağa biniş süreci sancılıydı. Otobüs şoförü oldukça hızlı sürdü ve virajları gerçekten hızlı döndü, bu da bazı yolcuların birbiriyle çarpışmasına ve güvensiz bir durum yaratmasına neden oldu. Yerleşik deneyim, çok sınırlı eğlence dışında iyiydi. Uçak içi eğlencede yalnızca birkaç film ve TV şovu vardı ve olağan teklifleri yansıtmadı. Yemekler iyiydi ve kabin ekibi çoğunlukla arkadaş canlısıydı. Güvenlik videosunda tuvalet kapısının nasıl açılıp kilitleneceği ve tuvaletin sifon çekileceği ile ilgili bazı talimatlar, Orta Doğu ve Kuzey Afrika ülkelerine yapılan uçuşlar için gerçekten yardımcı olacaktır çünkü bu uçuşlardaki birçok yolcu bu görevleri yerine getirmekte zorlanmaktadır. Bunun yolcu deneyimini daha iyi hale getireceğini ve Uçuş Görevlilerine yardımcı olacağını düşünüyorum.

New York to Lahore via Istanbul return with Turkish Airlines was a great experience. Flights were on time. The hospitality onboard with helpful and friendly staff made it a good experience. The food was delicious, inflight entertainment system was one of the best. Seat with a lot of legroom.

İstanbul'dan Washington'a. Türk Hava Yolları'nda birçok kez business class'ta uçtum ve neredeyse her uçuşta aynı deneyimi yaşıyorum. Havaalanı, dinlenme salonları, koltuklar ve eğlence sistemi iyi ama hizmet vasat veya kötü yani. biniş süreci, uçuş ve müşteri hizmetleri aracılığıyla. Bu uçuşta biniş dağınık ve kaotikti. Kalkıştan sonra bir film izlemeye çalıştım ama ekran modlar arasında gidip geliyor ve filmi bozuyordu. Görevlinin ne yapacağı hakkında hiçbir fikri yoktu. Yeniden başlatmayı denedi ama bu hiçbir şeyi düzeltmedi. Özel nezaket hizmeti aracılığıyla herhangi bir özür dilemedi ve hatta sahte bir telafi girişiminde bulunmadı. İyi bir yönü, business class yolcuları için ücretsiz wi-fi idi. Bunun, özellikle arızalı ekranım için son derece müteşekkir olduğum bir özellik olduğunu söylemeliyim. Ve wi-fi, uçuş boyunca aksamadan çalıştı. Türk Hava Yolları üst düzey bir hava yolu şirketi olmayı arzulayabilir, ancak sunduğu hizmet bu seviyeye ulaşmaktan çok uzaktır.

Montréal à Dubaï via Istanbul avec Turkish Airlines. Bon vol, bon repas, gens sympas. Depuis ma date de départ le 6 novembre, j'essaye de changer ma date de retour. Depuis ce premier rendez-vous, je parle au mur. J'ai appelé quand j'étais à Montréal. La dame m'a dit qu'elle n'avait pas pu changer mon vol avant le départ. Elle m'a dit que c'était beaucoup plus facile en voyage. À Dubaï, je suis allé à l'aéroport et j'ai trouvé le bureau fermé. Il y a un numéro de téléphone sur la porte qui me renvoie au bureau principal d'Istanbul. J'ai appelé là-bas et ils m'ont dit qu'ils ne pouvaient rien faire à partir de là. La dame m'a dit d'aller à l'avion. Je suis un voyageur de longue date et c'est la première fois que je me heurte à un mur comme celui-là. Je réfléchirai à deux fois avant de réserver à nouveau avec Turkish Airlines.

Von Zürich über Istanbul nach Ankara. Die Bordverpflegung von Turkish Airlines ist überdurchschnittlich gut – gute Qualität und schöne Präsentation. Das Personal spricht jedoch kaum Englisch und die Beinfreiheit ist sehr begrenzt. Mein Anschlussflug nach Ankara wurde von TK storniert und ich wurde auf den nächsten Flug dorthin gebucht. Als ich versuchte, für meinen Rückflug einzuchecken, stellte sich heraus, dass alle verbleibenden Flüge auf meinem Ticket storniert worden waren, mit der Begründung, ich hätte eine Teilstrecke meines ursprünglichen Fluges geändert! Völlig inakzeptabel: keine Entschuldigung, keine Hilfe.

टर्किश एयरलाइंस के साथ इंस्टाबुल के माध्यम से मुंबई से पॉडगोरिका तक। मुझे तुरंत चेक-इन और बोर्डिंग मिल गई। एक फ्लाइट अटेंडेंट असभ्य थी और दूसरी अच्छी और मिलनसार थी। उनके पास अच्छे संचार कौशल थे। सीरीज और फिल्मों के बड़े चयन के साथ IFE अच्छा था। मैं शाकाहारी हूं इसलिए दोनों उड़ानों में खाना भी अच्छा था। सीट में लेगरूम अच्छा था। हमें तकिया आदि जैसी बुनियादी सुविधाएं प्रदान की गईं। यहां तक ​​कि उड़ान भी समय पर थी। सब कुछ ठीक था।

Αθήνα προς Οσάκα μέσω Κωνσταντινούπολης με Turkish Airlines. Όλες οι πτήσεις στην ώρα τους εκτός από το ATH-IST καθυστέρησαν λόγω κίνησης στο IST. Μια δίωρη σύνδεση έγινε στενή. Όλες οι άλλες πτήσεις σχεδόν στην ώρα τους. Καθίσματα άνετα, εξαιρετικά γεύματα, ικανοποιητική επιλογή ταινιών. Επαγγελματικά συνεργεία με θετική διάθεση. Ωστόσο, θα πρέπει να προγραμματίσουν μια επιπλέον υπηρεσία ποτού κατά τη διάρκεια μεγάλων πτήσεων. Θα χρησιμοποιούσα ξανά.

Kuala Lumpur to Istanbul in business class, 2 persons. We have travelled a lot of times with Turkish Airlines and always had the experience of flatbed. This time it was an old aircraft and the bed was not able to be like a flatbed. All the pictures we see of business class seats and beds had nothing to do with this experience we had here. Severel of the seats was broken, the tv screens was not too good. When we landed in Istanbul the plain was taxied to the reparations area. We were very disappointed over this flight. Though we love the food and the staff was very competent and friendly.

New York JFK to Catania via Istanbul, and I chose Turkish Airlines because they had a competitive rate, good connection times, and great ratings. On my return home I was supposed to have a 1.5 hour layover and arrive home at 6 pm. They changed the flight and I had a 5 hour layover and arrived home at 11. And, waited well over an hour for my baggage. Worst experience and will never fly again.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan Malta'ya. Gemide profesyonel, ancak yerde çok fazla değil, personel zaman zaman yavaş ve kaba. Hatların inanılmaz olduğu söylendiği için erken geldim! Çok fazla diz mesafesi olan, aşağı yukarı yeni uçak. Uçakta servis harika, yemekler harika, uçuş zamanında kalkıyor, istek üzerine video yok, onları yalnızca bağlantılar için tavsiye ederim ve fiyat doğruysa çünkü pahalılar!

Baku to Istanbul with Turkish Airlines. Yet again another late arrival at Istanbul Ataturk and no apology as usual. Always a bus to the terminal. Plane was hot and though pleased to have a TV, the headphones were crackling as system hanging out. Istanbul Ataturk Airport just gets worse and worse, and I cannot remember when i last landed on time.

Lahore to New York via Istanbul. I made sure before travelling Business class on Turkish Airlines that I will get a wide body plane in which the seat made into a flat bed, but they switched the Lahore to Istanbul plane to a 737 with narrow seats that did not make into bed. At Istanbul missed my connecting flight because the gate did not show on the Business Class monitors till late, and when I reached the gate they told me the passengers were just put on the last bus to the airplane and they could not get me on the plane. The staff was rude and unfriendly and told me that for me to get the next flight I had to get a visa and then go outside to the the ticketing office located in the airport and then re-enter. The Business Class help desk could not get me the boarding card for the next flight though I was paying them for the 350 euros for the new ticket. I had to change the date on my return flight and Turkish Airlines agent told me to they could not do it on the phone, and I had to come to their office which was a two hours drive, and it took them one hour to re-issue the new ticket at a cost of $105 surcharge. This airline has bad customer service and when I sent them a writtem complaint, they took two months to answer and said they are not at fault for any of my suffering.

Seoul to Toronto via Istanbul on October 20th 2015. First flight on Turkish Airlines Boeing 777-300 departure at 23:50. Rude Swissport staff handled the check-in. They informed me that they could not tag my luggage all the way to Toronto because my second flight was on Air Canada despite both airlines being part of Star Alliance and having code share agreement on the IST-YYZ flight. Sent to the China Eastern Lounge, nothing fancy about the lounge except an interesting cheese plate : a pile of Kraft Singles slices with Ritz crackers around it. Boarded the flight at 23:10. Comfort Class premium economy almost empty, seat rather comfortable except for the leg rest that is low. Two good meals on the 11 hour flight. We landed early at 4:45am in Istanbul. I had to collect my luggage that was not tagged directly to Canada. At passport control I was informed that a Transit Visa does not exist and that I needed to buy a 60$ / 90 days visa. I paid for the Visa, collected my bag and was out of customs in 10 minutes. I then went upstairs to the check-in area to find a deserted area with every seat crowded with people sleeping. Again, due to Turkish Airline stupid baggage rule, I had to wait from 5 am to 7:50 am for the Air Canada counter to open. I was checked-in to my preselected business class seat and baggage tagged in 45 seconds. I then went to passport control once again and waited for AC811 to Toronto. This very bad customer service experience really discredits Star Alliance.

Entebbe to London via Istanbul. Loading at Entebbe was late and when got down to the airport apron a Turkish Airlines agent rushed up and asked what we were doing. The answer was, unsurprisingly, boarding the plane. He informed us all abruptly we should not be boarding and ushered us back to the door area we had just come out of. He told us to wait. It was pouring with rain. After 30 mins the passengers were wandering around the apron area (which was unsafe) while the aircraft was still being prepared (passengers who started their journey in Kigali had a one-and-half hour trust at Entebbe on the plane - that must have been a joy. Totally unprofessional attitude from the Turkish Airlines ground staff. On getting on the plane my seat, and other seats, in business class were covered in spare blankets and pillows. I asked for my seat area to be tidied up - I was glared and growled at by the steward. "Do it yourself" he said - I suggested that he should tidy the seat area for his passengers. Snack served if wanted after take off, but as was 4.00am most people slept. Breakfast was served just before landing. The transfer at IST was the usual shambles - other have reported on this. The flight Istanbul to London was OK. Food was good, but I just can't work out what the Chef on Board does. They don't cook anything. The airline moves people from A-B - it does not do it with a smile or grace. The advertisements the airline churn out obviously are very successful in that they have promoted a shoddy and smileless airline into a global brand. The airline has to depend on more than just good food - it has to be known for efficiency and friendliness of service on hte ground and in the air. Small bonus I arrived at LHR along with my luggage.

Manchester to Ercan via Istanbul return with Turkish Airlines. Great food and beverages, comfy seating with pillow and blanket, good selection of television entertainment, and lovely staff. Certainly on a par with Emirates for their service at a fraction of the cost.

من دبي إلى اسطنبول. الخطوط الجوية التركية A330 بمقاعد جديدة و IFE. كان اختيار الأفلام جيدًا. بالنسبة لي ، فإنهم يقدمون أفضل غذاء لشركات الطيران ويقدمون مجموعة واسعة من المشروبات. طاقم الطائرة لطيف. غادرت الرحلة دبي في الوقت المحدد ، ولكن بسبب ازدحام مطار إسطنبول ، هبطت متأخرة 15 دقيقة. لم تحترم أولوية الصعود على متن الطائرة. أنا عضو في النخبة وأتوقع معاملة مختلفة من الخطوط الجوية التركية للمسافرين المخلصين ودرجة رجال الأعمال.

Da Roma a Istanbul, e quando questo volo è atterrato, un certo numero di passeggeri si è alzato dai sedili, ha aperto le cappelliere e ha iniziato a rimuovere i bagagli, l'aereo era a soli 5 minuti dall'area dei taxi. In tutto sono stati coinvolti circa 15 passeggeri. L'equipaggio non ha fatto nulla. Nessun membro dell'equipaggio è nemmeno apparso a questo caos che si stava svolgendo e mettendo a rischio la sicurezza. A peggiorare le cose, le luci della cabina erano state spente (era un arrivo in prima serata) e la cabina era in semioscurità. Questi passeggeri hanno iniziato a scendere dal bagaglio dell'aereo mentre l'aereo si stava muovendo verso il gate. Alla fine, il capo steward decise di impartire loro l'ordine di tornare ai loro posti. Questo era ridicolo dato che aveva ancora la musica fastidiosa e le luci della cabina spente. Alla fine, dopo circa altri 5-7 minuti, la maggior parte dei passeggeri è tornata ai propri posti. Il personale di cabina non è riuscito a riconoscere il potenziale pericolo e ad agire. Ero così arrabbiato che ho fatto sapere al capitano mentre stavo lasciando l'aereo. Turkish Airlines, prendi sul serio la sicurezza dei passeggeri e istruisci il personale di cabina su come affrontare questo tipo di comportamento.

تأخرت رحلة الدوحة إلى اسطنبول وفوتنا رحلة الربط الخاصة بنا إلى باريس. لا توجد إرشادات مناسبة لركاب الترانزيت ، فقد تُركنا جميعًا برحمة الله. تمكنا أخيرًا من الوصول إلى مكتب الخطوط الجوية التركية ، لكننا شعرنا بالصدمة لرؤية العديد من الضحايا يقاتلون بالفعل من أجل رحلاتهم الفائتة. لقد استقلنا الرحلة التالية بعد 3 ساعات ، وسافرنا مع أطفال وأم مسنة ، كانت تجربة سيئة للغاية. لن نستخدم الخطوط الجوية التركية مرة أخرى. أثناء عودتنا من جنيف إلى اسطنبول ، تم إصدار أمر صعود على متن الطائرة دون التحقق من تأشيرتنا ، مما أدى إلى قضاء ليلة واحدة في المطار قبل العودة إلى الدوحة.

Türk Hava Yolları ile İstanbul'dan Ankara'ya uçuş rahattı, zamanında ve hizmet iyiydi. Personel genel olarak güler yüzlü ve yardımcıydı. Uçuş kalkış tarihine yakın satın alım yapıldığında fiyatları çok yüksektir, bu nedenle genel olarak mevcut olan promosyon fiyatları için önceden plan yapın.

Karachi to Istanbul to Chicago in February 2015: We took off on time. Istanbul Airport had snow and was shut, so re-routed to Ankara. Passengers from our flight were the first to arrive at the Ankara Transit Lounge and then came passengers from 7 other re-routed flights. Food was scarce. One sandwich and one cold drink in 10 hours. Snack store made money hand over fist. The worst part was that there were hardly any Turkish Airlines officials available to tell us that what the plan was. There were no public announcements about how long we will be there. People started to get angry not because they were stuck at the airport, they were angry because the Airline staff never bothered to tell us how long we will be stuck there. After about 10 hours of being in the transit lounge, they finally said we will be taken to a hotel for overnight stay. They said they will pay for the visa fee. We finally were herded to immigration and found out that we have to pay the visa fee and file for a reimbursement later. Some people had no $$s cash with them. Some people were very angry as $40 was a huge sum of money for them. After another two hours in the immigration line, we got our visas and were told that there are buses outside waiting to take us to hotel. Well, that was too good to be true. It took another 2.5 hours of standing in line in front of the terminal exit waiting for the buses to arrive/load. Finally we were got into a bus. On a positive note, the hotel was nice and dinner was free. At the hotel, one of the hotel staff told us that the passengers will have two choices in the morning: a 4 hour bus/train ride back to Istanbul airport. Once there, they will try to find a flight to get us out of the country, or possibly get us on a flight leaving from Ankara airport. I called United Airlines Global Services and they were able to get me a flight out of Ankara. I will not travel with Turkish again.

I flew London to Ankara via Istanbul, and it is difficult to put into words how bad Turkish Airlines is. Their customer service desk at Istanbul seems designed to annoy as many people as possible in as shortest time as possible. We missed the connection because the first flight was delayed, and then I spent three hours in a line waiting to get a new flight. Despite having a business class ticket, I was turned away from the Business lounge and had to wait in the main terminal. The attitude of every Turkish Airlines staff member I spoke to was appalling.

इस्तांबुल के रास्ते दिल्ली से बार्सिलोना, वापसी। A330 पर तीन उड़ानें और A321 पर IST-BCN। सीट पिच पर्याप्त थी, उड़ान फिल्मों में कुछ नवीनतम ब्लॉकबस्टर थे। भोजन पर्याप्त, अच्छी तरह से प्रस्तुत किया गया, हालांकि केबिन क्रू थोड़ा अजीब लग रहा था। सभी चार उड़ानों में समय पर प्रदर्शन।

İstanbul'dan Zürih'e A330 Business sınıfında. İstanbul havalimanı kaotik, business class için biniş öncesi anonsu yok. Uçakta, bir mürettebat üyesi şef üniforması, omlet ve ne yazık ki her zamanki havayolu yumurtası slopu giymiş. İş kabini çok güzel ve ferah. İyi bir seçim ile büyük video monitörü. Koltuklar bölme değildi ama rahattı. Uçuş boyunca ücretsiz ve hızlı wifi. Servis çok iyi ve kahvaltı bir havayolu için iyiydi. Business class salonu çok meşgul olmasına rağmen çeşitli ve iyi bir yiyecek ve içecek sunumu sunuyordu.

Paris à Cape Town via Istanbul avec Turkish Airlines. Nouvel avion sur les deux jambes. Excellent système de divertissement et bon dégagement pour les jambes. Enregistrement facile à Paris et embarquement fluide. Personnel de cabine sur les deux vols très attentif, bouteille d'eau pour le vol de nuit et réponse rapide aux appels. Nourriture passable. Le principal problème est à l'aéroport d'Istanbul. Il est maintenant très occupé et peut sembler chaotique. Pour les deux vols là-bas - atterrissage et décollage - nous avons été transportés par bus vers et depuis l'aéroport. Cela signifiait un long voyage vers et depuis l'avion. La porte du bus vers l'avion a une petite zone d'attente, aucun moyen clair de faire la queue et aucune priorité n'est donnée aux passagers, qu'ils soient âgés, aient des enfants en bas âge ou soient en affaires. Plus le problème de l'aéroport que de la compagnie aérienne.

Dhaka to Istanbul leg was ok. Cabin staff were freindly enough. The food options could be better. During Istanbul to Munich, we did not get our pre-booked seat. Our 5 year old child always wants the window seat and for him we make extra effort to book it. However due to a change of aircraft, the airline chaged our seats and gave our son a window seat for sure but with two strangers either side od him. Me and my wife were given seats two rows behind without any window seat. Not only this sudden change, but the behavior of the ground staff was unfriendly and stubborn.

Retour de Bruxelles à Istanbul, enregistrement rapide et voie rapide. Salon SN Brussels qui est épouvantable puis embarquement très rapide. J'ai volé cette compagnie aérienne 8 fois cette année seulement et j'ai été agréablement surpris. Cette version assise de l'A330 était épouvantable et le service une honte ! Mêmes menus, sauf que cette fois l'équipage a décidé de disparaître dans les toilettes de la cuisine ou de bavarder devant les portes ! Stand éloigné à Istanbul et transporté en bus jusqu'au terminal utilisé en voie rapide par Turkish Airlines, mais un groupe de toruistes avec des problèmes de visa était juste devant moi, donc l'expérience n'a pas été du tout rapide! Excellent enregistrement et salon fabuleux à Istanbul. Commandé un plateau de fruits au retour qui a fait l'affaire. Embarquement même vieille histoire et transporté en avion. Je suis très déçu de Turkish Airlines.

Hamburg nach Istanbul und zurück. Auf beiden Flügen verlief alles reibungslos und wir trafen nettes und freundliches Personal. Der Service und das Essen an Bord waren gut. Wir empfehlen dringend, mit Turkish Airlines zu fliegen
新加坡飛往伊斯坦布爾 搭乘土耳其航空航班。我們的登機時間是22:15，起飛時間是23:15——實際起飛時間是23:30。食物很美味。小屋太冷了，但是給了我 1 條毯子和 1 個枕頭，如果他們不給的話我會凍僵的。降落前2小時，機組人員為我們分發了早餐。
7 月 7 日 TK69 曼谷飛往伊斯坦布爾，商務艙客滿，但乘務長和他的團隊表現出色。他們都很忙，但對乘客保持著非常友好的態度。它擁有世界上最好的航空食品。在伊斯坦布爾轉機後，伊斯坦布爾飛往曼徹斯特的航班提供相同標準的服務和食物。

Jakarta to Istanbul with a stopover at Singapore Changi. Check in was smooth even though Turkish didn't have a fixed check in counter in CGK. Boarding was fast and smooth. On CGK-SIN flight sandwich was served a good one with a selection of drinks. Then we have to leave the plane and reboard again one hour later at Changi. The SIN- IST leg was great the crew served properly but it lacked eye contact. They were chatting with fellow crew members while they were serving passengers. The catering service was good and the amenity case was a good looking tin pencil case which was a nice touch. The IFE was decent with a broad choice of movies and music. The return trip was in the same quality except a fair 45-60 minutes delay because of congestion at Istanbul Ataturk. My conclusion Turkish is a great choice for a long haul flight.

乘坐最新的 TK 777-300ER 航班從香港飛往伊斯坦布爾，配備全新的商務和經濟艙座位。這架飛機上不再有舒適艙（高級經濟艙）。這是一次很棒的飛行：這個新的商務艙看起來非常現代，IFE 有很多新的內容和功能可供選擇，並且配備了非常易於使用的新遠程阿聯酋航空風格。廁所的佈局也進行了更新，現在更大了。食物很棒（但這不是 TK 的新聞）。優秀的年輕全男性機組人員非常友好且訓練有素。他們讓我在 11 小時的飛行中感受到被照顧。再次強烈推薦。

TK 333 Baku to Istanbul. Six hours delayed without any explanation. Once it finally boarded and took off the crew never acknowledged the delay in any way just wished us a nice flight! Toward the end of the flight they announced gates for those who had not missed their connections. Never acknowledged that some of us had gave no instructions whatsoever. When I found a service desk the guy printed out my new boarding pass (for a flight the next morning) and threw it at me only when I asked did he blurt out something about going through passport control then to the hotel desk. By then it was late at night three PP control guys serving a huge crowd people starting to get angry and shout. I was afraid I would get through PP control then not get any help and be stuck outside the airport so instead I headed for the wonderful Turkish Airlines VIP lounge. There they refused to give me one of the sleeping rooms but did offer a "five star hotel" and a shuttle if I left the airport. By then it was so late that I would barely have time to get to the hotel before it would be time to return to the airport for my early flight so I hung out in the lounge all night. In all this time there was never the slightest apology for the delay or even a smile. I travel a great deal and am usually fine with different personal styles (and I love Turkey!) but this was over the top for lousy customer service.

Boston-Istanbul-Boston in economy. Excellent fare ($600 round trip). Flights on time. Clean aircraft and seating fine for economy. Good choice of on-demand movies. Flight attendants pleasant and decent food. Recommended.

İstanbul'dan Washington'a TK007, Kasım 272014. Uçuş dolu değildi ve uçağın arka tarafında banyoların ve yemek arabası saklama dolaplarının yanında kendime 3 koltuk ayırdım. Bu yoğun bir alandır ama ekstra oda buna değdi. Bu havayolu hakkında sadece harika şeyler söyleyebilirim. Ekip, herkesin iyi bakıldığından emin olmak için çok çalışıyor. Uçuş başlangıcındaki lokum hoş bir dokunuş. Yolculuk boyunca içecekler servis edildi ve kaliteli idi. Yemekler bir havayolu şirketi için mükemmel kalitedeydi ve genel olarak kabinin hissini ve modern temiz tasarımını gerçekten beğendim. Koltuklar yeni görünüyordu ve rahattı. Dizlerim için bolca yerim vardı, bu da 6,5 ​​fit boyunda olduğum için bir rahatlama oldu. Uçak içi eğlence sistemi ve film seçimi birinci sınıftır. Fiyat çok yüksek ve personel profesyonel olduğu için bu havayolunu seçtiğim için çok müteşekkirim. Şükran Günü akşamı tam zamanında indi. Bir havayolundan daha ne istenir ki? Türkler, bin yılı aşkın bir süredir misafirperverlikleri ile tanınırlar.

Bruxelles à Istanbul. L'avion était propre et élégant et le personnel était serviable et bien organisé. Les normes d'anglais du personnel étaient également très bonnes. La nourriture était très savoureuse. Les divertissements en vol ne semblaient fonctionner sur aucun siège du vol aller, même s'ils étaient bons sur le vol aller avec un choix décent de films et d'émissions de télévision. On vous offre un morceau de délice turc après le décollage, ce qui est une délicate attention. Turkish Airlines est nettement meilleur que son aéroport d'origine.
Flight Dublin to Istanbul. Couldn't have wished for any better crew very pleasant and helpful food was lovely and roomy for economy. I will definitely fly with TA again.

Roma-Istanbul. Il volo originale è stato inizialmente ritardato ma ci sono state fornite poche informazioni. Alla fine ci dissero che un altro aereo sarebbe arrivato da Istanbul e che ci sarebbe stato offerto un pasto. C'erano così tante restrizioni e incongruenze con il pasto fornito. Le informazioni sul volo non erano disponibili nonostante diverse richieste. Sono state fornite informazioni inesatte sulla necessità di modificare le carte d'imbarco. Il personale di terra era quasi inutile e quando alla fine arrivò il supervisore, si stava imbarcando in modo decisamente aggressivo e non avrebbe risolto il nostro problema con le carte d'imbarco. Il volo è stato deludente. Il sistema di intrattenimento in volo non funzionava e il mio pasto speciale richiesto non era disponibile. All'atterraggio i passeggeri stavano camminando intorno all'aereo mentre si muoveva. L'equipaggio di cabina non ha fatto nulla e ha persino riso del bambino che correva su e giù per il corridoio mentre l'aereo si muoveva.

Sabah uçağıyla İstanbul'dan Selanik'e. Uçağa bindi. J kabininde iki mürettebat çalışıyordu (kıdemli mürettebat üyesi dahil). J kabininin yükü sadece 6. Kalkıştan önce servis için sıcak kahvaltı seçeneklerinin olduğu menüyü dağıttılar. Kalkıştan sonra mürettebat servise başladı. Mürettebat üyesi herhangi bir etkileşim olmadan gelip tepsiyi bana uzattı. Tepsi meyveli yoğurtlu kruvasan ve çeşitli peynirlerden oluşuyordu. Bir şey içmek isteyip istemediğimi veya hangi sıcak yemek seçeneğini istediğimi asla sormadım. Emniyet kemeri işareti yanmadan tuvalete gitmek için kalktım. Mürettebat, bir Y kabin müşterisinin tuvaleti kullanmasına izin verdiğinden ve o, tuvalete bütün bir ağaç ağacı fırlattığından, J kabin tuvaleti ilgili kabin müşterileri için kullanılamaz hale geldi. Diğer mürettebat üyesi nihayet bana içecek bir şey isteyip istemediğimi soruyor. Türk kahvesi istedi. Dışarı çıktıktan sonra bir ekip üyesinden tepsimi almasını istedim. Sonra kahvem geliyor. O sırada emniyet kemeri uyarısı yandı. İnişten önce kabini emniyete almak için kimse gelmedi. Selanik'e indi. Sadece en son gelen öncelikli çantaları bulmak için atlıkarıncadaki valizlerimizi bekledik. Günün sonunda kısa bir uçuş, onlar için uzun bir yolculuğun ne kadar önemli olabileceğinin bir göstergesidir.

दिल्ली से इस्तांबुल तक का सफर बहुत ही भयानक था। सीटों की खराब गुणवत्ता वाली पुरानी उड़ान। पूरी उड़ान के दौरान मनोरंजन प्रणाली काम नहीं कर रही थी। गर्मी चरम पर होने के कारण पानी मांगा और पेय पदार्थ शुरू होने तक नहीं आया। चालक दल रूखे थे। इस्तांबुल से स्वीडन की उड़ान बेहतर गुणवत्ता वाली थी लेकिन भोजन फिर से दयनीय था। स्वीडन से इस्तांबुल तक का खाना सहनीय था। इस्तांबुल से दिल्ली - फिर मनोरंजन काम नहीं कर रहा था। मैं फिर कभी यह उड़ान नहीं भरूंगा. शुक्र है कि वहाँ 1-2 क्रू सदस्य थे जो थोड़े विनम्र थे अन्यथा प्रत्येक पैरामीटर पर एक स्टार दिया जाता।

Washington Dulles to Istanbul Business Class. I was re-routed from a cancelled flight onto this one and what a nice surprise it turned out to be. The flight arrived on time and the cabin crew were very polite. The service was excellent with on demand entertainment comfortable reclining seats to sleep in and a complimentary meal service. This was not at all like flying with the USA's airlines where the staff are usually brusque and rude and the service generally terrible. I very much recommend Turkish Airlines for long haul business class.

Johannesburg to Istanbul on 3rd April 2014 flight TK 41. The flight was full yet flight attendants graciously attended to each passenger. They smiled and were extremely polite which is something that seems to be lacking across a number of airlines. Aircraft was very clean in great condition and the interior - in turquoise colour had a calming Mediterranean feeling to it. We were offered Turkish delights and dried fruit. Dinner followed it was sumptuous served with a variety of wines and other drinks. It was a pleasant 8 hour flight I was comfortable throughout. Toilets were spacious and clean. Throughout the flight the attendants were always nearby.

من دبي إلى برشلونة عبر اسطنبول (الرحلة TK 0761 و TK1853 IST - برشلونة) في 15 مارس 2014. تأخرت الرحلة من دبي ولكننا وصلنا قبل 50 دقيقة من مغادرة رحلة برشلونة. مطار اسطنبول فوضى كاملة. لو كان موظفو الخطوط الجوية التركية يضعوننا كأولوية في أمن المطار ، لكنا سنلحق الرحلة بسهولة. كان علينا ترتيب فندق مطار على نفقتنا.

İstanbul'dan Londra Gatwick'e 23 Şubat. Çok rahat hizmet. AVOD, 3 saatin biraz üzerindeki bir uçuş için oldukça iyiydi ve özellikle diğer taşıyıcılara kıyasla yiyecek boldu. Personel verimli ama belki daha kolay olabilirdi.
曼谷飛往伊斯坦布爾。進港航班與出港航班相反。起飛前，有人不斷地在過道上走來走去，顯然是在處理這個或那個。一旦到達高處，服務還可以，但有一些混亂

İstanbul'dan Bangkok'a. İşlevsel ama güler yüzlü hizmet esp. "şef" den. Mükemmel yemekler bu gerçekten skora yardımcı oldu. 340'ın koltuğu uzun bir uçuş için pek iyi olmasa da her şey yolunda gitti (koltuk incelememe bakın). Koltuk nedeniyle burada sadece "iyi değer".

Dublin to Istanbul 27 Dec returning on 1 January. Outgoing flight TK 1978/27 return flight TK 1975/01. Great service staff and entertainment. Couldn't fault this airline and I am a frequent flyer. Would definitely recommend using their services again.
Milas/Bodrum to IST at the end of October. The airport at Milas seems relatively new. Check in staff pleasant and efficient. Lounge was good for a regional airport. Cabin crew very good.

London to Dhaka via Istanbul twice in the last month. Usually I have a good experience with Turkish. However this time it was not so great. The London to Istanbul segments were mostly OK with the exception of the last return flight which was one of the most unpleasant flights I have had in a long time. It started with the children from hell in the row behind. The aircraft was an older A321 which had very poor leg room no IFE to speak of and it was too hot. One lady was quite ill because of the heat. The cabin crew refused to do anything despite complaints. I think everyone just wanted to get off so we were not pleased at having to fly around London on hold for half an hour. The Istanbul/Dhaka part is not operated by Turkish but by Meridiana an Italian charter operation. The A330 aircraft are old and do not come close to the normal Turkish standard. The IFE was very limited - no video on demand seats were old and business seats were basic and not worthy of the price. All airlines seem to put their worst and oldest aircraft on the routes into this part of Asia. I have flown with Emirates and Qatar Airways and both do the same. It is unfair as you do not pay any less for the ticket. On the positive side the overcrowding of the business lounge in Istanbul has improved. I did not have to sit on the floor on any of the 3 times I used it.

Birmingham to Dalaman via Istanbul and return. First time I've used Turkish Airlines and it won't be the last. Clean comfortable planes with plenty of leg room friendly crew members good meal on 4hr flight and snacks on short domestic flight. I usually use a charter flight direct to Dalaman to avoid having to change planes in Istanbul but it was an easy transfer and it actually cost less than any of the charter flights. My only complaint would be that the cabin was very hot and the air conditioning was ineffective.

London LGW to BKK via IST. Business Class Passenger. LGW-IST sector on older Airbus. Only 2 out of 20 BC passengers. Only BC Toilet out of action. Seat Mechanism did not operate. Could not eject remote control from socket. Food very bland and wine selection poor. LCD screen at alternative seat very faint and could not be adjusted. IST-BKK sector had much new Aircraft but again food quality very ordinary despite one attendant being dressed as "Chef" Food was microwaved and very bland. Indifferent staff on both sectors. Got distinct impression that if they liked you you got better service.

Nous avons volé Paris à Kayseri le 30 septembre. Vol totalement complet de Paris à Istanbul. Cependant bon service et un vol sans incident. A dû se déplacer rapidement pour se rendre au terminal domestique pour le vol vers Kayseri. Les bagages ont heureusement été enregistrés. Ce vol n'était pas complet et s'est déroulé sans incident. Service rapide d'un repas léger car temps de vol un peu plus d'une heure. Bref bons vols.

London to Istanbul 16/08/13 flight TK1980. 2 out of my last 3 flights were delayed. One for 6 hrs on a 3.5 hrs flight and another 1.15 hrs on 50 min flight. There is lack of information and communication from ground staff and poor customer relations. I find food to be average. Never had any problems with cabin crew as they are very professional. I think Turkish Airlines expanded its fleet and destinations too much too soon and now cannot manage it properly.

新加坡經伊斯坦布爾飛往都柏林，再從都柏林經伊斯坦布爾返回新加坡。感謝他們在從伊斯坦布爾飛往新加坡的夜間航班上提供的夜間套件。它裝在一個金屬盒子裡，很漂亮，可以作為收藏品。我第一次收到如此漂亮的夜間飛行套件。食物很好。 IFE 相當不錯，儘管電影不是最新的。由於四個航段的航班均已滿員，機組人員一直很忙碌。土耳其航空必須採取正確的措施才能吸引大量客戶。整個航班的一個後果是廁所沒有清理乾淨，在返回新加坡的航班上有人被窒息，而沒有人清理廁所。總的來說，與 THY 的合作是一次愉快的經歷。

من الدوحة إلى هونغ كونغ. تقدم الخطوط الجوية القطرية QSuites على أحدث طراز على هذا الطريق ، إنه لمن دواعي سروري ، ولكن إذا كان ارتفاعك 192 سم أو أكثر ، فقد يكون ذلك غير مريح. كانت اختيارات الإفطار سيئة وكان اختيارًا سيئًا بالنسبة لي. كانت خيارات نظام الترفيه مقبولة. كان موظفو المقصورة غير مهتمين بي باستثناء الرئيس. وأي فأي المقصورة كانت جيدة.

曼谷經多哈飛往蓋特威克。曼谷的地面服務參差不齊，辦理登機手續和安檢都很好而且很快。令人失望的是，漂亮的票夾似乎不再發行了（我想知道這是否是我出境時的一個小故障）.. 幾乎沒有必要，但這是一個很好的接觸。休息室的淋浴不能用。值得慶幸的是，我知道我可以使用附近的日航休息室，但當我明確表示對他們無法正常使用感到失望時，工作人員並沒有提供這種服務。除此之外，休息室非常棒。高級的感覺，但可愛的食物和飲料選擇，非常細心的專業員工以及舒適實用的座椅的完美組合。令人煩惱的是，休息室根本不靠近他們今晚使用的大門，步行大約 20 分鐘。雖然您在航空公司樞紐機場會遇到這種情況，但在另一個世界機場卻不會出現這種情況。由於每天只有少數航班和專用休息室，因此至少可以從機場同一側的登機口起飛。當最終到達登機口時，在休息室工作人員提示飛機正在登機後，所有巴士乘客都必須再站立15分鐘才能真正開始登機，因為登機口擠滿了人，沒有座位。多哈的休息室非常寬敞。現在已經去過幾次了，我決定總體上我不喜歡它，而且隨著卡塔爾航空公司的擴張和休息室變得越來越繁忙，我越來越不喜歡它。因為它只是開放空間，所以總是感覺很忙。椅子不是特別舒服，咖啡/軟飲料攤位分佈得相當稀疏，兩端都有主要的食物和飲料。顯然，周圍有工作人員可以為您提供飲料，但我更喜歡提供更多自助飲料。兩個航班的機上服務都非常出色。很棒的船員，以及優質的食物和飲料。座位很舒服。在 777 上，這是舊座位，儘管我實際上很喜歡這個。它不是完全平坦，但仍然非常好，具有出色的存儲空間，而且我睡得很好。 IFE 還不錯。有很多選擇和良好的分辨率，但兩個系統上的界面都很笨重且反應遲鈍。 Qsuite 上的新版本要好得多。降落在蓋特威克讓我想起，儘管有很多改進，蓋特威克仍然是一個糟糕的機場……但對我來說很方便。行李很快就到了，移民局排了很短的隊。總體飛行質量非常好，儘管質量略有下降，而且價格上漲使得這對於休閒旅客來說不太有吸引力。加入 Oneworld 是一項巨大的福利，因為 BA 的等級積分收集非常好。

من الدوحة إلى ميونيخ. الطاقم: رائع ، متفاني ، جميل ، لطيف ، ويقظ. كان الطاقم والمشرف على متن الرحلة من الدرجة الأولى. أفضل ما تعاملت معه مقارنة بشركات الطيران الأخرى. استمر الطاقم في التحقق معي لمعرفة ما إذا كنت مرتاحًا. الطائرة: كانت Qsuite نظيفة ومريحة وخصوصية. كان نظام الترفيه على متن الطائرة متجاوبًا ولم يُظهر أي علامات تأخير. F & B: مدلل للاختيارات. كان الشراب المميز انفجارًا. تجربة طعام راقية. بشكل عام ، كان الطعام رائعًا. بشكل عام ، فازت شركة الطيران هذه بقلبي. لقد تأثرت بمستوى الخدمة وسأواصل الطيران مع QR.

Johannesburg to London via Doha. Normally I love Qatar Airways but this experience wasn't so good. When I flew LHR to JNB via DOH everything was great. The brilliant service, plenty of food, great entertainment system and nice aircraft. The way back was not as good. The check-in assistant at JNB was incredibly rude as he spoke to his colleague the whole time he was checking me in and looked at me in a contemptuous way. I suspect he might be employed by the airport as I had the same experience at passport control and security. The route JNB - DOH was ok. The plane was nice and spacious and the seats were very comfortable. A female passenger moved next to me because the passenger behind her had placed her bare feet in full view on the first passenger's armrest. No one told her to put her feet away. They ran out of beef and chicken dishes and only had vegetarian left which I refused to eat as it was dal and spinach which seemed like a bad choice for a flight. The attendants tried really hard to find alternatives and credit to them for their efforts and professionalism. The airline needs to review its meal quotas for each flight. The route DOH - LGW was cramped and uncomfortable - the seats didn't go back as far. The snack was a choice of pizza or pizza with chicken. I don't eat cheese but luckily a member of the cabin crew found me something else. Staff were also great on this flight. The onboard WIFI is terrible. On two separate flights I signed up for the one hour free. The WIFI wouldn't connect until the hour was up, at which point it told me free WIFI was no longer an option. On the other two flights it worked ok but had periods where it wouldn't connect. Compared to Emirates, Qatar Airways staff are friendlier and more obliging and they give you more food. If all Qatar Airway's planes were as good as the JNB-DOH route and they didn't run out of food then they would definitely be my favourite airline.
Birmingham to Doha. Qatar Airways is the best when it is in the air, but they don't seem to care about customer's claims. They update the wrong Qmiles when I flew with them 3 days ago.

Male to Milan via Doha. Te first flight arrived with 2 hours delay, our connection was automatically moved to the next available flight more than 10 hours later. We have been asked to wait in a lounge or to queue to get outside the airport to a hotel. Facing extremely long queue we chose the first. Qatar Airways refused any compensation for the delay.

De Barcelona a Mumbai vía Doha en clase Turista, se pagó para ascender a business en el segmento DOH-BOM durante el check-in en línea. En general, fue una buena experiencia, no excelente. BCN-DOH en un A350 que aparentemente es propiedad de Latam y operado por Qatar. La marca era Qatar, pero la configuración de clase ejecutiva era puramente latinoamericana, es decir, 2x2x2, por lo tanto, cuando pidieron más de 700 euros para mejorar para un vuelo de 6,5 horas, pasé. La economía fue agradable ya que el vuelo no estaba abarrotado y tenía tres asientos para mí solo. Opté por mejorar en el segmento DOH-BOM, ya que era un avión configurado con Q-suite y tenía un precio de poco más de 300 euros para un vuelo nocturno de tres horas que llegaba a las 2:30 am. Todos los vuelos de la India se ejecutan después del colapso de Jet Airways, así que pensé que sería inteligente actualizar. El producto Q-suite es muy bueno, aunque la suite me pareció un poco claustrofóbica. El servicio fue bueno. Hay un comportamiento un poco frío con sus tripulantes de cabina. Cero tratamiento especial o reconocimiento para Oneworld Emerald para la asignación de asientos o a bordo. El salón de Doha estaba sobrevalorado y casi espantoso para mí. En resumen, el viaje fue bueno, no espectacular.

Washington to Bangkok in economy class on a 777. I arrived 70 minutes before the flight, leaving 10 minutes to spare before the official cutoff time. There were three ticket agents and no one else in line. However, there apparently was some debate over who would have to serve me, as no one would check me in. Several times a clock behind the counter was pointed to, and the agents wandered off without acknowledging me. Finally a supervisor asked one of the agents to take care of me. The agent again pointed to the clock (which at this point was still about 7 minutes prior to the cutoff) but the supervisor pointed to the work station and finally I was attended to. On board, the flight crew seemed neglectful, we were pushing back during the safety presentation and there were passengers standing in the aisles. The inflight experience was fine. The seats were comfortable, legroom was adequate, and the cabin was clean, and even economy class gets an amenity kit. The meals were the highlight, with multiple cuisines on offer. An hour of free wifi is included for anyone who pays enough attention to read these things, and the connection speed was truly exceptional. The only complaint about the inflight experience was the headphone jack. If you want to use your own headset, bring a two pronged adapter, or you'll suffer through the adequate but not much-more-than-that headset provided. My second flight was 10 hours after my first, and the Doha Airport is a tragic experience unless you have, or pay for lounge access. or you have a desire to shop for high end luxury brands of clothing and luggage. The connecting flight was just like the first, but with no seat charging options. A bit surprising to not have that option, but the entertainment system was good enough to keep me amused. All in, this was better than my last few experiences on Qatar, and I wouldn't tell friends to avoid them. Just get there earlier than the cutoff, and bring a battery and a headphone adapter.

Belgrade to Sydney via Doha. I decided this year to do my Balkans trip with Qatar having used Lufthansa and Emirates before. What a classy Business class. Now i know why they are voted the best in the world. The service from Doha to Sydney was fantastic and also the trip going over to Belgrade. This airline is without doubt leaving the others in there wake. Having had to fly Qantas to get to Sydney and vice versa Business class it makes you realise how poor our own Qantas airline is. The cabin crew on Qatar know how to serve (thats a word lacking in our countries airline) they were tireless in there quest to serve great meals and wine and ensure we were well looked after. Pity they do not fly to Brisbane which would avoid the sub standard Q we have to use. Well done Qatar you're great.

من الدوحة إلى نيويورك. تعد طائرة إيرباص A350-1000 أحدث إضافة إلى أسطول الخطوط الجوية القطرية ، مع أجنحة Q التي تم تصنيفها كأفضل منتج من فئة رجال الأعمال في العالم. في رأيي ، إنه بالفعل أفضل منتج من فئة رجال الأعمال اختبرته حتى الآن. كان للمسافرين في الدرجة الأولى ودرجة رجال الأعمال منطقة تسجيل وصول ممتازة خاصة بهم ، وليس خطًا منفصلاً ولكن مرفق فحص أمني منفصل ، مما جعل العملية برمتها سلمية وسلسة. كانت الصالة في مطار الدوحة ضخمة وجميلة. كانت مزدحمة للغاية عندما أتيت حيث استغرق الأمر بعض الوقت للعثور على طاولة طعام. ومع ذلك ، لا يبدو أنها مشكلة مزمنة حيث تم التخلص منها بعد فترة وجيزة. كانت عروض الطعام جيدة ، ولم تكن ملهمة شريطة أن تكون هذه هي موطنهم. على الرغم من ذلك ، كانت منطقة البوابة ضيقة ومزدحمة ، لكنني أعتقد أن هذا كان يتعلق أكثر بالمطار. ومع ذلك ، نظرًا لأن QR هو المشغل الرئيسي للمطار ، فأنا مندهش من عدم ممارسة تأثيرهم على تصميم البوابة ، التي تم الانتهاء منها مؤخرًا ، لتتناسب مع خدمتهم الممتازة. كان My Q Suite ، في رأيي ، أكثر مقاعد درجة رجال الأعمال التي رأيتها تصميماً ذكاءً (تلك التي تضمنت AA و DL و UA و CX و CI و JL و RJ و BR و TK و BA و OZ و VN و KE و GA و أكثر). ربما بدا الجناح خائفًا بعض الشيء مع إغلاق الباب ، لكنه بدا مختلفًا تمامًا مع مساحة واسعة للكتف وغرفة الورك ، مما جعل النوم أمرًا سهلاً ومريحًا. يقدم QR ملابس نوم وخدمة ترتيب الأسرّة ، وهي ميزة من الدرجة الأولى. خدمة المقصورة والطعام كانا ممتازين ، وتم تقديم وجبات الطعام بشكل جيد ، حسب الطلب وحسب الطلب. لقد استمتعت حقا بالرحلة.

Auckland to Johannesburg via Doha. On time flights, easy online check in, great food, oh so much food! Pleasant staff, soft landing. OR Tambo airport staff fussed about my visa/return ticket, couldn't listen to any reason, didn't seem to quite understand the straightforward visa conditions written on my printout visa until his supervisor had to call immigration at my destination country to verify my eligibility. Another young lady was more apologetic about this inconvenience, kept reassuring me, not him, he was off to the next customer! I understand he's â€œonly doing his jobâ€ but there's always a better way. And also sometimes flight info is not on the board at Doha, twice I struggled finding out which gate to board at, conveniently however they walk about staff with gate/flight info.

Birmingham to Amritsar via Doha. Friendly and helpful staff. Treated with a smile. On return I felt ill. The staff was very helpful and caring until I reached Birmingham. Took care of my son and made me feel confident I was in safe hands. I would highly recommend this flight. Compared to the alternative it has very helpful and caring staff. Thank you to the doctor on board who made me feel safe. First on my choice to fly again.

Manchester to Entebbe via Doha. Bought this ticket, due to it being cheaper than Emirates, which I flew over 15 years not changing it. Advantages: Comfortable atmosphere Well organised crew Free 30 minutes of WiFi for all passengers despite extreme low app rating, it shows all the baggage information, which removes all your worries about it. Superb IFE system (as on Emirates, depends on the aircraft you fly). Good food and often advised with drinks. For me who flew only Emirates for 15 years, I find Qatar good. Which means, I totally recommend using it.
الدوحة إلى ستوكهولم. شركة طيران وخدمة متميزة. لا يمكنك أن تخطئ في الطيران مع الخطوط الجوية القطرية ، فهذا أمر مؤكد. طعام جيد وقائمة نبيذ رائعة مع خدمة رائعة كما هو الحال دائمًا.

دينباسار إلى الدوحة. شركة طيران وخدمة متميزة. الطعام رائع وقائمة النبيذ على القمة! كانت الشكوى البسيطة فقط هي أن Amuse-bouche كانت باردة جدًا لدرجة أنك لا تستطيع الاستمتاع بها حقًا. لكن لا يمكنك أن تخطئ بشكل عام مع شركة الطيران هذه ، فهذا شيء مؤكد.

من الدوحة إلى نيويورك. سيئ جدا. كان الطعام فظيعا. كان الحمام متسخًا جدًا. طوال الوقت كانت الرائحة تنبعث من الطائرة. طلبت تغيير مقعدي ، لكنهم لم يفعلوا ذلك. لن أستخدم الخطوط الجوية القطرية أبدًا. أنا لا أستأنف على أي شخص.

Boston to Hyderabad via Doha. Flight out of Boston left on time around 11:05PM. The aircraft type also has changed from an A350 to an aging Boeing 777-300. Aircraft was clean and had the usual amenities. The food was the usual fare. Two meals served with a snack in the middle. Arrived in Doha on time. The seat back entertainment system shows its age in the screen quality. However everything was working and they had a nice selection of movies. Doha airport was super clean and comfortable. Onward journey was on a newer Boeing 787-8. The legroom is still not bad. The seat width leaves much to be desired. No position allowed me to sit without rubbing elbow on the armrest. One cannot also use the neck pillow effectively in these seats as the new fangled head rest interferes.Again very attentive service. Very happy with the overall journey except for the experience in the Boeing 787.
Edinburgh to Lahore via Doha. Best airline. Absolutely brilliant, great helpful staff. The meals served were fantastic and the A350 is a very comfortable and modern plane to travel in.

من طهران إلى كوبنهاغن عبر الدوحة. كان الموظفون ودودون ومتعاونون للغاية في مطار طهران ، وخاصة إحسان وشكوفة الذين ساعدونا في عملية تسجيل الوصول والمقعد. أنا حقا أقدر مساعدتهم الكريمة. سأختار بالتأكيد الخطوط الجوية القطرية لرحلاتي المستقبلية وأوصي بها أصدقائي أيضًا.

الدوحة إلى أمستردام. تجربتي الأولى مع Qsuite ، وهو أمر رائع. كان الجناح خاصًا جدًا بمجرد إغلاق الأبواب وكانت هناك مساحة كافية للتمدد. يتم تقديم الوجبات عند الطلب وكان الموظفون سعداء بتقديم طبق جبن أولاً ثم وجبة رئيسية بعد 4 ساعات. الخدمة شخصية ورائعة. بالتأكيد سوف أطير قطر مرة أخرى.

Manchester to Doha return. A great experience from start to finish. All ground staff pleasant and helpful. Cabin crew provided a consistent service to ensure our comfort and all needs met. Nothing was too much trouble. Particularly want to thank Samyak a ground team member at Doha, who helped myself and my daughter check in and ensured we were sat together in our long journey home. What a champ. Will definitely re booking with Qatar airways again
Vienna to Denpasar via Doha. My meals were very bad, seat comfort okay for Vienna to Doha and bad for Doha to Denpasar. My entertainment System not working on Doha â€“ Denpasar.

Perth to Doha. Upon boarding, personal steward escorted me to seat and offered me a drink. A case containing Italian toiletries was waiting at the seat. We were offered pyjamas and slippers for the flight. Seat can be converted into a flat bed. Good selection of meals with a large selection of wines. Amazing lounge is fantastic for stretching out the legs. Entertainment and inflight shopping selections are wide. However, inflight shopping is quite expensive. Despite the large business class numbers, we continued to have very attentive service throughout the flight and I was actually able to sleep well on the flight. This is my first time on QR business and I am extremely impressed. I will definitely fly Qatar Airways again.
الدوحة إلى أمستردام في 20 مارس. في مقصورتنا كانت المرافق السيدة جيزيلا. نريد أن نثني عليها. سيدة ودودة لطيفة للغاية. كان مستوى الخدمة مرتفعًا جدًا. عملت بجد وباستمرار. هذا الاستعراض هو تقدير! هو

الدوحة إلى كولكاتا. رحلة أخرى مريحة ودقيقة. كان دخول الطائرة إلى مقصورة درجة الأعمال عبر جسر نفاث مخصص. بطاقة قائمة بخيارات الوجبات والمشروبات الكحولية المقدمة مع حقيبة وسائل الراحة الأساسية. المقصورة واسعة والمقاعد مستوية. لم يكن متاحًا سوى عنصرين فقط من العناصر الخمسة التي اخترتها من كتالوج السوق الحرة - نصحت المضيفة أن المبيعات على الطرق إلى وجهات في جنوب آسيا كانت ضئيلة بشكل عام ، وبالتالي كان هناك مخزون صغير على متن الطائرة. ولكن الأمر الأكثر إثارة بالنسبة لي هو أنني اضطررت إلى تقديم إحدى بطاقات الائتمان ذات الطراز القديم حيث تم نقش الاسم والأرقام حيث لم يكن لدى المصاحب قارئ بطاقات إلكتروني. أخرجت أداة ميكانيكية ، ووضعت بطاقتي عليها وفوقها قسيمة بطاقة ائتمان متعددة الأوراق ، ثم سحبت شريحة فوقها للحصول على البصمة. كتبت باليد مبلغ الشراء واسمي على القسيمة. كم هي قديمة الطراز - لحسن الحظ كان معي أيضًا بطاقة ائتمان قديمة الطراز!

Dublin to Doha. My wife and I want to compliment the cabin crew who had to cope with a seriously autistic boy who was very disturbed during the flight. The cabin staff treated the boy and his father with complete dignity and compassion. We have never before seen such a thorough level of professionalism.

Oslo to Singapore via Doha. Top notch flights, all on the A350. Oslo Doha sector on the 359, using the herringbone configuration, and Oslo Singapore the A350-1000 Qsuite. Seats and service as usual top notch. These flights at Doha were at remote locations using busses which is inconvinient and time consuming, with departures using the bus gates totally unorganized. Qatar changed the departure terminal in Singapore from T3 to T1. This is a big downgrade. T1 is mainly for budget carrier and the lounge was so crowded with just basic F&B. Qatar should be more consistent with its product.
曼谷經多哈飛往華盛頓特區。出色的客戶服務。我的機艙的機組人員非常出色。服務及時、有禮貌而且非常專業。我曾乘坐其他航空公司的航班飛往這條航線，卡塔爾航空是迄今為止質量和服務最好的航空公司。強烈推薦。

Birmingham to Manila via Doha return in economy class. Overall a pleasant experience across the four sectors flown with only one delay of less than 30 minutes due to a passenger feeling unwell. The BHX-DOH sectors were on a B787, which was probably starting to show its age. For example the AVOD system on these planes is not as sleek as on the B777 which were used for the DOH-MNL sectors, however both provided a good selection of movies both new and old, TV shows, music and games. Seats are generally comfortable although the box for the AVOD system cuts into legroom if you are seated by the aisle or window. The recline is good on both planes as the lower portion of the seat moves forward slightly as the back portion reclines, giving slightly more recline overall. The quality of the food was generally excellent across all sectors, however I was disappointed that on three of the four sectors my first choice was unavailable by the time I was served. On one occasion the air stewardess did make up for this slightly by offering me a crew meal which was similar, however it would be better if the meal choices were available to more of the passengers. Drinks were available throughout the flights although in between meal service you need to go to the galley and ask. We were provided with an amenity kit on the DOH-MNL sectors which included an eye mask, travel socks, toothpaste, toothbrush and lip balm. Free Wi-Fi was available for a limited time on all sectors although the speed on the DOH-MNL sectors was much better - again this might be due to the age of the aircraft. USB ports were available on both planes to charge devices. For the price I paid I was very happy with the service provided and would definitely use Qatar Airways again.

Bangalore to London via Doha. The Qatar Airways Qsuite seems like an awesome product but there wasn't any space for my bag storage. The service from Bangalore was top notch and impeccable. Yet again the cabin crew make all the difference. Unfortunately a delay at Doha due to the late arrival of the aircraft, but had the usual 1x2x1 layout with no Q suite. However a special mention to cabin crew from Thailand who was the real star of this five star airline. Extremely polite, superb service on board and hats off to her. Unfortunately the food quality at the Al Mourjan lounge seems to be declining.

Atlanta to Karachi via Doha. This is my first time flying with Qatar airways in the last decade. I chose Qatar airways rather than Emirates because of better route options from Atlanta. This was also our first time taking our 20 months old on a long trans-atlantic flight. I must say i was very happy with the service I got during both flights. The crew was very professional and they always went an extra mile to accommodate the needs of our child. Further the transit at Doha was also fabulous with options available for business lounges and we got stroller for our child complimentary. I would recommend Qatar airways any day. I will most likely move from Emirates club to Qatar airways club. I shall update the review on our flight back home to ATL.

Manchester to Melbourne via Doha. Delighted to report that services on Qatar Airways outdo Middle Eastern competitors. They don't penalise travellers with saver tickets with reduced luggage allowance or charge extra for bulkhead seats or charge for popcorn. Cabin staff excelled and even inquired of my daughter how her trip was going . Keep up this level of service Qatar Airways.
新加坡飛往多哈。很棒的新飛機和 Qsuites 非常好，給你很多隱私。大電視屏幕和適當的電影選擇。我認為當你把椅子變成床時，你的腳可能會有更多的空間。這是一趟晚間航班，飛行時間 8 小時。工作人員非常慢，幾乎兩個小時才提供食物，而我只得到了一半的訂單。然後就剩下睡覺的時間了。

London to Lahore via Doha. London to Doha A380, 9 am flight on time from Heathrow, an aisle seat with leg room. Flight comfortable and breakfast served. Doha to Lahore Boeing 777 not a new aircraft and fully booked. Again an aisle seat with hard cushion and less leg room. Meal served somewhat uninspiring, but cabin crew efficient as always. Arrived in Lahore on time. Return flight from Karachi to Doha - very early departure (3 am) but check in etc still quick and we left on time-aircraft airbus A350, relatively new and more spacious than the 777. Seats comfortable and enough leg room - I am over 6' tall-leg room is important. Before take off passenger in the seat in front of me was sick, cabin crew quickly provided sick bags and a more senior cabin crew member questioned her about her medication. We took off but the passenger and her son were moved elsewhere in the plane. Crew handled the situation well and other passengers were moved to the seats as the plane was full. Breakfast was served but was very ordinary.

Penang to Copenhagen via Doha. Great flights. Staff attentive and friendly. Nice with printed menu cards in economy. Good wines, drinks and responsive IFE system. Super to receive amenity kit with lip balm etc. Would definitely fly again!

Budapest to Bangkok via Doha. Excellent service in both flights, smiling and friendly cabin crew. Flights on time, comfortable seats turning into flat bed. Very good meal and sweet wine. Big screen with large choice of movies.
曼谷經多哈飛往布達佩斯。兩個航班都準時到達，體驗很棒。在商務艙櫃檯辦理登機手續並獲得休息室通行證（銀卡會員）。乘務員在起飛前親自來找我並提供了一杯飲料。食物還可以，有 3 種選擇。新上映電影的娛樂。航班未滿，因此有足夠的空間。
曼谷經多哈飛往米蘭。在空中他們很難被擊敗。多哈的登機經歷是有史以來最糟糕的。首先登機，然後走下登機口的樓梯在外面等候，看著經濟艙乘客登上巴士並前往飛機。我們的巴士（商務）是最後一班。最好的一點就是嘗試抱怨。基本上你不能。客戶服務最終對我變得粗魯和不耐煩。我對他們的整體體驗評分很低，雖然在船上很棒，但祈禱你不需要聯繫他們。在線社交媒體團隊似乎花時間戲弄你離線直接發送消息，然後什麼也不做。

香港經多哈飛往維也納。在我第一次從香港飛往多哈的航班上，一切都很好，機組人員很好，根據要求還提供了一個額外的麵包。在9小時的旅程中，工作人員四處走動，檢查客人是否需要任何幫助、飲料。我從多哈到維也納的轉機時間相當長，為 8 小時 15 分鐘，這也是我購買機票時的預期。我對此很好。當我於 2335 點抵達多哈時，我在機場無法做任何事情。雖然轉機時間超過8小時，但航空公司沒有提供餐券。 0700 點左右，客人被告知會有延誤，下一個信息將在 0945 之前發布 - 但我們沒有得到任何信息。他們剛剛就這個問題發布了 1 條公告，並提到這是一個技術問題。我知道技術問題可能是不可預測的，但我希望得到更多的解釋和更多的關心。

Montréal à Phuket via Doha. Pas une grande expérience. J'ai réservé mes vols presque 2 mois à l'avance, j'ai reçu un e-mail un mois plus tard disant que je devais appeler le service client car il y avait un changement dans le vol. J'appelle le service client après une heure perdue au téléphone, ils me disent que tout est ok et réparé. Il est temps de s'enregistrer pour le vol 24 heures avant le vol et l'enregistrement ne fonctionne pas. Arrivée à l'aéroport, enregistrement à Porter Air, ils me disent que mes vols sont supprimés et que je dois appeler le Qatar. Enfin, Air Canada me rejoint et pour une raison quelconque, j'ai été déplacé de Porter que j'avais réservé, et maintenant j'ai été placé sur Air Canada (une compagnie que j'essaie d'éviter). J'ai contacté le service client une fois en Thaïlande lors de mon voyage pour me renseigner sur le problème. Ils me disent que tout va bien et que ce n'était pas un problème. J'essaie de m'enregistrer avant le vol de retour, je ne peux pas m'enregistrer. Impossible de contacter le Qatar, leur numéro de téléphone est à Doha et je ne paie pas pour les appeler pour un service médiocre. Arrivée à l'aéroport 2h20 avant le vol. Vaste gamme pour Qatar Airways avec seulement deux comptoirs économiques ouverts. Également une ligne pour l'enregistrement en ligne des sacs de dépôt - ce qui aurait été formidable si le Qatar m'avait permis de m'enregistrer en ligne. Au-delà déçu de cette expérience horrible.
曼谷經多哈飛往蓋特威克。在曼谷機場登機前，我們吃了點小吃和飲料，有足夠的時間到達登機口（50 分鐘）。我們在機場屏幕上看到航班即將關閉，我們以為自己錯過了航班就跑了。此時距離出發還有 45 分鐘。我們和許多其他急著趕去的乘客同時到達了登機口。我們感覺受到了不好的對待，因為當飛機還沒有準備好起飛時，沒有理由這麼催促我們。

Sydney to Amman via Doha. My transit was in Hamad Int'l Airport, Doha. I missed my connection flight as the time in the screen was departure time and I thought (as other airports) was the boarding time so when I went to the gate, at what I thought was boarding time, the flight had departed already. The customer service personnel at Hamad Int'l airport were very helpful, professional and kind. At first I was going to be charged for the change in flight, but when I explained the situation, Qatar Airways understood and did not charge me a cent (especially thankful after a long flight and being very tired). That is first class service. Thank you to Qatar Airways for this help. A recommendation to be considered, any changes in airport policies or procedures (new or from old practices), it would be great if an email is sent to all who purchased the tickets, I don't think this would be very costly to the Qatar Airways and it would highly appreciated. Example: Hamad Int'l airport is a silent airport, I did not know that until I faced this issue. Please put notice on the screen if the time is departure or boarding time. Thanks again from a very happy customer.

Belgrade to Phuket via Doha. The flight late 3 hours so we missed connection flight as well and we waited another 7 hours for it and when we asked to change the return ticket as a compensation they told that they are sorry for inconvenience we had.

Copenhagen to Muscat via Doha. The 10-abreast setup in Economy Class Boeing 777-300 is a total disaster. The seats are narrow, and you don't really know where to place your elbows. I am by no means a broad person, but I am Scandinavian. From flying just 6 hours from Copenhagen to Doha I got back and neck pain from sitting in a wrong, forced position. I will never fly this aircraft and this configuration again.
新加坡經多哈飛往愛丁堡。上週我搭乘卡塔爾航空飛往愛丁堡的航班，經歷了一次美妙的經歷！尤其是來自格拉斯哥的空姐尼古拉，他非常照顧我，因為我很擔心我要回家看望的重病親戚。作為一名身材高大的女性，我對腿部空間非常滿意。機上餐飲服務很好。電影的選擇範圍廣泛且多種多樣。

Sydney to Berlin via Doha. Best airline in the world currently. The airplanes are new and clean, service and food is excellent. Some airplanes offer free wifi for a short period of time. A free hotel is given to long transit passengers of higher booking classes.

الدوحة إلى أوسلو على متن طائرة A350-900. على هذه الطائرة ، تتميز الخطوط الجوية القطرية بمقاعد رجال الأعمال المسطحة التقليدية. على الرغم من أنها ليست مذهلة مثل QSuite ، إلا أن تصميم المقعد والراحة لا يزالان على رأس قائمة فئتها. مجتمعة - أجهزة المقاعد ، والخدمة على متن الطائرة ، ونظافة الكبائن - من السهل معرفة سبب كون قطر أفضل شركة طيران في العالم في مجال الأعمال اليوم.

मुंबई से दोहा, बोइंग 777 पर। इस उड़ान में हमारे पास QSuite कॉन्फ़िगरेशन था। सीट हार्डवेयर सारी प्रतिस्पर्धा को मात दे देता है। आराम और जगह कई अन्य एयरलाइनों में मिलने वाली फर्स्ट क्लास सीटिंग के करीब है। मैंने हाल के वर्षों में सिंगापुर या कैथे बिजनेस (कतर की निकटतम प्रतिस्पर्धा) नहीं देखा है, लेकिन मुझे नहीं लगता कि इनमें से किसी में भी QSuite की सीटों जैसा कुछ है। यहां तक ​​कि शौचालय का डिज़ाइन भी उत्कृष्ट है। कतर की इन-फ्लाइट सेवा बहुत अच्छी है, लेकिन मैं इस विभाग में लुफ्थांसा, स्विस और एएनए को एक पायदान ऊपर रखूंगा। दोहा में अल मौरजान बिजनेस लाउंज में जहां कतर पिछड़ गया। भौतिक दृष्टि से यह एक प्रभावशाली स्थान है। हालाँकि, सुबह के व्यस्त समय के दौरान यह अपने साथ आने वाली सभी अप्रियताओं के साथ एक बस स्टेशन में बदल जाता है। यह आश्चर्य की बात है कि कतर ने इस बारे में नहीं सोचा है और न ही अपने इन-फ़्लाइट उत्पाद में लगाई गई ऊर्जा के बारे में सोचा है। हमें नहाने के लिए 15 मिनट तक बाहर खड़ा रहना पड़ा और ऊपर का रेस्तरां खचाखच भरा हुआ था और बैठने की जगह की कमी के कारण कई लोग वापस चले गए।

الدوحة إلى نيويورك جون كنيدي. أود أن أثني على طاقم الطائرة على متن رحلتي من الدوحة - جون كنيدي على وجه الخصوص سعيد الذي كان ممتازًا. كانت المرة الأولى التي أتسكع فيها مع أفراد الطاقم أثناء رحلة في المطبخ الخلفي. كانت السعادة جيدة جدًا مع ما كانت تفعله ، وهي تفعل كل شيء بابتسامة لجعل رحلتنا ممتعة. لقد كانت رحلة طويلة جدًا ، تجاوزت 14 ساعة لكنها سخرت منها.

London to Sydney via Doha. Check in at Heathrow was chaos, two flights leaving an hour apart. Ground staff unhappy and no management of lines. Waited 2 hours to check in, regular economy line had 6 counters, web check in line had 3, 2 of which were shared with business check in. What is the point of checking in online if you aren't getting anything from it? London to Doha, FA's unhappy. Food was terrible. FA's almost resistant to drink refills during service, FA frowned at partner when he asked for another G & T. No amenities kits. Doha to Sydney, a repeat performance. FA's unhappy and disinterested.

Melbourne to London return via Doha. I just want to say thank you to Qatar Airways for the wonderful service extended to my family and myself during our trip. The ground staff, as well as the crew, are exceptional. They went out of their way to make sure that the long flight was comfortable and pleasurable. We thoroughly enjoyed the meals provided. Thank you Qatar Airways!

من الدوحة إلى ادنبره. لقد استمتعت حقًا برحلتي مع الخطوط الجوية القطرية في أوائل يناير. كانت خدمة الترفيه والشراب رائعة حقًا من مضيفات طيران رائعات. على وجه التحديد ، أردت أن أذكر صيحة كبيرة لبرونا ، التي جعلت بداية رحلتنا مميزة للغاية من خلال كونها جميلة جدًا وتقديم خدمة مذهلة. شكراً جزيلاً. بالتأكيد سأوصي بهذه شركة الطيران للآخرين.

Birmingham to Bangkok via Doha. Fantastic, they deliver a great product on the first leg, the service was great and the ride in their new Boeing 787 was a real enjoyable pleasure. Only slight downside was the leg room was only 29inch instead of some of their rivals being 31+. It was a day flight so no need to sleep and the cabin and ride was great, I picked this flight as I hadn't flown the 787 before and wanted too. Doha - Bangkok - The best aircraft I have ever flown in, the Airbus A350 widebody - great plane, great comfort very enjoyable, quiet and good to sleep in. All in all Qatar deliver a great product and service with great planes and staff. Well done I will be back.
Da Milano a Dacca via Doha. Abbiamo viaggiato con Qatar Airways molte volte perché il prezzo è buono e il loro servizio è buono, quindi pensiamo che abbiano migliorato il loro servizio.

Copenhagen to Bangalore via Doha. This time my flights were a mixed bag and somewhat disappointing, especially the sectors BLR-DOH and DOH-CPH on 09 January 2019. Both flights full, the first leg being a real flight from hell because of screaming children who wouldn't stop during the 4 hr flight. QR has added an extra seat on their B777-200LR's as well as B777-300ER's during their latest refurbishment (3-4-3 in Economy), which makes the seating extremely cramped and the aisles too narrow. I'm 6"1' and due to the too narrow seat, it was very hard to find a comfortable position to eat or rest, the seat is simply not suitable for me. The cabin crew are all very good and hard-working, meals OK for Economy and the Oryx entertainment system way above many competitors, but I found it hard to enjoy all this due to the problems mentioned. We had 55 min connection at CPH (QR to SAS) but since QR was delayed due to an extremely long taxiing at DOH, we managed to catch SAS thanks to the security check and passport control at CPH, however, our bags didn't make it and came 24 hrs later due to the fact that QR has one ground handling agent at CPH and SAS another. All in all, QR is a good airline to fly with and DOH is a great airport as suggested by fellow travellers as well but, in my opinion, the cramped cabins in Economy don't reflect a five-star experience and the cabin crew struggle on the narrow aisles to provide five-star service they have been so well trained for. A mixed bag, really.

Kochi to Munich via Doha. Their booking and seat allocation system has changed for the worse this time. Seat allocation for 3 people incl a minor in 3 different rows. No seats open for selection during online check in. And the cabin crew has been the least helpful. First thing such a seating situation has not happened to us before and secondly even if it did in a rare case the cabin crew tried their best, asked single travelers around and adjusted seats for us to be together. We have been privilege club members for nine years and such loyalty didn't bring any value either. Looking for other options from our next travel on.
新加坡飛往多哈。卡塔爾航空 A350 非常新且漂亮。座位還可以，但可以更寬一些。當菜單上的菜品用完時，機組人員非常有禮貌並表示歉意，考慮到航班似乎已滿載 60%，這真是令人驚訝。我享用了夜宵和早餐。夜宵很美味，但早餐很糟糕。

Montréal à Colombo via Doha. Malheureusement, ma perception et ma loyauté ont été remises en question par l'état actuel du service client que je reçois de Qatar Airways. Un vol de correspondance de Toronto à Montréal avec Westjet a été retardé et m'a laissé bloqué à Montréal pendant plus de 30 heures. Personne n'était prêt à assumer la responsabilité de la situation et à arranger les choses. J'ai perdu un temps précieux et les plans d'affaires/vacances que j'avais faits étaient en plein désarroi. Le service client a été très décevant et étant un voyageur fréquent avec eux, ils n'avaient aucun souci de maintenir la relation.

London to Kuala Lumpur via Doha on economy. On the outbound flight the Doha to Kuala Lumpur flight was delayed for more than 5 hours. The A330 aircraft wasn't comfortable with a huge box obstructing the limited leg space. On the inbound flight, the Doha to London flight was also delayed for a few hours. I experienced delays in both outbound and inbound flights.

Perth to Edinburgh via Doha. On both outward and return legs, A380 and A350. Aircraft were all in new condition and immaculate. Plenty of legroom and attentive flight attendants. In-flight entertainment impressive. The food was bland and not very appetising and quality of in-flight food seems to be slipping.

Johannesburg to Singapore return via Doha. On the first leg of the flight between Johannesburg and Doha, we were extremely impressed with the service of the flight attendants. We were also impressed by the flight attendants, who attended to us on our return flight from Doha to Johannesburg. We were all most excited by using the Q-Suites, but found the flight attendants to be aloof. We were especially disappointed with the service between Singapore and Doha. I was really looking forward to having my bed made up and pyjamas on the flight. Although we wanted to sleep immediately when we got onto the flight

Sydney to Doha. Mohammed was an extremely helpful staff member whose customer service deserves to be recognized. He went above and beyond to ensure we had an excellent flight and the staff on-board also made an impressive impression. Food was adequate and entertainment was abundant. One of the best flights I've been on. Would recommend to a friend 9/10

Washington to Doha in Economy class. My flight was delayed by 4 hours at Washington, the ground staff did not even regret for the delay. Unfortunately i had to miss my connection at Doha with 45 minutes to spare. The airline re-scheduled my flight with a further wait delay of 6 hours. I was not provided lounge facilities, was just given a food coupon of 10 USD.

Los Angeles to Doha. An old and tired Boeing 777-200LR which had not been upgraded, then IFE was the poorest I have seen in years. Cabin staff were attentive and friendly and the food was good but Qatar Airways did not do themselves any favors by operating such an old plane. The WiFi was patchy it worked at the start but went off line over Europe.

الدوحة إلى كوبنهاغن. عندما سألني طاقم الطائرة عما أريده على العشاء ، أجبت "أيهما أكبر لأنني جائع" ، وأعطتني عبوتين من الطبق الرئيسي. عندما هبطنا في كوبنهاغن ، وأنت تعلم أنه بمجرد إطفاء ضوء الحزام ، يحاول جميع الركاب الحصول على أغراضهم ويحاول الجميع النزول من الطائرة بشكل أسرع ، لذا فهو بالتأكيد ليس أفضل وقت لطلب شيء من الطاقم لأنهم في الأساس هم لا يمكن التحريك. أردت أن أضع بطاقة Simcard الدنماركية في هاتفي الخلوي وأعلم صديقتي أنني عدت إلى المنزل ، لذلك طلبت من أحد أفراد الطاقم إدخال دبوس أو إبرة أو أي شيء يمكنني إزالة بطاقة Simcard من جهاز iPhone الخاص بي. وفتحت بطاقة اسمها من قميصها وأعطتني إياه لاستخدام إبرةها. اعتقدت أن هذا الفريق بحاجة إلى مراجعة جيدة. كنت سعيدًا بتجربتي مع الخطوط الجوية القطرية بشكل عام.

Perth to Munich via Doha. Perth to Doha Boarding was reasonably fast for a packed large plane. Seat pockets in economy are very tight - everybtime the man behind me tried to fit something in the seat pocket, I felt it. Food was tasty - I had the beef harissa because this flight forgot my special meal request. However, no pre-meal drink service, meal service commenced 90 minutes after take off, no cup holders as part of tray, very tight seat pockets. Hard plastic cups used means no place to store used cups - by the end of the flight, multiple broken plastic cups were strewn around our seats. No inflight shopping magazine. Doha to Munich Bus to flight. 777. Decent seat pockets. Inflight shopping magazine available. My special meal was remembered! Free wifi was available for an hour.
