Outbound on my flight DOH-MEL I was unwell so unfortunately didn't get to enjoy the catering (which looked amazing from the menu) or bar but was well looked after by staff onboard the flight including the CSD who checked up on me throughout the flight. Inbound on the last leg to CPH, my seat area hadn't been cleaned properly due to late landing and turnaround of the plane. This was unacceptable but once crew was informed she was embarrassed and tried her best to rectify the problem and tried to more make up for it through the rest of the flight. All in all the soft service is really what sets QR apart from their rivals.

من الدوحة إلى فيينا والخطوط الجوية القطرية هي بالفعل شركة طيران من فئة الخمس نجوم. كانت مقاعد بوينج 787 بتكوين 1 × 2 × 1 مما يوفر مساحة كبيرة لمسافري درجة الأعمال. يمكن نقل المقعد إلى سرير مسطح كامل ولديّ مساحة كافية أيضًا لساقي (طولي 183 سم). كان الطعام رائعًا وسألني طاقم الطائرة الودود كل 30 دقيقة عن طعام إضافي. كما تم تقديم الآيس كريم كحلوى.

São Paulo para Doha, e no embarque fui informado que não sobrou champanhe para o serviço de drinks do embarque, com a refeição também não estava disponível um vinho francês selecionado. Restava um tamanho de pijama que era XL. Como estava sentado no assento 2B, era difícil entender por que essas faltas ocorriam. Enquanto o voo saía às 3 da manhã e chegava às 21 horas, as persianas estavam fechadas e era tratado como se fosse um voo noturno, o que significava que você tinha que zumbir se quisesse alguma coisa. Eu voei Qatar Business algumas vezes e este voo não estava no mesmo nível dos voos anteriores. Nosso voo de conexão saindo de Doha tinha champanhe, mas estava quente.

Von Zürich nach Doha mit Qatar Airways und mein erster Flug mit einer Boeing 787. Ich hatte einen Einzelsitz am Fenster und war in jeder Position sehr bequem. Völlig flach ergibt es ein gutes Bett, aber nicht das beste in der Branche. Der Stauraum für Handgepäck ist begrenzt, wenn Sie nur mit Handgepäck reisen. Passagiere, die in der mittleren Reihe sitzen, verstauen ihr Handgepäck ebenfalls in Ihrem Abteil. Das Essen ist wirklich ausgezeichnet (einige der Gerichte kamen der Essensqualität von Swiss First nahe!) Die Besatzung war jung und von Flug zu Flug sehr unterschiedlich, aber im Allgemeinen freundlich und effizient. Ich denke, dass die Besatzung von Qatar Airways in vielerlei Hinsicht besser ist als die ihrer Konkurrenten aus dem Nahen Osten. Ich frage mich, was die ganze Aufregung um die Luftqualität oder die größeren Fenster in der Boeing 787 soll: Ich konnte mir nicht vorstellen, dass die Luft besser sein würde als in anderen Flugzeugen, ich konnte nicht sagen, dass die Fenster größer sind als in anderen Flugzeugen.
乘坐卡塔爾航空從新加坡經多哈飛往奧斯陸是一次很棒的商務艙體驗。美味的甜點，尤其是我的拉杜麗馬卡龍。菜單上有多種食物可供選擇。主菜不太適合我的口味，因為我有亞洲味蕾。座椅的舒適度足以讓我睡個好覺。來自法國酒莊的豪華飲料（非酒精） - 適合像我一樣不能喝酒的乘客。

Von Frankfurt nach Doha in der Economy Class mit der B777 und ein fantastisches Erlebnis mit Qatar Airways. Das Einchecken in FRA war etwas langsam, aber sonst verlief alles gut. Das Personal an Bord des Flugzeugs war freundlich und einladend und der Service war für diesen recht kurzen Flug aufmerksam. Das Essen war in Ordnung, aber nicht großartig, aber während des Fluges wurden reichlich Getränke angeboten. Die Kabine war sehr sauber und schön, die Bordunterhaltung schien dem Angebot von Emirates nahe zu kommen und alles funktionierte gut. Entscheiden Sie sich auf jeden Fall für zukünftige Reisen, wenn der Zeitplan passt.

Washington to Kilimanjaro via Doha. We have flown business on several different airlines and Qatar Airways was very impressive. The flight attendants were exceptionally friendly and helpful â€“ seemed a cut above the others. We had a long layover between our flights and Qatar put us up in a hotel in both directions free of charge. That was impressive. Their lounge in Doha is huge and one of the best we have ever seen. Customer service was impeccable. If I could give them 6 stars I would.

Von Zürich nach Sydney über Doha. Insgesamt eine gute Erfahrung. aber mit den neuen Übergepäcktarifen ist es wahrscheinlich das letzte Mal, dass ich damit geflogen bin. Ich bin Taucher und eine zusätzliche Tauchtasche von Europa nach Australien (maximal 15 kg) kostet 560 USD, selbst mit 30 kg Freigepäck. Ich bin mir nicht sicher, warum man aus Europa am Ende immer das Dreifache des amerikanischen Selbstbehalts zahlt.

Colombo to Johannesburg via Doha with Qatar Airways. An excellent Business Class. Seats are magnificent with attentive crew throughout the flight. Pre drinks served before take off and variety of pre drinks as well. Food is well prepared and tasty. Air Hostesses greet you by the name and made you feel special. Pajamas handed out before take off which is unheard of in business class. Spacious cabins and lay flat seats. By far the best airline I have flown.

من الدوحة إلى برشلونة. مقاعد نظيفة وواسعة وخدمة ودودة للطاقم ، كان الاهتمام بالتفاصيل بارزًا. شعرت بالقلق عندما أقلعت الطائرة لأن والدتي كانت مريضة. مرضت والدتي من الخوف من الأماكن المغلقة والخوف من المرتفعات خلال رحلة طويلة لكنني أخبرت الطاقم بهذه الحقيقة ، وطلبت من الركاب العذر واتخذت خطوة حتى تتمكن والدتي من الاستلقاء. بالإضافة إلى ذلك ، كانت تفحص حالة والدتي بشكل متكرر ، وسألت عما إذا كانت والدتي بحاجة. قد يكون هذا لطفًا بسيطًا بسبب واجبها ، لكن بالنسبة لعائلتي ، كانت خدمة رائعة حقًا. على الرغم من مرور الوقت ، إلا أنني أود أن أثني على الطاقم في ذلك الوقت.

Jeddah to Bangkok via Doha. Excellent planes on all legs and very punctual. Good choice of food and reasonable selection of drinks. JED to DOH route half empty so much better and more frequent refreshment service than the A380. One negative is the music. The welcome and goodbye music played prior to takeoff and half an hour after landing - please change the music!

Budapest to Bangkok via Doha. I really enjoyed my flight from Doha to Bangkok and return with their A380. It was a pretty amazing airplane, with tasty food, good inflight entertainment and very polite cabin crew. They are no 1 for me, and I will definitely take Qatar Airways again for my upcoming long hauls.

Von München nach Phuket über Doha mit Qatar Airways. Der Flug von München nach Doha war ein tolles Erlebnis im brandneuen A350 mit sehr aufmerksamem und hilfsbereitem Personal. Gute Organisation mit Limousinenservice in Doha. Bei der Buchung von Business oder First wäre ein Limousinenservice zum Flughafen im Umkreis von 50 km um den Flughafen in Deutschland wünschenswert.

Penang to Manchester via Doha. We travelled as a family with a toddler and I was disappointed we couldn't book our seats together in advance - they couldn't get us seats together during check in but luckily on both journeys the seat next to my wife been blocked so we were able to seat together. I was told its because they needed to block off for another parent but there is only space for one bassinet! The sitting arrangements were 2x4x2 and we had the 2 seats by the window. I felt it would have been much more helpful if the airline allowed families to book seats together from the start instead of trying to sort it out onboard or at the gate. Food was nice but stewardess doesnt seem so attentive. Leg room space seem good, the 30kg luggage allowance is generous, but our baby pram seem to have got lost on our return journey - we got it back 1 day later. In flight movies seem limited and difficult to browse through, and no free complimentary wifi on board. From my experience Hamad Airport in Doha is excellent, very clean, fantastic toilets, lots of charging points, and apple imac stations!

مسقط إلى مدينة هوشي منه عبر الدوحة العودة للعمل. طائرة الخطوط الجوية القطرية الجديدة من طراز بوينج 777-300ER على ساق MCT-DOH وطائرة A330-200 قديمة بين الدوحة ومدينة هوشي منه. المقاعد 777 رائعة فقط! تم تجهيز A330 بالمقاعد القديمة التي تمتد بالكامل ولكنها تظل مائلة قليلاً. شعرت بخيبة أمل في البداية ولكن بعد ذلك لاحظت أن الزاوية لم تكن سيئة. يمكنني أن أنام جيدًا دون أن أنزلق. كانت الأطعمة والمشروبات ذات جودة ممتازة في جميع الأنحاء ، بما في ذلك صالة الأعمال الكبيرة جدًا الجديدة في DOH. كان طاقم المقصورة ودودًا ومتاحًا دائمًا ومتعاونًا ولكن لم يكن مطلقًا. تسجيل الوصول السريع في كل من MCT و SGN. سأطير الخطوط الجوية القطرية مرة أخرى.

London to Colombo via Doha with Qatar Airways, the first leg was on a Boeing 787, my first experience of this aircraft. The noise in the rear economy cabin was incredible and we were moved forward to the next cabin. This was better but noisier than say a 777. Food on this leg was poor and although the wine was of good quality, it was dispensed in horrible cups. The other 3 legs were much better. The A340 is a comfortable plane and the A380 can't be beaten. My overall impression was I was in economy and should not be allowed to forget it. Doha is a far better airport than Dubai.

الدوحة إلى فيلادلفيا مع الخطوط الجوية القطرية. خدمة ممتازة ، وصالة جميلة لدرجة رجال الأعمال في مطار الدوحة. منذ لحظة صعودك إلى الطائرة ، يتم تقديم كأس من الشمبانيا الوردية ، وطعام ممتاز - مع تناول الطعام في أي وقت تختاره. الأفلام الأعلى تقييمًا على أنظمة الترفيه على متن الطائرة. أفهم الآن سبب احتلال الخطوط الجوية القطرية المرتبة الأولى لسنوات عديدة.

बिजनेस क्लास में कतर एयरवेज के साथ दोहा होते हुए मुंबई से डलास फीट वर्थ तक। यह दुनिया की शीर्ष एयरलाइनों में से एक होनी चाहिए। भोजन और पेय रेस्तरां मानक के अनुरूप हैं। उड़ान सेवा त्रुटिहीन और चालक दल थी। AVOD का चयन अच्छा था। केबिन बहुत साफ-सुथरा था और डलास जाने के पूरे समय शौचालय ठीक-ठाक था। वाइन बहुत अच्छी थीं, विशेषकर गुलाब की।

الرياض إلى لاهور عبر الدوحة مع الخطوط الجوية القطرية ، وهي شركة طيران جيدة. فريق العمل ودود للغاية وكذلك تعاوني. الطائرات في حالة جيدة وهناك نظام IFE محدث. كانت المقاعد على متن طائرة A350 من الرياض إلى الدوحة جيدة جدًا ، ولكن بالنسبة للدوحة إلى لاهور ، كان لديهم A330 بمقاعد مثل شركة طيران متوسطة 4 نجوم.

Manchester to Cape Town via Doha with Qatar Airways. The flight was smooth but the outward journey became rather uncomfortable due to lack of space. The person in front of me reclined their seat which made it worse. My TV screen became far too close. Doha to Manchester journey was much better as the plane was older. There was more space and seats were more comfortable. The food and drinks service was limited. We needed more water, juice, or even a glass of wine. We were given a small amount with our meal but not enough. The meals were nearly all the same. too much chicken and poor vegetarian option. Some of the food was poor. The film selection was okay. I would want to travel business class if I were to use Qatar Airways again.
新加坡經多哈飛往巴黎，卡塔爾航空被譽為世界上最好的五星級航空公司。尤其是他們的 A350 非常出色。然而，一些客艙工作人員並不友好。我的托運行李延誤，沒有到達戴高樂機場。他們預計將在半天內將包交付給我，但一整天后我還沒有收到。

Baku to Frankfurt via Doha was very comfortable, lovely crew and the world's newest aircraft A350. That was my first time to flying with Qatar Airways, I'm student from Azerbaijan. And that was my dream to fly with A350. The ticket was so cheap, that I could buy this ticket. Thanks to Qatar Airways for unforgettable journey.

曼谷經多哈飛往愛丁堡，在經歷了一次令人失望的去程航班後，卡塔爾航空的回程服務得到了很大改善。從曼谷到多哈的旅程中，他們的香檳仍然沒有了（只有玫瑰），但食物和服務都很棒。這是我第一次乘坐帶酒吧的 A380，晚餐後我們在那裡度過了很短的時間，工作人員非常令人愉快（他們還找到了一些庫克白香檳）。 A380 和波音 787 的空間幾乎相同，而且非常舒適。我唯一的抱怨是，在從多哈飛往愛丁堡的早上航班上，我們很餓，在 7.5 小時的航班起飛後不久就吃了早餐。飛行 5 小時後，我們得到的只是飲料、茶和咖啡。在提到我很餓後，他們給了我一包巧克力餅乾。離開愛丁堡大約一個小時後，機組人員小心翼翼地詢問了幾位看起來很餓的乘客是否想要吃點零食，並拿出了一些零碎的東西（我吃了餛飩，其他人吃了奶酪板）。我感覺這是剩菜而不是真正的小吃服務，因為他們的菜餚不斷用完，而且並不是每個人都收到了東西。也許這個航班上有一個自助三明治吧？

Edinburgh to Doha. Plenty space, comfortable seats and smooth flight. Service was poor though. Only 24 Business seats yet ran out of champagne before take off, ran out of soup, cold starter, and cheese board - suggested I take crackers and share with the person next to me. Then ran out of NZ Sauvignon Blanc and offered dessert wine instead. Made a formal complaint but I'm still waiting for a response.

London to Dhaka via Doha with Qatar Airways. It was a good experience although I didn't like the food. The seating was comfortable and we were supplied blankets, pillows and an amenity kit. The inflight entertainment was okay and the cabin staff were friendly and smiled a lot. When we landed in Doha it was fine and we transferred and had no delay. Overall I would recommend this airline.

من الدوحة إلى دبي وتم ترقيتي إلى الدرجة الأولى حيث تم حجز الرحلة بالكامل ، ولدي بطاقة ذهبية من الخطوط الجوية القطرية. تحتوي طائرة A320 على مقاعد جديدة يمكن طيها إلى سرير مسطح كامل. كان الطاقم ودودًا للغاية ، وقدموا القهوة العربية ووجبة باردة لذيذة.

Perth to London via Doha with Qatar Airways, and cannot fault them. It was a great experience to fly with them. The seats have so much room and comfort, the food is amazing, inflight entertainment with so many options! Our luggage all arrived safe and sound after the stopover. Don't have anything bad to say about our experience.

Da Venezia a Seoul via Doha e il mio primo volo con Qatar Airways, e sono rimasto piacevolmente sorpreso dalla compagnia aerea. È stato tutto fantastico anche se il volo era super pieno! Aereo nuovo, pulito, ottimo intrattenimento in volo e personale di cabina gentile. Ho anche apprezzato il fatto che ti regalino un beauty case e dei calzini per il viaggio. Lo scalo a Doha è stato molto buono, infatti l'aeroporto è nuovo e pieno di negozi e ristoranti. Qatar Airways è totalmente raccomandato.

Manchester to Phuket via Doha, and having used Qatar Airways 3 times in the last 12 months, I can`t recomend them enough. However on my last trip to Phuket I was disappointed that having booked online an aisle seat, I then had to sit between 2 big men and could not get my meal choice on both legs of the journey.

Paris-Singapour avec transfert à Doha en classe affaires Qatar Airways, ce fut l'un des plus beaux vols. Le service de cabine était agréable, rapide et assez sympathique, semblait plus authentique que mon ancien voyage sur Singapore Airlines. Les repas étaient délicieux et servis dans un restaurant raffiné. Nous avons également pris une très bonne collation dans le salon d'affaires de l'aéroport Hamad sur le chemin, et c'était bien. Divertissement à bord choix très massif et m'a impressionné. Les sièges étaient confortables sur les deux avions que nous avons volés et nous avons bien dormi avec de belles couvertures et coussins. Recommander et volera à nouveau quand nous irons à Hong Kong en mars.

Manchester to Perth return via Doha, and we were very impressed with all aspects of our travel experience with Qatar Airways. All our flights (4 in all) were well organised and on time. The planes were clean and looked new. Cabin crew were very efficient and helpful. Food was very good for 'plane food' and in economy class. Leg room was very acceptable especially as my husband is over 6 feet tall. Entertainment offered was the same on all 4 flights, but was varied and there was plenty to choose from. The airport at Doha was beautiful and its' structure was much admired by my consultant structural engineer husband. On the return flight we had an 8 hour layover at Doha so decided to book the Airport Hotel for 5-8 hour slot. A little pricey but well worth having a rest and a swim for nearly an hour in a stunning pool on the 4th floor overlooking the concourse. I think the staff were somewhat surprised to find a middle aged couple so keen on a swim so early in the morning! So thank you Qatar Airways, you made a long journey more than bearable.

Amsterdam naar Singapore via Doha, en dit was mijn 12e keer dat ik met Qatar Airways vloog. Ze hebben me nog nooit in de steek gelaten. De voedselkwaliteit is intact, inclusief de kindermaaltijd. Het kinderpakket heeft nu meer keuzes, bijvoorbeeld. Mr Potato Head, Monopoly, enz. Nieuw model van entertainment aan boord. Hamad International Airport maakte onze reis als geheel perfect.

Von Frankfurt nach Singapur über Doha. Wir flogen von Singapur zurück und unser für 2 Uhr morgens geplanter Flug hatte Verspätung bis 7.30 Uhr, was bedeutete, dass wir unseren Anschlussflug nach FRA in Doha verpassen würden. Wir haben versucht, in ein früheres Flugzeug einzusteigen, aber zunächst ohne Erfolg, da es voll war. Beim Check-in teilte uns Qatar Airways jedoch mit, dass wir später wiederkommen sollten, um zu sehen, ob sie uns auf einen Partnerflug buchen könnten, und es hat reibungslos geklappt – sie gaben uns zwei Optionen und waren bereit, uns zum Check-in des Partners zu begleiten Fluggesellschaft. Danke! Unsere Hinflüge mit Qatar Airways waren wirklich in Ordnung. Neues Flugzeug mit gut funktionierendem Unterhaltungssystem, Sitzen mit ausreichend Beinfreiheit, nicht zu kalter Klimaanlage und gutem Service.

Von Frankfurt nach Bangkok über Doha mit Qatar Airways. Insgesamt eine sehr gute Erfahrung mit einigen kleineren Mängeln. Der A350 ist ein fantastisches Flugzeug, der A380 auch. Der Sitz ist sehr gut, allerdings könnte die Beinfreiheit in Schlafposition (unter dem Stauraum des Vordersitzes) besser sein, insbesondere wenn man beim Schlafen den Körper dreht. Die viel beworbenen Matratzen werden nicht mehr verwendet. Das Essen ist unter Berücksichtigung der Flugbedingungen gut bis sehr gut. Leider konnte meine Bestellung (direkt nach dem Abflug) auf der ersten Etappe nicht genau geliefert werden, da mein erster Gang verschenkt wurde und auch der Gewürztraminer nicht mehr verfügbar war. Das IFE verfügt über einen sehr schönen 17-Zoll-Bildschirm (nicht verstaubar). Die Filmauswahl könnte für Neuerscheinungen besser sein. Da ich im selben Monat zurückflog, hatte ich einige Schwierigkeiten, für alle 4 Flüge etwas Interessantes zu finden.

London to Bangkok via Doha return. I have travelled many times on Qatar Airways in Business Class, mostly to Bangkok but I have also used them from London to Male, Kuala Lumpur and Denpasar. They impress me with consistently high standards on the ground and in the air. I will always chose to fly with Qatar even if means a stopover rather than a direct flight on another carrier - and always above British Airways who consistently disappoint me! This time I travelled in First Class from Doha to Bangkok and return, and it was outstanding in every way! Discreet, personal, professional and comfortable all the way! Qatar Airways have their service up to the highest standards possible. It was lovely to see caviar in First Class and a superb selection of wines and champagnes. Entertainment, amenities, sleeper suits and slippers all of great quality and I was able to fully enjoy and fully rest both ways. Their ground service match the inflight services with superb lounges in both London and Doha. With priority boarding and luggage arriving first every time you really do feel that they value you - and they do!

Da Milano a Città del Capo via Doha andata e ritorno con Qatar Airways. MXP-DOH in un angusto A330, volo in orario, simpatico equipaggio giapponese e cibo medio. DOH-CPT sul Boeing 787, un sedile stretto ma non così angusto come descritto in questo forum. L'equipaggio di cabina ha trascorso gran parte della notte nella parte posteriore dell'aereo a parlare. CPT-DOH con check in velocissimo. Settore finale DOH-MXP su A330 con passo medio dei sedili. Equipaggio molto gentile e disponibile e cibo nella media. Buon servizio e per tutti i voli partenza perfettamente in tempo. Tutto sommato una buona esperienza, ma una compagnia aerea a cinque stelle non dovrebbe avere un aereo angusto per un volo di 9 ore.

Amsterdam naar Doha, en Qatar Airways onderscheidt zich als een van de beste luchtvaartmaatschappijen in business class. Dit is ouderwetse elegantie verpakt in nieuwe technologie. Fantastisch eten geserveerd, allemaal apart natuurlijk. Probeer de roze champagne! Het entertainment aan boord is uitstekend en de lounge in Doha is de beste. Zal weer vliegen.

Tokio Haneda naar Londen Heathrow via Doha. Ik arriveerde 6 uur voor vertrek in Tokyo Haneda vanwege een binnenlandse vlucht, maar ik kon mijn bagage pas 2 uur eerder inchecken. Japan Airlines handelt Qatar Airways af bij HND en hun incheckbalies zijn altijd open, dus ik weet niet waarom ze de bagage van hun partner niet vroeg kunnen meenemen. Ook viel het tegen dat Premium Class pax hier geen gebruik kan maken van de fast rack security lanes. Maar u krijgt wel toegang tot de First/Premium Sakura-lounge van Japan Airlines, die over alle faciliteiten beschikt die u nodig heeft. Boeing 787 vertrok een paar minuten te laat, en eenmaal in de lucht viel ik in slaap op de zeer comfortabele, vlakke stoel. Toen ik wakker werd, dineerde ik (op verzoek) Japans en westers eten van goede kwaliteit, en rustte daarna voor de rest van deze 12 uur durende sector. Overstappen bij DOH was iets minder chaotisch dan uitgaand, maar het valt op dat het volume van de overstappers niet goed is gepland en dat de beveiliging wat laks is om mensen snel door te laten. De bewegwijzering in DOH is slecht en ik had moeite om de weg naar de Business Lounge te vinden. Het instappen in de A380 was een traktatie (mijn eerste keer) - we werden hartelijk verwelkomd door een charmante FA die onze jassen aannam en ons een drankje aanbood. Ik kan niet geloven hoe stil de A380 is, vooral bij het opstijgen. We hadden een geweldige vlucht, genoten van de loungebar voor een cocktail voor de lunch, deden een dutje in de geweldige stoelen (hetzelfde als 787) en keken naar de IFE, een reis van topklasse! Maar ik kon geen verbinding maken met internet, omdat het erg traag was. Dus in mijn gratis 15 minuten heb ik geen enkele pagina gedownload.

من الدوحة إلى هونج كونج على متن طائرة قديمة من طراز A330 ، المقاعد ليست سيئة على الإطلاق ، لكنها ليست 5 نجوم في رأيي. كان الصعود بطيئًا والخدمة ليست رائعة. كان الموظفون على متن الطائرة متعاونين ولطيفين بشكل لا يصدق ، وكان الطعام لائقًا ، ووجدت متوسط ​​نظام الترفيه. أنا لست من المعجبين بقطر حتى الآن ، لكني أجد الموظفين متميزين.

Johannesburg to Muscat via Doha with Qatar Airways. At Johannesburg the check in was smooth. Bagagge allowance was reasonable too. The aircraft was very clean and had a fresh smell. Cabin crew was warm and welcoming, our seats were comfortable and meals were well prepared and tasted good. Transfer through Doha was fast and efficient. We had a 2 hour layover and still managed to do duty free shopping. Boarding our A321 we then flew to Muscat where we experienced the same great treatment. We then landed with ease thanks too the well trained Pilots. I would recommend Qatar Airways.

Copenhagen to Doha with Qatar Airways. Check in at Copenhagen was incredibly slow. Onboard I found service slow given this was a night flight and everyone wanted to sleep. The inflight entertainment is a bit slow for me and it takes a long time for example to continue watching a TV Series. Its not bad, but not best in class.

Chicago to Kathmandu via Doha with Qatar Airways. Incredible service! First leg of the journey was 14 hrs and there were 4 meals served with choices of entrees and alcohol beverage choices included for no additional charge. The second leg of the journey began at 1:05 am and the flight attendant began by saying, "when the captain turns off the fasten seat belt sign we will be serving dinner!" We got our meal shortly before 2am - so I arrived in Kathmandu not a bit hungry. There was an empty seat next to me and I had nice leg room as well. There was a screen on the seat and a place to charge my phone! All the flight attendants were just nice.
新加坡經多哈飛往倫敦。這是我第一次乘坐 A350 或波音 787，在我看來，它們非常相似。雖然不如卡塔爾航空波音 777 寬敞，但也不錯，比 A330/340 更好。新的座椅很舒適，娛樂系統也更好——幾乎直觀！空乘人員的服務一如既往。卡塔爾航空仍然是我選擇的航空公司。

الإسكندرية إلى الكويت عبر الدوحة. لم تكن رحلتي من الإسكندرية ممتعة للغاية. لم يكن لدينا IFE شخصية ، لكن الطعام كان ممتازًا. المقاعد كانت متوسط ​​مقاعد A320. عند وصولنا إلى الدوحة ، تم إحضارنا إلى المبنى بالحافلات - إذا سافرت في الصباح والظهيرة ، فإن المطار خالٍ حقًا في هذه الساعات. وصلنا إلى الدوحة حوالي الساعة 5 مساءً. مطار حمد الدولي في الدوحة ضخم ، لكن التنقل فيه سهل للغاية. كان لدينا توقف لمدة 3 ساعات ولكن كان علينا أن نأكل ونشتري بعض الهدايا التذكارية. كانت رحلتنا إلى الكويت قصيرة ، لكن مقاعد البوينج 787 مكتظة ، ولم أحب الطعام. لقد كان نوعًا من المعجنات مع الدجاج أو الضأن ولم يتم خبز المعجنات بشكل صحيح. لن يتم تسليم سماعات الأذن في الرحلات التي تقل مدتها عن ساعة واحدة. كانت المقصورة نظيفة ، لكن التكوين 3x3x3 لم يكن ما كنت أتمناه. أثناء عودتي إلى الدوحة ، تم تقديم نفس المعجنات ورفضت. لا أحب ظل النافذة الخافت الذي تتمتع به طائرات بوينج 787 - فهو مزعج للغاية للأشخاص الذين يحاولون النوم في النهار. كان مضيفات الرحلة غاضبين على رحلات الكويت. لم يكن توقفنا في الدوحة طويلاً مثل رحلتنا الداخلية ، ولكن لا يزال لدينا الوقت لتناول برجر قبل التوجه إلى بوابتنا. كان المطار فارغًا (كان وقت الظهيرة) ولكن كن على علم بأنه يتعين عليك المشي كثيرًا (كانت بوابتنا C13). في رحلة العودة إلى الإسكندرية كان لدي لحم خروف وربما كان خيار الدجاج أفضل. في كل من رحلتي الجوية من وإلى الإسكندرية ، تضمن الطعام الخضار المقلية والدجاج / لحم الضأن وسلطة صغيرة وقطعة كعكة. في مارس ، أسافر مع الخطوط الجوية القطرية من القاهرة إلى عمان ، وأتطلع إلى تصميم مقصورة 777. أقترح أن يسافر الناس على متن الخطوط الجوية القطرية ، فهو أكثر متعة من الخطوط الجوية التركية على سبيل المثال.

2015 年聖誕節和新年，從香港經多哈返回哥本哈根。該產品穩定且可預測，幾乎完全準時到達。經濟艙的食物和飲料選擇較差。不提供菜單，儘管份量很小，但提供 2-3 種熱餐選擇。船上的服務是一流的。四趟航班中有三趟已滿員，但客艙工作人員為乘客提供的服務令人滿意。多哈的轉機稍好一些（四次中有 3 次是通過機場廊橋）。被認定為精英 FFP 飛行者，並因經濟艙超額預訂而提供 CPH 和 DOH 之間的免費升艙。然而，我被告知無法使用升級優惠，因為我是在單獨預訂的情況下帶著孩子旅行的。兒童餐和兒童玩具都很完美。由於航班滿員，座位安排得很好，工作人員根據需要主動調整好。多哈的寰宇一家精英客戶休息室不符合標準。代碼共享以及與寰宇一家合作夥伴國泰航空和港龍航空的合作在預訂、里程累積、行李轉運方面完美無瑕。

從新加坡經多哈飛往倫敦還不錯，只是我的機上娛樂屏幕似乎有自己的想法。我正在觀看的節目不斷地來回跳動，當我什至沒有觸摸屏幕或遙控器時，它會自行停止，這很煩人。飯菜還可以，有些配菜的味道我不習慣。我從倫敦經多哈回新加坡的途中，從倫敦起飛的飛機晚點了大約半小時到達多哈。由於轉機時間只有 45 分鐘，我們錯過了返回新加坡的轉機航班，他們的處理方式還有待改進。在我們開始跑向轉機登機口之前，有人可能會告訴我們這樣做沒有意義，並帶我們去客戶服務處尋找替代航班。當我們一大群人接近客戶服務時，一些工作人員看起來很慌張和惱怒，而不是禮貌地安撫乘客。當我們要求更換航班時，他們給了我們一個 12 小時後從多哈起飛的航班。他們不應該出售時間如此短的轉接航班。

أبو ظبي إلى بيرث عبر الدوحة العودة. تسجيل وصول فوضوي بشكل غير معهود في أبو ظبي يرجع على ما يبدو إلى خلل في تكنولوجيا المعلومات. مشكلة خارجة عن سيطرة قطر ، ومع ذلك لم يكن هناك وكلاء طيران في متناول اليد لتقديم التوجيه / التحكم في قائمة الانتظار المتنامية بسرعة من الركاب الغاضبين. كانت جميع الرحلات في الوقت المحدد ، وكانت الطائرات نظيفة تمامًا ، وكان IFE يعمل بشكل كامل طوال الوقت. لقد تم الترحيب بي شخصيًا كطيار متكرر على كل ساق ، وبالنسبة للغالبية العظمى ممن يستخدمون الاقتصاد ، تظل طائرة الخطوط الجوية القطرية بوينج 777 الأفضل في فئتها من حيث الراحة لمسافات طويلة. للأسف ، لقد ولت منذ فترة طويلة المناشف الساخنة

Oslo to Dhaka with a 9 hour transit in Doha, and was told if the transit is longer than 8 hours, a hotel will be provided - but they did not provide this. The return flight from Dhaka was through Doha and London, with 3-4 hours transit. The food was excellent in all flights as it normally is on Qatar Airways. Seat was good and the entertainment system was also nice, especially the touchscreen in the A380 is superb. Turkish Airlines is cheaper and I may therefore prefer them next time.

London to Singapore via Doha with Qatar Airways. All flights on time except SIN-DOH which arrived 20 mins late. Seating on A330 is 2x2x2 which is a problem, but 1x2x1 seating on the other aircraft means greater privacy. Seats are fine and comfortable enough to sleep. Food was good and available on demand, but on the flight from London the English breakfast had run out by the time my order was taken (row 4). If you choose to eat later in the the flight, there may be little chance of your first or second choices being available. Not a good point for business class. My bland meals to/from Singapore were ok, but the salads were poor and one of the soups was anything but bland it seemed to me. AVOD fine with the greatest choice available on the A350, including a tail mounted camera which gives an amazing perspective of flying at high altitude. All crew good, friendly, efficient and welcoming. Certainly the service is up there with some of the best but they should look at improving quantities of certain dishes which are bound to be popular on certain sectors.

Paris à Bangkok via Doha avec Qatar Airways. En un mot excellent. La classe affaires ne va pas mieux que cela en ce qui concerne le service, la nourriture, l'aménagement de la cabine et l'ambiance. Le siège était magnifique avec des commandes qui vous mettaient dans la position assise ou allongée de votre choix. Je me suis connecté avec Aer Lingus de Dublin en contournant l'option la plus directe en utilisant Etihad ou Emirates. Déplacement intelligent. J'ai utilisé ces deux compagnies aériennes dans le cadre de mes affaires à quelques reprises et, bien qu'elles soient bonnes en elles-mêmes, elles sont loin d'être proches du produit Qatar Airways pour son élégance, son confort et sa cohérence. Faire partie de l'alliance mondiale unique est également un bonus supplémentaire. À juste titre la compagnie aérienne numéro un offrant un salon à Doha qui est tout simplement imbattable. J'attends avec impatience leur arrivée un jour sur le marché irlandais.

Melbourne to Madrid via Doha. The flights were on time and check in staff very welcoming and efficient. The food was average, service was okay, my headset was broken on one leg and I didn't get a replacement. My main issue was even though at check in I was in an aisle seat, for the longer leg this was changed at the gate and they would not move me again - even though this had happened on my outbound as well within less than a week. I explained my circumstances but the gate person was not interested and was told it was because I was travelling alone.

London to Tokyo Haneda via Doha. As usual it was a pleasure to fly with Qatar Airways, but not perfect. The Business product on the 777 is not the latest, but it is very spacious and so much better than other carriers. Seat was a little hard. My first experience of the Boeing 787 product, which I thought was great, even though at first sight it appears more cramped (I did graze my shin on the TV shelf when trying to get back onto bed). I liked the lav location in the cabin vice galley area. I was surprised that transfer at DOH was worse than at the old airport

Manchester to Kuala Lumpur via Doha with Qatar Airways. This was my first long haul flight in a few years, we arrived very late at the airport and only had a few minutes until check in closed. The Qatar Airways staff were waiting for us as we were the last passengers to check in, we were very short on time and the staff escorted us to the security check and managed to get us fast tracked through security so we didn't miss our flight. We boarded the plane and were greeted by the nicest crew I have encountered on a flight. Our first leg of our flight was roughly 7 hours to Doha. The plane was clean and very stylish throughout each seating class. Shortly after take off we were served breakfast which consisted the most amazing meal on an airline. We were served Waffles with strawberries and cream, We also received a hot bread roll, fruit salad, yogurt, water and fresh juice and coffee. After we were served our meal, the cabin was cleared of the breakfast and we could sit back and relax. The inflight entertainment system was great and had hundreds of movies, TV Shows, music, games to keep you happy for the long flight. A few hours into the flight we were served lunch. The food on this airline is some of best. We landed in Doha with a short 4 hour layover which was just enough to explore Qatar Airways hub airport which is a fantastic place. The flight from Doha to Kuala Lumpur was to the same high standards and we arrived in Kuala Lumpur feeling relaxed and refreshed. The seat pitch was very good and seats were wide, aircraft was clean and all staff were excellent. The best flight I have ever taken.

Von Frankfurt nach Doha mit Qatar Airways, pünktlicher Abflug und Ankunft. Der Check-in war in Ordnung, einige Probleme bestanden darin, dass unsere Tochter zu groß für die Wiege war und kein dritter Sitzplatz verfügbar war. Der Service an Bord war perfekt mit sehr höflichen und aufmerksamen Besatzungsmitgliedern. Mein neuer Koffer wurde beschädigt und selbst einen Monat nach meiner Beschwerde kam keine Reaktion.

Tokio naar Parijs CDG via Doha met Qatar Airways. Geen probleem om in te checken op de luchthaven van Narita. In staat om zonder gedoe een stoel bij het raam te krijgen. Eten oke, vegetarische maaltijd besteld. DOH tot CDG slechts 3 passagiers op het bovendek gereserveerd voor Privilege clubhouders, en geen andere passagiers opgewaardeerd. In staat om plat te liggen met behulp van de middelste stoelen. Even een praatje gemaakt met de attente stewardess. Ik wou dat ik deze ervaring opnieuw zou hebben!

London to Bangkok via Doha with Qatar Airways, and very pleased overall - especially with the three of four legs on A380 which I found a great step up beyond what I've seen before. Comfortable and supportive seats and even at 1.84m enough space and so quiet. Service very attentive and polite, all on time and minimal time queuing to board aircraft. Entertainment system, again especially on A380, was excellent. Only great weakness was food - even by airline standards I found it terrible on all four flights - fatty meat, almost nothing green, frequently a stodgy pasty with paste inside referred to as chicken sandwich : not nutritious. Juices also terrible (processed juice drinks)

Perth to London via Doha. The seats were comfortable, got a packet with tooth brush, tooth paste and an eye mask. I also got a blanket and pillow. There was enough room for me to stretch my legs out. Good choice of movies and shows. I was disappointed with food, not much of a choice on the menu and didn't have enough for 11 hour flight. One point they were handing out chicken sandwiches but turned out to be a pastry filled with mush. Staff were okay, they weren't smiling. At least 8 hours into the flight, they eventually handed out small bottles of water. But flight was good, no turbulence, smooth landing in Doha. I was looking forward to a flight on the Boeing 787 Dreamliner but they changed it to a Boeing 777-300er. London to Doha I flew the A380. Great aircraft, good legroom for economy, food was sort of the same, except they handed out a decent chocolate bar. Entertainment systems newer than the 777. They were great, I watched a few movies and slept most of the time. Then another smooth landing at Doha. I was impressed of the A380. Another Boeing 777-300ER from Doha to Perth. A kid in front of me pushed his seat back on boarding and cabin crew walked by and did nothing until takeoff. Once we took off, the seat came down again for the whole flight. It was difficult to eat food and watch Tv. This plane, my entertainment system would not respond, couldn't press anything without it glitching.

Amsterdam naar Bangkok via Doha met Qatar Airways. Uitstekende vluchten en lounge in Doha. Boeing 787- en A380-stoelen zijn hetzelfde. Maar vreemd genoeg was de IFE op de Boeing lang niet zo uitgebreid als de A380. Mijn vrouw bestelde een vegetarische maaltijd en de eerste vlucht vroeg ze of ze iets van het gewone menu kon kiezen, aangezien de vlucht vol was, was het antwoord nee. Geen probleem - maar ze kreeg maar drie cursussen in plaats van vijf. Tweede sector op A380 ze kon alles kiezen. In de retoursector annuleerde ze de speciale maaltijd en het was veel leuker. Aan boord is de champagne veranderd sinds ik in het voorjaar met QR terugvloog. Jaquart werd aangeboden in de Business-cabine, het was oké, maar de Taittinger Comtres de Chanpagne in de A380-lounge was veel leuker. De Aspire-lounge die in Amsterdam werd gebruikt, was oké en beter dan de BA-lounge ernaast. Over het algemeen moet ik, naast Singapore Airlines, nog een betere Business Class-vlucht ervaren. Les geleerd door mijn vrouw, bestel geen speciale maaltijd - veel vegetarische keuzes op het gewone menu.

بيروت إلى مسقط. خدمة الخطوط الجوية القطرية رائعة وجديدة ويتم الاعتناء بها جيدًا وموظفين متعددي الثقافات ، لذا لن تكون اللغة مشكلة كبيرة. كانت الرحلات في الوقت المحدد ، والطعام جيد جدًا ولكن في بعض الأحيان شهي للغاية ، لذلك إذا كنت لا تحب تذوق الطعام الجاهز ، فقد تكون هذه مشكلة. كان طاقم الطائرة موجودًا دائمًا للتحقق مما إذا كنت بحاجة إلى شيء ما. لقد طلبت بعض النبيذ الحلو ، ولم يكن لديهم ، لكن الطاقم أضاف على الفور بعض الصودا لجعله حلوًا - شعرت أنهم مدربون جيدًا. كان لدي بعض الرحلات معهم ولن أفكر مرتين قبل حجز الخطوط الجوية القطرية مرة أخرى في المستقبل.

Doha üzerinden İstanbul'dan Manila'ya. İstanbul'dan Doha'ya uçuş iyiydi. Bu uçuşta koltuk konfigürasyonu business class'ta 2x2 idi ve A321 uçağında business class'ta 12 koltuk vardı. Kulaklığım çalışmıyordu. Sıradan bir yemek servisinden sonra uyuyakaldım. Hamad Uluslararası Havalimanı'na vardık ve Al Mourjan Lounge'a geçtik. Salon oldukça doluydu, restoranda bir masa bulacak kadar şanslıydık ve bifteğin abartılı olduğunu hayal kırıklığına uğratarak fileto biftek sipariş ettik. Al Mourjan Lounge'da servis harikaydı. Duş almak için aile odalarının yanındaki alana transfer olduk. Dinlenme salonu personeli, bunun kapımızda biniş için son çağrı olduğunu bildirdi, bu yüzden binişin henüz başlamadığını ve business class için ayrı bir biniş alanı olmadığını öğrenmek için acele ettik. Kalkıştan hemen sonra uykuya daldım. Üç saat sonra bir bayan kabin görevlisi yanımıza geldi ve yemek tercihimizi sordu. İhtiyacımız olan şeye dikkatle dikkat ettiği için onu takdir etmeliyim. O bizim emrimizdeydi ve bunun için çağrıda bulundu, uygun krediyi hak ediyor. Kabin ekibi hizmeti son derece beş yıldızlı bir sınıftı. Buna rağmen, dinlenme salonlarında ve biniş hizmetlerinde yemek seçimi ve kalitesi söz konusu olduğunda hızlarını artırmaları gerekiyor.

कतर एयरवेज के साथ दोहा होते हुए दिल्ली से रोम तक। एकदम नए विमान में उड़ान भरना हमेशा आनंददायक होता है और इस बोइंग 787 और कतर एयरवेज की त्रुटिहीन सेवा ने इसे और भी बेहतर बना दिया है। फ्लाइट समय पर उड़ान भर गई. पूरी उड़ान के दौरान पेय और हल्के नाश्ते की पेशकश की गई। मैंने एक हिंदू नॉन-वेज भोजन का ऑर्डर दिया था और यह स्वादिष्ट था। सबसे महत्वपूर्ण बात यह है कि मैं 6 फीट लंबा हूं लेकिन फिर भी पैरों के लिए आरामदायक जगह ढूंढने में कामयाब रहा हूं।

London to Singapore via Doha. Very impressed with the economy service and product offering on Qatar Airways on their brand new A380 and A350 aircraft. Aircraft spotlessly clean on both legs. Seating the same on both aircraft, very comfortable with good legroom and reasonable seat width. Felt more cramped on the A350. Crew professional and friendly on both legs. Good meal services on both flights, although I note on daylight flights in this case London to Doha the meal service and offering is much more extensive than on the early morning flights 0230am from Doha to Singapore. Inflight entertainment good and extensive choice not just of Western movies/tv but content from around the world. The Oryx IFE system they use is not that user friendly and can be clumsy. 15 minutes free wifi offered on both flights, but no point in using as the system times out constantly. Bathrooms kept clean throughout both flights. Only real negatives about experience, very long and drawn out safety announcements done in both Arabic and English but not simultaneously, way too much advertising of Qatar Airways, Qatar banks etc. Inflight entertainment interrupted too many times with charity videos and arrival videos for Doha. The new Doha airport for economy class passengers very bland, very poor food outlet choices, expensive shops, but lack of sitting area, shower and rest facilities for such a major global hub.

Hanoi to Nairobi via Bangkok and Doha. Excellent service at check-in in Noi Bai International Airport. NIA Business Lounge in T2 is very good and spacious. Onboard proactive FAs provide a good mood and proper care. The product has changed slightly in recent months in economy class with smaller food portions though 3 options are offered on menu card. Champagne is not served in economy class but an amenity kit is still provided. Excellent language skills among the crew. All flights on time. Reliability and precision of the airline high. FAs are professional, fresh, and often in a sparkling mood. I never had experienced a significant delay with Qatar Airways, but am annoyed by eternal bus-transfers in Doha. HIA was supposed to have this improved but I do not see much change nor direct gate access. Onboard the worst part is the the slow safety video, lengthy, numerous commercials (esp. on tourism, banking, and HIA glamourisation). Even worse are QR charity initiatives which are imposed on all passengers. Drink rounds have been less on my flights and are no separate round offered prior to meals - which can be delayed for 1-2 hours into the flight

من مانيلا إلى اسطنبول عبر الدوحة. هذه هي المرة الأولى التي نطير فيها على متن الخطوط الجوية القطرية منذ أن كنا نطير إلى كاثي باسيفيك منذ فترة طويلة. بالكاد كان هناك طابور في درجة الأعمال. لقد تواصلت مع أحد موظفي QR وسألته عما إذا كان بإمكانها حل مشكلة FFP الخاصة بي. كانت قادرة على تشفير CX على النظام. على الأقل كنت سعيدًا لأن أرباحي من الأميال ستُضاف إلى حساب ماركو بولو الخاص بي. ثم حصلنا على بطاقة الصعود إلى الطائرة والدخول إلى الصالة. وقفنا في قائمة انتظار للحصول على شيكات الهجرة ، وقد استغرق ذلك منا ساعة حتى نتمكن من اجتيازها. عندما وصلنا إلى طابور موظف هجرة معين ، كان أمامنا 6 أشخاص واستغرق الأمر وقتًا طويلاً للتعامل مع كل واحد منهم. عندما جاء دورنا ، استغرق الأمر أقل من 5 دقائق. مشينا لبضع دقائق للوصول إلى صالة PAGS وظهرت مثل صالة كاثي باسيفيك القديمة - قيل لي بعد ذلك أن هذه هي صالة CX القديمة التي تحتاج إلى تجديد جدي! لقد تم الترحيب بنا على متن الطائرة بحرارة ، على الرغم من خيبة الأمل لرؤية تكوين المقعد كان 2-2-2. كنت أتمنى أن تكون النتيجة 1-2-1. كانت الخدمة لا تشوبها شائبة - ببساطة لا تشوبها شائبة. فضلنا تناول العشاء بعد ساعة من الإقلاع. وعندما بدأت خدمة الوجبة ، شعرت بسعادة غامرة بالخبز. كانت المزة العربية موجودة وحصلت على كأس شيراز الأسترالي الثاني. لسوء الحظ ، كان entrÃ © e عاديًا. أفضل كوب ثالث من شيراز والمكسرات على الرئيسي. كانت الحلوى متاحة ، لكنني اخترت الحصول على طبق الجبن ليقترن مع شيراز الخاص بي وكان رائعًا. وصلنا إلى مطار حمد الدولي في الساعة 9:30 مساءً. نزلت من الطائرة وعملت من خلالها إلى مكتب النقل للإقامة داخل المدينة الذي قدمته الخطوط الجوية القطرية. وصلنا إلى الغرفة وحصلنا على غرفة في الطابق العلوي ، وكانت الإقامة لائقة. أدوات النظافة كانت لوكسيتان. بعد الاستحمام السريع ، غفونا في الغفوة لأن مكالمة الإيقاظ في الساعة 4 صباحًا. في الرابعة صباحًا ، تلقينا مكالمة الاستيقاظ وقمنا بتسجيل المغادرة. أعادنا سائق النقل من المطار إلى المطار وكان الأمر أشبه بنسيم يمر عبر عمليات فحص الهجرة والأمن. لقد جربنا صالة المرجان للخطوط الجوية القطرية. عندما دخلت ، أذهلتني التفاصيل المطلقة. السقف العالي والمفروشات وكل ذلك. استنادًا إلى كل شيء على أساس الخدمة أثناء الرحلة وليس تكوين المقعد وتصميمه والتجربة الكاملة ، كنت سأسافر على درجة الأعمال في الخطوط الجوية القطرية في رحلتي الطويلة القادمة.

Perth to Edinburgh via Doha. Planes modern and spacious, I could see the Boeing 787 could be cramped if full but the large windows and lower cabin pressure make experience better. Very little jet lag on my arrival. Very pleasant flights helped by being able to have three seats to myself on both flights. Staff pleasant if not overly friendly. Food okay on Perth to Doha segment. Breakfast on leaving Doha much better but pastry and savoury snack before landing in Edinburgh not great. Doha Airport good on quiet midweek morning but quite expensive for food and drinks. Onward connection from Edinburgh to Belfast straightforward as bags checked all the way through and just needed to pick up boarding pass from flybe staff. Overall a very easy way to connect to Northern Ireland from Australia.

Oslo to Bangkok via Doha. The business class product is still excellent, and the crew was friendly and attentive as usual. Small things are cut back, the amuse bouche from Oslo, drink after takeoff, amenity kit. Still value for money. One thing that annoys is the IFE remote which is sluggish and unresponsive, unless you by chance touch it with your elbow - not very smart placement in the seat. DOH to BKK they do a full dinner menu, very slow on a flight that leaves after midnight. I gave up and went to sleep. Tried the on board lounge for canapÃ©s, but they only had nuts.

Manchester to Bangkok via Doha return, and a superb trip with Qatar Airways. Check in at Manchester business desk took only a few minutes then on to the Escape lounge which was quite full, perhaps one day Qatar will have their own lounge in Manchester and maybe a complimentary Chauffeur service. Boarded and a member of cabin crew asked about drinks while others introduced themselves, always a nice touch, took off virtually on time. A330 is a nice aircraft, small business class section with comfortable seats, decent selection of movies, food very good as usual on Qatar. Arrived Hamad International a few minutes ahead of time and disembarked into airport, no bus. As I had a few hours to spare went to the Al Mourjan lounge until gate for Bangkok advised. Bangkok flight on the A380, some of the departure gates designed with this aircraft in mind as separate business class gate and upstairs lounge to board direct to upper section. Much bigger business section with 48 seats, very comfortable but strange seats no arm rest of the left hand side until you reclined the seat. Good flight, again managed to sleep for a short time before arriving at Bangkok. Return flights just as good despite an 8 hours transit in Doha (more about that in the lounge review) I always get messed up with the different Airbus A330 models but the one from Doha to Manchester was different from the first flight, looked a little older and smaller. I can't praise the Qatar crews on all four flights enough, brilliant service with maybe the best food on any airline. The only thing that spoilt a perfect trip was that between Bangkok and Manchester my case was damaged in three different areas, it looked like to main damage was done by the wheels of another case.

London to Shiraz via Doha, returning from Tehran. Qatar Airways 1x2x1 business class layout on the A380 top deck means every seat has aisle access. They are angled away from the aisle to make them more private, have lots of storage space (plus big overhead bins) and are very comfortable. There are two toilets at the front and two at the back and the lounge area (which surprisingly didn't seem to be used much) makes the whole area feel spacious. Passengers in the small economy section at the rear of the top deck are entirely separate and not allowed to use the lounge or wander through the business area. The cabin service and food was faultless. Qatar Airways cabin staff are specifically trained for the A380 and it certainly shows. A nice touch is that each passenger has a designated crew member who introduces him/herself before take off and says goodbye before landing. The A320 has old style business class seats but these were fine for relatively short flights.

Bruxelles à Bangkok retour via Doha sur Qatar Airways. Tous les vols à l'heure, avion très propre. L'équipage était très sympathique et la nourriture très bonne. Je ne peux que recommander cette compagnie aérienne. Je volerai certainement avec eux à nouveau!

Amsterdam naar Bangkok via Doha. Ik probeerde Qatar Airways begin dit jaar tussen Londen en Kaapstad terug te keren in economy. Ik was zo onder de indruk van de service dat ik besloot om de business class eens te proberen, en ik moet zeggen dat het echt als 5 sterren voelt in vergelijking met de luchtvaartmaatschappijen die ik normaal gebruik. Check-in op Schiphol was snel en beleefd doorverwezen naar de Aspire-lounge - een lounge van derden die prima is, hoewel druk. Op tijd instappen per klas, eenmaal aan boord was de service ongeëvenaard! De stoel op de Boeing 787 (2A) was comfortabel en een geweldige omgeving. De bemanning op deze vlucht kon ik niet klagen en ik kon ook niet klagen over het eten dat goed werd gepresenteerd en goed smaakte. Op tijd vertrokken en 15 minuten te vroeg aangekomen. Hamad Airport in Doha is fantastisch. Ik gebruikte de lounge tijdens mijn 2 uur durende transit, wat weer echt 5 sterren was - veel ruimte, lekker eten en

من دبي إلى الدوحة وبعد يومين من الدوحة إلى الكويت. كانت المحطة الأولى برحلة قصيرة من طراز A320 ، وتخطيط مقصورة لطيف ، وكلها تبدو جديدة تمامًا. كان الاقتصاد مريحًا. لا يوجد ترفيه منذ رحلة قصيرة ، مجرد وجبة خفيفة كوجبة على متن الطائرة. لا اعلان عربي. كان الطاقم آسيويًا وليس متحدثًا باللغة العربية ونفس الشيء على رحلة DOH-KWI. لكن طائرة بوينج 777 تقل عن 50 راكبًا. عموما رحلة جيدة.

Edinburgh to Perth via Doha return with Qatar Airways. No airline comes close to the high customer service levels of Qatar. The Boeing 787 seat is really good and the food is amazing. Love the Boeing 777 but not the same as the 787 which is a lot more modern and quieter. Always fly Qatar and would suggest to anyone to fly them and join privilege club frequent flyer program, as got an upgrade to business for the flights for having enough qmiles.

Cape Town to Manchester via Doha with Qatar Airways, and excellent as always. Easy transfer at Doha and great boarding process. Their Boeing 787 is an excellent plane, the Boeing 777 less comfortable. Service from crew was wonderful. Special help was given to family on first flight with young son with autism. Qatar Airways have good fares too.

Tokio Narita naar Stockholm via Doha. Bij Narita wordt de grondservice van Qatar Airways uitgevoerd door partner Japan Airlines, snel en efficiënt voor inchecken en bagage. Lounge is comfortabel en stil, maar het aanbod aan eten is vrij slecht, zoals vaak in Japan. Lange wandeling naar de gate, maar we waren gewaarschuwd dat het 10 minuten zou duren. Makkelijk instappen, op een Boeing 777, vriendelijk welkom door een bemanningslid die ons naar onze stoelen wees. Zelfde comfort en plat bed als op de heenvlucht. Ik koos voor meer internationaal eten, het was een licht diner vanwege laat vertrek (22.00 uur), niets fantastisch maar goede en leuke presentatie, alle gerechten naar je stoel gebracht, geen trolley op en neer door het gangpad. Ik heb twee films gekeken. Kon goed slapen en had een licht ontbijt besteld dat 90 minuten voor de landing werd geserveerd. Aangekomen in Doha om 4 uur 's ochtends, toegang via jetway maar lange weg om te lopen, tijd om naar de lounge te lopen, bijna niemand daar, het was 0430 - ging naar boven naar restaurant dat om 5 uur begint. Kon meteen wat thee krijgen en koos toen voor het buffet dat ik aantrekkelijker vond dan een à-la-cartemenu. Ik had een lekker uitgebreid ontbijt uit een grote keuze aan producten in westerse en oosterse stijl. Daarna een douche, geen wachttijd, hoewel de lounge steeds drukker werd met verschillende vluchten die aankwamen. Een tussenstop van 4 uur ging als een makkie, met wachttijd op een rustige en comfortabele plek, met goede wifi-verbinding en stopcontact om iphone en ipad op te laden. Ik kreeg instapinformatie per sms dan op het scherm van de luchthaven, dus begon op tijd naar de gate te gaan omdat het erg ver was, 15 minuten lopen inclusief bewegende trottoirs om daar te komen. Instappen met de bus, een gereserveerd voor business class passagiers. Hetzelfde welkom aan boord van Boeing 787. De bemanning nam bestellingen op voor de maaltijd - koos een Arabisch ontbijt omdat het 9 uur was en wat extra dingen zoals Frans gebak. Ik drink geen alcohol en heb niet naar IFE gekeken, behalve naar de vliegroute. Tweemaal vroeg de bemanning of ik extra drankjes of eten wilde. Landing in Stockholm, wat door de immigratie lopen om de bagageaflevering te bereiken, onze koffers arriveerden minder dan 5 minuten nadat we daar waren geweest op de riem. Beide vluchten, want beide uitgaande vluchten waren precies op tijd. Ik maakte me een beetje zorgen over de bagage na het lezen van enkele opmerkingen, maar deze service verdient alle punten - behalve de lounge van luchtvaartpartners in NRT en ARN. Ik vlieg zeker weer met Qatar Airways.

Edinburgh to Perth via Doha with Qatar Airways, very difficult to criticise any aspect of this journey. The Boeing 787 seats to Doha were excellent and the cabin crew could not have been better. The crew was also excellent on the leg to Perth, although we did not find the seats on the Boeing 777 quite as good, as this was an older airplane.

مانيلا إلى فيينا عبر الدوحة والخطوط الجوية القطرية هي واحدة من أفضل شركات الطيران لدي. كان المقعد مريح للغاية والموظفين يقظون للغاية. كان لديه أفضل مجموعة ترفيهية على متن الطائرة لدي وأفضل اختيار نبيذ علاوة على ذلك. كانت خيارات الطعام رائعة أيضًا. كل شئ كان مذهلا. تستحق شركة الطيران هذه حقًا تصنيفها من فئة 5 نجوم.

Von Frankfurt nach Doha mit Qatar Airways im A350, mit den besten und breitesten Sitzplätzen aller Zeiten in der Economy Class! Sehr guter Service durch wirklich internationales Kabinenpersonal. Einfache Arbeit, da das Flugzeug nicht voll ist. Das Essen war enttäuschend, ein sehr guter chilenischer Wein und ausgezeichneter heißer, leckerer Kaffee. Extrem schöne 3D-Fluginformationen. Der Flug von Doha nach Colombo erfolgte mit einer älteren Boeing 777, die nach dem A350-Flug von Frankfurt enttäuschend war. Der Flug war voll, nicht genug Personal und die Sitze waren nicht so bequem, mit altem IFE. âš‘ Qatar Airways Ranking

Johannesburg to Stockholm via Doha with Qatar Airways. Great service in business class, and the lie flat seats are truly 180 degrees. A genuine effort from cabin staff to cater for every whim of the customer, from welcome beverage to the 6 course meal with range of wines and spirits. My only niggle was that the AVOD selection for September was not as good as on my previous flights.

London to Abu Dhabi via Doha on Qatar Airways. They let us use the Business area to check in. Onboard the flight, crew were smiling and respondent. Seats were very comfortable. Finally, they have mood lights, which is a positive. Food was delicious. Transit was around 2 hours. Doha Airport has lots of things to be done in it. Shopping areas to playing, with Macs in the middle of the airport for free. Internet in airport was 15mb/s and upload was 17mb/s.

الكويت إلى اسطنبول عبر الدوحة ، وكانت هذه أول رحلة لي على متن الخطوط الجوية القطرية. لقد كانت رحلة رائعة ، كانت هناك مضيفة طيران رائعة على الرحلة QR241 كانت متحمسة للغاية وأرادت التحدث مع الركاب ومساعدتهم.

Manchester to Riyadh via Doha. The food was good, seats were as expected, but flights to and from Manchester were full of children (as well as the short Riyadh flights), and sleep was impossible. They use an electronic menu, for which they interrupted the IFE for 30 minutes. Toilets were a mess.

دبي إلى كاثاماندو في فئة J. الخيار الأفضل مع الخطوط الجوية القطرية هو أنها تطير من مطار دبي الدولي وليس مطار دبي الدولي وهو خيار رائع. مطار صغير ، يمكنك المرور من تسجيل الوصول إلى البوابة في غضون 5 دقائق حرفيًا على الجانب الجوي للعودة إلى رتبة سيارة الأجرة الأرضية. أجد الخطوط الجوية القطرية شركة طيران متسقة الجودة ، هذه الرحلة لم تكن مختلفة ، رحلات في الوقت المحدد ، في جميع الاتجاهات. DWC إلى KTM عبر الدوحة ، كل طاقم العمل كان ممتعًا لقد كانت هذه العين حمراء ، لذا كان النوم هو المطلب الرئيسي ولكن للأسف مع الطائرة المستخدمة لم يكن خيارًا. طائرة A320 في رحلة ليلية 4.5 ساعة مع مقاعد غير مسطحة لا تجعلها منطقة نوم مريحة. لذلك كان هذا سلبي. يتسم الطاقم على متن الطائرة عمومًا بالأدب والفعالية ولكن لديهم شعور بالآلية ، ولا يعرفون كيف يتعاملون مع الركاب بأناقة. في جميع القطاعات ، لم تكن هناك أولوية لتسجيل الوصول أو أولوية الصعود ، وكانت جميع الطائرات في مواقف نائية. الطعام والشراب جيد - لكن لا تفهم سبب وجود المزة ولحم الضأن في كل قائمة! بشكل عام جيدة ولكن يمكن أن تفعل أفضل.

新加坡飛往多哈。卡塔爾航空A350商務艙是一流的。一架美妙、安靜且裝飾精美的飛機。窗戶似乎比其他飛機更大。座位可能有點窄，但我得到的是單人座位，這意味著有很多隱私，可以很好地休息和睡眠。機組人員非常出色，食物也很棒。衛生間非常好，在整個飛行過程中都保持乾淨。還沒有嘗試過機載WiFi。無論如何，在我看來，這項 WiFi 服務應該對商務艙乘客免費。多哈飛往威尼斯的航班是一架較舊的 A330-200，但服務和食物與之前的航段一樣出色。我在多哈哈馬德機場轉機的次數越多，我就越欣賞它的現代化和寬敞的商務艙休息室。

كانت رحلة الدوحة إلى فرانكفورت مبهجة على متن طائرة إيرباص 350 الجديدة ، متفوقة بشكل جيد على ما يسمى دريملاينر. الخدمة والمقاعد والالتزام بالمواعيد متميزة. مطار حمد الجديد في الدوحة هو الأفضل على الإطلاق في الشرق الأوسط. رحلة العودة كانت قصة مختلفة

Was curious to try Qatar, having flown Emirates numerous times between S Africa and Europe. Qatar's pricing is a major draw-card, they were significantly cheaper than Emirates. The trip out of JNB to DOH was great, the plane was not full and a lot of passengers had spare seats around them. Not sure that it would have been as pleasant with a full plane. Having heard so much about the Boeing 787, I was expecting it to be state-of-the-art flying, but I can't say that was the case. The seats are as hard and very cramped - these seats rate very poorly against the Boeing 777, and the only way I could grab any sleep was by sleeping against the window. The food was really good, and I love the containers they use - much better than any other airline I have flown with recently. Entertainment is great - the range is not quite as extensive as Emirates or BA, but streets ahead of Turkish Airlines. One gripe is that the crew would only serve one drink with dinner, I couldn't have a pre-dinner drink and a glass of wine. Thought that was rather mean. The flight between Doha and Istanbul was also good, despite it being a full flight on a narrow body aircraft. Return flight was great too, my only gripe is that every leg of the journey entailed a bus to get to the terminal building, and another back out. That would be okay if you weren't left in the 38 degree heat. Other than that, I can't fault Qatar.

Dallas to Doha economy class, and passengers were mostly not beef eaters, but one of the main dishes offered was beef. Maybe the airline should look at other food choice options. Overall very satisfied with the service provided by crew and the inflight entertainment. Qatar deserves to be the world best airline. Meal options are not the fault of crew, but just a suggestion.

新加坡飛往邁阿密。波音 787 的座椅看起來很適合兒童和小個子女性，但成年男性會感到不舒服。首先要做的是將媒體盒移離座椅下方區域。我的一隻腳放在島上不僅存在安全隱患，而且被踢和撞也不好玩，因為如果放在座位下面我就無法移動我的腳。我坐在一個身材高大的男人旁邊，他侵占了我的座位空間。我相信座位寬約17 英寸。座位間距最小，但與其他航空公司沒有什麼不同。服務非常友好，一流。明顯比美國航空公司好。食物令人失望。雖然該航空公司確實提供一流的服務，但我建議不要乘坐飛機由於座位限制，他們乘坐經濟艙。

Manchester to Melbourne return - flight very good as always I had 2 seats to myself on the Doha to Melbourne which enabled me to have about 6/7 hrs sleep. The only criticism is that the films/music etc is a little outdated and the films are quite old. The new airport is very big and bright but I found my way around quite easily and there are plenty of Qatar air staff just walking about ready to help if needed I've already booked again for next year.

836 ريال قطري من الدوحة إلى بانكوك ، كان من المفترض أن تكون طائرة إيرباص A380 الجديدة بمقعد 46 درجة مئوية على الدرجة الاقتصادية ولكنها انتقلت دون سبب فني إلى منطقة اقتصادية صغيرة في الطابق العلوي الأيمن في الجزء الخلفي من الطائرة. مقعد 27G. لقد اخترت المقعد 46c نظرًا لموقعه الأمامي للحافة الأمامية للجناح الذي يتميز بالهدوء النسبي والراحة في الاضطرابات في 380 مثل طيران الإمارات وسنغافورة. كان هذا الوضع الجديد صاخبًا (المحرك) ومروعًا في الاضطرابات لأنك قريب جدًا من الذيل. أتفهم أن شركات الطيران لا يمكنها ضمان طلب مقعدك "لأسباب فنية" ولكن لم يكن هناك خطأ في المقعد الذي اخترته. تخميني هو أنه بصفتي مسافرًا منفردًا ، ربما تم نقلي لاستيعاب مجموعة من اثنين أو أكثر من المسافرين الذين تركوا هناك لتسجيل الوصول وحجز المقاعد حتى اللحظة الأخيرة. أود أن أعرف لماذا يجب معاقبة الأشخاص الذين يحجزون الرحلات بخمس أو ستة أشهر مقدمًا على الآخرين الذين حجزوا في اللحظة الأخيرة أو لا يسجلون الوصول حتى اللحظة الأخيرة. قيل لي من قبل متعهد المقصورة أن طاقم العمل الأرضي قد نقل العديد من الأشخاص وأن العديد من الركاب قد اشتكوا.

Da Milano a Nairobi via Doha. Entrambe le tratte su aeromobile A320. L'aereo più recente sulla prima tratta offriva posti a sedere più morbidi e intrattenimento su richiesta, mentre il vecchio A320 sulla seconda tratta aveva posti a sedere più duri e nessun intrattenimento. lo spazio per le gambe è un problema a causa della scatola di intrattenimento sotto il sedile di fronte a te (sedili F), ma per il resto va bene. Recline è generoso anche se le persone dietro di te si lamentano che invade il loro spazio.

Edinburgh to Doha flight QR 28 on 24th January 2015. First time I've flown with Qatar Airways. I would not hesitate in recommending them. I believe this is the best economy class flight I have been on. Spacious seating tasty food and friendly attentive staff. I have experience of long haul flights where the cabin crew get the service out of the way as quickly as possible and then disappear behind a curtain for the rest of the flight. This was not like that at all. They were helpful throughout the flight. I was very impressed.

Edinburgh to Doha flight QR 28 on 24th January 2015. First time I've flown with Qatar Airways. I would not hesitate in recommending them. I believe this is the best economy class flight I have been on. Spacious seating tasty food and friendly attentive staff. I have experience of long haul flights where the cabin crew get the service out of the way as quickly as possible and then disappear behind a curtain for the rest of the flight. This was not like that at all. They were helpful throughout the flight. I was very impressed.

Madrid a Dubái y Muscat a Bruselas en clase Turista y Ejecutiva en varios segmentos. Todos, desde el personal de tierra hasta las tripulaciones de vuelo, fueron amables y corteses. Se sirvieron comidas y alcohol gratis incluso en clase económica. Los televisores personales en los respaldos de los asientos tenían una gran selección de películas. Las tripulaciones de vuelo realizaron numerosas carreras de bebidas a lo largo de los vuelos de larga distancia, nuevamente esto es clase económica, ofreciendo recargas aún más de alcohol y agua fresca gratis. El espacio para las piernas era muy generoso, los asientos extremadamente cómodos. Esta aerolínea hace que los transportistas de los EE. UU. e incluso Europa se vean muy mal en comparación.
787 من الدوحة إلى بروكسل في الأعمال. ممتاز! خدمة رائعة فريق عمل ودود للغاية صالة جديدة ممتازة. المرة الأولى لنا مع قطر ولكن بالتأكيد ليست الأخيرة! أفضل من طيران الإمارات.

الدوحة إلى كولومبو. كانت الطائرة من طراز B777 ويبدو أنها جديدة تقريبًا. تأخرت الرحلة 20 دقيقة ، ثم أمضينا 30 دقيقة في جولة حول المطار دون إعلان عن سبب تأخرنا. درجة الأعمال نصف كاملة فقط لذا كانت الخدمة ممتازة. كان الطعام المقدم غير ملهم ولكن المشروبات كانت جيدة وتم إعادة تعبئتها بانتظام. لم يتم توفير حزمة راحة في هذه الرحلة. كانت المقاعد مريحة للغاية والطائرة 777 في رأيي أفضل من A330.

London to Doha return. Economy class just average no signs the five stars advertised on TV. Seats are fine if you manage to avoid the numerous seats that have a box in the foot space. Entertainment system is old and tired. Better with your own tablet. Food basic. Cabin service very slow on both legs of my journey and staff seemed very tired and stressed. Flight almost on time and baggage all safe and sound.

9 月 12 日至 19 日從曼谷經多哈返回曼徹斯特。新的多哈機場當然比舊機場有了很大的改進，但一些問題仍然存在：在登機口辦理登機手續意味著將250 人推入一個為大約100 人設計的空間，這是一個不恰當的開始- 不可能有這麼多人我們中的一些人不得不等到一些人上了飛機。特權俱樂部銀牌休息室很難找到——在我找到合適的休息室之前，我被從一個休息室送到了下一個[總共參觀了4 個]——工作人員似乎對誰可以使用哪個休息室感到困惑。現在卡塔爾已加入同一個世界，我可能會轉乘芬蘭航空，因為他們的價格和旅行時間都比卡塔爾好。總而言之，卡塔爾是一個好產品。

Economy Paris à Doha puis Business de Doha à CPT. Le vol de Paris est parti tard donc j'ai raté ma correspondance à Doha. Le personnel au sol attend mon arrivée pour m'emmener au bureau de transfert pour prendre d'autres dispositions. Tout est fait de manière très professionnelle. Embarquez le lendemain sur votre vol et passez la nuit dans un hôtel à Doha sans frais supplémentaires. Le nouvel aéroport de Doha est magnifique. J'ai utilisé le salon d'affaires le matin de mon vol révisé et c'était spacieux et moderne avec une excellente cuisine. Le vol en affaires vers CPT était superbe. Siège très confortable dans le nouveau Dreamliner avec un excellent personnel de divertissement attentif et de bonnes options de restauration. Hautement recommandé.

Paris à Doha Classe Affaires 15 août 2014. Comme toujours avec Qatar Airways l'équipage et les stewards étaient excellents. Le service comme tout le reste du vol est d'un bon ou excellent niveau. Difficile de trouver meilleur rapport qualité/prix au moins sur cette route Europe vers Asie/Pacifique.

Paris à Doha Classe Affaires 15 août 2014. Comme toujours avec Qatar Airways l'équipage et les stewards étaient excellents. Le service comme tout le reste du vol est d'un bon ou excellent niveau. Difficile de trouver meilleur rapport qualité/prix au moins sur cette route Europe vers Asie/Pacifique.

Flew Perth to Doha to Manchester return which I do a few times a year. The planes where all very clean we flew an A330 and B777. The seat quality was one of the best I have had. The biggest let down for me and why I will not be using Qatar again was because I am an emerald one world flyer I was greeted by a member of the cabin crew who took my meal order only to find when the meals were served I was asked again as my preference was no longer available. I explained I had made a previous order being an emerald member. This was also the case for the fast track lanes at passport control no fast track passes handed out which it states in the one world privileges. Doha airport is so much improved easy connections and very clean and professional.

Cape Town to Barcelona: QR 1366 on 18 June 2014 Cape Town to Doha. QR 139 on 19 June 2014 Doha to Barcelona. After reading many less favourable reviews on Qatar Airways we feared the trip when we were delayed at Cape Town before even embarking. However a pleasant crew outstanding service a well maintained Boeing 787 an on time landing in Doha changed our views. The transfer was quick and easy and the onward flight to Barcelona as good as the first. We will follow the route again!

Taif to Doha 18 June TIF-DOH QR 1207. Doha to Bangkok 18 June DOH-BKK QR 822. The first leg was First class on an Airbus 321. Small aircraft and got shaken a round a bit during fine weather. The service was outstanding. Only 2 people and a family. The cabin supervisor went out of his way to please us. No Alcohol on the first leg. The second leg fro Doha to Bangkok was again exceptional service. The food was hot of and extremely high quality by any restaurant standard yet alone up in the air at 39000 feet! The cabin staff were pleasant always had a smile and nothing was too much trouble. Both the supervisors and staff on both legs should be commended for their efforts. The new airport was a pleasant surprise with no buses. No problems accessing the premium lounge Plenty of drink and food available even though it was a little bit busy. Be prepared to walk a long way to get there and to the gate. However they give you plenty of warning when you are due to board. They scan all passengers in the lounge. You should not be overlooked. Best of all was the smoking lounge where in this politically correct world we live in was a bonus. It is isolated so those of us who wish to smoke can do so in peace. Hats off to the entire experience. I will choose no other airline if it flies the route I am taking. The new airport is big and will take some getting used to.

Voler de Paris à Bangkok en affaires il y a quelques jours. Le kit d'agrément est vraiment médiocre la nourriture n'est pas adaptée à l'horaire la carte des vins n'est pas aussi bonne qu'à l'exception (mauvais champagne servi trop chaud) pas de salons d'affaires à Doha (depuis plus de 6 mois) utilisation de très mauvais salons à Paris ou Bangkok. Les vrais bons points sont le personnel et le siège.

Voler de Paris à Bangkok en affaires il y a quelques jours. Le kit d'agrément est vraiment médiocre la nourriture n'est pas adaptée à l'horaire la carte des vins n'est pas aussi bonne qu'à l'exception (mauvais champagne servi trop chaud) pas de salons d'affaires à Doha (depuis plus de 6 mois) utilisation de très mauvais salons à Paris ou Bangkok. Les vrais bons points sont le personnel et le siège.

Zürich nach Doha und Doha nach Narita am 29. und 30. Mai. War mit meinem Kind und meinen Kindern (3 und 5) unterwegs. Beim Check-in bekamen wir die Information, dass wir keinen Zutritt zur Lounge am neuen Flughafen Doha haben. Aus diesem Grund haben wir einen Gutschein erhalten, der am Flughafen Doha in einen Gutschein eingetauscht werden konnte. Der Flug von Zürich nach Doha hatte eine Stunde Verspätung. Wir haben keine richtigen Informationen erhalten. Die Abfahrtszeit wurde alle 15 Minuten verschoben. An Bord war man erstaunt über den Komfort in der Kabine. Das Essen und die Getränke waren ausgezeichnet. Der Service an Bord war durchschnittlich. Am Flughafen Doha waren sie noch nicht wirklich bereit. Sehr lange Schlange an der Sicherheitskontrolle. Gefragt nach Business-Class-Fast-Track. War nicht verfügbar. Dann musste ich einen ziemlich langen Weg zurücklegen, um zum Verbindungstor zu gelangen. Wir flogen von Gate B1A. Das bedeutete, dass wir mit dem Bus zum Flugzeug fahren mussten, aber zuerst mussten wir draußen auf den Bus warten. Am Flugzeug angekommen mussten wir wieder draußen warten, bevor wir einsteigen konnten. Der Flug war ok. Das Essen war wieder ausgezeichnet und der Service war besser als von Zürich nach Doha.

London to Doha Boeing 787. Qatar Airways sets the standard for luxury business class with this airplane and it was the best experience I've had in many years. First class lounge at Heathrow Terminal was fantastic fabulous good great wines and nice staff. Onboard the airplane brilliant business class cabin and nice color scheme. I had a single window seats and truly private - better than most airlines first class. Meals served individually table style and food was good with a great selection of wines. Staff very efficient they don't smile much though but are courteous. The in flight entertainment had massive choice of movies and tv programs. Downside was arrival into Doha with long bus ride but the new airport is flagged to open this week and that will top this off as the best business class out there.

London to Doha Boeing 787. Qatar Airways sets the standard for luxury business class with this airplane and it was the best experience I've had in many years. First class lounge at Heathrow Terminal was fantastic fabulous good great wines and nice staff. Onboard the airplane brilliant business class cabin and nice color scheme. I had a single window seats and truly private - better than most airlines first class. Meals served individually table style and food was good with a great selection of wines. Staff very efficient they don't smile much though but are courteous. The in flight entertainment had massive choice of movies and tv programs. Downside was arrival into Doha with long bus ride but the new airport is flagged to open this week and that will top this off as the best business class out there.

Perth to London via Doha. Perth to Doha Boeing 777 had reasonable legroom. Service adequate meal selection poor. Doha - London Boeing 787 restricted legroom with impediment under seat in front. Again meals not great but good service. Both legs on time. Had to change flight 10 days before departing Perth at great cost.

新加坡飛往倫敦（經多哈）經濟航班，2013 年 3 月 21 日至 22 日。QR 939 (77W) 和 QR 009 (A346)。新加坡樟宜機場的登機有點慢，但登機後座位比大多數航空公司都寬，而且腿部空間充足！工作人員非常專業，在起飛前分發了毛巾和糖果，起飛後立即提供餐食，機組人員定期為乘客提供飲料等。77W 上的觸摸屏機上娛樂系統非常出色，儘管選擇不如中東競爭對手阿聯酋航空那麼多。午夜前順利降落多哈。四小時後轉乘 QR 009 轉乘 A346，服務再次出色，定期提供飲料服務，餐食也及時送達。 A346 上的 IFE 較舊，但電影選擇與 77W 相同。座椅再次舒適，但這次腿部空間和座椅寬度都較小。準時抵達倫敦，行李在半小時內就裝在了皮帶上。對服務非常滿意，而且物超所值。

Paris CDG vers Singapour (via Doha) Economy sur QR 38 (A346) et QR 938 (B77L). L'embarquement a été rapide à CDG et le vol est parti à l'heure. Le service sur ce vol était excellent - l'équipage apportait régulièrement des boissons, des repas étaient servis dès le départ du vol de Paris et une collation était donnée avant l'atterrissage à Doha et toujours un sourire sur les visages de l'équipage alors qu'ils faisaient le tour de la cabine. Il y avait de l'espace pour les jambes et de la largeur de siège sur l'A346, mais heureusement pour moi, le vol n'était pas plein et j'avais toute une rangée pour moi. Les IFE étaient plus anciens mais néanmoins la sélection de films était bonne. Atterrissage extrêmement fluide à Doha avant l'heure d'arrivée prévue, le transfert vers le terminal a pris environ 10 minutes, mais une fois à l'intérieur, j'ai pu me connecter à mon prochain vol vers Singapour avec du temps libre (j'avais un transit de 1 heure 25 minutes). Le QR 938 vers Singapour sur le nouveau vol B77L était encore plus vide que le dernier, donc une autre rangée pour moi aussi. Sièges plus larges sur cet avion avec beaucoup d'espace pour les jambes. Le service était excellent encore une fois les serviettes et les sucreries passées autour des boissons venaient régulièrement le petit déjeuner servi après le décollage et le goûter servi avant l'arrivée à Singapour. Le vol a atterri en avance. Je recommanderais certainement Qatar Airways et j'ai hâte de les faire voler à nouveau lors de mon prochain voyage - la compagnie aérienne va vraiment loin, en particulier avec le nouvel aéroport Hamad qui devrait ouvrir ses portes d'ici un an environ.

Melbourne to London via Doha. Late leaving Melbourne by 2 hours we missed the connection at Doha. Waiting at Doha airport gave me time to check the departure boards and every single plane was late departing. At times there were nine planes waiting to takeoff. We boarded our plane on time but then waited 70 minutes before it took off. It was a tired old A330 clean but hopeless AV system with controls fastened to the side of the seats which were difficult to operate. Immigration at LHR was prompt but we waited for more than an hour for our bags! Doha Airport just cannot handle the increased number of flights as Qatar Airways increases the number of flights. This can only get worse until they get a second runway.
1 月 17 日從曼谷飛往英國曼徹斯特：在曼谷延誤了 5 個小時，這意味著我錯過了在多哈的轉機

Manchester to Doha and then Bangkok 24th January. First time on a 787 Dreamliner (Manchester to Doha) great plane very quiet and plenty of seat room. Felt very relaxed. A much better plane than the old Airbus which I hope has now been replaced on this sector. Unfortunately the 777 from Doha to BKK is now a let down not much seat room and uncomfortable.

Melbourne to Doha in Business class. 777-200LR. Staff were very friendly and attentive. The food was the best I've had in Business and a great anytime style menu. Seat was comfortable to sit in and the full lie flat beds were great. My wife and I both got a solid 8 hours sleep which is testament to the quality of the seat/bed. We were also provided with amenities pack and pyjamas which we made use of. Aircraft was modern and well looked after and flight smooth. I'd say its as good as if not better than Emirates business and considerably cheaper.

London to Doha in business on the new Airbus. Our flight attendants English wasn't very good and they were not as efficient as other airlines. My dinner was overcooked and too salty. Staff were very kind and gave me a different meal. I had issues with my TV. It kept cutting out the entire flight. The beds are rights next to one and other. I was lucky as I was traveling with my husband but if I was sleeping that close to a stranger I wouldn't have enjoyed it. With other airlines you can put up a screen which you can't do on this plane. Worst inflight TV selection I've seen on a plane. Old movies and only a few new western release movies. Arrived into Doha for a 6 hour stop over and the Business Lounge is already looking very tired. Qatar would not be my first choice next time I fly. Up side: Amazing pyjamas and toiletry bag.

London to Dubai via Doha. The service received from the check in desk to all air crew was impeccable. Seats were of good comfort in economy and leg room was good as well. Inflight entertainment had a large number of choices to choose from. A bit of everything for everyone. Was travelling with a 5 Year old and catered their needs well as well as giving well presented child's meal. Only the transfer at Doha needs to improve a bit as having go by coach to the transit and aircraft is annoying. But overall very good and the best service I have had on anyone airline I have travelled that includes BA Virgin and emirates.

Perth WA to London LHR on 8 August. I have never felt so well looked after onboard any airline. Despite the length of this journey (22 hours) I thoroughly enjoyed it. Perth - Doha leg was onboard a B777-200LR a very comfortable aircraft. The IFE was brilliant and I was well entertained by (literally) 100s of movies games and television shows. The cabin was ambient with a lovely mood-lighting system. The connection at Doha International was smooth and took me just 1hr and 30 minutes to be onboard my London-bound flight coming from the 777. Doha is a very pleasant airport and a much newer one is on the way. The London leg was onboard B787 and had a very comfortable arrangement (as do all Qatar Aircraft) with Thales IFE. Again wonderful entertainment. The food was wonderful at all parts of the journey and various meals are provided with generous portions. The cabin crew were so professional and smart very friendly. I am very much looking forward to flying Qatar again.

دبي إلى جوهانسبرغ. خدمة العملاء المروعة المطلقة. كما وافقت ، أبلغت السيدة أنني سأسافر إلى جوهانسبرغ وسيغلق العد قريبًا. (20 دقيقة) قالت لا بأس علي أن أنتظر في قائمة الانتظار. حوالي 19/20 عدادات كان هناك شخص واحد يعمل. كان هناك حوالي 9 ركاب أمامي. انتظرت كما قيل. عندما وصلت إلى العداد أخيرًا أخبرتني السيدة أنني فاتني تسجيل الوصول (لمدة 5 دقائق) لأنني كنت أنتظر. رفضت المساعدة أو المساعدة وقالت لي إنني بحاجة إلى التحدث إلى عداد آخر. المدير الذي قيل له للتو أنني بحاجة إلى إعادة الحجز وهذه ليست مشكلته. نظرًا لأنني حجزت رحلتي عبر طرف ثالث (خطأي) وتم تسجيل الوصول بالفعل ، فقد فقدت رحلتي لأنني لم أحضر. كلفني هذا 4500 درهم تقريبًا. لقد فقدت طيران الإمارات حقًا عاملها الباهر مع مواقف الموظفين الميدانيين. قد تكون جميعها تلقائية لأنها ستكون أكثر متعة. التجربة الأكثر فظاعة ومكلفة للغاية. أنا أفهم أنه كان يجب علي الحضور في وقت سابق.

Auckland to Dubai. My worst flying experience in 40 years. Right now I am stuck in Dubai on a confirmed ticket on Emirates that they will not homor. Their airline had no integrity and no one that can make a decision. Horrible.

Vienna to Sulaymaniyah via Dubai. We missed our connection flight with another airline company and were unable to get a continuing flight with that company for another 3 days. We searched the other airlines and could fly with Emirates within 4 hours - best decision we made! When we checked in they noted that we have 3 young children and changed our seats so we could have the front row seats enabling us to sit together and also be able to use their onboard cot for our 9 month old. Once on board the flight attendants were very helpful and friendly. They attached the baby cot to the divider, my 2 older children, 6 & 3, saw the baby pack and wanted the blankets as they came with penguins (didn't say anything, they just poured!) and they were more than happy to supply these for them. The children's food was a good selection of food they actually ate, we were checked on regularly and we found the flight more relaxing than we'd expected travelling with 3 small children! TLDR: A very accommodating airline with friendly and professional staff. Highly recommend, especially if travelling with children!

Algiers to Bangkok via Dubai. It was a fantastic experience from the check in until the air craft landed. Seats are very comfortable with large legroom, the entertainment system was excellent with lot of choices.
