Manchester to Dubai in Business Class. An excellent experience from start to finish. Chauffeur drive pick up worked perfectly and check in was very quick. I was seated in my pre-booked aisle seat in the 777-300ER which serves the morning flight from Manchester (the other 2 flights are operated by an A380). Fast track security worked like a dream. Within 10 minutes of arriving at the airport I was seated in Emirates' excellent lounge enjoying an outstanding breakfast, as good as you will experience in the best 5 star hotels: cut fresh fruits, eggs benedict, stuffed field mushrooms, grilled tomatoes, warm bread and croissants. There were a selection of freshly squeezed juices and smoothies, but I opted for a glass of Veuve Cliquot champagne. Boarding was on time and we were soon seated with a friendly welcome and another glass of champagne. The business seat on the 777 is a little narrower than on the A380, but still very comfortable and it reclines to a lie flat bed, with nice new design duvet. Service throughout the flight was perfect with very good crew visibility and a purser who really was outstanding and lead by example. We enjoyed drinks and nuts (Emirates makes a very good Mojito), then a 5 course lunch, with light bites or afternoon tea served before landing. The inflight entertainment is of course very good, although unfortunately there was no WIFI or live TV on this 777. We arrived on time and were soon disembarked. I had collected my luggage, done some duty free shopping and was in my limo within 40 minutes of touch down. Outstanding business class experience in all aspects.

دبي إلى مانشستر. اخترت هذه الرحلة على وجه التحديد حتى نتمكن من السفر على متن طائرة A380. محبط جدا. كان الصعود على ما يرام وكنا في المقاعد 12E / F. كانت المقاعد ضيقة قليلاً وكان العرض مقيدًا ، ولا يوجد مكان لإراحة مرفقيك إلا إذا كنت تستخدم الحواجز على كلا الجانبين ، كانت الأرضية التي أمام المقعد بها سلسلة من التلال مما جعلها غير مريحة لتمديد ساقيك للخارج. تأخرت الطائرة عن المغادرة 30 دقيقة بسبب عدم استخدام مدرج واحد. خدمة المقصورة كانت سيئة للغاية ومفككة. تم تقديم المقبلات والأنابيب لم تصل لمدة عشرين دقيقة. لم يتم تقديم الشاي أو القهوة لنا بعد الوجبة وكان علي أن أطلبها مرتين لتقديمها ، لقد استسلمت في النهاية. يجب أن تكون الأوقات صعبة على طيران الإمارات

Manchester to Dubai. First time flying with Emirates for 10 years. Booked seats 11J/K which are the last row before economy section. Seats were a little bit hard, seemed to have little padding on the cushion. Legroom was OK but I could not get really comfortable in the seat. One major annoyance was the removable tablet on the seat frame which got in the way of my left arm and which restricted movement. The food service was good but the wine list is restricted when compared to Qatar Airways. The inflight entertainment was good but a bit fiddly to operate. Cabin crew were generally good and plane was clean and tidy. Overall a good flight but not as good as I was expecting.

Da Roma a Taipei via Dubai, il cibo è sorprendentemente freddo, FA si è persino dimenticato di dare da bere quando serve i pasti. La FA di lingua cinese tratta male il cliente, ignorando le esigenze del cliente. Potrei solo dire le esigenze del cliente a FA di lingua inglese. Penso che il prodotto Emirates sia davvero buono (grande schermo, altezza del sedile è ok), ma il software è davvero scadente - FA molto disattento, nessuna corsa tra i pasti, cibi freddi).
Paris CDG à Cape Town retour via Dubaï. Etape Paris CDG - Dubaï opérée en A380 et étape Dubaï - Le Cap en Boeing 777-300ER

乘坐阿聯酋航空航班從曼谷經迪拜飛往紐卡斯爾。從字面上看，這是工業規模的商務艙。船上的服務感覺完全是照本宣科，缺乏任何個性或個性化的感覺。迪拜的商務艙休息室類似於高級乘客的倉庫——一個沒有任何可取之處的巨大空間。這次經歷沒有什麼好處。在所謂的高級休息區，要排 10 人的隊才能進入休息室嗎？真的嗎？這不是一種優質的體驗。值得慶幸的是，我只需每年兩次接受 EK 治療。我很高興能夠重新認識全日空航空公司和新加坡航空作為我的常規飛行合作夥伴。

Manchester to Kuala Lumpur via Dubai. These were our first Emirates flights. Excellent cabin crew, friendly, attentive and happy to engage with the passengers. Both aircraft were very comfortable, but we prefer the extra smoothness and comfort of the A380. For a couple we recommend the central pair of seats which are positioned together with the mini bar section between the seats and the aisle. The wine selection was excellent and food very tasty and of a high standard. Regular supplies of hot towel throughout the two seven hour flights. The only negative was that I struggled to get the wifi set up, but that is probably down to my ineptitude. I could have requested help there but I didn't as I was into a film at that point. The Emirates lounge at Manchester was very good and is soon to be updated we were told. We were very impressed with the food in all the lounges we used, the KUL lounge was excellent too. There very good quality wines, coffee etc on offer in each lounge. Prior to these Emirates flights our most recent business class flights were from LHR terminal 5 and BA, Emirates offering is many levels higher than our experience there.

من مسقط إلى سنغافورة عبر دبي مع طيران الإمارات. تجربة جميلة جدا. مقصورة أنيقة ، طاقم ودود للغاية ، باقة ترفيه رائعة للغاية. الصعود في الوقت المناسب والمغادرة. تحديث معلومات الرحلة مفيد جدا. لقد أظهر الحجز عبر الإنترنت ، واختيار المقاعد عبر الإنترنت ، وتفضيلات الوجبات ، وحزم الأطفال أثناء وجودهم على متن الطائرة ، خدمة ممتازة حقًا.

Von Frankfurt nach Mumbai über Dubai mit Emirates. Sehr zufrieden mit der Reise, hatte viel Beinfreiheit von FRA-DXB auf dem A380 und hatte das Gefühl, viel Platz für die Economy-Klasse zu haben. Die Unterhaltungsmöglichkeiten waren außergewöhnlich

Dublin to Brisbane via Dubai. I again travelled to Northern Queensland using Emirates / Qantas for a major family event. I left DUB on the late evening flight, supposed to leave at 22.25 but was delayed by 30mins or so because of an off load. Getting to the airport and similarly, on return, the chauffeur pick up worked extremely efficiently. Emirates is still, unfortunately, using the the DAA lounge in DUB. I had hoped, 2 years ago, that when they went to 2 flights per day, they would have their own lounge, like Etihad, but we can still hope. The DAA lounge is extremely basic, with no added frills. I flew in First with Emirates, DUB/DXB/BNE. Then transferring to Qantas Business for the Domestic connection to TSV. Out of DUB, it was very lumpy for the first 3 hours, to the degree that all the cabin crew had to be seated, so I didn't manage to get my evening meal until around 1.30am, by my clock. The 4 flights I had with Emirates in First Class, were all of a very good standard. Comfortable, good service and good food / wines. When I go back to Australia, Emirates First will certainly will have to be considered, if I can still afford it.

Mit Emirates bin ich ein paar Mal von Zürich nach Dubai geflogen und es war immer großartig. In meinen Augen hat Emirates das beste Kabinenpersonal. Sehr aufmerksam, gründlich, rücksichtsvoll und immer mit einem breiten Lächeln. Das Essen an Bord war von sehr hoher Qualität. Das Unterhaltungssystem für mich ist das Beste.

Sydney to Dubai in First Class with Emirates. The seats and service in the A380 are absolute luxury and Emirates First class is truly amazing - love the shower. There are a lot of food and dining options that you can pre-select and I did try to select some vegetarian food. The overall food experience on flight was great. The soup and entree was nice but the main was probably left in the oven for longer time leaving the rice very hard and the the green beans a bit burnt. Apart from this down side, the entire experience was truly amazing. Emirates is the only airline that I have experienced, who make you feel very special even if you are in coach, business or first class.

Auckland to Brisbane with Emirates. A very comfortable journey. Boarding and departure were on time. The aircraft was clean and tidy and the cabin crew friendly and helpful. A delicious evening meal was served not long after our 5:10 pm departure and the trays were cleared away in a timely manner. The A380 is rock-steady in cruise and the quiet cabin is much-appreciated. The Emirates ICE entertainment system has a huge selection of movies, TV shows and music and kept us occupied for the remainder of the flight.

Sydney to Munich via Dubai with Emirates. EK continues to be our first choice of airline. The A380 is large and provides additional space and comfort. We fly Emirates to Europe through Dubai every year and they continue to perform to a high standard. The partnerships with Qantas suits us as we are frequent flyers of both airlines. Dubai airport is always busy and always interesting. It is easy to pass a couple of hours here.

Paris CDG à Dubaï avec Emirates. Fantastique. Le siège est excellent, le personnel est gentil et attentionné. Le gros plus est un excellent choix de vins français avec le repas. Le repas lui-même était correct, rien d'extraordinaire. Le seul problème avec Emirates c'est qu'ils n'apportent pas la nourriture en même temps pour les personnes assises ensemble. Nous avons en Europe une culture du manger ensemble.

New York to Nairobi via Dubai with Emirates. We left on time - the flight was uneventful, the crew were helpful when you needed but responded quite slowly. The seat was comfortable and the plane was new so it had the new IFE - it was a rather fun flight. We arrived in Dubai on time and passed through security quickly for our connecting flight to Nairobi. The Nairobi bound flight was also good - the aircraft was new and we landed on time. I would recommend Emirates because their fares are reasonable and aircraft comfortable.

Manchester to Mauritius via Dubai with Emirates. Never flown with them before but would definitely do again. Customer service was faultless, the space on the plane was plenty and entertainment fantastic. Eat and drink as much as you want - a fantastic airline with great staff. Terminal 3 at Dubai is just for Emirates and the airport itself is like a small city with so much to do and see.

Perth to Prague via Dubai with Emirates on Qantas tickets to get the QF points and status credits. We always work this way. Typical Emirates business class, that is to say pretty much as good as you can get. The A380 from Perth to Dubai was a very early model and starting to show its age, but still everything was up to standard and sleep was easy. New Perth lounge does get a bit crowded when the A380 is leaving and lack of pyjamas on overnight flight a minor issue, but still would not fly with anyone else to Europe.

Barcelona a Sydney vía Dubai con Emirates. El A380 en clase económica es lo suficientemente espacioso, pero nuevamente se encontró que el servicio era deficiente después de la comida. Dubái no permitirá que líquidos de más de 100 ml pasen por el área de la puerta de embarque, por lo que debe contar con suficiente agua durante el vuelo. Esto me pareció casi imposible y con mi molesta tos seca necesitaba el líquido. Intenté repetidamente llamar a un miembro del personal que pasaba solo para que me ignoraran. Nunca antes había presionado el botón de asistencia, pero cuando un miembro del personal finalmente respondió, lo hizo con una mirada impaciente, pero finalmente trajo un sorbo de agua en un vaso de plástico. Apenas lo suficiente para mantenerse bien hidratado. Al desembarcar, vi una fuente de agua con tazas en la parte delantera de la economía que podría haber usado, si hubiera podido pasar a los dos hombres grandes profundamente dormidos a mi lado: los peligros del asiento de la ventana. Probaré con otra aerolínea para mi próximo viaje.

Manchester to Dubai with Emirates. It was disappointing - paid to upgrade to business class and maybe expected too much. After queuing for check in we were immediately welcomed by the staff saying "You are on a saver business ticket so you can't use the lounge". Yes we knew that, but thankyou for making us feel so welcome. Onboard we settled into row 18 in the lovely A380 seats. The cabin supervisor was coming through welcoming people onboard - she clearly missed us out and carried on. No smile or hello. We hadn't paid enough, obviously. Next my husbands seat did not recline or indeed move. The centre partition was jammed half way down. The cabin supervisor came over and shrugged. We will reset the seat and see what happens - it got stuck half way to lie flat. We changed seats off our own back but the only seats available together were in row 26 infront of the rowdy men's pub area (inflight bar). If you want a peaceful flight don't sit in the rear section. It's like lying down at a party. The food service started - they took our orders early on but oh dear, our choices weren't available. No apology even though they would have known that already at time of taking the order. The food we got was lovely but really - back row problem in any class obviously. After being at the party a while, listening to some loud stories and eating something we didn't really want we found yet 2 more individual seats further down the cabin to try and sleep. It was shoddy the whole trip. Downstairs it was half full and people no doubt had 3 seats each anyway. We upgraded not for the food but to lie down and be more comfortable. I guess we got that bit eventually but at a price we personally wouldn't pay for in the future.
搭乘阿聯酋航空航班從曼谷經迪拜飛往倫敦。在曼谷辦理登機手續的隊伍很長，排了兩個小時幾乎沒有移動，可能是電腦問題，但當我到達櫃檯時效率很高。雙腿都非常勤奮的機組人員。在第一段夜間航班上吃早餐有點奇怪，但從迪拜到倫敦的午餐是美味的三文魚配米飯，可愛的機組人員讓我的酒杯保持滿了 6 個小時。
搭乘阿聯酋航空航班從曼谷飛往迪拜。登機效率很高，儘管商務航班的客座率還不到一半。機組人員在起飛前很細心地提供飲料。起飛後不久就提供飲料並接受早餐訂單（沒有大餐，因為深夜起飛）。我沒有使用娛樂系統因為想睡覺。空姐幫忙裝床墊。醒來後，我要了一份包含熱糕點和咖啡的快捷早餐，很快就端上來了。遲到了幾分鐘，很快就下船了。總體而言，這是一次積極且值得推薦的飛行體驗。

Barcelona a Dubái con Emirates. Barcelona es uno de los aeropuertos más amigables con los pasajeros por los que hemos volado. Desde la llegada hasta la salida, todo lo que hay que negociar es muy fácil y es sin duda uno de los aeropuertos más favoritos. Sin embargo, el salón de clase ejecutiva está realmente en la edad oscura. La oferta de comida es realmente espantosa. Ayer hubo 3 tazones de papas fritas, totopos y trocitos de pan. Sándwiches que no tenían mantequilla, y solo un trozo de carne metido en el medio. En otra bandeja con un letrero que dice que no hay carne de cerdo, hay otra bandeja de panecillos con queso y otras cosas, etc. Era la hora del almuerzo cuando entramos y tenía hambre después de un viaje de 4 horas para llegar al aeropuerto. Una bandeja de empanadas danesas apareció en la cocina, a la hora del almuerzo. En otro mostrador había cuencos de plástico con ensalada de pasta. Solo pasta con una cucharada de aderezo cesar. Conseguir wifi es una gran misión. Esto no es de ninguna manera el estándar de salón de los Emiratos y realmente debe abordarse. Las tarifas de Business y Primera clase no son baratas y hemos llegado a esperar algo mejor que lo que se ofrece en el Aeropuerto de Barcelona.

دبي إلى لشبونة مع طيران الإمارات. بدت B777-300 متعبة بعض الشيء مقارنة بالطراز B777-300ER ، وبدت درجة المقعد أكثر إحكامًا ، وشاشة الترفيه متصدعة ولم تستجب تمامًا ، وكانت سماعات الرأس مروعة - ويبدو أنها تزيد من ضوضاء المحرك وتتطلب حجمًا يصم الآذان لسماع أي شيء على الشاشة . وسادة المقعد كانت تفتقر قليلاً إلى الحشو. وصل النبيذ مبكراً ولكن منذ حوالي 3 ساعات عانينا من اضطرابات شديدة وعلى الرغم من الدعوات المنتظمة لربط أحزمة المقاعد وحتى اضطرار الطاقم إلى العودة إلى مقاعدهم لفترات طويلة ، فقد تم الحفاظ على الخدمة بطريقة ما. كان العشاء هذه المرة عبارة عن جمبري كبير مع أرز وخضروات في صلصة تشيلي حلوة وأفضل مما كنا نتناوله غالبًا في درجة الأعمال. كان الاقتراب من لشبونة وعرًا بنفس القدر ولكن انتهى بهبوط سلس ممتاز بعد حوالي 20 دقيقة. عندما أثنيت على المراقب على أداء الموظفين ، دعتني إلى منطقتهم في الخلف لتكرار تعليقاتي "لأنني أريدهم جميعًا أن يسمعوا تحياتك" وأعطتني زوجًا من Drambuies لأخذها للمنزل كتذكار. لا يمكن أن تكون هناك طريقة أفضل للطيران الاقتصادي من هذا على الرغم من محاولة الحصول على B777-300ER وربما إحضار سماعة إلغاء الضوضاء الخاصة بك.

Birmingham to Adelaide via Dubai with Emirates. The Birmingham to Dubai leg was in an A380 and OK but seat was narrow for business class. We switched to a Boeing 777-300 in Dubai. Can't help thinking anyone in economy who was able to lie across 3 seats would have had a better trip. The Boeing 777 seats are at a 15 degree angle so your legs can not be flat. This flight seemed understaffed. Too few bathrooms which were tiny and not always clean. The focus seemed to be on serving those who wanted alcohol throughout the flight rather than basic quality care to everyone. Definitely not value for money - at best I would describe it as poor premium class.

Manchester to Bangkok via Dubai with Emirates. The first leg of our journey was great, we had the friendliest stewardess I have encountered she was just lovely and we travel regularly with a number of different long haul airlines. She took time to chat to the passengers - even though the flight was full, kept us topped up with drinks, snacks and meals and even took our photograph, it made the flight fun and go quickly. The plane was clean and although not one of the newest, comfortable and everything worked. On the second leg we were on a new A380, again the staff were friendly and responsive but we slept most of the way. The seats were comfortable and the plane was clean and the food tasty and plentiful. We did the same journey but obviously the other way around on our return to the UK, all fine although a bumpy flight but the staff were not as friendly and it did jade the experience. It just shows that the mood and service you get from the staff on board does make a big difference to the clients overall experience.

Brisbane to Stockholm via Dubai. I have been flying with Emirates for the last 15 years. I did stop for a couple of years when they went really bad in almost every aspect, but lately they have picked up on service and everything. On my recent flight though there were many things not right again. The service with Emirates is hit and miss. You can get lucky with extremely polite and efficient staff or very unlucky with poor staff. On this trip I experienced both. When a flight attendant replies to guest complaint about the ice cold, ie. not heated food with the answer she could not know I wanted it hot, then there is something severely wrong. Within Asia you will have good staff, within Europe you won't. The new A380 is a pleasure to fly, it is more spacious and new. The second leg of my journey was on an older model, a Boeing 777-300 and that was awful. It is impossible to move, eat, sit or do anything. My worst concern was the disgusting food. Also my folding table was dirty, so they might want to look into cleanliness. The entertaining system is marvelous, but in the older planes many gadgets do not work properly.

Von München nach Kapstadt und zurück über Dubai mit der vierköpfigen Familie. Positiv: Der Check-in an allen Flughäfen (online und am Schalter) verlief reibungslos und schnell, da genügend Schalter geöffnet waren. Das Bodenpersonal war freundlich und hilfsbereit (wir mussten Online-Bordkarten in DXB ausdrucken, da der Zoll sie nicht auf dem Tablet-Bildschirm lesen konnte). Auch das Einsteigen ging schnell. Alle Flüge starteten pünktlich und kamen pünktlich an. Das Essen war von guter Qualität. Regelmäßiger Getränkeservice auf allen Flügen. Tolles Unterhaltungssystem. Sitze mit guter Beinfreiheit. Negativ: Die Sitzplätze im Flugzeug entsprachen nicht den bei der Buchung im Sitzplan ausgewählten. Die Sitze sollten etwas größer sein. Die Verpflegung war schnell, aber unserer Meinung nach zeitlich nicht besonders gut

Adelaide to Delhi via Dubai with Emirates. I had selected my seats for travel on 26th December 2015 but the seats were released and I could not check in on my mobile. I tried many times to check in and choose my seat but the system locked me out. When I made a phone call to Emirates they told me of their inability to do a thing about it. This resulted in being allocated a horrible seat in the middle, for the 13 hours long flight with the aisle person making it almost impossible for me to even go to the toilet. Topping it up the Emirates staff was unresponsive on the plane. When the staff was called they did not come even after pressing the tab 5 times. The entertainment system had so many glitches that I could hardly watch it. The worse thing was the bus from the plane to the terminal herding us like cattle. The experience was not to end there since when I got my luggage back from the conveyor belt the lock was broken. When I sent the complaint to Emirates they said sorry for the things but passing on the blame to the respective authorities.

Manchester to Johannesburg via Dubai. I am a big fan of the Emirates A380, quiet, comfortable and plenty of personal storage space. On the last flight out of Manchester that day I had dinner in the lounge prior to boarding and watched a movie on the 21" screen during standing, taxi and take off before getting my bed made as soon as the seatbelt sign went out. I got about 5 hours of sleep before landing. The second leg in the 777-300 is very different. I sat in the aisle seat and my partner had the window. Unlike the A380 window and middle seats of the 2-3-2 layout need to clamber over the aisle seat to get in and out. Seats are comfortable but not full flat bed when reclined. There is a slight angle although not enough to prevent my getting to sleep. Dinner choices were nicely presented and the curry had flavour and heat, as promised by the menu. Both legs on time and bags were on the carousel soon after arrival in Johannesburg.

Brisbane to London via Dubai, and Emirates is quite a good airline with generally helpful staff and acceptable food. On this particular flight we suffered delays. The entertainment system is very good and the seats were fairly comfortable, the arm rests could be lifted to lie down and rest in the unusual event of not having a passenger aside. I would still fly them again next year though.

London to Perth via Dubai was our first time flying with Emirates (we usually fly with BA) but sincerely hope this will not be our last. From our visit to the Emirates Lounge at Heathrow until our chauffeur dropped us off in Perth we enjoyed every minute. The cabin crew were hard working, attentive and cheerful. Food and wine was excellent and the A380 is a very comfortable plane to travel on. I have seen reports that the crew can be inattentive but I can honestly state that wasn't the case in our experience. It pains me to say, having been so loyal to BA for many years, in future our airline of choice will now be Emirates

Sydney to Auckland, and Emirates offers excellent customer service on the ground and in the air. The inbound flight was late arriving resulting in a delayed departure. Emirates handled this exceptionally well, regular updates both in the lounge and at the gate. The service on board was professional at all times and made the trip very comfortable. The free inflight wifi is a great benefit and allowed me to keep in contact with my business colleagues to advise of my impending late. Made what could have been a wasted day to be a pretty good day.

Kuala Lumpur to Melbourne with Emirates, and the process was seamless from check in to baggage collection. The lounge at Kuala Lumpur is very stylish with a nice view of the airport and food and the staff were great. The flight left on time and the crew throughout the flight were amazing, often stopping as they walked past to make sure everything was alright and asking if we wanted anything. The crew were very pleasant and energetic.

Casablanca to Colombo via Dubai and Male with Emirates. From Casablanca was a fantastic crew who were responsive and attentive. The flight to Colombo via Male a very different set of crew who were totally opposite.The guy serving my side of the isle never spoke to pax in a full sentence - Coffee-sugar- milk- tray up/down etc. Hardly any smiles from many crew in the economy cabin. The meal service starts very late and it takes ages for them to clear the trays. The announcements were bad and confused. Its amazing how a crew can make the difference on a flight. The stopover hotel transfer worked well and food on all flights nicely presented. ICE entertainment was fabulous. Ground staff in Casablanca was friendly and efficient.

Sydney to Christchurch. Arrived about 07:45 for 10:15 scheduled departure. Upon arrival at the airport it was obvious something was up, check-in row was E, queue snaked all the way to C. It took about 40 minutes for someone from Emirates to show up, in flight attendant gear, that knew what was going on (destination immigration system down, requiring manual checking of passports, etc). Some supervisors walked around looking harried, and useless. Anyway, having done online check-in again saved some time. Overall check-in would have taken more than an hour. At check-in desk I was made to take my cameras out of carry on and put camera bag in hold (12 kgs, my partner had less so we would have been within the allowance of twice 7 kgs but got "it is for your safety" lines, full flight etc), never had to do that. Anyway my lenses survived the trip. What was worse is that rules seemed totally inconsistent in terms of application. Hold luggage we had no more than 2/3 of our 32 kgs each allowance. Onboard service in line with Emirates reputation, in terms of quality of seating (Boeing 777-300 with ten across) food, friendly attendants, 13 languages across them). Upon arrival in NZ very surprised with both passport control and customs/ quarantine being so friendly compared to Sydney Airport.

دبي إلى وارسو مع طيران الإمارات. تم تغيير المقاعد الخاصة بي ، التي تم اختيارها قبل الرحلة بثلاثة أشهر ، دون أي إشعار. عندما صعدنا على متن طائرة ، قالوا لي إنهم لا يستطيعون فعل أي شيء حيال ذلك لأن الطائرة كانت ممتلئة. لم يكن حزام الأمان يعمل وكان المقعد مكسورًا. عندما نشكو من ذلك ثلاث مرات قالوا إنهم سيتحققون مما يمكن عمله وسيخبروننا بذلك. لم يأت أحد ليشرح أي شيء. لقد شعرنا بخيبة أمل حقا.
搭乘阿聯酋航空從新加坡飛往布里斯班的航班是我們為期兩週的旅行的最後一班航班，所以登機時我們一家人都疲憊不堪。當我們到達面向艙壁的第 23 排（很確定這就是排號）時，我們簡直不敢相信自己的運氣。有足夠的空間讓我們四個人伸展並伸展雙腿。照顧我們的兩位服務員讓我們四個人感覺很特別。我希望我用的是奧地利服務員的名字，因為她值得特別提及。

Glasgow to Hong Kong via Dubai with Emirates. The A380 is superb, and this makes for an interesting comparison with the Boeing 777 used on the GLA sector. The latter suffers from ten-across seating in economy, which is okay for GLA-DXB flight duration, but I would resent for any sector more than eight hours or so. Otherwise, recommended. The inflight entertainment system is the best I have ever used.

Colombo to Melbourne via Singapore. I was allocated the wrong seat from check-in despite having booked it 2 months ago. I wouldn't have minded except that the new seat was near the toilets. When I inquired, it was found the seat I booked was still vacant. The ground staff at the boarding gate in Colombo were not very helpful except for one staff officer from Emirates. He was very professional and made the seat correction promptly.

من دبي إلى باريس مع طيران الإمارات ، وهذه المرة مع أطفالي شهدنا زيادة في الحجز. في مكتب تسجيل الوصول ، أخبرونا أنه ليس لدينا مقاعد ويجب أن نذهب إلى مكتب آخر حيث أخبرونا أنه ليس لديك مقعد ، لذلك نقدم لك فندق 5 نجوم وعشاء ووجبة إفطار (كان منتصف الليل بالفعل وكان موعد الرحلة التالية في 7 صباحًا). قلت إنني رفضت ووجدوا على الفور 3 مقاعد بجانب بعضهم البعض. لذلك تم حل المشكلة بسرعة كبيرة. كانت الرحلة جيدة ، المقعد مريح. الطعام جيد ، فريق العمل لطيف بالفعل.

الكويت إلى كوالالمبور عبر دبي مع طيران الإمارات - تجربة ممتعة. لقد تعرضت للإفراط في التغذية (وهو محترف في رأيي) ، وكانت المقاعد مريحة ، ونظام ICE كان مذهلاً وساعد في تمضية الوقت ، وعمومًا كان الطاقم مذهلاً. بالتأكيد سأطير مع طيران الإمارات مرة أخرى في المستقبل.

अमीरात के साथ दुबई के रास्ते मुंबई से गैटविक तक। मुंबई में ड्राइवर का पिक-अप और चेक-इन/सुरक्षा सुचारू रूप से चली। लाउंज मुंबई में साझा है लेकिन अच्छा है और स्टाफ भी उत्कृष्ट है। मुंबई से दुबई पुराने 777 पर था लेकिन इतनी लंबी उड़ान के लिए उपयुक्त था। सीट आरामदायक और विशाल है, और IFE स्क्रीन उचित रिज़ॉल्यूशन की है और इसमें अच्छा चयन है। खाना बढ़िया था. मेरी राय में दुबई का लाउंज विशेष रूप से अच्छा नहीं है क्योंकि यह विशाल और अव्यवस्थित है और इसका लेआउट भी विशेष रूप से अच्छा नहीं है। मैं इस बात की सराहना करता हूं कि यह केवल पहला व्यवसाय नहीं है, लेकिन फिर भी मैं इसे गलियारे के अनुभव के साथ-साथ स्व-सेवा पेय क्षेत्रों के बारे में कम पसंद करूंगा। दुबई से गैटविक लेग बेहतरीन था। सीट का ऊपरी स्तर महत्वपूर्ण है और एवोड उत्कृष्ट है। इस उड़ान के केबिन क्रू मिलनसार और चौकस थे। एकमात्र छोटी सी समस्या यह है कि भोजन और वाइन सेवा में बिल्कुल भी समन्वय नहीं था, इसलिए वाइन भोजन के साथ परोसने के बजाय उसके बाद परोसी गई। यह दो गिलास शैंपेन और एक जिन और टॉनिक के बाद था, हालांकि कोई वास्तविक शिकायत नहीं थी। सबसे बड़ी निराशा गैटविक हवाई अड्डा थी जहां हमें आप्रवासन के लिए प्रीमियम सेवा की पेशकश नहीं की गई थी। गैटविक इस समय भयानक है और कतार बहुत बड़ी थी। इसके साथ ही हास्यास्पद और बेहद व्यवस्थित बैगेज रिक्लेम (जो स्पष्ट रूप से A380 के साथ सामना करने में सक्षम नहीं है) ने एमिरेट्स के पूरे प्रीमियम अनुभव को ख़राब कर दिया।

Sydney to Dubai with Emirates. We were allocated the wrong seats from check-in. Ended sitting next to an inebriated passenger that made the trip the worst. Tried to change the seats before the flight but the ground staff were very rude. On return complained to airline, but not even an apology. The customer service team is a computer. The only response I got was a computer generated letter.

Booked to fly from New Delhi to Accra via Dubai in business class with Emirates in Aug 2015 with a layover of 1 hr 20 mins in Dubai. The flight from Delhi took off 30 mins late and then circled Dubai before landing in a remote corner of the airport. We rushed and reached our boarding gate (20 mins before departure) just as the last of the economy passengers were boarding. We were denied boarding on the pretext that we were late at the gate - never mind that there was no one to receive us at the terminal, Emirates flight from Delhi was late and that last few passengers were still boarding right in front of us. Staff at the gate were rude, turned us away and asked us to get our re-routing from the Emirates customer service. With 2 kids who were sleepy and exhausted, we made our way to a long queue at the customer service counter. They routed us to Accra via Abuja and on my husbands persistent query assured us that Abuja had transit facilities. The situation in Abuja was far from this - no transit, we were made to collect our bags by paying for passenger trolleys, re-check in at Arik Air and fight customs / immigration who insisted on stamping our passports. The Arik Air flight was delayed, there was no business class lounge at the airport and the flight itself was a small propeller aircraft. We were happy to reach Accra in one piece after the harrowing experience. On registering a complaint with Emirates we were advised that they would investigate and needed 30 days - at the end of this period they came back with no admittance of guilt but offered us 15,000 frequent flyer points each which to date they have not credited to my children's account. Contrast this with our recent experience on Eithopian where we were transported from the tarmac when they were late on a flight from ACC to NBO and even connected our bags. Did not expect Emirates to treat business class passengers in this manner. They clearly are now such a big airline that they could not be bothered by these exceptions - imagine how they treat non-gold, economy class travelers - am glad to see other airlines now catching up with them.

Dallas to Dubai with Emirates - amazing airline. A380 with good service, tasty food. The seat comfort was good. The cabin crew are friendly, entertainment had some good games and the latest movies to watch. The personal video screen size was good. Every 4 hours they serve a meal or snack. You can also get get free drinks any time in the flight. Every 1 hour they come along with some juice and some refreshments. Ground service was nice, little busy but overall good.

मुंबई से दुबई और अमीरात का स्टाफ बहुत विचारशील था। मैं एक सक्रिय बच्चे के साथ यात्रा कर रहा था। दुबई से सैन फ्रांसिस्को और एयर होस्टेस को कम से कम परेशानी होती है। स्वागत करते समय मुस्कुराहट के दर्शन नहीं हुए। छोटे बच्चों को दूध की ज़रूरत होती है, क्या यह स्पष्ट नहीं है या माता-पिता को दूध ले जाने देना चाहिए। विडंबना यह है कि जब दूसरी बार दूध मांगा गया तो उनका दूध खत्म हो गया। 15 घंटे की उड़ान में क्या माता-पिता के लिए यह उचित नहीं है कि वह अपने बच्चे के लिए दूसरे से दूध मांगें। मुझे लगता है कि केबिन क्रू स्टाफ को छोटे बच्चों को संभालने और मुंह बनाने के बजाय थोड़ा धैर्य रखने के लिए प्रशिक्षित करने की आवश्यकता है। इससे यात्रियों को परेशानी हो रही है.

Hamburg über Dubai nach Bangkok. Unterschiedliche Serviceerlebnisse. Flug HAM-DXB (EK 60) war pünktlich, First war ausgebucht. Sehr guter Service durch 2 aufmerksame FA's und den Zahlmeister. Die Weine waren hervorragend, 40 Jahre alter Portwein, ausgezeichneter Cognac. Das First-Class-Essen bei Emirates ist etwas langweilig im Vergleich zu Singapore Airlines und anderen, bei denen Sie Ihr Hauptgericht im Voraus buchen können. Die zweite Etappe (EK 384 mit A380) war eine schlechte Erfahrung. Vor dem Start in DXB befahl ich, meine Dusche 1,5 Stunden vor der Landung einzuschalten. Ich wurde sehr unhöflich von einer FA geweckt (sie klopfte laut an die Tür meiner Suite – auf allen Flügen öffnete der FA die Tür und wachte sanft auf) und führte mich in den Duschraum. Normalerweise reinigen die FAs in der Zwischenzeit die Suite und verwandeln das Bett in einen Sitz. Als ich nach 20 Minuten zurückkam, war nichts passiert, also rief ich den FA an. Widerwillig erledigte sie ihre Aufgabe und ging weg. Normalerweise wurde der Passagier nach dem Duschen nach seiner Frühstücksbestellung gefragt. Mein FA unterhielt sich gerade mit einem anderen Passagier und als ich sie einige Minuten später anrief und um Frühstück bat, schaute sie auf ihre Uhr und sagte mir, dass wir in etwa 10 bis 15 Minuten mit dem Abstieg beginnen würden und sie mich nicht bedienen könne. Ich fragte nun nach dem Zahlmeister und wenig später bekam ich mein Frühstück. Der Purser kam später zu mir und entschuldigte sich und sagte mir, dass er nicht sehr glücklich darüber sei, dass Emirates so viel neues Personal brauche und dass FAs heute nach zu kurzer Zeit in der First Class dienen könnten. Für mich bietet Emirates hervorragende Spirituosen und Weine, die Suiten und Duschen sind wunderbar, aber es ist ein Glücksfall, welchen Service man in der First Class erwarten kann. Sie wachsen zu schnell.

Manchester to Dubai return, and I was looking forward to my first flights with Emirates. On the way out from Manchester they switched the seats I booked 3 months ago - they gave me various reasons like different aircraft - not true - and eventually they moved me nearer to the seats I had booked - why was someone else sitting in the seats I had booked? In an 8 hour flight we had one drinks service and one meal - not enough. On the flight back they switched the seats I booked 3 months earlier - sounds familiar - same excuses - again not true - after stamping my feet they gave me the seats I had already booked. Meals were great but far between, drinks were almost non existent. Not the experience I was expecting. Good legroom, good food, excellent entertainment, but poor service. Living off their reputation I think.

سافر من دبي إلى بانكوك مع طيران الإمارات. الجزء الثاني من رحلة طويلة ، جالسًا في مقصورة أمامية بالدرجة الاقتصادية. خدمة جيدة غير مزعجة ساعدت الكابينة على الهدوء. عرضت المشروبات الباردة عدة مرات وكان الطعام جيدا. كانت المقصورة ممتلئة وكانت المساحة مرتفعة خاصة في صناديق الأمتعة ، وقد يكون هذا بسبب إحضار الناس حقيبتين أو ثلاث حقائب. ترفيه جيد على خدمة ICE. تم تجديد المراحيض أثناء الرحلة.

Madrid a Dubái con Emirates. Se sentó en la cabina delantera de la fila económica 42. Un problema de esta fila es que, debido a la curva del avión, el compartimiento de equipaje superior es más pequeño y las maletas de cabina con ruedas normales no caben en él, por lo que las maletas deben colocarse más atrás. Espacio razonable para las piernas y muy buen servicio de los mayordomos. Como el vuelo no estaba lleno, nos aconsejaron ir a la parte trasera del avión porque había mucho espacio allí. Excelente selección de entretenimiento para disfrutar. La cabina delantera es silenciosa. Pedimos comidas especiales y estas fueron entregadas rápidamente y fueron muy buenas.

普吉島經迪拜飛往阿姆斯特丹。與我的出境航班相比，機組人員不太感興趣，但仍然高效且友好。 4條路我們都提前到達。高標準的食品和飲料。 HKT 的休息室不是最好的，但您從辦理登機手續到休息室都會被護送，並避免在安檢的各個階段都排長隊。我們到達 DXB 時正值安靜，休息室的工作人員很主動，為我們補充飲料。 DXB-AMS 上的 A380 商務艙中的航段空著，這使得酒吧體驗不那麼有趣，但仍然是一次很棒的旅行。

Perth to Brussels via Dubai with Emirates. Great flight, enough legspace, food was average : more diversity would be nice (two flights and both times chicken and two times eggs (other option was not available). Drinks service was okay. Friendly crew, who were dedicated to their job. During the flight was it very cold.

Von München nach Perth über Dubai mit Emirates. Langsamer und schlechter Business-Class-Service. Der erste Drink auf MUC-DXB und DXB-PER dauerte ewig. Bitten Sie nicht um Nachschub – Sie erhalten keinen Nachschub, weil das Kabinenpersonal nicht in der Lage und/oder nicht bereit ist, zusätzliche Anfragen zu erfüllen. Besonders schlecht war der Essensservice auf der DXB-PER-Strecke. Zum Essen gab es keine Getränke, nicht einmal Wasser. Als ich den Anrufknopf betätigte, erschien nach einer Weile eine Flugbegleiterin und nahm meine Bestellung entgegen. Allerdings kam die Bestellung nie an. Sie kam – ob Sie es glauben oder nicht – nach etwa 30 Minuten zurück und erklärte, dass Sie meine Bestellung nicht bedienen konnten, weil „sie mit dem Servieren des Essens beschäftigt waren“. Das ist lächerlich, wenn man bedenkt, dass es in der Business Class viele Flugbegleiter gibt. Emirates hat zwar eine junge Flugzeugflotte, aber ihre Abläufe während des Fluges sind eine Katastrophe und sie haben keine Serviceeinstellung. Sie sind völlig ineffizient. Ich kann nur empfehlen, die asiatischen Fluggesellschaften oder vielleicht Qatar Airways zu nutzen, wenn Sie zwischen Europa und Australien fliegen.

搭乘阿聯酋航空航班從曼谷飛往悉尼。登記入住的情況很好。休息室如果很滿的話還可以，而且在航空公司專用的休息室裡沒有航班牌是令人費解的。對於一個小休息室來說，食物和飲料足夠/高於平均水平。登機很及時，但這只是因為我無視休息室的工作人員，在航班呼叫之前前往登機口。我是第一批進入機艙的人，但其他商務艙乘客卻長期錯過優先登機，這會很不方便，因為幾分鐘之內經濟艙乘客就在商務艙排隊了。商務艙上感覺很局促。 2-3-2陣型幾乎沒有迴旋餘地。對許多人來說，這裡沒有隱私感，過道通道也很差。我座位上方的頭頂儲物櫃裡裝滿了備用毛巾，所以我不得不使用另一條毛巾。座位周圍幾乎沒有存儲空間，除了一個放鞋子的洞太小，無法容納我的（平均尺寸）鞋子和前面座位背面的前袋。 IFE 選擇足夠了。屏幕很大，但位於前排座椅的後面，因此觸摸屏功能是多餘的，因為它太遠了。奇怪的是，沒有任何功能可以阻止從任何角度看到它，所以在像我這樣的 D 座位上，我可以輕鬆地看到 7 或 8 個其他屏幕。如果您有小孩，那就不太好，因為他們可能會看到您不希望他們看到的東西。如果您旁邊的人正在與您觀看同一部電影，但已經開始觀看，那麼也不太好。複雜的迷你觸摸屏和單獨的控制器系統並不直觀。我發現座位不舒服。扶手位置不佳，位於不同的高度，而且內部扶手太小。職位選擇非常有限。座椅不能完全平放，也不能達到 180 度，躺下時我無法完全伸展 - 而且我身高 175 厘米/5 英尺 9 英寸。對我來說，關鍵問題是座位，因此僅就這一方面而言，我通常不會乘坐阿聯酋航空的航班。電源端口是凹進式的，空間不足，無法容納 iPad 或 MacBook 充電器。服務很慢，起飛後 1 小時 15 分鐘沒有提供任何飲料，這是一次 9 小時預定飛行時間的過夜航班。起飛後大約 2 小時食物到達。還可以，但僅此而已。桌子大小合適，擺盤也很好。服務總體來說不是很好。我要了第二杯飲料，10 分鐘後還沒有送來。同樣，我向另一位服務員要了耳塞，但同樣沒有到達。免費贈送的寶格麗洗漱包很大，但包含不必要的物品，例如大須後水瓶 - 但沒有耳塞！機上只有兩個廁所可供42名乘客使用。絕對不夠，一個人只用了5多分鐘就排起了長長的隊伍。空姐向我道歉並告訴我一直都是這樣。航班準時到達。概括。該產品感覺至少已經過時了 10 年。主要問題是座位和配置。遠低於國泰航空、澳洲航空、新加坡航空、日航甚至英國航空。我知道 A380 的配置可能會更好，但我會繼續避開阿聯酋航空。

Copenhagen to Perth via Dubai with Emirates. The seat comfort on business class A380 was astounding. The seats on the CPH to DXB flight were more modern than Dubai to Perth, but both were just as comfortable. There was no Emirates lounge in Copenhagen, an Aviators lounge which was pretty good. The cabin staff was great on both flights, as was the food. The inflight entertainment was not lagging at all.

Melbourne to Auckland with Emirates. 30-45 minutes late in takeoff, they said it was due to cleaners, anyway eventually we were allowed to board. The plane was nice, the seats looked comfortable enough and it was certainly clean. The FA's however were conspicuous in their absence. Once boarded, we didn't see them again till we were served a meal. About an hour or so before we landed I asked one FA about landing cards to fill in. She said they had run out of them as they "never give us enough" and we would probably have to fill in once we landed however to her credit she called around and found a pile more. Not sure why this wasn't done when they had run out earlier? Anyway that was sorted. They also asked for coin donations to a children's fund, so we had our coins ready but no one came for them. Just odd. The PE was quite good though but as for service, I'd say below par compared to most airlines I have flown.

Sydney to Dublin via Dubai, and Emirates have an average to good business class product. Flew both legs on 777 with only issue being the seats are angled lie flat which was a disappointment. Food was good with large portions on both legs, good selection of wines and spirits. Excellent AVOD with the largest selection of movies I have seen on an airline. Staff on both legs were both professional and friendly.

Lusaka to Amsterdam via Dubai, the Emirates A340-300 was full and seats pretty cramped. IFE the old type and with the seat of the passenger reclined almost all the way it was not possible to get a good view of the screen. There was no wifi on this flight. The cabin crew seemed disinterested and more busy with themselves than with their passengers. Two crew doing the meal serving were gossiping about a colleague apparently oblivious to the fact that at least 20 pax around them where hearing this. Furthermore an extra order of something that was not on a drinks trolley was acknowledged, but never arrived. Emirates was a great airline with fantastic service but they now need to realize that on the stretch LUN / HRE to Europe there are alternatives.

Karachi to Dammam via Dubai with Emirates, and clean aircraft on both legs. Flight attendants cooperative and active. Food was served on the first leg but had only one option. Second leg was delayed due to operational reasons for 30mins, but was advised at DXB. We have 2 hours to kill at DXB. There is a play area at concourse B opposite to patisserie shop which was nice addition in our layover to get my daughter charged up again for the next leg.

Kuala Lumpur to Heathrow via Dubai, and returning from London Gatwick through Dubai with Emirates, in economy. I am very impressed with the experience on each flight I took. There were no major delays to speak of, the food was actually very good (minus the strange fishy starters), drinks were plentiful and they had a great database of entertainment. The tail mounted cameras are a fantastic feature and the wifi worked well - but only on 2 of the flights. The crew couldn't do enough to help, they were friendly and helpful it was refreshing compared to some airlines I have been on. One downside I found on all flights was that it took over an hour for the FAs to get the drinks trollies and begin service. Each time they started serving from the front of the cabin, which for me was fine as I was at the front - while the people in the back looked on longingly. The check-in staff at Gatwick were really miserable. Other than that, everything was perfect. The first of four legs was on the Boeing 777-300ER with 10 abreast seating. Yes the aisles are a little narrow but as there was nobody next to me it wasn't a problem. I'm 5'11 and 70kg - sat in the aisle seat and wasn't hit very often. Maybe a larger person may feel more uncomfortable, especially if the middle seat were occupied. The other 3 legs on the A380 were better. The seats were roomy and spacious, and on the DXB - KUL route the plane was 10 days old. The flight was empty and there were only about 12 people in a cabin of 120(ish) seats so the crew and I spent half the flight talking as there was little for them to do. 68A was a great seat as it has nobody in front. Overall, very pleased with how well everything went! I look forward to flying with Emirates again very soon.

Melbourne to Kuala Lumpur with Emirates, and I arrived on New Years Day in Kuala Lumpur to discover that my wallet had fallen out of my carry on bag, and the first thing I did on entering the airport was look for it. Staff were unhelpful and the ground crew refused to let me back on the plane to check. I understand this may be policy but nothing was explained. After waiting to no avail I went to collect my luggage, but to my horror no luggage appeared. The staff representing Emirates had no help or a kind word to offer, and could not tell me where my bags were. The best I could do was make my way to my hotel and wait. My bags turned up the following day. On my return flight, accompanied by my partner, we found that they had changed our pre-selected seats and we were not seated together. We did not notice this until we were through immigration, and then had to talk our way back through so that we could convince the check-in desk to re-seat us - a huge waste of time. Waiting for our luggage at Melbourne airport at 2:00am it turned out they had misplaced my luggage again, as well as my partners this time. This led to more time spent at the lost baggage counter, and having to sit at home for the better part of the next day waiting for it to be delivered. All up I would say that I wasted at least 8 hours on unnecessary mistakes, not to mention the distress caused, which was certainly not alleviated by their very unhelpful staff. Inflight was all smiles and complimentary wines, but that does nothing to buy back the time and stress spent on this company.

Von Frankfurt nach Dubai in der First Class und Chauffeurservice im Fahrpreis inbegriffen. Die Emirates-Lounge in Frankfurt ist in Ordnung, es gibt jedoch keinen zusätzlichen Platz für First-Class-Passagiere, und Sie müssen bei der Berechnung vor der Sicherheitskontrolle bedenken das Zeitbudget. Für die First Class gab es kein Priority Boarding. Das war der einzige schwache Teil der Reise. Der Sitz an Bord ist fantastisch, viel Platz und das Personal hat großartige Arbeit geleistet. Der Essensservice auf Anfrage war stilvoll, mit leckerem Essen und großartigem Wein. Die Lounge im hinteren Bereich war hervorragend und bot ein tolles Ambiente. Die Dusche war perfekt, um sich vor der Ankunft zu erfrischen. Sie haben WLAN zur Verfügung. 10 MB kostenlos, 500 für nur 1 USD (Kreditkarte). Es ging schneller als ich erwartet hatte, es reichte gerade noch, ein paar Bilder nach Hause zu schicken. In Dubai gibt es einen eigenen Bereich für den Chauffeurservice. Es dauerte nicht lange, ein Auto für den Zielort zu bekommen.

دبي إلى مسقط مع طيران الإمارات ، وكانت رحلة قصيرة تقريبًا. ساعة واحدة بطائرة عريضة من طراز A330. على عكس الرحلات الجوية في أوروبا حيث لا تحصل إلا على مشروب خلال مدة الرحلة هذه (على الإطلاق) ، فقد تم تقديم وجبة الإفطار في هذه الرحلة.

Paris CDG à Dubaï avec Emirates. Le transfert avec chauffeur a bien fonctionné, le salon était bon et j'ai apprécié l'IFE. C'est là que s'arrêtent les points positifs. L'enregistrement a été lent et je n'ai pas eu l'impression d'avoir été chaleureusement accueilli. L'accueil dans l'avion n'était ni chaleureux ni authentique par rapport à Singapore Airlines. L'équipage de cabine ne s'est pas engagé et n'a pas établi de contact visuel en passant devant. J'ai dû faire mon propre lit. La nourriture était moyenne et pas la meilleure sélection de vins. Dans l'ensemble, ce n'était pas une expérience premium.

Flew Durban to Seattle via Dubai on Emirates Boeing 777s. Durban to Dubai was very bumpy almost the entire 8 hours, so cabin service was limited to a single meal and a single drink prior to that meal. Cabin crew were fine, not overly friendly but definitely not hostile. The warm towels were a nice touch. Seat was a not terribly crowded aisle seat in row 41 made all the more comfortable by the fact that the person in front of me did not recline. Thank you! Inflight entertainment offerings were somewhat limited (just 400 channels) but far superior to SAA's offerings. Flight was very full in economy. Dubai to Seattle leg is a long ride: 13 hours over Iran, Russia and the north pole. Cabin service again was very good. The meal was ok

搭乘阿聯酋航空航班從香港經迪拜飛往格拉斯哥。酒吧是我飛行第一段旅程的一大亮點。阿聯酋航空的食物有些欠缺。不知道它是什麼，但菜單似乎並不鼓舞人心。另一方面，飲料種類豐富、品質優良。我在 A380 上的座位很舒服，但我感覺自己被困在這些座位上。 777 上的那個真是讓人頭疼。我想在飛機上做一些工作，但我的燈照到了 777 上坐在我旁邊的人的臉。我的個人閱讀燈根本不起作用。除此之外，迪拜的休息室並不是一個令人愉快的放鬆環境。到處跑的人太多了。凌晨 3 點不太好，因為你只想好好休息一下。我最終走到了門口，那裡的每個人都不再那麼狂躁，在舒適的長躺椅上放鬆了。司機服務非常好，我的司機超越了職責範圍，在格拉斯哥提供了優質的服務。我的回程航班是有爭議的。我在訂票時選擇了座位，是靠過道的座位，因為我很高，當我上網辦理登機手續時，我發現我的座位在沒有通知的情況下被重新分配了。當然，這不是他們的義務，但很高興知道。最終升級到商務艙而不是處理經濟艙的中間座位。對於像我這樣害怕飛行的人來說，這是罕見的，我成功地專注於娛樂十多分鐘，而沒有讓自己陷入恐慌。設法觀看現場足球比賽，這是一個巨大而令人愉快的驚喜！就目前情況而言，我乘坐的一趟經濟艙航班（坐在經濟艙底層前部附近）是我行程中最舒適、最好的航班。很棒的座位。

Auckland to Newcastle via Dubai and I was very disappointed with the service. They had run out of food options so we only had one choice, the staff were unhelpful. My coffee fell off my tray onto my seat, I told the stewardess and she handed me five napkins and walked away. I asked her for another blanket and she never returned, so I asked another stewardess and she walked away. I thought she was coming back so I was reluctant to fall asleep, I sat on my soaked blanket to soak up the coffee on the chair. Half an hour later she didn't return so I had to ask a third member of the crew. The crew were rude about getting the trolleys past us and when they hit a man's foot they didn't apologise. They looked stressed and annoyed during the flight safety announcement. When they brought round the warm towels the stewardess handed one to the person next to me then noticed she had none left to give me. She said "oh" and walked away. When another steward came to collect our towels I said I never received one and he frowned, looked around, and walked away. I wasn't spoken to again. Halfway through the flight an alarm went off and a yellow light flashed the stewardesses asked each other "what does that mean". I pointed to the screen by the toilets where it said "smoke detected". They swore and ran off and came back later to announce "it was just someone's deodorant". Finally we were delayed for an hour when leaving Dubai and were not informed why or spoken to, we just watched the flight safety video and an hour later we suddenly took off.

New York to Dubai. After having flown with various American airlines over the last 8 months I'm relieved to be back on Emirates. The first class on the A380 is everything it should be. Love the privacy of their suite and comfort of the seat, may it be in an upright position, lounge or as a fully flat bed with a separate mattress which is excellent for sleeping. The catering is on-demand, with an amazing selection of food. I tend to over-eat on such flights for I'm eager to try everything. And drink everything. I wasn't disappointed. Everything I tried was top notch quality and taste. IFE is incredible with an amazing collection of movies and TV shows. And the 32-inch screen is a pleasure to watch. The piece-de-resistance is the shower that sets them apart. The surprisingly disappointing feature on this flight was their internet. Given how heavily they promote online connectivity while flying and the free (or nearly free) service, it is also a frustratingly slow experience. This is something that needs to improve. I simply gave up for the connection was so slow.

Da Roma a Jakarta via Dubai con Emirates e pessimo servizio in volo. Stavo chiamando un assistente di volo per aiutare a tirare lo schermo dal lato del mio sedile e ho dovuto aspettare almeno 30 minuti prima che uno si presentasse e quello era per il servizio pasti in volo. Poi mi ha semplicemente fissato e non ha mosso un muscolo finché non le ho chiesto di aiutarmi a tirare fuori lo schermo della tv. Senza aspettare che nessuno di noi tirasse fuori il vassoio, l'assistente di volo ha appena distribuito i vassoi del pranzo ed erano sulle nostre ginocchia. Terribile! Nonostante abbia chiesto un posto di corridoio per entrambe le tappe del mio viaggio, ho ottenuto un posto centrale per la seconda tappa del mio viaggio. Il personale di terra dietro il bancone non mi ha detto che avrò un posto di mezzo perché forse non erano disponibili altri posti di corridoio. Il cibo era così così rispetto a poche altre compagnie aeree che ho preso nel corso degli anni. Nel complesso, sono rimasto piuttosto deluso dalla mia esperienza, che sembra essere la mia prima volta con Emirates.

Durban to Birmingham via Dubai return. I have flown three times with Emirates in the past 6 months and been satisfied with the service. However, on the flight from Birmingham to Dubai on 29th December, the ICE system froze which didn't bother me very much. Coupled with that, however, was the fact that our seats could not be adjusted and we had to sleep in an almost upright position. This is not acceptable, particularly as I had paid a premium price for the flight, due to the festive season.

Glasgow to Tokyo Narita via Dubai with Emirates, and on both legs of my trip the seat and service provided by the cabin crew was excellent, however there were a few items to mention. The first was that at Dubai we had a 25 minute bus tour of the airport complex from the gate to reach the plane flying the second leg. No real inconvenience but it felt slightly odd to be on the bus driving around for so long. The second issue was with the food that was served on the Tokyo flight. I had the oriental vegetarian meal booked and I genuinely have no idea what the main portion of my meal was. I was served an odd flavorless mush that resembled wallpaper paste which I couldn't eat, so I had to abandon it and instead have some of the pastries the cabin crew brought round with the coffee. I'd recommend using the airline but to avoid choosing my food option!

London to Brisbane return via Dubai with Emirates, and our journey was the worst I have had. The crew were not service oriented and were rude - we waited 2.5 hours before we were offered water or a drink. I had stewardesses telling me "no" and "I am too busy" so many times. The crew gave the impression that they would rather be anywhere other than serving on that aircraft. Do not bother complaining - they seem to have no customer service team, but an email that will give you a generated standard reply. When I did more digging and calling, they admitted that they do not have a phone number or a team that I could speak to.
搭乘阿聯酋航空航班從曼谷飛往悉尼。這項服務充其量只是機器人。座位太窄了，整個行程中我旁邊的人基本上都坐在我的腿上，腿部空間幾乎不夠。食物的選擇非常混亂而且味道平淡。對於一家以食品和服務質量為榮的公司來說，他們應該與整個飛機而不僅僅是商務艙分享這種體驗。免費的 WIFI 是一個額外的福利，但在智能手機時代，10MB 的流量根本不夠用。

Colombo to Copenhagen via Dubai return. Emirates advertise that a business class ticket include a hotel in Dubai when you travel through this city and that you pick up the voucher in the airport prior to embarkation. We booked online and at the same time reserved the hotels and received confirmation on the hotels as well as of travel tickets during the booking process. In Copenhagen on the way to Colombo this worked as advertised and we were able to break up the journey into two 5-6 hr flights by staying overnight in Dubai. However, on our return flight no voucher was receivable in Colombo and we were told to pick it up in Dubai. In Dubai we were sent from counter to counter in the very large airport and were finally told that no hotel voucher would be issued. The argument used was that although you book online you have to call the Emirate office afterwards to confirm the booking! Apparently this is written somewhere in the small print of the "conditions for sale". In other words you may book online but you can't rely on the confirmation received during booking but have to call the office anyway. So what is the point of having on-line bookings when the information is not valid anyway?

دبي إلى بانكوك في درجة الأعمال. مقاعد مريحة للغاية وطاقم عمل المقصورة رائع. تعجبني طائرة A380 بمقاعدها الواسعة وتصميمها الرائع. على عكس رحلتي السابقة على طيران الإمارات ، كانت الخمور جيدة والاختيار كما هو متوقع. لم أتناول الطعام ، لذلك لا يوجد تعليقات على الوجبة.

Durban to Manchester via Dubai. Very disappointing flight. I'm a frequent flyer and always had faith in Emirates but no more. Departed 28 December from Durban on flight EK776 to Dubai. The area around my seat smelled of urine. My tv screen hung loosely so I could not adjust the angle plus it was sticky to the touch. Cabin staff appeared stressed and smiles were absent. I accepted that sometimes stuff happens and maybe Emirates had experienced some hiccups that evening. However when I was served with a very stale soggy chicken bun and inedible old chocolate brownie I felt most disgruntled. Even economy flight tickets are expensive and I left that flight most unhappy.

Birmingham to Dubai and I was not that impressed. Service was very friendly but so slow. Night flight so the meal should be served up fairly quickly. Getting a glass of wine with the meal was hard, and the wines on this flight were terrible. The food that I choose was not great, but I could have chosen wrong The entertainment system was down for the whole flight for everyone. Emirates have grown so quickly I feel they are neglecting the detail.

دبي إلى جدة في نوفمبر على متن طائرة A380. طائرة جديدة وفريق عمل رائع. المقعد و IFE كما هو متوقع. المشكلة الوحيدة التي واجهتني لم تكن في الحقيقة خطأ طيران الإمارات. لم يكن الصعود إلى الطائرة تجربة ممتعة للغاية حيث كان معظم الركاب يدفعون بعضهم البعض وكانوا بصوت عالٍ إلى حد ما في اتصالاتهم. نفس القصة أثناء النزول. في JED ، كان علينا ركوب حافلة واستغرق الأمر وقتًا طويلاً للوصول إلى المحطة.

Flew Brisbane to Auckland return on Emirates A380's. We were delayed on the tarmac in Brisbane for the Brisbane - Auckland flight due to the power shutting down on the plane when taxiing back from the gate. The pilot said he had to reset some computer settings and then the power came back on. Then as we were taxiing, he stopped and advised that the water system wasn't working. So he was going to do some resetting on the tarmac to see if the computers could reset the water supply. After about an hour of this, he went back to the gate to have engineers look at it (another 45 mins or so) and finally we were on our way 2 hours late. It wasn't very comforting to hear the pilot not finish sentences on occasion when giving us updates - it was as though he drifted off! Also, my husband's headset was broken, he asked for a new one but unfortunately a new headset never arrived. If it had been a longer flight, he would have followed this up. The food was pretty cold due to the delay, and there was the rudest male cabin supervisor I've ever come across. I went to ask for some water from the galley (as after the service, the cabin crew do a pretty good job of disappearing to avoid being asked for service I guess). I was standing there for a few minutes and he knew it, and he never even asked how he could help. I had to ask him! He basically ignored me and was generally grumpy when and unsmiling when he did go up and down the aisle during the service. The way back was much better with friendlier cabin crew, a coherent pilot and a plane that had no issues apart from my headset jack not providing stereo this time. The food was fine this time too.

Los Angeles to Johannesburg via Dubai. Everything was as expected. The only downside on the entire trip was lack of Wi-Fi. Given that we were flying over the North Pole on the first leg, I can understand it, but it is still something Emirates should work on for the long haul flights. The leg from DXB to JNB was on a 777. Not as nice as the A380, but still great. They woke us up to feed us, which I thought was a nice touch, although I could see some people not liking it. I think the biggest problem with Emirates business class is that there's really no need to fly first class. The Business Class experience was better than the First Class trips I've had.

من دبي إلى أورلاندو ، المقعد 37 ألف دفعت 8045 درهمًا إماراتيًا مقابل تذكرتي. رحلة طيران الإمارات لمدة 16 ساعة - ترتيبات تغذية غير كافية أخطط لتعبئة حزمة وجبة خفيفة في رحلة العودة من أورلاندو. الوجبة التي تم تقديمها بعد وقت قصير من الإقلاع كانت مرضية. ثم البيتزا بعد فترة وجيزة ، والتي رفضتها لأنني لم أكن جائعًا. قبل 4 ساعات من الهبوط طلبت قطعة من الفاكهة أو بسكويت جاف ، اقترحت القائمة أن هذه الوجبات الخفيفة متوفرة بين الوجبات. قيل لي أنه لم يبق شيء ، "كل شيء قد هُدم" أخبرني أحد المضيفة. بينما أفهم قيود الطعام على متن الطائرة ، أتوقع شيئًا صغيرًا لتناول وجبة خفيفة في رحلة بهذا الطول. في النهاية ، بعد أن قال لي كم كنت مذهولًا ، قال أحد الحكام إنهم يعرفون أين يمكن العثور على مخبأ! لماذا لم يكن متاحًا بسهولة على أي حال؟ أعطاني علبتين صغيرتين. والأسوأ من ذلك ، أن كل فنجان من القهوة كان فاترًا لذلك طلبت الشاي ، وكان ذلك أسوأ ، بدا وكأنه طبق ماء ، ولم يكن اللون شايًا! لقد طلبت شرابًا من عصير الفاكهة قبل الهبوط بساعة ونصف قبل الهبوط ، وقال المضيفة إنه لم يكن هناك أي شيء متاح لأنه كان معبأ بالكامل! أنا مندهش ومشمئز.

Auckland to Manchester via Dubai. Nice to report on a positive experience with Emirates. Check-in quick, lounge access OK but a bit crowded. Flight from Auckland very good, food and drink choices excellent, even managed some sleep. Business class bar was well occupied. Second flight from Dubai to Manchester even better as we were given a First class upgrade and we appreciated the increase in the luxury level, with the food, drink and shower. Baggage claim and driver service super quick. All in all an excellent experience.

Milano a Dubai con Emirates. Il servizio per la classe economica era molto buono. Check-in rapidissimo al Terminal 1 di Malpensa, nessuna coda. Il Boeing 777-300er sembrava nuovo, il sedile era comodo con uno schermo abbastanza grande e USB. Sono state distribuite cuffie e coperte e il menu in economia è stato un bel tocco. Mi è piaciuto il sistema di intrattenimento: tanta musica e film disponibili in diverse lingue. C'era solo 1 servizio pasti durante questo volo, il che era molto buono. Poco prima dell'atterraggio è stato servito uno spuntino, si poteva scegliere tra gelato e biscotti caldi. L'equipaggio è stato gentile e disponibile, sorridono e sembra che siano felici di servirti. Prodotto davvero carino per un volo di 6 ore.

Paris CDG à Dubaï. C'était la première fois que nous volions avec Emirates et nous avons fait un voyage très facile. Personnel agréable, nourriture bonne, vol à l'heure. Sièges confortables. Comme c'était un vol de jour, nous n'avons pas essayé de dormir mais nous n'avons aucune raison de penser qu'en tant que lit, les sièges seraient aussi confortables. Une disposition un peu étrange en classe affaires. Semble être plus dirigé vers les voyageurs en solo.

Karachi to New York via Dubai. Best flight I have experienced. The staff was very nice and cooperative. They have the best entertainment system with the latest collection of movies. The food is okayish and better than many airlines. The planes are also new. I should mention that Dubai Airport is the best airport I have visited.

दुबई के रास्ते मुंबई से न्यूयॉर्क जेएफके। जब भी मैं एमिरेट्स के साथ उड़ान भरता हूं तो उनकी सेवा में गिरावट होती दिखती है। दुबई से न्यूयॉर्क तक उनकी भोजन सेवा भयानक थी। उन्होंने एक मेनू प्रदान किया जो वे आमतौर पर 3 विकल्पों के साथ करते हैं। हालाँकि मेनू में शाकाहारी विकल्प (नाश्ता और दोपहर का भोजन दोनों) केवल उन लोगों के लिए उपलब्ध था जिनके पास पहले से चयनित भोजन प्राथमिकताएँ थीं। यह निश्चित नहीं है कि मेनू में कुछ शामिल करने का क्या अर्थ है जब वह वास्तव में चयन के लिए उपलब्ध नहीं है। दूसरे, उनकी उड़ानों में कड़ाके की ठंड होती है और फ्लाइट अटेंडेंट हमेशा कंबल इकट्ठा करने की जल्दी में रहते हैं। यात्रा के एक चरण में उन्होंने ठंडी उड़ान में उतरने से एक घंटे पहले कंबल इकट्ठा किया। कुल मिलाकर उड़ान का अनुभव सुखद नहीं है और टिकटों की कीमत इसके लायक नहीं है।

Cape Town to Auckland via Dubai and Brisbane in Emirates first class. Decided to splash out. Paid just over NZD 13000 which seemed like a good deal. Flight out of Cape Town was uneventful - staff great, older aircraft but nice inside, Cape Town BIDVest lounge absolutely horrible. Arrival at Dubai is at 1am and the airport is buzzing at that time of the morning. Lounge very big and spacious. Priority fast track means nothing at Dubai. It doesn't help to show it or anything, everyone just seems to use the same lines for security. Flight to Brisbane early morning 10am departure on A380, Very new aircraft. Seat fantastic and showers just great! Staff was a bit of a miss, food pretty good though. Transit at BNE very efficient, lounge is great with lots of food options. Flight to Auckland on same aircraft, different staff and they were the best out of all the staff I had. Very attentive and caring. Flight to AKL a short hop but very nice experience. AKL immigration a pain as 3 Emirates A380s arrived in the space of 40mins. Overall the experience was nice but as past experiences have showed me Emirates staff remain a hit or miss situation at best.

Manchester to Sydney via Dubai. First time using Emirates and very disappointed with the lack of communication, requests were ignored and very cold aircraft. Service was poor, haphazard when serving food and drinks, trays left on tables. Children allowed to run up and down the aisles, even when the seat belt signs switched on, and the crew didn't seem to care. Ran out of toilet paper in the lavatories, reported but nothing done.

Karachi to Boston via Dubai with Emirates. I had a very disappointing experience with Emirates. I have been a travelling musician and always travel with my guitar. Having always put it close to me in the plane I always travel with a softcase. This time I travelled to Boston I was coerced at Karachi airport and given absolutely no choice but to check in my guitar. Knowing the fragility of a guitar it is unacceptable to check it in regardless of all fragile handling protocol an airline may have. A guitar is too sensitive to be checked in. Upon arriving at Boston my guitar was nowhere to be found at baggage claim and after filing a claim it reached me a few days later. And when I unzipped my case I noticed my guitar's headstock is fractured and the guitar received dents regardless of Emirates ensuring fragile handling.

搭乘阿聯酋航空航班從新加坡經迪拜飛往芝加哥。機組人員不耐煩，要求在著陸前45分鐘拿走所有毯子。在這次寒冷的紅眼飛行中，乘客們被粗暴地從睡夢中驚醒，毯子也被拿走了。然後工作人員以非常粗魯的方式收集了所有耳機。我認為所有這些都是為了幫助飛機更快地掉頭，但這會導致非常可怕的飛行體驗。更不用說食物也是冷的而且質量很差。我有過世界各地許多其他航空公司的經驗，這無疑是有史以來最糟糕的服務和最糟糕的食物。我再也不會乘坐阿聯酋航空了。對於類似的價值我會選擇卡塔爾航空。

दुबई के रास्ते दिल्ली से मेलबर्न तक। चेक-इन अच्छा और तेज़ है और दिल्ली लाउंज ख़राब नहीं है। तकनीकी कारणों से दिल्ली से उड़ान भरने में देरी हुई और रद्द कर दी गई। दिल्ली हवाई अड्डे के कर्मचारी नहीं जानते कि संकट से कैसे निपटा जाए। यात्रियों को परेशानी का सामना करना पड़ा। यात्रियों को उचित तरीके से होटल और/या आराम उपलब्ध नहीं कराया गया। प्रतिस्थापन उड़ान EK8515 20 घंटे बाद दिल्ली से रवाना हुई। प्रतिस्थापन उड़ान पर चालक दल की स्थिति बहुत ख़राब थी। अमीरात की उड़ानों में खाना अब बहुत ख़राब है। EK406 से MEL. फ्लाइट समय पर रवाना हुई और पहुंची। IFE बुरा नहीं है. विज्ञापित वाईफ़ाई धीमा और ख़राब था। लब्बोलुआब यह है कि अमीरात अत्यधिक विस्तार से पीड़ित है। एयरलाइन ने आम पकड़ और ग्राहक सेवा की बुनियादी बातें खो दी हैं। ईके के साथ एक गोल्ड सदस्य होने के नाते मैं अब कहीं और देख रहा हूं।

Manchester to Sydney via Dubai. This was my fifth return journey facilitated with Emirates. Myself and my wife prefer travelling with Emirates, due to their flexibility around routes out of Manchester and previous experience of flying with Emirates from London Heathrow and Gatwick via Dubai to Mauritius. The meals in Economy class have deteriorated in my view. The portions are much smaller and needs reviewing by Emirates. I purchased $1 of wifi access, and its reliability was poor at times, and cannot be relied upon. On a positive note, we flew on the new 2 class Airbus A380 (A6-EOP) and the flight was good (with the exception of meals). They did regularly offer drinks and snacks throughout the flight - this was not observed on the other three Emirates flights.

Melbourne to Rome via Kuala Lumpur & Dubai. My husband and I booked a trip to Italy with our two young children. The flight is around 21 hrs not including transfers & upon recommendations from several friends we decided to travel with Emirates. I do not have one good thing to say about them! We experienced every family's worst fears about international plane travel with everything from poor, slow service, judgemental staff, pathetic kids meals (the kids were served spaghetti bolognaise on 5/6 flights), rude staff refusing to give the kids their 'complimentary' toy (which we had to beg for!), and to top it all off we had all been separated on one flight, despite booking our seats online. My four year old son and seven year old daughter were sitting 10 and 15 rows away from myself with my husband sitting another 7 rows behind me! All up we were spread right through the economy cabin and no-one wanted to help us, each blaming the next point of transfer as the responsible party. Originally I made an online complaint to Emirates while on holiday, hoping at the bare minimum, they'd be able to offer some palatable food to our children inflight. The response I got, as well as being ridiculously late and outside the timeframe given, was pathetic

Manchester to Bangkok via Dubai and was really disappointed with Emirates. The onboard service was slow and appeared disorganised. We were 2 hours into the flight before we were offered a drink and even then the stewardess seemed uninterested. The food was bland and repetitive. There were two options with one always being chicken. There was never enough of the second meal choice option. The seating was comfortable with good legroom. Entertainment was okay but the same on each connecting flight. Some screens also failed on the plane causing complaints. On a whole, an average experience for the price.

Manchester to Doha via Dubai return with Emirates. We arrived at the airport to find that the plane had been changed and our seats that we had carefully selected had been changed - with us scattered all over the place. This is not just an inconvenience but made worse when you are travelling with children - other cheaper airlines have noticed that we are travelling with children and have made sure we are seated together even when we have not paid extra for this (like Thomas Cook). The ground staff managed to find us seats together in the end but much further back in the plane. To make it worse they did the same thing on the way home on our Doha to Dubai flight. This time I checked just before we left and rang them - they could only seat 4 of us together and the rest were scattered. When I got home I emailed them to complain and after a long time got a reply to say that this is just how it is. I expected better for a company that sells itself as having good service and are so expensive. Its a sad day when I get better service from a holiday company chartered flight compared to Emirates. After all the messing about spoiled the flight - this is one of the best parts of the holiday for my family. If a family aren't seated together it doesn't matter what film you show or food you give.

Jakarta to Paris via Dubai with Boeing 777 from Jakarta to Dubai and A380 from Dubai to Paris. I was impressed with the cabin interior. The seat color was calm yet it still gave something confident. Before take-off, the flight attendants gave the menu to all passengers. Jakarta-Dubai flight was served with two meals. I was surprised with the flight attendant that has different languages, 18 in total, this would be very helpful with the passenger who couldn't speak English very fluently. The meal for me was standard, as I could find a meal better in other airlines. I hope I could get better meal in my next flight to Paris since I thought the flight would use A380, but it was still the same. The flight attendant seemed so hurried in serving the meals. The meal to Paris was served a bit later until dinner time, and I was like starving since they didn't give us more snack. The best thing in the flight was the IFE. And it also had the camera that was very interactive.

London to Kuala Lumpur via Dubai with Emirates. Inflight entertainment was wonderful with many selections to choose from. Food was rather okay too, considering I ordered a gluten free meal. The seat was hard to sleep in and the cabin was sometimes too cold. I needed to use a couple of blankets on these flights as it was just too cold. Service was below average. Asked for orange juice and water twice from two different cabin crew, but it never showed up. I had to go to the galley myself to take the drinks because no one attended to my call.

New York JFK to Milan. I've flown the Emirates A380 on short haul flights from BKK to HKG in First Class which is a noticeable improvement over the Business Class product. As many write, there are a number of seats in the Business Class cabin that are much worse than others. I did my homework before selecting the outbound seats. Per recommendation (traveling with a significant other), I picked seats 20 E/F that had the mini bar on the aisle, which allows you to sit closer to your friend/partner/spouse. The problem with these is that our middle armrests were so small and narrow that really only one of us could use it at a time. On our flight back to New York we opted to sit apart and chose seats 18K and 20K. These seats have the mini bar on the aisle, and you do have a nice more private experience. The huge plus of these seats is that you get lots of storage space next to your seat under the windows that is nonexistent in the other middle seat configurations (E/F and D/G). This allows you to put away your laptop bag, blanket etc, without getting up into the overhead bins during flight. This would also be the case for the "A" seats on the other side of the plane. We found these much more comfortable and didn't mind sitting apart for the flight. The flight attendants are very hit or miss with Emirates. On our outbound JFK-Milan flight, most were pretty bad. Not particularly helpful or available. They disappear after the very rushed dinner service. On our return flight the good FAs outnumbered the bad. The thing that agitated the most on both flights is the disregard that the attendants have for being quiet. They love to congregate and talk loudly between sections behind row 21. As well, they seemed to always getting into the overhead bins and slamming them shut. This woke me us several times. The other thing that I disliked is that the restrooms are next to the galley in the back of the Business class cabin in such a way that it almost seemed unsanitary and without privacy. You have the toilets between the lounge/bar with uncovered food, and the galley where they are preparing food. With no curtain separating the toilet section from the galley section, you have a bunch of FAs standing around on one side and guests in the bar area on the other that you must walk through to get to and from the toilet. We found the food offering pretty subpar for a business class product. The beverage service and offering was above average.

Sydney to Bangkok with Emirates. I was unhappy with the Check-In staff member who mistakenly added the weight of my carry-on cabin bag to my Checked luggage, requiring me to repack my bags, but when I eventually got back to (different) check-in desk my checked luggage was well under the 30kgs allowed, so I ended up checking both bags and carrying the plastic bag that I was going to post as my carry-on. The difference between the two service staff was marked - this is the second time this has happened. The meals on Emirates in Economy have deteriorated in the last year or so, probably because Emirates operates a codeshare arrangement with Qantas on this route, so they are maybe catering to Qantas customers. The cabin staff are very professional and helpful, The beer on board is supermarket class offering a Dutch and USA option with a Dutch light alternative rather than options from Oceania or Asia which I would prefer, still the staff offer options rather than just what is close to hand. The wine is quite reasonable given it is cool and drunk at altitude. The in-flight entertainment is superior unless the person in front insists on fully reclining their seat even during meals which makes viewing the screen extremely unpleasant, but this is probably more a reflection on the type of passenger Emirates attracts with their code share arrangement with Qantas than on the actual seat.

Durban to Gatwick via Dubai. The Emirates inflight entertainment helps you to not notice the space your seat in economy has to offer on the Boeing 777-300ER. The A380 from Dubai to London Heathrow no issues. Will fly Emirates on this route and will not hold it against them if they squeeze the extra seats and keep it economical to fly.
Jeddah to Dubai in economy class on Emirates Boeing 777-300. Emirates are a good airline to fly. Flight on time, with great service on board, spacious airplane and good food served.

Barcelona a Singapur vía Dubái fue mi primera experiencia volando con Emirates y quedé impresionado con los cómodos asientos, el entretenimiento y los servicios de comida. Incluso los baños eran espaciosos y estaban bien equipados. El personal fue cortés y agradable, sin embargo, mi compañera de viaje y yo (ambas mujeres de cincuenta y tantos años) a menudo pasamos por alto algunos detalles del servicio, mientras que el joven pasajero sentado en el pasillo junto a nosotros siempre fue atendido, recogió las bandejas de comida (las nuestras estaban izquierda) y recibimos bebidas regulares de cortesía, pero nunca nos preguntaron. Una amiga (también una mujer mayor) mencionó que tuvo una experiencia similar al viajar en clase ejecutiva con Emirates en mayo de 2015 y tuvo que pedirle al pasajero sentado en el pasillo junto a ella que la ayudara con las solicitudes de servicio. No he experimentado esto con otras aerolíneas y tal vez esto deba abordarse en el nivel de capacitación.

Newcastle to Dubai return.The food on board was virtually inedible, and we were offered one drink on a 7.5 hour flight. The staff were unhelpful and if a question was asked or a request made, the look you received was painful. The flight to Dubai was exactly the same. This this was my first time in this region. I felt the people in the UAE were so friendly and helpful and Dubai is spotlessly clean, our only real disappointment was Emirates. The captain announced that there were eleven cabin staff on the plane - what were they doing? One girl was kind and had a smile. She even admitted to us that she didn't and wouldn't eat the meals on board. I had an elderly parent in Business Class and he fared little better apparently. We had approximately forty minutes waiting on luggage, whilst there was no other plane landed at Newcastle competing for resources. This may be an issue with the airport, but worth mentioning as indicative of the poor service we received.

曼谷經迪拜飛往倫敦，我在網上訂了一張阿聯酋航空超值特惠機票。我很失望地發現，如果您選擇通過泰國銀行以現金支付機票，則需支付 600 泰銖的新當地 EK 服務費，而標準 EK 西聯匯款轉賬費為 200 泰銖。網上辦理入住手續很順利，BKK 和 LHR 的辦理入住手續的工作人員很有幫助。航班準時，飛機乾淨，各航段維護良好。 ICE 系統讓我開心了好幾個小時，我注意到它們已經換成了新的方形軟耳機。迪拜的交通順暢且受到專業控制。我沒有吃任何東西所以我不能評論食物。船員們都很有魅力，我注意到在過去的兩年裡船員們的態度發生了巨大的轉變。阿聯酋航空現在再次成為我選擇的航空公司。

Birmingham to Brisbane via Dubai. I flew Emirates 5 years ago and was very impressed. What a difference this time. The staff were unsmiling and unfriendly to passengers. Meals were slow and on both legs one of the meal options was not available by the time they got to us. On the second occasion I refused the meal offered as I didn't want another stew and I had had enough. I was eventually provided with the meal I wanted but it was put down with ill grace. My partner is vegetarian but he is not vegan. Surely Emirates could provide for both and not treat vegetarians as vegan? His meals were awful and inadequate and he had to have my cheese and biscuits as he was left hungry.

Lisboa para Auckland via Dubai com a Emirates.
