Primeira etapa de Lisboa para Dubai no velho Boeing 777-300, velho ICE e tela pequena, boa viagem porque a tripulação foi fantástica, muito tarde saindo de Lisboa, equipe fantástica em Dubai esperando com sinais para nos levar para o próximo voo. EK 408 também um Boeing 777-300 para Melbourne com parada técnica em Kuala Lumpur. Este era um avião novo ou pelo menos com assentos fantásticos na parte de trás, ótimo voo. Em Melboune esperamos o EK 406 para nos levar a Auckland, voo completo, não gosto muito do A380-800, os assentos um pouco mais espaçosos mas menos privacidade como o Boeing 777-300. Uma experiência muito boa com a Emirates.

Melbourne to Dubai via Singapore, and the Emirates service was excellent, food superb and flight attendants very attentive. One of my traveling companions had a bad allergic reaction to a product bought at the airport, and the crew went out of their way so much. After our stopover in Singapore, the new cabin crew had been informed that my companion was not well. They kept an attentive eye throughout the entire flight and when we asked for some chocolate and they forgot because they were so busy, they went to Business Class and got the chocolate from there. At Dubai we noticed they cost about $50USD for a box of 6! I will fly Emirates in the future, best airline I have been on.

Dallas to Dubai return in October 2015 with Emirates were the worst flights I have been on. Seats were cramped, poor service, filthy bathrooms, and crying children during the entire flight. Had great hopes that this airline would be exceptional and it was exceptionally bad.

من الكويت إلى دبي على متن طائرة بوينج 777 ، كانت المقصورة نصف فارغة ، وكان إنجاز إجراءات السفر عبر الإنترنت سلسًا. الطاقم اليقظ ، عشاء لطيف يقدم لرحلة قصيرة. كان الكابتن إعلاميًا بتحديثات الرحلة. كان الجانب السلبي الوحيد هو الطائرات المتوقفة بعيدًا عن صالة الوصول في DXB والتي انتهى بها الأمر في رحلة طويلة بالحافلة إلى المحطة وبوابة الوصول.

Melbourne to Auckland on Emirates A380, pure luxury in every shape way and form. The flight was delayed on the way in, and the staff on the ground could have handled that better. But the fight, crew and facilities etc, I cannot fault in any shape way or form.

Barcelona a Manila vía Dubai con Emirates. El asiento y el espacio para las piernas parecen más grandes en comparación con el Boeing 777-300 de Emirates. El entretenimiento a bordo tiene una amplia gama de opciones (películas y series de televisión), la tripulación de cabina es amable y servicial. No les importaría dar algo extra para los niños después del servicio de cabina. También tienen juguetes y libros para colorear para mantenerlos ocupados.

Genf nach Singapur über Dubai und Emirates waren eine günstigere Option für diesen Flug und schienen im Hinblick auf Zwischenstopps und Abflug-/Ankunftszeiten praktischer zu sein. Nicht nur der Preis war günstig, auch die an Bord servierten Mahlzeiten waren von schlechter Qualität. Der Hinflug von Dubai nach Singapur war ein Albtraum, das Flugzeug war völlig voll und die Sitzplätze waren sehr schlecht, es gab sehr wenig Platz. Ich habe versucht, die Unannehmlichkeiten zu vergessen, indem ich mir (lächerlich zensierte) Filme angesehen habe, kam aber erschöpft an, weil ich stundenlang in einer verkrampften Position gesessen habe. Das Personal schien mehr daran interessiert zu sein, miteinander zu plaudern, als sich um die Passagiere zu kümmern, obwohl es nicht direkt unfreundlich war.

Sydney to Manchester via Dubai with Emirates. Chauffeur, included in the price, picked us up on time and following check in we settled in the lounge to await our flight. Flight left on time and arrived Dubai early. Emirates A380 has excellent suites in first with 23" TV, privacy door which make your space entirely private and very comfortable seat. Following takeoff, watched a movie, got the seat into bed position with mattress and duvet, closed the doors and slept. Woke after 6 hours, ordered food and about two hours from Dubai used one of the two showers. Onward flight to Manchester, again A380, was the same and using the shower meant we arrived fresh. Chauffeur drive again home.

San Francisco to Dubai with Emirates. Exceptional inflight service and clean and fresh cabin. Luggage was not a problem and neither the crew at all. We arrived on time in DXB. The food was outstanding, entertainment was sub par. Bathrooms were kinda wet but manageable. Seat comfort was nice.

Von Frankfurt nach Sydney über Dubai. Vom desinteressierten Kabinenpersonal, dem fehlerhaften Unterhaltungssystem, dem Mangel an Erfrischungen bis hin zu den Flugverspätungen können wir kein gutes Wort über Emirates sagen. Die Durchreise durch Dubai ist ein Albtraum. Überteuertes Essen (wird dringend benötigt, da an Bord so wenig Essen serviert wird) und ungenießbarer Kaffee sowie halbstündige Warteschlangen vor den schmutzigen Toiletten. Die Toiletten an Bord des Flugzeugs wurden nicht gereinigt und im Laufe des Fluges wurden immer mehr Toiletten „außer Betrieb“. In über 20 Flugstunden wurde zweimal Tee und Kaffee serviert. Als ich um eine Tasse Tee bat, wurde mir mitgeteilt, dass es keine Tassen gäbe. Alles in allem eine Albtraumreise.

Da Roma a Calcutta via Dubai con Emirates. Sito web semplice e funzionale. Questo è stato un viaggio a più tappe da Roma a Calcutta con ritorno da Delhi. Il personale era cortese e molto professionale. Il viaggio sul Boeing A380 è davvero piacevole grazie all'ampio spazio per le gambe, al film televisivo in molte lingue e al servizio a bordo davvero eccellente. Pasti, merende, coperte, bevande tutto bene, e grazie all'equipaggio presente e veloce.

乘坐阿聯酋航空航班從曼谷經迪拜飛往伯明翰。過去 10 年我一直使用阿聯酋航空，但服務卻在走下坡路。優點是有很棒的娛樂系統，如果在正確的時間預訂航班的話價格也不錯，但僅此而已。如今，飯菜的規模已經縮小，他們一定是使用了廉價的供應商，因為他們在烹飪方面已經走下坡路了——過去幾年我吃過的飯菜都不是很好，尤其是當你比較經濟時新加坡航空和馬來西亞航空的機艙食物都很棒。我還發現，如果你在航班上引起注意，這取決於機組人員 - 在這趟航班上，機組人員對乘客根本不感興趣，沒有水流，你必須不斷地按鈴要飲料，然後你就被由一群脾氣暴躁的船員服務。

من دبي إلى ملبورن عبر كوالالمبور مع طيران الإمارات ، وفوجئنا بسرور. كانت المقاعد (20F / G) ضيقة ولكن بها مساحة مناسبة للأرجل. لا أحد منا طويل القامة ، ولكن كان من الممكن أن يكون لدينا قراء وعلب زجاجية في جيب المقعد وألا ننزعج. نظام الترفيه رائع: الكثير من الخيارات وأنا أحب مشاهدة الكاميرا الأمامية عند الإقلاع والهبوط. كان الطعام جيدًا أيضًا. تكمن المشاكل في أن المقاعد ضيقة جدًا ، لذا صدم الجار عند تناول الطعام ، وصينية الطعام ضخمة - كل شيء يأتي في نفس الوقت ، لذلك لا توجد مساحة على طاولة الدرج لزجاجات النبيذ أو الحاويات المهملة. فناجين القهوة سيئة التصميم ، وأي اضطراب ينساب. لكن بشكل عام ، بالنسبة للاقتصاد ، تجربة ليست سيئة للغاية.

Copenhagen to Melbourne via Dubai. CPH-DXB was operated by one of Emirates oldest B777-300ER. Friendly checkin at CPH but flight delayed by 2hrs. Got a call in the morning from skyward desk informing of delay. Shared Lounge at CPH not bad but crowded. Cabin crew good but not excellent. After arriving into DXB 2 hrs late, was taken to remote stand which was at far end of airport. Thereafter a much dreaded 20-30 minute bus journey to terminal. This felt like we were driving back to CPH. Baggage was already there before us. Dubai to Melbourne left on time, which is rare with heavy traffic out of DXB during morning rush time. Service onboard again not bad. Newer A380 aircraft with better IFE, but food was terrible. Early arrival into MEL and was out in 20 minutes of landing.

Melbourne to Moscow Domodedovo via Dubai. Checkin in MEL handled by Dnata, staff aloof and unfriendly with attitude. Lounge good and good selection of food. First Flight on an older A380 showing signs of ageing. Eventhough Emirates boast that they have a multinational and multilingual cabin crew, most are more keen on how they look than be of service. IFE is excellent as always. Food is another story and is pretty bad now. A far cry from what is said in menu. The second leg the Purser was rude and made impression he would rather be somewhere else. All this said, Emirates is not bad and does fly out to many places and with seamless connections via DXB.

Cape Town to Manchester via Dubai in Emirates economy class. On time and great in-flight service. Enterainment system also one of the best. No issue with check in - all handled smoothly and good boarding at Cape Town. As others have said the Boeing 777 has narrower seats and aisles - not a problem for me, but does reduce the quality of the flight for some. Food, I ordered special meals which came as requested and okay. In Dubai had to be transferred to and from the planes by bus which lengthens the transfer time. The airport has been built to take more people but seems to be bursting at the seams. Allow plenty of time if you are having to go on the train to and from terminals - it can be time consuming with lots of lifts, walks and then the train trip itself. Easy deplaning in Manchester and immigration and baggage claim there efficient.

Sydney to Christchurch with Emirates, which was a codeshare flight with Qantas. Flight delayed by 2.5 hours due to late arrival from Bangkok so instead of departing at 9.25am, it wasn't until after midday. However, made up time in the air arriving at 4pm. Once in the air, service was excellent. Seated in 21K, in the last row of the front economy section, up against a toilet. Toilet was no bother though. With headphones, you hear nothing, and no smells. 3x4x3 seating with good pitch. Seat recline was great and I had no issues with reclining as no one behind. Good selection of entertainment options. Warm moist hand towels given upon departure. Menu with two choices. Food plentiful for this 2.5 hour flight. Flight was not full. Many seats spare. Seat beside me was free as it was for many seated on outside rows. Arrival into Christchurch was at a time when Emirates is the only international flight. So processing fast. Bags on belt within ten minutes of disembarking. From landing to airport exit was 15 minutes. Really good. Christchurch Airport is the best international airport in New Zealand. Apart from delay, it was a great flight.

7 月 4 日曼谷飛往迪拜，EK373、A380 符合預期，並且像往常一樣提供了豐富的機上娛樂選擇。機上服務是我經歷過的最糟糕的，我的期望很低！將近2.5小時才提供一杯水。如果他們在起飛後一小時內無法提供一杯水，我寧願他們在飛行開始時放棄熱毛巾並分發一瓶水。機組人員基本上是隱形的，在奇怪的情況下，機組人員會沿著過道匆匆而過，避免與乘客進行任何目光接觸。唯一可見的機組人員在整個飛行過程中大部分時間都在與第 45 排的朋友或家人交談。我們區域的所有服務請求都被忽略，其他一些沮喪的乘客對發生的事情感到困惑。飛機準時到達，但停在離航站樓很遠的地方。巴士、延誤和轉乘感覺就像我們從阿布扎比開車到迪拜一樣。

Auckland to Sydney EK413 28 May 2015. Drink trolley came 15 minutes after the meal trolley. All passengers around me had therefore finished their meal before being provided with a drinks service. Dinner menu offered Beef or Chicken however the option was in fact Fish or Beef? The crew in the mid section of the cabin seemed very disorganised and lacked supervision. I activated the call button and it took 20 minutes to have any attention given and I was not the only passenger in this situation.

من الدوحة إلى دبي EK848 ومن دبي إلى زيورخ EK087. كانت الرحلتان في 25 مارس 2015. كانت طيران الإمارات شركة طيران رائعة ولكن مستويات خدماتها آخذة في الانخفاض مؤخرًا. أخذنا رحلة من الدوحة إلى زيورخ مع اتصال في الدوحة. في المرحلة الأولى ، طلبنا البطانيات ولكن لم يتم إعطاء أي اهتمام حتى هبطت الرحلة ، وعند تذكير المضيفة الجوية بعدم توفر بطانيات على متن الطائرة. في المحطة الثانية كان الطعام سيئًا للغاية وتم جمع الهواتف قبل 30 دقيقة من الهبوط. بالتأكيد انخفضت مستويات الخدمة بشكل ملحوظ مقارنة بما كانت عليه قبل عامين.

دبي إلى سيدني الدرجة السياحية. بعد قراءة منشورات أخرى هنا لطيران الإمارات ، كان عليك فقط إضافة تعليقاتي. لقد سافرت مع طيران الإمارات لسنوات عديدة ولكني أشعر أن خدمة العملاء من الطاقم تزداد سوءًا. الإتحادات الودية نادرة هذه الأيام. يقوم الآخرون بالحد الأدنى مما يحتاجون إليه بدون ابتسامة. كادت أن تطرقك إذا كنت في طريقهم. جلس اثنان من الأشخاص على مقاعدنا ولم يتحركوا لكن اتحاد كرة القدم لم يهتموا كثيرًا. الاختيار الرائع مرة واحدة على ICE آخذ في التدهور أيضًا. هناك الكثير مما يمكن رؤيته ولكن اختيار سيئ باللغة الإنجليزية إلا إذا كنت تحب الأفلام العنيفة. ماذا حدث لحزمة الوجبات الخفيفة مع مشروب في بداية الرحلة؟ لم يخدم في رحلتي. اتصل بعض الركاب بالاتحاد لكنهم لم يأتوا. نعم ، قد يرن البعض لأشياء ثانوية ولكن من ناحية أخرى قد تكون حالة طارئة. الأشياء المزعجة في رحلة طويلة مدتها 14 ساعة تحدث هذه الأشياء الصغيرة فرقًا للركاب. ارفع لعبتك الإماراتية أو سيبحث المزيد من الناس في مكان آخر. أعتقد اعتقادا راسخا أن أي شركة طيران جيدة مثل طاقمها فقط. سأقوم برحلة أخرى الأسبوع المقبل إلى أوروبا. أتمنى أن تكون هذه تجربة أفضل.

Flying Perth to Manchester for a funeral both out and return flights delayed therefore missed connecting flights on each trip (facing an extra 10 hours on the return leg). On arrival at Dubai no one met the passengers to offer directions to desks etc and on asking to use the lounge to send an email was met with a 'no' - not every one has a fancy phone with internet service! Hotel voucher led to a hotel room for a 'sleep' of approx 3hrs not worth the effort. For the cost of the ticket was not impressed with the lack of ground service or apologies for such a long delay one would think they would be more organised as this must happen regularly.

Glasgow to Male via Dubai and return economy class. All flights on time with Emirates' usual professionalism and efficiency in dealing with quick transfers of baggage between flights. The standard economy seats provide enough legroom even for big guys like me (6 foot 6 with long legs). Excellent food and utterly superb in-flight entertainment. Friendly and responsive staff on all flights.

Boston - Dubai - Mumbai. The long haul 777's economy section is scandalous. It's the equivalent of flying on a cramped domestic airplane for 14 hours. Honestly I have flown many international trips in Economy and never have I been this uncomfortable. In a standard seat it is so narrow that I had to take turns eating with the passenger next to me because neither of us had enough arm room to cut food. There was absolutely no back support in the 'new and improved' economy seats and the 3-4-3 seating is too much for the 777 â€“ so much so that the flight attendants do not even apologize when they hit your seat every time they walk by you in the narrow aisles. On the way from Dubai back to Boston my entertainment touchscreen misregistered every tap meaning that any time I went to pause a movie the system either exited rewound to the beginning or switched to a view of the map. It is clear that Emirates the is flying on a reputation clearly earned before its new-found desire for profit over passenger well being. Like American domestics they will now punish the passenger for the benefit of their bottom line. Unfortunately I will not fly Emirates again if they continue their push for more and more seats in Economy.

Glasgow to Male via Dubai and return economy class. All flights on time with Emirates' usual professionalism and efficiency in dealing with quick transfers of baggage between flights. The standard economy seats provide enough legroom even for big guys like me (6 foot 6 with long legs). Excellent food and utterly superb in-flight entertainment. Friendly and responsive staff on all flights.

Flew Brisbane to Dubai on 777 and the onto Rome on A380. You really notice the difference between these two planes. The A380 is a lot quieter and seats are more comfortable and spacious. Would recommend sitting in the first section of economy we were rows 49 and 50. Food was of high standard and their entertainment system was fantastic. Easy to use up the time watching a couple of the late latest movies. Would highly recommend to anyone making the trip to Europe from Australia.

Copenhagen to Manila via Dubai. The flight from Copenhagen was 1 hour delayed because of late arrival from Dubai. Boarding in Copenhagen was fast. The service from Copenhagen to Dubai on the flight was good and the ICE system working well. The boarding in Dubaifor the flight to Manila was good. The plane was one of the older models of the 777 so for the ICE system you needed to use the remote. The return flight from Manila to Dubai was good the check in was fast and nice that they are now using terminal 3. Boarding was good and first time I saw boarding using zones not used in the other airports. The plane was an old B777 and the IFE system was not working well - it was stopping in middle of movies. Flight from Dubai to Copenhagen was good was one the younger 777 plane so ICE was working with out any problems.

Jakarta (JKT) to Dubai DBX - the seats are very narrow and uncomfortable for a Business class. The food was outstanding but the airplane was dirty. When you fly for business you require a good rest on the aircraft and you expect a comfortable seat.
曼谷飛往迪拜，然後前往 BHX。旅途的兩段旅程都非常愉快。我唯一的抱怨是在迪拜等待了七個小時，但這是我預訂該航班的錯。機組人員很棒，食物很棒，ICE 娛樂也是世界一流的。 BHX 前往迪拜和曼谷的回程非常棒。除了一件事之外，我沒有任何抱怨（當食物送達時，工作人員沒有要求人們將座位放回直立位置）。除此之外，我可以說阿聯酋航空是一家非常適合乘坐航班的航空公司，我將來會毫不猶豫地再次乘坐他們的航班。

Jakarta (JKT) to Dubai DBX - the seats are very narrow and uncomfortable for a Business class. The food was outstanding but the airplane was dirty. When you fly for business you require a good rest on the aircraft and you expect a comfortable seat.

EK432 من دبي إلى بريزبين عبر سنغافورة (استمرار بعد EK2 - انظر المنشور المنفصل). الاقتصاد B777-300ER. عند النزول من EK2 ، يجب على جميع ركاب النقل إجراء فحص أمني قبل الدخول إلى المحطة مما يلغي الحاجة إليه عند البوابة. مسح اللافتات إلى البوابة التالية. غير معجب بمحطة T3B. كان الصعود فقط يحضر ويذهب. لا طلب. بمجرد الصعود على متن الطائرة ، يكون الفرق بين A380 و B777 هادئًا. مقاعد أصغر بوصة واحدة والممرات أصغر أيضًا. كان لدي مقعد في الممر وفي كل مرة مرت عربة الترولي أو شخص ما بالصدمة. كان الشخص بجواري أعلى بقليل من المتوسط ​​واستمر في الانحناء في مقعدي عندما كانت نائمة. كان الأمر مزعجًا للغاية ولم تساعده وحدات AV الموجودة أسفل المقعد في شغل مساحة. كانت عروض الطعام في قطاع الساعات السبع الأولى خفيفة للغاية. لفة ووجبة إفطار من عجة الجبن. لا نقانق لحم الخنزير المقدد أو الفاصوليا المطبوخة. العشاء الأخير الذي تناولته كان طاجن لحم البقر قليلًا. كان من الممكن أن يستفيد من تخفيض النبيذ. كان AV على هذه الحرفة هو ICE القديم. شاشة ضبابية محدودة للغاية وأصغر حجمًا. من الصعب جدًا تحميله كما تريد. كان لدينا حالة طبية طارئة واضطررنا للهبوط في الهند. قيل لنا أن الأمر سيستغرق 30 دقيقة ولكنه أضاف ساعتين لرحلتنا التي وصلت في الساعة 2.30 BNE. لم يخبرنا الطاقم في أي وقت عن الوقت الذي كان من المتوقع أن نصل فيه إلى BNE. اضطررت لقضاء وقتي في سنغافورة في البحث على الويب لمعرفة ذلك واتخاذ الترتيبات اللازمة. شكل سيء للغاية. هذا بالإضافة إلى المقاعد غير المريحة بشكل لا يصدق في 777 تجعل من غير المحتمل للغاية أن أسافر مع طيران الإمارات مرة أخرى إذا كان هذا هو الخيار الوحيد المتاح.

London to Dubai on 6/9 flight EK 012 and returned 12/9 flight EK 0009. I flew business class with Emirates both on 777 and 380 airbus. The seats were narrow in the extreme even on the 380 and I found it very uncomfortable. The staff were 'going through the motions' and the food was tepid. I have flown with many airlines-first time with Emirates. If you compare them to Qantas they have much to learn. Not impressed at all and will avoid in future.

Flew London to Bangkok via Dubai. London to Dubai was reasonable no complaints. Other than I had the only seat with the inflight entertainment not working. However the service staff reset this and it began to work. Good choice of films. The entertainment also includes sport TV shows latest movies movie classics and music. The food was good - I had salmon for starter with a yoghurt chicken and sticky toffee pudding. The best flight food I have had. The breakfast wasn't bad either. The seats weren't too good though - slight lack of legroom. Dubai to Bangkok started slightly late but made up the time. Nice choice of newspapers and magazines for in flight use as well. Food on this leg not so good but still reasonable. I had a fish curry which was quite edible. I cant really comment on value for money as I paid for my ticket as a RTW flight so I didn't know the cost of this ticket.

Flew Sydney to Istanbul return in May and August. Booked through Qantas but didn't set foot on a Qantas plane. As a codeshare passenger you are a second class citizen. No online check-in and no seat selection you get what's left at the airport. An unnecessary stop in Bangkok with even more unnecessary duplicated security checks even we were just stepping off the plane then back on again. Flight and food were good though I always score the entertainment system that doesn't work they were able to move me to another seat (I wasn't able to sit with my wife anyway). One whinge Emirates (and other airlines) really need to police their hand luggage policies. I'm sick of having my reasonably sized cabin bag under my feet because some selfish person has put a suitcase in the overhead locker. Hand luggage is for what you need on the flight not overflow from your check-in bag.

EK751 من دبي إلى الدار البيضاء في 8 مايو 2014. باستخدام الأميال للترقية من درجة رجال الأعمال إلى الدرجة الأولى في رحلة حديثة من دبي إلى الدار البيضاء ، شعرت بخيبة أمل كبيرة في المنتج والتجربة التي كنت أعتبرها شركة طيران عالمية حريصة على التميز بين شركاتها منافسين أقوياء مثل الاتحاد للطيران أو الخطوط الجوية القطرية. لم تكن خدمة طاقم الطائرة فظة ومتفرقة فحسب ، بل كان نظام الترفيه على متن الطائرة معيبًا ، حيث لم يتم تقديم خدمة تقديم الطعام من الدرجة الأولى وكانت سماعات الرأس معيبة. وعندما تم إبلاغ خدمة العملاء بكل هذا ، كان هناك رد سلبي للغاية على التعليقات. كانت شركة الطيران هذه نجمة ذات يوم لكنها بالتأكيد تتراجع عن النعمة.
Colombo to Amsterdam via Dubai and Paris to Colombo via Dubai. Food was fantastic excellent inflight entertainment. Staff very attentive will use Emirates again. Flew in A380 as well.

Lisboa para Luanda via Dubai. No passado eu usei a TAP Portugal para ir a Luanda, mas devido a atrasos, altas tarifas, aeronaves antigas e mau serviço, mudei. A Emirates está um pouco acima dos demais voos, onde a perna principal na saída estava em um 777 moderno, muito agradável e com mais espaço do que a comida da competição, uma tripulação deliciosa, profissional e prestativa. Não me lembro de nenhuma outra transportadora oferecendo proativamente tantas bebidas e recargas na classe econômica.

EK503 बॉम्बे से दुबई नवीनतम 777ER300। लगभग 15 मिनट देर से निकले लेकिन समय पर पहुंचे। नवीनतम 777ER300 में टच-सक्षम अतिरिक्त-चौड़ी स्क्रीन के साथ अल्ट्रा-आधुनिक आईसीई (सूचना संचार मनोरंजन) प्रणाली थी। रिमोट आईपैड की तरह दिख रहे थे। अत्याधुनिक इनफ़्लाइट मनोरंजन प्रणाली। विमान नया था और बहुत साफ-सुथरा लग रहा था। सब कुछ सही क्रम में था. पैसेंजर वॉकवे की छत पर तारे जैसी मिनी-लाइटें थीं जो एक शांत प्रभाव दे रही थीं। ग्राउंड क्रू बहुत मददगार थे और उन्होंने सभी प्रश्नों का उत्तर दिया। केबिन क्रू बेहद मददगार और मित्रवत थे और उन्होंने सभी अनुरोधों का तुरंत जवाब दिया। अन्य एयरलाइनों के विपरीत एमिरेट्स में इकोनॉमी में बहुत आरामदायक सीटें हैं और पैरों के लिए पर्याप्त जगह है। बिज़नेस और प्रथम श्रेणी ने असीमित विलासिता का चित्रण किया जो पहले किसी अन्य एयरलाइन में नहीं देखी गई थी। खाना बहुत स्वादिष्ट था. भोजन का चयन उड़ान मार्ग के अनुसार किया जाता है जिसका अर्थ है कि भोजन का चयन प्रस्थान और आगमन शहरों के व्यंजनों के अनुसार किया जाता है। मैंने चिकन बिरयानी खाई और यह अब तक की सबसे स्वादिष्ट चिकन बिरयानी थी!

EK404 دبي إلى سنغافورة 777ER300 14 أبريل 2014. غادرت متأخرًا بحوالي 30 دقيقة ولكنها وصلت في الوقت المحدد إلى سنغافورة. كانت الوجبة الممتازة لطاقم المقصورة ممتازة مع تجول الطاقم باستمرار حول الطائرة لتوزيع المشروبات والوجبات الخفيفة. الترفيه في الرحلة كان ممتازا. استغرقت الرحلة 8 ساعات فقط خلال النهار ولكن بفضل الخدمة و IFE مر الوقت.

Manchester to Perth business class. Experience from Manchester to Dubai was very disappointing. Boarding was chaotic and very disorganised the service from the young male attendants very poor. They had run out of my food choice and the business section was almost empty. The food I was given the seafood stew was inedible. The TV did not work a lady did move me but that was just an hour before we landed. All in all a bad experience. Considering the cost of the flight I have travelled with Emirates in economy and the service was better. Flight from Dubai to Perth was better the attendants were excellent - what a difference that made.

Washington Dulles (IAD) direct to Dubai. I have no complaints at all for this flight. My complaint comes from my return. Was at the airport (Dubai) 3 hours early. No problem going through security. I will just skip to the problem. Poor communication. We were delayed 7 hours yes 7 hours and no one to tell us anything. We sat on the plane for 3 hours before we were told the plane was being taken out of service. Sat at the gate for another 3 hours and still no word. We finally heard from passengers that had been inquiring that we needed to be at gate B32 from B18 and the plane will depart in an hour. Really. No one from the airlines said a word. Once we got on board there weren't any problems. Communication is key.
3 月 23 日乘坐 EK371 曼谷飛往迪拜。凌晨 1 點 55 分搭乘深夜航班飛往阿聯酋航空。工作人員非常棒，食物和飲料都很豐富，而且服務時總是面帶微笑。飛機不是太新，但是很乾淨，ICE 非常令人愉快。

Manchester to Clark (Manila North) via Dubai in Economy. Chose this route as my wife's family live very close to Clark airport and it's much easier than grappling with travel from Manila. Outbound to DXB on A380 very comfortable quiet and smooth with attentive service good food and plenty of new films to watch. Similarly DXB to CRK on B777 not as quiet but still reasonably comfortable. On return we were upgraded to Business on CRK/DXB leg (B777) excellent lie-flat seats with massage function brilliant service and food. DXB/MAN same A380 service as outbound. Everything ran either to time or early paid Â£550 each for the whole trip. Excellent.

Kolkata to Dubai before connecting to a British Airways flight to Heathrow and an onward connection to Austin Texas. Emirates staff at Kolkata airport upgraded me to business class. The food service and entertainment system was superb and I got a good nights sleep before my onward journey to the United States. The A330 was immaculate cabin crew friendly and well groomed and the airline was punctual and efficient.

Manchester to Christchurch via Dubai - 773ER out in Economy and had the best Economy food we have had on a plane. We are frequent flyers and this was excellent coupled with great crews and their entertainment system made a great flight. Trip back from Auckland was two A380's in Business and again we had good attentive crews and the usual level of service befitting their excellent product. Please keep up the good work re the food.

Perth to Dubai and then Dubai to Istanbul and return. Main problem is no water or drinks served until 4 hours into a 10.5 hr flight. Service awful. On board entertainment broken for one entire 10.5 hour leg of flight. Really terrible experience. Food was inedible apart from a salad on one of the legs.

Nairobi to Manchester via DXB and back. Having loyally used Emirates for the last couple of years I am extremely disappointed with EK719 DXB-NRB flight back home on 3rd Feb. As if the discomfort was not enough the seat pockets were a shambles torn and hanging. An attendant loudly said to a passenger in response as to why he doesn't take flight meals I totally agree with you on this. This while serving the rest of us. Such a pity really.

Sydney to Dubai. Treated myself to a Miles upgrade. What an experience. Huge individual pod pyjamas duvet and mattress. Kruger and Leuwin to drink caviar a long comfortable sleep - then a shower. A real treat.

曼谷飛往悉尼，2014 年 10 月 1 日 QF 8418 出發。經過大肆宣傳，非常令人失望。辦理登機手續是一個漫長而乏味的過程，我和我的妻子比托運行李限額多了幾公斤，不得不與他們爭論，讓我們兩個人多托運兩公斤。在曼谷登機很混亂。機上服務還不錯，只是我們的早餐缺少承諾的羊角麵包，當我們向機組人員提出這一點時，他們為我們找到了兩個冷的羊角麵包。我們不得不問了三次才給我們我們的悉尼入境卡。娛樂系統很棒。根據我們與阿聯酋航空的第一次經驗，我們不會推薦他們作為首選航空公司，因為還有更好的選擇。阿聯酋航空要么擴張速度過快，要么固步自封。

Kuala Lumpur to London Heathrow on 5th January 2014. The prices are reasonable and the service is quite good. 2 years ago I felt the attitude of the cabin crew was poor so I avoided the airline after that. The staff were not responding to calls and was even rude to passengers. This year I thought I'd use Emirates again. I rang my call button twice and both times it took them more than half an hour to respond. They just didn't seemed bothered about serving. The food was served very late. In summary Emirates is a good airline but they just need to buck up with the cabin crew service.

Cape Town to Bangkok-departed on time excellent IFE good quality food and drink. Airline staff seemed a bit scarce! But we're mostly engaging and friendly. Transit through Dubai is not a pleasure the airport is one of the most unsettling places to visit. Pity the airline and the airport are so different.

曼谷飛往悉尼。此前曾搭乘一家知名泰國航空公司的航班飛過這條航段 6 次。根據我們乘坐阿聯酋航空從悉尼飛往曼谷的航班，登機被延誤。至少這次登機口有廣播來解釋發生了什麼。晚餐的份量還不錯，但是平淡無味。菜單只提供 1 道菜可供選擇。那麼所謂的“早餐”只是一份小小的水果沙拉和一個麵包卷。我在上面提到的另一家航空公司的菜單上有 2 種菜餚可供選擇（晚餐和早餐）。早餐本身也是一頓豐盛的飯菜。機組人員似乎比悉尼至曼谷航線更有禮貌，儘管我仍然不會將他們描述為友好或熱情。他們送餐和水/茶/飲料等的速度有點慢。我認為機上娛樂非常好，有多種節目可供選擇。我想說兩家航空公司在這方面是平等的。他們確實分發了一個小洗漱用品包，非常方便，而其他航空公司則沒有這樣做。他們還給了我們的孩子一個小包，裡面有一些物品讓他有事可做。這是一個很好的舉措，也是其他航空公司沒有做到的。總而言之，我發現阿聯酋航空被高估了。這些機票比其他航空公司便宜了幾百美元，而且確實有一些其他航空公司沒有的小禮物。然而我認為這並不能彌補不舒服的座位和不友好的服務。

曼谷經慕尼黑飛往盧森堡。我們於2019 年1 月1 日直接通過漢莎航空預訂了航班。由於這是一次長途飛行，我們選擇了飛機（想要更新的飛機以更加舒適）並支付高級經濟艙座位的費用，以獲得額外的腿部空間並能夠選擇靠窗和靠島的座位，以免有人挨著。當時預訂和座位預訂已得到確認。 4 個月後，我們在漢莎航空應用程序上註意到，我們的預訂在沒有任何通知的情況下發生了以下更改 - 我們的座位在曼谷和慕尼黑之間發生了變化。 （分配的座位與預訂的座位不同）。我們的航班時間提前了近1小時，機型已更改（新A350改為舊A340 200）。飛機運營商已更改（從漢莎航空更改為 Sun Express），然後我們致電漢莎航空詢問情況，回復如下。第一次打電話時，我們被告知航班已轉移到另一家航空公司，我們應該直接聯繫他們（Sun Express），儘管我們直接通過漢莎航空預訂，但漢莎航空無法為我們提供任何進一步的幫助。第二個電話被告知這是漢莎航空的航班，但該飛機並未在該網站上列為使用的飛機。然後接線員說這是另一個接線員，我問是否有其他選擇。運營商為我們預訂了當天晚些時候的漢莎航空航班。然而，儘管詢問我們是否可以有類似的座位並被告知有空位（我們被告知我們可以隨後在網上預訂這些座位），但我們還是看到靠窗和島台的座位不可用。第三次致電時，我們被告知沒有靠窗和島式座位，並要求我們寫一份書面投訴。目前我們被告知這是由原飛機的維護問題引起的，其他人也受到了影響。第四次打電話（因為我們仍然沒有確認的預訂）我們再次打電話，被告知我們可以有一個靠窗的座位，但是當查看我們的確認信息時，我們被分配了14D 和14E，但在座位圖上這是一個島和中間的座位，不是靠窗的座位。第五次致電時，我們再次被告知我們的座位可以移至靠窗和島式座位，現在已分配到 14A 和 14C，但是當查看在線詳細信息時，我們了解到這可能不是靠窗的。根據我們的經驗，這遠遠低於我們在漢莎航空預訂時所期望和支付的客戶服務水平。

Vilnius to Singapore via Frankfurt. Flight crew are very professional. I really got all their attention and help. One of the best experiences so far. Touch screen TVs are very old. It was extremely annoying to use them. Moreover, it may bother the person sitting in front of you (or you may be the one who is bothered). I was sitting near to this woman who was playing Solitare on her screen and the man in front of her could not just relax watching the movie because of the constant poking to his seat. It even led to some tiny conflict in the end. People who like to enjoy alcohol during their flight, should definitely consider these airlines over the other ones, since they are serving alcohol drinks like beer, wine, cocktails on international flights for free. However, I found it the only difference in comparison to slightly cheaper airlines in regards to what you get on board for the price paid.
Prague to Frankfurt. Incredibly rude at gate. Took my carryon claiming it was oversized. Did not care that I was traveling internationally and needed items in the bag. Not customer friendly at all.

Frankfurt nach Valencia. Ich fliege seit 10 Jahren regelmäßig (mindestens 3 Mal im Jahr) mit Lufthansa und bin immer sehr zufrieden mit dem Service. Obwohl Lufthansa teurer ist als Billigfluggesellschaften, zahle ich den Aufpreis. Aber letztes Mal war es ganz anders. Lufthansa-Direktflüge von Frankfurt nach Valencia werden jetzt von Sunexpress durchgeführt. Das Flugzeug war sehr alt, die Sitze abgenutzt, das Netz zur Aufbewahrung der Magazine war zerrissen und das Flugzeug war sehr laut. Also bekamen wir für die übliche Lufthansa-Gebühr ein altes Flugzeug von einem Billigflieger. Es ist schade zu sehen, wie sie die Kosten auf Kosten des Kunden senken.

London to Vienna via Frankfurt. This review is for Mrs Darr from Lufthansa Customer Service in Frankfurt, a great person who did everything that was in her powers to help one of my friends change his flight only because the police in Frankfurt don't really know the law and didn't want to let 3 people go through passport control even though they are family. Everything ended well in the end but this lady went back and forward to help us with alternative routes so we can reach all of us the same destination. She was extremely patient and calm even when we were going absolutely crazy, because we were scared. Thank you again and you are going to be part of our memories as the lady who helped a lot! Hope you are going to read this! We really appreciate your efforts and your time!

Der Flug von München nach San Francisco hatte aufgrund technischer Probleme eine Verspätung von fast drei Stunden. Informationen waren alles andere als entgegenkommend. Das Ersatzflugzeug hatte Probleme mit dem Unterhaltungssystem und den Steckdosen am Sitz. Mehrere Neustarts der Systeme wurden durchgeführt, jedoch ohne Erfolg. Die Bordbesatzung versuchte, mit der defekten Hardware zurechtzukommen

Da Roma a Mumbai via Francoforte. Il volo da Roma a Francoforte era in ritardo di 20-25 minuti. Il personale di terra non si è assicurato che i passeggeri con volo in coincidenza con pochissimo tempo di trasferimento rimasto arrivassero in orario e potessero saltare la fila. C'era una lunga coda all'immigrazione. Il personale di terra non ha aiutato i passeggeri a procedere in fila. Almeno 50-60 passeggeri stavano correndo dal terminal A di Francoforte al terminal C per prendere il volo in coincidenza. Inoltre, il personale della sicurezza non garantirebbe che i passeggeri con volo possano procedere in fila. C'era molto caos e le persone che potevano correre correvano, ma le persone con disabilità o problemi dovevano sopportare molto stress per raggiungere l'aereo. Lufthansa deve lavorare su questo dove il problema è alla fine perché il loro volo in coincidenza era in ritardo. L'unica cosa buona che è successa è che hanno ritardato il decollo del volo in coincidenza. Ma tutti i passeggeri hanno dovuto subire molto stress mentale e fisico a causa di questa cattiva gestione

Copenhagen to Washington via Frankfurt. Flew the same route in Nov 18, and was pretty impressed. However, today's performance was far from stellar. First of all the LH website is probably from the 1980's, because it sure feels that way when using it. The long-haul flight was very average, to be generous. IFE did not work. The PA system worked in business class only. I had ordered an upgraded dining experience, and if I had been served what I had ordered, I would have been much happier. WiFi did not work onboard this time. What really made the whole thing bad is that everybody was confined to their seats for the last 2.5 hours of the flight due to very strong turbulence. I like Lufthansa, but if this is what they can offer, there are much better options.

Prague to Frankfurt. In Frankfurt I was chosen for a special security check without saying why. Then staff at the gate took my carry on luggage saying I'm not allowed to have it. On the airplane we had no option of more than one food.

Jeddah to Frankfurt. Got a seat in the very last row on this night flight. When the lights went off after we departed, I realized that the LH logo just behind my seat is illuminated by 4 extremely bright lights. No way to be able to sleep under these lights. I asked an attendant to switch off the lights. Waited for approx 5 mins, nothing happened, made another call, this time another attendant came. Asked again to switch off the lights, waited 5 mins, no result. I called the third time, then the former attendant appeared and told me that they cannot do anything about it. I asked for another seat, no seats available. Sort of apology, got a sleeping mask. For final approach and landing stage, the lights were switched off which made me feel like a complete idiot.

Seoul to Manchester via Frankfurt. As usual with Lufthansa the flight was pretty much full. Seoul to Frankfurt was ok, but the boarding gate was miles away from the check-in desk. The inflight vegetarian meals are rubbish. Pre-ordered, so they knew they were required. Ovo-lacto means any egg or dairy ingredients are fine, but to cut corners they seem to just serve everyone a bland vegan meal. Spaghetti with a tasteless red sauce. Spaghetti with an airline fork? Penne or fusilli maybe, but not spaghetti! Lufthansa obviously just don't care about vegetarian customers.

Frankfurt nach Valencia. Fliegende Lufthansa – Eine gute Fluggesellschaft. Die schlechteste Erfahrung bei allen Fluggesellschaften war die Nutzung digitaler Medien. Lufthansa (und der Frankfurter Flughafen) im Allgemeinen sind eine großartige Fluggesellschaft zum Fliegen, mit guten Flugzeugen, gut gewartet, großartigem Personal, sauberen, höflichen und effizienten Abläufen. Die Herausforderung ist ihr digitales Erlebnis. Bei einer so großen Fluggesellschaft bin ich schockiert darüber, wie schlecht ihre Websites und APPS sind. Die Geschwindigkeit ist so langsam, dass ich das Gefühl habe, in die Zeit des Einwahldienstes zurückversetzt zu sein. Sie scheinen so viele Seiten übereinander gelegt zu haben, dass man beim Klicken auf eine Schaltfläche 10 bis 15 Sekunden wartet, bis die nächste Seite geladen ist. Wenn Sie dann glauben, dass Sie es geladen haben, wird darüber eine andere Ebene geladen und der Bildschirm wird verschoben, sodass Sie nach dem suchen müssen, was Sie gerade getan haben. Ich habe kürzlich einen einfachen Flug von Frankfurt nach Valencia gebucht und die Online-Buchung dauerte über 30 Minuten. Ich habe es dann mit der APP probiert – konnte es letztendlich nicht mehr in der APP buchen, weil ich immer wieder rausgeschmissen wurde. Ich weiß nicht, ob das an den Anforderungen an die Internetsicherheit liegt oder daran, dass die Leute, die das Lufthansa-Internet und die APPS entwickelt haben, inkompetent sind. Das weckt in mir den Wunsch, mit anderen Fluggesellschaften zu fliegen. Das Web-Erlebnis von KLM ist schnell und einfach.
曼谷飛往法蘭克福。豪華經濟艙的價格幾乎是普通經濟艙的兩倍，但優勢（實際的和感知的）與價格差異並不成正比。是的，我們的腿部空間稍大一些，球場比經濟艙稍大一些，屏幕稍大一些，我們還收到了一個小（但很好）的便利套件。食物應該放在瓷器裡，但所有的托盤都只是放在盤子上，而不是放在托盤上，我沒有註意到食物質量的差異。總而言之，這是對金錢的嚴重浪費。

Da Milano a Denver via Monaco/Francoforte. Mentre il servizio a bordo era leggermente al di sopra della media, ho avuto un'esperienza orribile come cliente all'aeroporto di Monaco. Servizio disattento da parte del personale del gate incurante riguardo al mio bagaglio registrato in transito tra un volo LH in ritardo dagli Stati Uniti e un volo successivo LH diretto in Italia. Per finire, il personale mi ha dato indicazioni che si sono rivelate imprecise per quanto riguarda le procedure di oggetti smarriti all'aeroporto di arrivo. Ho fallito un reclamo sul sito web di LH che hanno inoltrato al direttore della stazione di Monaco.

Von Frankfurt nach Bengaluru. Schreckliche Erfahrung mit dieser Fluggesellschaft. Ich habe den Premium-Economy-Sitzplatz (2-Sitzer-Konfiguration am Ende) gekauft und 20 Stunden zuvor einen Online-Check-in durchgeführt. In der mittleren 4-Sitzer-Konfiguration bekam ich jedoch einen Mittelsitz. Ich fand das Essen, das dort serviert wird, dürftig, und die Medieninhalte waren für mich eher ein nachträglicher Einfall. Lässt zu wünschen übrig.

Bangalore to Keflavik via Frankfurt. The upgrade from economy to premium economy is misleading. When looking at how to upgrade, no mention is made that upgrade only includes the seat and not additional baggage. I have never seen this on another airline. It is listed in fine print in one of the subsections. We read the instructions on how to upgrade many times and we never saw this. It took 5 Lufthansa staff 20 minutes to find it - yet we were supposed to have seen it? When asked if we could then just go back to economy class, they could not refund our money. Great way for Lufthansa to make short term money and lose long term customers. We ended up having to pay $473 dollars in luggage. You lost us.

Da Venezia a Dusseldorf via Francoforte. Siamo finiti con Lufthansa dopo la cancellazione di un volo Eurowings ed è facile notare la differenza: più spazio per le gambe e una bevanda e uno spuntino gratuiti. Ottime informazioni dall'abitacolo e sorvolato le Alpi in poco più di un'ora. Cambiare a Francoforte è una seccatura poiché LH utilizza i terminal A e B che sono molto distanti l'uno dall'altro. Breve salto a Dusseldorf. Niente bevande ma con 25 minuti questo volo è semplicemente troppo breve. Ancora la mia compagnia aerea preferita.

عمان إلى فرانكفورت. كانت الطائرة قذرة ، والمقاعد بالكاد تناسب مراهقًا ، والمعاملة من قبل الموظفين تشبه الماشية. درجة الأعمال هي في الأساس اقتصادية مع وجود مقعد فارغ في المنتصف. بالإضافة إلى كل ذلك ، رحلة مدتها خمس ساعات بدون وسائل ترفيه على متن الطائرة. لا تضيع أموالك في السفر مع شركة الطيران هذه.

Birmingham to Bangkok via Frankfurt. Contract lounge that Lufthansa uses is the worst at Birmingham by a mile. It was too full when we visited with few spare seats and all the hot food options had run out. Flight to Frankfurt reasonable but it really is just economy class with the middle seat missing. There's nothing business class about this part of the journey. Transfer at Frankfurt pleasantly easy but boarding for the BKK flight quite chaotic. The flight itself was full but fantastic. We were served by the same Bangkok based crew member throughout, she was really friendly and professional, 10/10. Food was great, all choices available. I found the seats really comfortable and managed over 6 hours of good sleep. Can't criticise anything about this flight, just wish Lufthansa would bring their short haul up to a similar level.

Von Frankfurt nach Bahrain zurück in der Premium Economy. Die Bestuhlung der A330 ist eine 2x3x2-Anordnung mit viel Beinfreiheit und etwas breiteren Sitzen als in der Economy Class. Ein kleines Pflegeset, eine Wasserflasche und ein Begrüßungsgetränk aus Plastikglas wurden bereitgestellt. Kurz nach dem Start wurde ein Barservice angeboten, gefolgt von einem Mittagessen, das in Ordnung war, und einem Snack kurz vor der Landung. Auf meinem Rückflug gab es ein leckeres Sandwich und später ein warmes Frühstück. Das Rührei mit Tandoori-Hähnchenbrust schien eine ziemlich seltsame Kombination zu sein und war eher langweilig. Der Touchscreen-IFE-Monitor an der Rückenlehne war einfach zu bedienen und bot eine begrenzte Auswahl an alten und neuen Filmen. Die Besatzung war zwar höflich und professionell, aber uninteressant, obwohl sich nur acht Passagiere in der PE-Kabine befanden. Was den Sitz selbst betrifft, so machten ein paar Zentimeter Neigungsverstellung, Fußstütze und verstellbare Kopfstütze die Reise für den sechsstündigen Flug nach Riad mit einem 45-minütigen Zwischenstopp und weiter nach Bahrain sehr komfortabel. Ich habe diesen Flug in beide Richtungen sehr genossen. Obwohl die Reise über Frankfurt länger ist, war sie viel besser (und günstiger) als ein Nonstop-PE-Flug. Und der Preis war auch äußerst angemessen.

London to Frankfurt Business Class. I usually don't pay inflated prices for European Business Class flights, where it's just the economy seat with the empty middle seat. But I was on Premium Economy for the long haul part from Frankfurt to Bahrain, and was offered an upgrade to Business Class for the short haul sectors for a very low fee, which I took. And I was not disappointed. On boarding, I was greeted with a smile. The flight attendants were professional but not necessarily engaging, although they did address me by my name. No hot towel, welcome drink or IFE. But the food was excellent in both directions, considering it's an hours flight. Outbound was a tasty cereal with fruits and on return, a delicious tuna salad with hot bread and premium brand bar service, with refills. I really enjoyed these flights and was impressed with the good service. The seats, though hardly any leg room, surprisingly felt comfortable too. Both flights were on time. But I still would avoid paying Business Class fares on European routes. Checking prices (two days prior to departure), I noticed that the BC flight LHR-Frankfurt-LHR was only little cheaper than the fare from LHR-Bahrain-LHR on Premium Economy! I rated Value For Money as good, only as I was offered a good price for an upgrade.

Vienna to Frankfurt as a connecting flight. If you are flying with a star alliance airline from Vienna airport, during the check in procedure or any concerns still at the airport, you will be served from the Austrian airlines team, which is treating you with not a good customer service. Boarding was really funny as usual when they call first who has priority line, such as business Hon circle and Senator, itÂ´s ending up that also economy class passengers can just queue with them and skip the line, as it was this time. Once in the plane, an A319-100, the welcome was really German and polite from the cabin crew. The seats were nice, actually comfortable with a small but good place also for the legs. As it was just a short, 1h 20 minutes flight of course they passed with some sandwiches and beverages, but they offered you how many beverages you wanted and as I was really hungry I asked the hostess if they had some sandwiches left and after literally two minutes with no hesitation she brought me two sandwiches, with a big smile in the face! I had an overall pleasant short flight.

Manchester to Seoul via Munich. Return leg, with stop over in Munich for 4 days. Man to Munich was uneventful, standard A321, Snack was OK, seating as per economy with spare seat in middle empty. Service was ok. Munich to ICN on 8 month old A350, flight was on time. Seating the same as 747-400. Amenities kit poor. Food was stone cold, choice of wines limited to two red and two white. My choice of main was not available (or none left ). Flight was 90% full. Kids meal was OK as was amenity pack for kids. Service was okay, WiFi poor.

Miami to Munich. How Lufthansa is a 5 star airline has always baffled me but this time I really got the confirmation. I will not blame them for the 3 hours we spent on the plane before departing on our outwards trip (MUC-MIA), there was heavy snowfall in Munchen and we had to wait for the runways to be cleared and the plane to be deiced. However, during those 3 hours there was no service at all. I wasn't expecting much, but a glass of water would have been nice though. Now, the A380s cabin is seriously outdated. And even though it's clear that the plane we flew on recently underwent a C-check, being repainted in the new livery, the didn't bother retrofitting the cabin, so you get a 10 year old in-flight entertainment system. The touch screen barely works, it's slow to respond and responds only to every 3rd of 4th command. And on the inbound leg (MIA-MUC) the control keys (volume, channel, reading lights) didn't work at all. The IFE also froze and reset several times. On the outbound flight some passengers had the IFE not working at all and although they announced on the PA systems that they reset it several times, it didn't solve the problem. We also landed with the cabin light on (they should have been turned down) due to the same electrical problem. The seats are quite uncomfortable and the pitch in economy is just bearable and there are large metal containers protruding in the leg area. I have flown on low cost airlines which had the same seat pitch. There were no amenity kits provided, which if I'm not mistaken, should be provided by a 5 star airline, even in economy (I have flown on ones that do). The food is also nothing to brag about, it's half decent but certainly expected more from such a prestigious airline. On our backward trip the crew arrived late (but again, not their fault since there was an accident and a traffic jam), however the boarding process was a total mess. People aligned according to their seat numbers, but then they decided to randomly close lanes and just board people wherever. There wasn't even a boarding announcement, just for first and business class. When they started boarding Economy and Economy Premium they just opened two random lanes. This meant that no one really knew what's going on and the random boarding made the boarding time unnecessarily long for such a large plane (people in the back which should have been first ended up waiting for people in the front to sit down, who should have been boarded last). The crew however is pleasant, smiles and does a good job. The pilots also seemed professional and seemed to have everything under control, despite quite rough turbulence at times. At least this time our bags arrived safe, this is a miracle for Lufthansa since they managed to break 2 trolleys on my previous flights. In conclusion, definitely not a 5 star airline and regret choosing them over the other 5 star airline with which I could have flown (despite the fact that my flight time to MIA would have been an hour longer since they operate from a different hub and would have had other connecting flights).

Barcelona a Munich con la tarifa Eco-Light. El agente de la puerta seleccionó a los pasajeros para facturar el equipaje debido a que el vuelo estaba casi completo. Tenía un equipaje, fui seleccionado al azar para verificar su tamaño y peso, aunque muchos otros eran mucho más grandes. Tuve que someterme a su proceso de pesaje y descargar mi equipaje por debajo de los 8 kg con un equipaje medio vacío y el resto del contenido se transfirió a una mochila que tenía en el equipaje antes de poder llevar el equipaje a bordo. Si el propósito era reducir la cantidad de equipaje de mano y seleccionar pasajeros al azar, lo más profesional sería decirles a los pasajeros que ese era el motivo.

曼谷經法蘭克福飛往倫敦。漢莎航空商務機票2送1優惠。航班完全由 LH 運營。晚上在曼谷辦理入住。櫃檯的實習生忘記給我們安全/移民的快速通行卡，這真是一件痛苦的事，因為這是曼谷一個非常繁忙的夜晚，所以我們不得不回去辦理登機手續以取卡。安全/移民快速高效。登機準時開始，而且速度非常快。毯子和枕頭已經在座位上等著了，不久之後就分發了洗漱包和迎賓飲料。酒吧的訂單是在起飛前接受的，但晚餐訂單是在安全帶指示燈關閉後才接受的。儘管如此，這頓晚餐在起飛後僅90分鐘內就完成了。食物還可以，但沒什麼特別的。這個座位雖然缺乏隱私，而且不全是過道通道，但必須是我坐過的最舒適的座位。無論是坐著、躺著還是選擇“放鬆”的位置，座位都很棒。娛樂系統很棒且易於使用，提供精選的電影和電視節目。著陸前提供的早餐雖然還不錯，但可能是這次旅行中最不好吃的一餐。初衷是好的，但整道菜最終變得非常乾燥和無聊。工作人員非常缺乏描述性，因為他們只是走走過場，雖然並不不友好，但他們似乎根本沒有參與，這是一個非常容易被遺忘的工作人員。準時降落在法蘭克福。 FRA-LHR 很準時，是一次非常普通的歐洲內部商務艙旅行。這裡的機組人員比長途機組人員要好得多，因為他們在短途航班上很有趣、很有魅力，並且渴望取悅他人。

Von München nach Miami. Insgesamt war die Reise ok. Die Konfiguration der Sitze im Flugzeug ist im Vergleich zu anderen Fluggesellschaften mit demselben Flugzeug etwas zu komprimiert. Es gibt keine Privatsphäre zwischen den Sitzen und der Komfort des Kissens war eine wirklich böse Überraschung, nicht das, was ich von einem Business-Class-Sitz erwartet hatte. Der Service an Bord entspricht den Erwartungen, sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. Der WLAN-Service kostet zusätzliches Geld, selbst bei einem Business-Class-Ticket oder für Mitglieder von Miles&More, was enttäuschend ist. Beginnend bei 7 EUR nur für die langsame Verbindung und bis zu 29 EUR für die Premium-Verbindung. Angesichts des hohen Ticketpreises hätte es kostenlos sein können. Die Unterhaltung ist ok, nichts Besonderes. Der Bildschirm ist ziemlich klein und befindet sich nicht in einer sehr bequemen Position. Die Auswahl an Filmen ist gut, auch die Möglichkeit, die externen Kameras anzusehen.

Seoul to Manchester via Frankfurt. Lufthansa cannot be compared to other 5-Star Airlines and is a poor relation. The first leg was in a 20 year old 747-400, although clean, it is showing its age. Wifi did not work. The food choice was poor and poorly presented, the wine list consists of two reds and two whites, both very average. The seat comfort was not good and the placement of the screen disturbs neighbour who may wish to sleep. Frankfurt airport is a mess. Second flight on a A320 Neo, was not better, seats very thin? Business class seats same as economy but with middle seat empty, same legroom as economy. Buy two economy would be cheaper. Snack served. Ticket was keenly priced though.

Frankfurt nach Nairobi. Unser Flug UA 58 von SFO kam mit Verspätung in Frankfurt an, was dazu führte, dass meine Schwester und ich von einem Ende des Terminals zum anderen rennen mussten. Ich bin 75 Jahre alt und meine Schwester 67. Als wir an der Sicherheitskontrolle ankamen, verstärkten die Wachen die Verspätung, sodass wir unseren Anschlussflug nach Nairobi verpassten. Dann wurde uns mitgeteilt, dass der nächste verfügbare Kampf am nächsten Tag zur gleichen Zeit stattfinden würde. Wir mussten den gesicherten Bereich verlassen, um das Personal zu kontaktieren und unseren Flug zu verschieben, was an sich schon ein Albtraum war. Als wir beim „Kundenservice“ ankamen, buchte der Agent uns auf einen Flug nach Heathrow und weiter nach Nairobi mit Kenya Air um. Wir kamen am nächsten Morgen um 05:00 Uhr in Nairobi an, nachdem wir einen sehr langen Flug in einen viel längeren Flug umgewandelt hatten. Die letzte Etappe unseres Fluges führte von Kapstadt nach Frankfurt und dann weiter nach SFO. Aufgrund des verpassten Fluges zu Beginn der Reise konnte meine Schwester nicht online einchecken, um ihre Flugbuchung zu sichern. Nach vielen frustrierenden Anrufen bei Ihrer 866-Nummer und einem Gespräch mit jemandem, der kein Englisch verstand, zogen wir uns für den Abend zurück und riefen am nächsten Tag erneut an und sprachen schließlich mit jemandem, der uns bei der Bestätigung unseres Fluges half, und meine Schwester konnte dann einchecken online. Ich habe keine Ahnung, wie hoch meine Mobiltelefongebühr für den Anruf sein wird, aber das hätte vermieden werden können, wenn der Fehler nicht gleich zu Beginn gemacht worden wäre und wenn Sie jemanden beauftragen, der sicherstellt, dass er vollkommen klares Englisch spricht. Ich werde künftig auf die Buchung von Flügen bei Lufthansa verzichten. Dies ist das erste Mal, dass ich eine Bewertung schreibe, aber ich habe in den letzten 10 Reisejahren noch nie so schlechte Erfahrungen mit einer Fluggesellschaft gemacht.

Dallas to Amman via Frankfurt. It's our first time using Lufthansa Air Line, really it was a very nice trip, we enjoy it very much. Ground Service Manager in Dallas DFW Airport, was very nice and cooperative. He was so nice to all passengers. We recommend to use Lufthansa Air Line, they are very nice and professional.
Luanda to Rome via Frankfurt. Everything is cheap

Timisoara to London via Munich. I was going to fly during heavy snow and was expecting to miss my connecting flight from Munich to London. That meant I had to spend a night in Munich since all of the flights to London that day were fully booked. Lufthansa was very helpful with free accomodation, transport to and from the hotel and a 25 euro dinner voucher. They also bumped up my flight class, meaning that I received more miles (for Miles&More programme) that I would normally get for a european flight.

Von Frankfurt nach San Diego am 27. Januar 2019. Der Business-Class-Bereich verfügte über zwei Toiletten, von denen eine bereits vor unserer Abreise aus Frankfurt mit Klebeband als funktionsunfähig verschlossen war. Es gab also nur eine Betriebstoilette. Der Purser erlaubte uns in der Business Class, eine Toilette im vorderen Teil des Flugzeugs zu benutzen. Leider wollte der Flugkapitän diese Toilette für sich nutzen und verbot den Passagieren, sie zu benutzen. Daher begnügten sich die Passagiere mit den langen Warteschlangen an den anderen Toiletten. Schlechter Service und Egoismus. Das hätte ich von einem Lufthansa-Kapitän nicht erwartet.

Krakow to Frankfurt. Very good airline with excellent service. Everything was on time and well organized. All of the employees I came in contact were great to deal with. Definitely will fly with them again.

Frankfurt nach Delhi. Schlechteste Erfahrung mit dieser Fluggesellschaft. Zum ersten Mal bei Lufthansa gebucht und zum ersten Mal mein Gepäck verloren. Ich habe versucht, sie regelmäßig anzurufen. Wir geben unser Bestes. Und nachdem ich 12 Tage lang eine Antwort erhalten habe, ist diese verloren gegangen.

Belgrade to Barcelona via Munich. After delay of 1st flight, 25min, I had to run through passport check, scanner, literally left without air, and reached for next flight, where passenger were already boarding. Sit in the plane and started to wait take off, quite thirsty, as there were no time to buy water. The sitting in plane was 1 hour. Wanted to go to toilet, and drink water. At the end, another lady asked for water, and she was provided. After her, I asked as well as I tried to explain my situation, but response was quite rude, without even listening me at all. Totally disappointed from Lufthansa and particularly services. Two flights- two delays and rude attitude.

New York to Tehran via Frankfurt. On international flights, on one of the routes, you are allowed two 23kg luggage and for the rest you have to pay. The information on the website is very confusing, they have routing sections, and numbers but no clear explanation from point A to B. So, I called the customer service number and asked what the cost would be. She took my reservation number, checked the flight and came back with the quote that it would cost $125.00 Fast forward, at the airport, at the checking counter, looking to checkin the extra bag and we are asked to pay $230. Obviously at this point, there is nothing you can do, except pay. Anyway, there was no reasoning, so I paid. Then I wrote a complaint. After two weeks of no reply and sending two emails, I got a canned response.

Von Frankfurt nach Dublin. Meine erste schlechte Erfahrung mit der Crew am Gate beim Boarding. Der Typ überprüfte meinen Reisepass (schwedisch), blätterte ihn durch und stellte eine Kontrollfrage, die ich beantwortete. Aber er blätterte noch eine Weile darin herum, zeigte es dem Mann neben sich und stellte ihm Fragen. Ich habe zweimal nach dem Problem gefragt

São Paulo para Dublin via Frankfurt. Reservei o voo por telefone em euros, tudo bem, a senhora me disse que seria confirmado em 4 horas, meu voo sairia 20 horas após a reserva, então queria fazer o check-in o mais rápido possível para poder reservar um assento ao lado de minha esposa para um vôo de 12 horas. 10 horas depois não foi confirmado, então liguei para o atendimento ao cliente, disseram que seria prioritário e confirmado imediatamente, 2 horas depois ainda não foi chamado de volta e disseram que eles tinham que cobrar meu cartão em USD então iria para a lista de prioridades e confirmaria "imediatamente"! 1 hora depois ainda não estava confirmado, liguei de volta e fui informado de que eles definitivamente resolveriam o problema agora e estariam prontos em minutos. 2 horas depois ligou de volta para ser informado por uma mulher muito rude que a reserva foi cancelada e se tiver que ir ao aeroporto para pagar o voo, ela não se desculpou e não se sentiu responsável pelo fato de o único A maneira como descobri que foi cancelado foi ligando para eles! Cheguei ao aeroporto o mais rápido possível para saber que nosso voo havia sido cancelado e que não havia mais assentos no avião. Tive que ir para outra companhia aérea e comprar um voo por € 4000 que só saiu por 7 horas! Nunca estive tão emocionalmente estressado na minha vida. Evite a companhia aérea Lufthansa, se puder. Vou dar 1 classificação porque o primeiro cara do atendimento ao cliente foi legal e sabia que eles estavam errados.

Denver to Munich. Horrible service, huge delays, incorrect titles on checkin and boarding displays. Lost my luggage upon arrival in Dusseldorf. The lady on the baggage tracing counter took 30 minutes to process 3 customers. had absolutely no regard for people standing in line, kept on working without acknowledging the people waiting.

Leipzig nach Frankfurt. Ich habe nur einen Tag vor dem Boardingtag eine Flugannullierungsbenachrichtigung erhalten und wurde dann automatisch auf einen anderen Flug umgebucht, der mehr als 6 Stunden Verspätung hatte! So dass ich mein Ziel spät in der Nacht statt am Nachmittag erreichen musste.

Von Frankfurt nach Denver. Altes Flugzeug, alte Steckdosen, 2x3x2 Sitzkonfiguration. Unhöfliche Stewardess, kein Service mit Lächeln. Essensauswahl: mittelmäßig, es gab keine Speisen mehr, aber der Champagner war sehr gut. Der Pilot war informativ, pünktlich abgereist, Unterhaltungsangebot.

عمان إلى فرانكفورت. كانت هذه رحلة ليلية. كانت درجة الأعمال عبارة عن مقاعد اقتصادية مع ترك المقعد الأوسط شاغرًا. قامت المضيفة بتمريرة واحدة في الساعة الأولى ولم نرها مرة أخرى. اخترت مقعدًا على الممر ، وقمت بتسجيل الوصول بمقعد بجانب الممر ، وصعدت إلى الطائرة وكان لدي مقعد بجوار النافذة. كانت هناك امرأتان في مقدمة الطائرة ، وكان لكلانا مقاعد بجوار النافذة. اختارت المرأة الأخرى أيضًا مقعدًا على الممر. كانت المرأتان الوحيدتان في قسم من ثلاثة مقاعد مع راكب آخر. وجهت انتباه شركة Lufthansa إلى هذا الأمر وقالوا إنهم لا يضمنون أن المقعد الذي تطلبه هو المقعد الذي تحصل عليه. ثم أوضحت مخاوفي فيما يتعلق بالنساء ، وتجاهلوا مرة أخرى هذا الجزء من سؤالي ، وذكروني أنهم قد تناولوا سؤالي بالفعل - لا توجد ضمانات بأن أي شخص سيحصل على المقعد الذي اختاره.

München nach Prag. Fehlerfreier Flug mit betrieblicher Effizienz und Gastfreundschaft an Bord. Für diesen weniger als einstündigen Flug mussten wir mit dem Bus zu einem Mittelfeldstandort zum Flugzeug fahren. Wir ließen unsere Tragetaschen auf dem Wagen auf dem Rollfeld. Beim Einsteigen in das Flugzeug wurden wir von einer Flugbegleiterin begrüßt, die jedem einen Schokoladenkeks anbot – eine herzliche Begrüßung! Die Sitzplätze waren im 2x2-Format angeordnet. Ankündigungen erfolgten neben anderen Sprachen auch auf Englisch. Ein Wagen mit kostenlosen Getränken kam vorbei. Ich erspähte Bierflaschen, erkundigte mich nach dem Preis und griff nach meiner Brieftasche. Die Flugbegleiterin sagte, dass es keine Gebühr gäbe, und sagte dann nachdrücklich: „Ich lade Sie ein, ein Bier zu trinken“, öffnete damit eine Flasche, goss etwas in einen Plastikbecher und stellte Flasche und Becher auf mein Tablett . Im Handumdrehen waren wir pünktlich am Boden. Ein Bus wartete bereits darauf, uns zum Terminal zu bringen. Unser abgegebenes Gepäck war bereits ausgeladen und wir holten es ab, als wir in den Bus stiegen, um zum Terminal zu gelangen. Dieser Lufthansa-Flug hat gezeigt, wie ein Flugerlebnis so routinemäßig angenehm sein kann. Gut gemacht!

Berlin nach München, mit Anschlussflug nach Pisa. Keine vorherige Warnung vor Verzögerungen, wir blieben alle bis zur letzten Minute im Dunkeln. Es gab eine 40-minütige Verspätung, aber als alle eingestiegen waren und wir zum Abflug bereit waren, war es anderthalb Stunden später. Das bedeutete, dass ich 20 Minuten nach dem geplanten Abflug meines Anschlussflugs nach Pisa ankommen würde und es auf diesem Flug keine Verspätung gab. In München wurde uns gesagt, wir sollten zum Lufthansa-Servicecenter gehen, dort gab es etwa 20 Schreibtische, von denen nur 3 für eine Warteschlange von 40-50 Personen besetzt waren. Mir wurde gesagt, ich könne entweder einen Flug nach Frankfurt nehmen, wo ich auf eine Warteliste für einen Flug nach Florenz gesetzt würde, oder ich könnte in einem Hotel untergebracht werden. Da ich es eilig hatte, diesen Flughafen zu verlassen, entschied ich mich für einen Flug nach Frankfurt. Dieser Flug hatte eine Stunde Verspätung. Ich habe keine Essens- oder Getränkegutscheine erhalten, außer einem 60-Cent-Lebkuchenplätzchen. Auf den Flügen von Berlin nach München und von München nach Frankfurt gab es keine Verpflegung. Um die Sache noch schlimmer zu machen, war der Service schrecklich. Als ich eine Flugbegleiterin fragte, ob sie mir Auskunft darüber geben könnte, ob mein Anschlussflug pünktlich abfliegen würde, machte sie einen Witz und sagte: „Diese Verspätungen betreffen auch mich, da ich heute zwei Stunden mehr arbeiten muss.“ . Dies ist das letzte Mal, dass ich einen Lufthansa-Flug betrete.

London to Budapest via Munich. Lufthansa just ruined our Xmas! First leg delayed and they rebooked us for a flight almost a complete day after the original was supposed to fly out. Now dumped to the airport waiting for a bus that supposed to take us to an hotel.

Frankfurt nach Amsterdam. Mein Flug von Lyon nach Frankfurt hatte Verspätung und so verpasste ich meinen Anschlussflug von Frankfurt nach Mexiko. Ich habe stundenlang darüber nachgedacht, wie ich zum Servicecenter komme, und als ich endlich dort ankam, gaben sie mir eine „Entschädigung“ mit einer Nacht in einem Hotel. Am nächsten Tag buchten sie mir einen Flug von Frankfurt nach Amsterdam und von dort nach Mexiko, aber überraschenderweise hatte auch der erste Flug Verspätung. Ehrlich gesagt, was ist mit dieser Fluggesellschaft los? Ich werde nie wieder mit Lufthansa fliegen. Ich war die ganze Zeit zu früh am Flughafen und an den Gates, da es zu einer dummen Verspätung kam und ich dadurch einen weiteren Flug verpasste.

London to Munich. Always been a very passionate Lufthansa customer. The flight from London is quite often delayed so an hour delay was nothing to be surprised. It always is a very busy flight, especially during the run up to Christmas and/or on Sundays, and I was made to sit with my carry on luggage, handbag, duty free shipping and coat at my seat. Cabin crew showed no intent to help me with finding any space for the carry on.

Chicago to Belgrade via Frankfurt. Flights were fine but customer service was seriously lacking. We were initially delayed in Chicago for a day due to weather conditions. We confirmed with (and were assured by) Lufthansa staff that our baggage would arrive with us in Belgrade before we left on our Chicago flight. After a layover in Frankfurt we finally arrived in Belgrade. Of course, our luggage did not arrive as initially confirmed. We talked to airport staff and expressed our concern as our wedding attire was in the luggage and we were having our ceremony the following weekend. After dealing with airport staff we were sent home and told we would be contacted when our luggage arrived. Three days later we were told our bags had showed up but due to customs we would have to drive the 3 hours back to Belgrade to retrieve them. After another day of our trip lost and a few hundred dollars in gas, tolls, and customs fees, we finally had our clothes. When we returned to the US we filed a claim for the hardship and money lost due to their delays. We have been going back and forth for a couple months now with an endless string of emails requesting that we submit more and more documents and receipts and whatnot. What a nightmare this has been dealing with their customer service team. This should be a simple case with some financial consideration for losing our luggage for 3 days. Very disappointed and hesitant to fly with them again.

Tokio naar München. Dit is de 3e keer dat ik naar Japan ging en de tweede keer dat ik met Lufthansa vlieg. De service is goed en de bemanning is vriendelijk en zorgt voor je. Soms zijn ze een beetje koud, zoals Duitse mensen kunnen zijn. Het nieuwe vliegtuig was echt goed en mijn stoel had genoeg beenruimte. De piloot stelt ons op ons gemak en probeert turbulenties boven de Japanse zee te vermijden. De connectiviteit moet worden verbeterd en mogelijk had de wifi-verbinding in de Lufthansa-app kunnen worden opgenomen en niet in een andere app. USB-voeding voor alle stoelen. Maaltijd is een beetje te pittig voor mij, maar smaakte echt goed.

Boston to Frankfurt on a Boeing 747 business class on the upper deck. Intimate atmosphere there with 2-2 configuration. Fortunately not all seats are occupied and my neighbor seat remained empty. The cabin staff on this flight was very attentive. Professional service is to be excepted from Lufthansa but here it was more then that. I enjoyed the flight. I would never rate Lufthansa with full points due to the seat. They have to change this narrow thing with no sufficient storage possibilities.

Hannover nach Barcelona über Frankfurt. Gemischte Erfahrung. Selbst für den Kurzflug HAJ-FRA wurden Snacks (vorher) und Getränke (kalt und heiß) während des Fluges verteilt. FAs sehr freundlich. Für FRA-BCN wurden die berühmten LH-Sandwiches (auf Wunsch auch mehrere) sowie Getränke verteilt. Durchweg moderne Kabine, aber wenig Polsterung und kein IFE. Kein USB-Ladegerät. Von LH würde ich mehr erwarten. Ich hatte noch einen Anschlussflug mit einer anderen Fluggesellschaft und mein Gepäck kam nicht am Zielort an. Mir wurde gesagt, dass es in FRA gefunden wurde und auf dem Weg zu meinem Standort ist. Somit schien LH es aus unbekannten Gründen zurückgelassen zu haben. Ich musste ein paar Sachen kaufen und LH erstattete mir das Geld, ohne nach Rechnungen zu fragen. Ich würde diese beiden Flüge sicher nicht bei LH buchen, weil sie einfach zu teuer sind.

Pula to Toronto via Frankfurt. The flight from Pula, Croatia was delayed and therefore we (group of 7) missed our connecting flight. Since I needed assistance for my husband (wheel-chair bound and 80 years old), we were separated from our group. While four of our travelling friends were offered dinner and breakfast vouchers, hotel accommodations and taxi chits to and from the hotel, my husband, myself and a friend who had followed us, slept in a corner of the hotel, no food, no hotel, no consideration given to age and special needs. I contacted Lufthansa twice! The first time they told me to send my complaint to Croatia Airlines, even though they have paid for our friends expenses. The second time I wrote they offered me 2 duty free vouchers for 50 euros on their flight. What makes them think I will travel with them again even though this is the airline we always used to get back home in Pula, Croatia! If you are elderly, and/or need assistance, think twice about flying Lufthansa!

Toulouse à Munich. Cela fait deux fois que j'ai des soucis avec cette compagnie, mais je dois la prendre depuis Toulouse pour rejoindre les aéroports de départ. Cette fois, ils m'ont forcé à acheter un billet d'avion hors du territoire thaïlandais, sinon je ne pourrais pas monter à bord. Ils ont dit qu'à Munich, l'autre compagnie qui m'emmènerait en Asie, me demanderait ce billet ! Quand j'en ai parlé à l'autre compagnie, Qatar Airways, tout le monde a ri. Cependant, j'ai été obligé d'acheter un billet à 50 euros, non remboursable pour rien ! L'année dernière, l'avion était parti en avance, sans moi, en m'envoyant un SMS sans lien internet pour que je puisse me servir. Ils me dédommagent en voulant m'offrir une carte SD de 32gigas valant des points de fidélité ! Honte à Lufthansa. J'espère sincèrement que d'autres entreprises prendront le relais de Toulouse, car nous sommes prisonniers avec cette entreprise.

Von Frankfurt nach Los Angeles. Eher enttäuschend und durchschnittliche Business-Class. Die Business-Class-Sitze im A380 sind nicht sehr bequem (sehr wenig Privatsphäre und sehr wenig Platz zum Aufbewahren von Gegenständen oder zum Abstellen von Getränken usw.). Das Essen war schlecht und nicht ausreichend (nach dem Flug hatte ich Hunger). Der Service war freundlich, konnte die Mängel des Business-Class-Produkts jedoch nicht beheben. Ich ging in die Senator Lounge am Flughafen FRA, die ebenfalls durchschnittlich ist und nicht viel Auswahl beim Frühstück/Essen bietet. Das Lufthansa-Produkt ist dem von Singapore Airlines deutlich unterlegen, ich würde Lufthansa eine 3-Sterne-Bewertung geben. Sie haben viel Arbeit, um ihr Produkt zu verbessern.

London to Frankfurt in May 2018. Lufthansa has gone downhill for customer service. Don't bother phoning their contact centre or e-mailing for help. Feedback functionality seems to be down on the website. I got a lot of standard scripted answers but no help. Very disappointed.

Von Berlin nach Lissabon über Frankfurt. Lufthansa ist gut. Aber der Flug von Tegel hatte etwas Verspätung und da die Transitzeit in Frankfurt kurz war, fragte ich, wann wir landen würden, und die Antwort, die ich bekam, war „Ich weiß nicht“. Der Flugbegleiter sagte mir auch, er könne fragen, aber unter solchen Umständen wäre es schön, bereits über solche Informationen zu verfügen, nach denen auch andere Passagiere gefragt hätten. Der Flug in Frankfurt hatte jedenfalls auch Verspätung. Trotzdem war das Personal sehr nett, der Service war gut. Die Flugzeuge waren auch großartig.

Frankfurt nach Berlin. Sehr nettes Personal, aber ein etwas heruntergekommenes Flugzeug. Für einen einstündigen Flug gibt es keinen Grund zur Sorge. Wir sind effizient an Bord gegangen und der Flug verlief reibungslos. Lufthansa ist immer eine Freude.

San Francisco to Munich. First time my son and I decided to try flying in Premium Economy as we were flying with Lufthansa. In short, it isn't worth the money we spent. It was more comfortable than flying in Economy for the extra legroom, but it's nothing special. Differences between Economy and PE are that the meals are served on chinaware and one sits 55 plus rows in front of Economy, there is a complimentary bottle of water included as well as a small amenity kit with typical items. The kit has 'Cerruti 1861' on it not Lufthansa and was just okay. They serve a pre-flight drink (only orange juice) which I think should be varied. The drinks they serve with snacks or with meals are not individual mini wine bottles but from a large bottle. British Airways and Air France serve wine in individual mini bottles so prefer that better. The service was fine. We had very friendly flight attendants both on the outbound and inbound flights. Food was tasty. However, there are just two choices: Meat dish or pasta. And the portions are as small as a frozen meal. Everything was tiny from the tray to the chinaware. Bread rolls were at least warm but again tiny. The flight attendants put out snacks in the galley but one had to either know beforehand to expect them or just happen to walk past the toilets then notice them as there was no announcement made nor on the menu they handed out. However, the choices were either crackers, Lindt chocolates, and juices and water. Seating as mentioned above is roomy for legroom and a tiny bit widthwise. I found it problematic to recline. In fact, I could not figure out how to do so. And the tray table is folded so it is a bit of a nuisance to unfold and fold it back into the arm rest. If I weren't sitting next to my son I'd need to ask my seat mate if I could disturb them as this tray table folding/unfolding experience necessitated bothering one's seat mate's arm rest too. Worst part of the experience is that the toilets were only two for the entire PE section and they were filthy. Plus the crew seem to be stingy on toilet roll replacing. In fact, they only have one toilet roll from the beginning of the flight. Sometimes it ran out with no replacement timely. Also hand soap ran out and it took some time for them to refill it. I've flown British Airways and Air France which have bad aspects, however, at least their flight attendants were always replacing missing toiletry items regularly during the long flight. This was a connecting flight between Munich and Rome. Hated that we were not told that upon arrival in Rome we'd be landing on the tarmac and would need to take a shuttle bus to the terminal. It was cold and windy and frankly hard to maneuver the steps from the plane for me. Would hate to have an infant and/or small children in tow. All in all, I'd have to think hard if I want to spend another $2K for Lufthansa's PE in future. I just didn't feel it was worthwhile as it was not much different from sitting in Economy. In fact, they make it known that you're really in Economy as you have no special boarding privileges either

Von Frankfurt nach Miami. Diese Crew behielt ihren hohen Servicestandard bei und war der beste lange Überseeflug, an den ich mich erinnern kann. Normalerweise achte ich bei jeder Reise auf die Qualität des Service, und dieses Mal stach eine Stewardess ganz besonders hervor. Neben mir saß ein Herr, der offenbar nichts für sich tun konnte

Von Frankfurt nach London. Flug nach London um 7:00 Uhr. Beim Einsteigen stellen sie fest, dass sich das Gate ändert (während das Flugzeug bereits dort war – ein Zeichen dafür, dass sie ihre Prozesse nicht unter Kontrolle haben).

Copenhagen to Houston via Frankfurt. This is my first long haul trip with Lufthansa after many successful short haul flights with them over the past couple of years. I have to praise them for a great experience, from booking, through check in to the flight itself. We sat on the top deck at the very back, economy on the top deck of Lufthansa is a small cabin with 5-6 rows so it felt very private and service was also very efficient and fast although there was only one cabin crew. As a 182 tall guy I found the seats to be the most comfortable economy seats I have sat in as my knees didn't touch the seat in front and I could stretch my legs comfortably underneath the seat in front. Crew came round with water/juice every half hour, and in between the galley was open and you could help yourself to soft drinks or even request beer/wine. The crew were excellent, and from this return trip I can understand why LH has earned the 5 star status.

من القاهرة إلى أتلانتا عبر فرانكفورت. كنت أسافر مع أحد أفراد الأسرة وطفل رضيع ، وكانت المقاعد المخصصة عشوائية فقط ولم تأخذ في الاعتبار أن لدينا رضيعًا معنا. تم تقديم وجبة واحدة فقط بين فرانكفورت وأتلانتا (حوالي 10 ساعات طيران). اضطررت إلى إجراء بعض التغيير في رحلة العودة لأحد أفراد الأسرة ، وتعاملت مع أسوأ خدمة عملاء ، وتوقفوا عني ورفضوا أن أكون مفيدًا للمساعدة في حل المشكلات. كما تم تحصيل 400 دولار أمريكي لإضافة تذكرة حضن رضيع. خلاصة القول ، أنا وعائلتي لن أتعامل مع Lufthansa مرة أخرى ، ابق بعيدًا عن شركة طيران خدمة العملاء الرهيبة هذه.

من تونس إلى كييف عبر فرانكفورت في يونيو 2017. ذهبت مبكرًا إلى المطار لتسجيل الوصول. سألتني الفتاة في المكتب أسئلة نموذجية حول زيارتي وقدمت لها جميع المعلومات المطلوبة (التأشيرة ، وخطاب الدعوة ، وجواز السفر) و بدا كل شيء على ما يرام ، حتى جاء هذا الوكيل وأخذ جواز السفر وأعطاه لمحة ثم أخبرني أنه لا يمكنني حضور هذه الرحلة. سألته عن السبب ، فأجاب أن الأموال التي حولتها بالدولار لم تكن كافية لمستوى المعيشة في ألمانيا (يجب أن أحمل معي مبلغًا يساوي 70 يورو في اليوم) أجبت بأنني أقيم فقط في ألمانيا. لبضع ساعات ، لذا فإن قواعد تأشيرة شنغن لا تنطبق علي ، وقد أظهرت هذا المبلغ من المال للسفارة الأوكرانية وقبلوا. تمت تغطية الإقامة أثناء إقامتي في البلد المضيف وكنت واضحًا في خطاب الدعوة الأصلي الذي عرضته عليه. بدا مقتنعا بعد ما قلته وغادر. بعد بضع ثوانٍ عاد وأخبرني أنه لا يمكنني المغادرة لأن رسالتي لم تكن باللغة الإنجليزية أو الألمانية ، فقد أوضحت له أنها أصلية ومكتوبة باللغة الأوكرانية لأن هذه كانت المتطلبات من سفارة أوكرانيا ولكن ، الكلمات الرئيسية مثل اسمي ورقم جواز السفر والمكان والتاريخ واسم البرنامج ومعلومات أخرى مثل مكان الإقامة الذي تم توفيره مذكورة باللغة الإنجليزية. لحسن الحظ ، ذهبت للتحدث مع عملاء آخرين وتركوا أمتعتي والذهاب لحضور رحلتي ، بينما نفى ذلك الوكيل سلوكه وأفعاله.

Bruxelles à Munich. A part un retard au départ j'ai apprécié mon vol. Contrairement aux autres compagnies aériennes européennes, la nourriture et les boissons sont incluses. Un sandwich était tout à fait acceptable pour un vol aussi court. Le personnel était sympathique et efficace et s'est mis en quatre pour aider les passagers qui avaient des problèmes pour prendre des vols de correspondance. Il n'y avait pas d'IFE, ce qui n'est pas grave pour un vol aussi court.

Newark to Munich. Aircraft with newly designed interior. Though relatively new the headphone socket at my seat (31D) did not work. The entertainment system was shut down 45min before the flight ended. The friendliness of the cabin staff is a game of luck. Sometimes you get some nice words as a Senator. Not this time. At boarding the middle seat next to me was empty, but then someone else was re-seated there. On my proposal to re-seat the person to the next row instead (Premium Eco, completely empty) the stewardess gave me a rude comment and asked if I want to pay 400â‚¬. The vegetarian pasta was covered with a fat/tasteless clumpy cream sauce, the dressing was frozen. Do yourself a favor and fly Delta instead at least you have a chance to get an upgrade as a loyal customer.

Von Frankfurt nach Port Harcourt über Abuja. Insgesamt war es ein guter Flug mit einigen Problemen mit Gewitter bei der Landung in Abuja (NG), aber nach 1:30 Stunden in der Luft landete er gut.
